Difficult are [they]1572-their to check in full career . [Thou]5153-thou must not drive [the car]5156-the car directly through five circles , for the track takes a wide curve , obliquely , and is bound by the extreme edge of [three zones]5157-three zones . — It avoids [the Southern Pole]5158-the southern pole , and it avoids the Bear that roams around [the north]5159-the north . The way is plain ; the traces of the Wheel are manifest . “[1574-the father] Observe with care that both [the earth]1289-the earth and sky have [their]1577-their appropriate heat — Drive not too low , nor urge [the chariot]5143-the chariot through the highest plane ; for if [thy]1579-thy course attain too great a height [thou]1579-thy wilt consume the mansions of the sky , and if too low [the land]1295-the land will scorch with heat . “ Take [thou]5153-thou the middle plane , where all is safe ; nor let the Wheel turn over to the right and bear [thee]5153-thou to the twisted Snake ! nor let it take [thee]5153-thou to [the Altar on the left — so close to [earth]1287-earth]5160-the altar on the left — so close to earth — but steer the middle course . — to Fortune [I]0-i commit [thy]1579-thy fate , whose care for [thee]1579-thy so reckless of thyself [I]0-i pray . “[0-i] While [I]0-i am speaking humid night has touched [the margin of [Hesperian shores]1582-hesperian shores]1581-the margin of hesperian shores . ' Tis not for [us]1583-us to idle ; [we]1583-us are called away ; — when bright [Aurora]512-aurora shines the darkness flies . Take up the reins ! But if [thy]1579-thy stubborn breast be capable of change use not [[our]1583-us car]1584-our car , but heed [my]0-i counsel while the time permits , and while [thy]1579-thy feet are on a solid base , but not , according to [thy]1579-thy foolish wish , pressing the axle . Rather let [me]0-i light [the world]1360-the world beneath [thy]1579-thy safe and wondering gaze . ” But [Phaethon]501-phaethon with youthful vigor leaped , and in [the light - made chariot]5162-the light - made chariot lightly stood : and [he]501-phaethon rejoiced , and with the reins in hand thanked [[his]501-phaethon reluctant parent]5163-his reluctant parent . Instantly Eous , [Aethon]514-aethon , [Pyrois]515-pyrois and [Phlegon]516-phlegon , the winged horses of [the Sun]39-the sun , gave vent to flame - like neighs that filled the shaking air ; [they]1579-thy pawed the barriers with [their]1579-thy shining hoofs . Then [Tethys]507-tethys , witless of [[her]507-tethys grandson]5164-her grandson 's fate let back the barriers , — and [the universe]1323-the universe was [theirs]1579-thy to traverse . Taking [the well - known road]5166-the well - known road , and moving through the air with winged feet , [they]1579-thy pierced resisting clouds , and spreading wide [their]1579-thy pinions soared upon the eastern wind , far - wafted from [that realm]5167-that realm . But [Phaethon]501-phaethon , so easy of [their]1579-thy yoke , lost all control , and [the great car]5168-the great car was tossed , — as [tapered ships]5169-tapered ships when lightened of [their]5169-tapered ships ballast toss and heave unsteady in the surging seas : [the car]5156-the car leaped lightly in the air , and in [the heights]5171-the heights was tossed unsteady as an empty shell . Soon as [the steeds]5155-the steeds perceived it , with a rush impetuous , [they]5155-the steeds left the beaten track ; regardless of all order and control ; and [Phaethon]501-phaethon filled with fear , knew not to guide with trusted reins , nor where the way might be — nor , if [he]501-phaethon knew , could [he]501-phaethon control [their]5155-the steeds flight . Warmed in the sunshine , never felt before , the gelid Triones attempted vain to bathe in seas forbid : the Serpent cold and torpid by the frozen Pole , too cold for contest , warmed , and rage assumed from heat bootes , troubled by the heat , took flight , impeded by [his]501-phaethon wain . And as from skies of utmost height unhappy [Phaethon]501-phaethon beheld the earth receding from [his]501-phaethon view , a pallor spread [his]501-phaethon cheeks with sudden fear ; [his]501-phaethon knees began to quake ; and through the flare of vast effulgence darkness closed [his]501-phaethon eyes . Now vainy [he]501-phaethon regrets [he]501-phaethon ever touched [[his]501-phaethon father]1530-his father 's steeds , and [he]501-phaethon is stunned with grief that so entreating [he]501-phaethon prevailed to know [his]501-phaethon true descent . [He]501-phaethon rather would be called [the son of [Merops]503-merops]5174-the son of merops . As [a ship]5175-a ship is tossed by [raging Boreas]460-boreas , when the conquered helm has been abandoned , and [the pilot]5176-the pilot leaves [the vessel]5177-the vessel to [his]501-phaethon vows and to [the Gods]1395-the gods ; so , helpless , [he]501-phaethon is borne along the sky . What can [he]501-phaethon ? Much of [heaven]1454-heaven remains behind ; a longer distance is in front of [him]501-phaethon — each way is measured in [his]501-phaethon anxious mind . — at first [his]501-phaethon gaze is fixed upon the west , which fate has destined [he]501-phaethon shall never reach , and then [his]501-phaethon eyes turn backward to the east . — so , stupefied and dazed [he]501-phaethon neither dares to loose the bits , nor tighten on the reins , and [he]501-phaethon is ignorant of the horses ' names . [He]501-phaethon sees horrific wonders scattered round , and images of hideous animals . — and there 's a spot where [Scorpion]509-scorpion bends [his]509-scorpion claws in double circles , and with tail and arms on either side , stretches [his]509-scorpion limbs throughout the space of two [Celestial Signs]40-celestial signs ; and when [the lad]5180-the lad beheld [him]501-phaethon , steeped in oozing slime of venom , swart , and threatening to strike grim wounds with jagged spear - points , [he]501-phaethon was lost ; and , fixed in chills of horror , dropped the reins . When these [they]5180-the lad felt upon [their]5180-the lad rising backs , [the startled steeds]5181-the startled steeds sprang forthwith ; and , unchecked , through atmospheres of regions unexplored , thence goaded by [their]5180-the lad unchecked violence , broke through the lawful bounds , and rushed upon the high fixed stars . [They]5180-the lad dragged [the chariot]5143-the chariot through devious ways , and soared amid [the heights]5171-the heights ; dashed down deep pathways , far , precipitous , and gained a level near [the scorching earth]5184-the scorching earth . [Phoebe]517-phoebe is wondering that [[her]517-phoebe brother]5185-her brother 's steeds run lower than [her]517-phoebe own , and sees the smoke of scorching clouds . [The highest altitudes]5186-the highest altitudes are caught in flames , and as [their]5186-the highest altitudes moistures dry they crack in chasms . The grass is blighted ; trees are burnt up with their leaves ; the ripe brown crops give fuel for self destruction — Oh what small complaints ! [Great cities]5187-great cities perish with [their]5187-great cities walls , and [peopled nations]5188-peopled nations are consumed to dust — [the forests]5189-the forests and [the mountains]5190-the mountains are destroyed . [Cilician Taurus]41-cilician taurus , [Athos]42-athos and [Tmolus]1016-tmolus , and [Oeta]19-oeta are burning ; and the far - famed Ida and [all [her]19-oeta cooling rills]5191-all her cooling rills are dry and burning , and [virgin Helicon]45-virgin helicon , and [Hoemos]46-hoemos — later [Oeagrius]518-oeagrius called — and [Aetna]762-aetna with tremendous , redoubled flames , and double - peaked [Parnassus]473-parnassus , [Sicilian Eryx]49-sicilian eryx , [Cynthus]744-cynthus — [Othrys]519-othrys , pine - clad , and Rhodope , deprived [his]519-othrys snowy mantle , and [Dindyma]51-dindyma and Mycale and [Mimas]52-mimas , and [Mount Cithaeron]53-mount cithaeron , famed for sacred rites : and [Scythia]4-scythia , though [a land of frost]5192-a land of frost , is burning , and [Caucasus]54-caucasus , — and [Ossa]9-ossa burns with [Pindus]30-pindus , — and greater than those two [Olympus]11-olympus burns — [the lofty Alps]5193-the lofty alps , [the cloud - topped Apennines]57-the cloud - topped apennines . And [Phaethon]501-phaethon , as [he]501-phaethon inhaled the air , burning and scorching as a furnace blast , and saw destruction on [the flaming world]5194-the flaming world , and [his]501-phaethon great chariot wreathed in quenchless fires , was suddenly unable to endure the heat , the smoke and cinders , and [he]501-phaethon swooned away . — if [he]501-phaethon had known the way , those winged steeds would rush as wild unguided . — then the skin of [Ethiopians]520-ethiopians took a swarthy hue , the hot blood tingling to the surface : then the heat dried up [the land of [Libya]58-libya]5195-the land of libya ; dishevelled , [the lorn Nymphs]5196-the lorn nymphs , lamenting , sought for all [[their]5196-the lorn nymphs emptied springs and lakes]5197-their emptied springs and lakes in vain ; [Boeotia]59-boeotia wailed for [Dirce]521-dirce 's cooling wave , and [Argos]60-argos wailed for [Amymone]522-amymone 's stream — and even Corinth for the clear Pyrene . Not safer from the flames were [distant streams]5198-distant streams ; — the Tanais in [middle stream]5199-middle stream was steaming and old Peneus and [Teuthrantian Caicus]61-teuthrantian caicus , [Ismenus]523-ismenus , rapid and [Arcadian Erymanthus]62-arcadian erymanthus ; and even [Xanthus]524-xanthus destined for a second burning , and tawny - waved Lycormas , and Meander , turning and twisting , and [Thracian Melas]63-thracian melas burns , and [the Laconian Eurotas]525-the laconian eurotas burns , the mighty [Babylonian Euphrates]64-babylonian euphrates , [Orontes]65-orontes and [the Ganges]66-the ganges , swift Thermodon , [Ister]67-ister and [Phasis]68-phasis and [Alpheus]526-alpheus boil . [The banks of [Spercheus]69-spercheus]5200-the banks of spercheus burn , the gold of [Tagus]70-tagus is melting in the flames . The swans whose songs enhanced the beauties of [Maeonian banks]5201-maeonian banks are scalded in [the Cayster]71-the cayster 's middle wave . [The Nile affrighted]527-o nile fled to [parts remote]5202-parts remote , and hid [his]527-o nile head forever from [the world]1360-the world : now empty are [his]527-o nile seven mouths , and dry without or wave or stream ; and also dry [Ismenian Hebrus]72-ismenian hebrus , [Strymon]73-strymon and [the streams of [Hesper - Land]74-hesper - land]5204-the streams of hesper - land , the rivers Rhine and [Rhone]75-rhone , and [Po]76-po , and [Tiber]528-the tiber , [ruler of [the world]1360-the world]5205-ruler of the world . And even as the ground asunder burst , the light amazed in gloomy [Tartarus]77-tartarus [the King Infernal]5207-the king infernal and [[his]5207-the king infernal Spouse]5208-his spouse . [The sea]1298-the sea contracted and [his]5207-the king infernal level waste became [a sandy desert]5210-a sandy desert . [The huge mountain tops , once covered by [the ocean]1288-the ocean 's waves]5211-the huge mountain tops , once covered by the ocean 's waves , reared up , by which the scattered Cyclades increased . Even the fishes sought for [deeper pools]5213-deeper pools ; — [the crooked dolphins]5214-the crooked dolphins dared not skip the waves ; the lifeless sea - calves floated on the top ; and it is even famed that [Nereus]467-nereus hid with [Doris]506-doris and [[her]506-doris daughters]5215-her daughters , deep below in seething caverns . With a dauntless mien thrice [Neptune]472-neptune tried to thrust [his]472-neptune arms above [the waters]5216-the waters ; — thrice the heated air overcame [his]472-neptune courage . Then [the genial Earth]5217-the genial earth , although surrounded by [the waters of [the sea]1298-the sea]5218-the waters of the sea , was parched and dry ; for all [[her]5217-the genial earth streams]5220-her streams had hid deep in the darkness of [[her]5217-the genial earth winding caves]5221-her winding caves . — [she]5217-the genial earth lifted [her]5217-the genial earth productive countenance , up to [her]5217-the genial earth rounded neck , and held [her]5217-the genial earth palms on [her]5217-the genial earth sad brows ; and as the mountains huge trembled and tottered , beneath [her]5217-the genial earth wonted plane declined [she]5217-the genial earth for a space — and thus began , with parched voice ; “[1586-thy] If this is [thy]1586-thy decree , O , Highest of [the Gods]1395-the gods , — if [I]0-i have sinned why do [thy]1586-thy lightnings linger ? For if doomed by fires consuming [I]0-i to perish must , let [me]0-i now die in [thy]1586-thy celestial flames — hurled by thine arm — and thus alleviate , by thine omnipotence , this agony . “ How difficult to open [my]0-i parched mouth , and speak these words ! ( the vapours choking [her]5217-the genial earth ) , behold [my]0-i scorching hair , and see the clouds of ashes falling on [my]0-i blinded eyes , and on [my]0-i features ! What a recompense for [my]0-i fertility ! How often [I]0-i have suffered from the wounds of crooked plows and rending harrows — tortured year by year ! For this [I]0-i give to cattle juicy leaves and fruits to [man]1330-man and frankincense to [thee]1586-thy ! “[0-i] Suppose destruction is [my]0-i just award what have the waters and [[thy]0-i brother]1588-thy brother done ? Why should [[thy]0-i brother]1588-thy brother 's cooling waves decrease and thus recede so distant from the skies ? If not [[thy]0-i brother]1588-thy brother 's good nor [mine]0-i may touch [thy]0-i mercy , let the pity of [[thy]0-i Heaven]1591-thy heaven , for lo , the smoking poles on either side attest , if flames consume them or destroy , the ruin of [[thy]0-i palace]1592-thy palace . [Atlas]529-atlas , huge , with restive shoulders hardly can support the burning heavens . If [the seas and lands]1593-the seas and lands together perish and [[thy]0-i palace]1592-thy palace fall , the universe confused will plunge once more to ancient Chaos . Save it from this wreck — if anything survive the fury of the flames . ” So made [the tortured Earth]5223-the tortured earth an end of speech ; and [she]5223-the tortured earth was fain to hide [her]5223-the tortured earth countenance in [caves that border on the nether night]5224-caves that border on the nether night . But now [the Almighty Father]5225-the almighty father , having called to witness all [the Gods of [Heaven]5-heaven]5226-the gods of heaven , and [him]5225-the almighty father who gave [the car]5156-the car , that , else [his]5225-the almighty father power be shown , must perish all in dire confusion , high [he]5225-the almighty father mounted to the altitude from which [he]5225-the almighty father spreads the mantling clouds , and fulminates [his]5225-the almighty father dreadful thunders and swift lightning - bolts terrific . — Clouds were none to find on [the earth]1289-the earth , and the surrounding skies were void of rain . — [Jove]456-jove , having reached [that summit]5229-that summit , stood and poised in [his]456-jove almighty hand a flashing dart , and , hurling it , deprived of life and seat [the youthful charioteer]5230-the youthful charioteer , and struck with fire the raging flames — and by the same great force those flames enveloping [the earth]1289-the earth were quenched , and [he]5225-the almighty father who caused [their]5232-their fury lost [his]5225-the almighty father life . Frantic in [their]5232-their affright the horses sprang across the bounded way and cast [their]5232-their yokes , and through the tangled harness lightly leaped . And here the scattered harness lay , and there the shattered axle , wrenched from off the pole , and various portions of [the broken car]5233-the broken car ; spokes of the broken Wheel were scattered round . And far fell [Phaethon]501-phaethon with flaming hair ; as haply from the summer sky appears a falling star , although it never drops to [startled earth]5234-startled earth . — Far distant from [[his]501-phaethon home]5235-his home [the deep [Eridanus]530-eridanus]5236-the deep eridanus received [the lad]5180-the lad and bathed [his]5180-the lad foaming face . [His]5180-the lad body charred by triple flames Hesperian Naiads bore , still smoking , to [a tomb]5238-a tomb , and this engraved upon the stone ; “[5115-mother] Here [Phaethon]501-phaethon 's remains lie buried . [He]501-phaethon who drove [[his]501-phaethon father]1530-his father 's car and fell , although [he]501-phaethon made a great attempt . ” Filled with consuming woe , [[his]501-phaethon father]1530-his father hid [his]1530-his father countenance which grief had overcast . And now , surpassing [our]5240-our belief , [they]5241-they say a day passed over with no glowing sun ; — but light - affording flames appeared to change disaster to the cause of good . [Amazed]531-amazed , the woeful [Clymene]502-clymene , when [she]502-clymene had moaned in grief , amid [her]502-clymene lamentations tore [her]502-clymene bosom , as across [the world]1360-the world [she]502-clymene roamed , at first to seek [his]5180-the lad lifeless corpse , and then [his]5180-the lad bones . [She]502-clymene wandered to [that distant land]5243-that distant land and found at last [his]5180-the lad bones ensepulchred . There , clinging to [the grave]5244-the grave [she]502-clymene fell and bathed with many tears [his]5180-the lad name on marble carved , and with [her]502-clymene bosom warmed the freezing stone . And all [the daughters of the Sun]5245-the daughters of the sun went there giving [their]5245-the daughters of the sun tears , alas a useless gift ; — [they]5245-the daughters of the sun wept and beat [their]5245-the daughters of the sun breasts , and day and night called , “[501-phaethon] [Phaethon]501-phaethon , ” who heard not any sound of [their]5245-the daughters of the sun complaint : — and there [they]5245-the daughters of the sun lay foredone , all scattered round [the tomb]5246-the tomb . The silent moon had four times joined [her]502-clymene horns and filled [her]502-clymene disk , while [they]5245-the daughters of the sun , according to an ancient rite , made lamentation . Prone upon the ground , [the eldest]5247-the eldest , [Phaethusa]532-phaethusa , would arise from there , but found [her]5247-the eldest feet were growing stiff ; and uttered moan . [Lampetia]533-lampetia wished to aid [[her]533-lampetia sister]1501-her sister but was hindered by new roots ; a third when [she]533-lampetia would tear [her]533-lampetia hair , plucked forth but leaves : another wailed to find [her]533-lampetia legs were fastened in a tree ; another moaned to find [her]533-lampetia arms to branches had been changed . And while [they]5245-the daughters of the sun wondered , bark enclosed [their]5245-the daughters of the sun thighs , and covered [their]5245-the daughters of the sun smooth bellies , and [their]5245-the daughters of the sun breasts , and shoulders and [their]5245-the daughters of the sun hands , but left untouched [their]5245-the daughters of the sun lips that called upon [[their]5245-the daughters of the sun mother]5249-their mother 's name . What can [she]5249-their mother do for [them]5245-the daughters of the sun ? Hither [she]5249-their mother runs and thither runs , wherever frenzy leads . [She]5249-their mother kisses [them]5245-the daughters of the sun , alas , while yet [she]5249-their mother may ! But not content with this , [she]5249-their mother tried to hale [their]5245-the daughters of the sun bodies from the trees ; and [she]5249-their mother would tear the tender branches with [her]5249-their mother hands , but lo ! The blood oozed out as from a bleeding wound ; and as [she]5249-their mother wounded [them]5245-the daughters of the sun [they]5245-the daughters of the sun shrieked aloud , “[501-phaethon] Spare [me]0-i ! O [mother]5115-mother spare [me]0-i ; in the tree [my]0-i flesh is torn ! farewell ! farewell ! farewell ! ” And as [they]5245-the daughters of the sun spoke the bark enclosed [their]5245-the daughters of the sun lips . [Their]5245-the daughters of the sun tears flow forth , and from the new - formed boughs amber distils and slowly hardens in the sun ; and far from there upon the waves is borne to deck [the Latin women]5250-the latin women . [Cycnus]534-cycnus , [son of [Sthenelus]535-sthenelus]5251-son of sthenelus , by [[his]534-cycnus maternal house]5252-his maternal house akin to [Phaethon]501-phaethon , and thrice by love allied , beheld this wonderful event . — [he]534-cycnus left [[his]534-cycnus kingdom of [Liguria]78-liguria]5253-his kingdom of liguria , and [all [its]5253-his kingdom of liguria peopled cities]5254-all its peopled cities , to lament where [the sad sisters]5255-the sad sisters had increased [the woods]1317-the woods , beside [the green banks of [Eridanus]530-eridanus]5257-the green banks of eridanus . There , as [he]534-cycnus made complaint , [his]534-cycnus manly voice began to pipe a treble , shrill ; and long gray plumes concealed [his]534-cycnus hair . A slender neck extended from [his]534-cycnus breast , and reddening toes were joined together by a membrane . Wings grew from [his]534-cycnus sides , and from [his]534-cycnus mouth was made a blunted beak . Now [Cycnus]534-cycnus is a swan , and yet [he]534-cycnus fears to trust the skies and [Jove]456-jove , for [he]534-cycnus remembers fires , unjustly sent , and therefore shuns the heat that [he]534-cycnus abhors , and haunts [the spacious lakes and pools and streams that quench the fires]5258-the spacious lakes and pools and streams that quench the fires . In squalid garb , meanwhile , and destitute of all [his]534-cycnus rays , [the sire of [Phaethon]501-phaethon]5259-the sire of phaethon , as dark as when eclipse bedims [his]534-cycnus Wheel , abhors [himself]534-cycnus and hates the light , shuns the bright day , gives up [his]534-cycnus mind to grief , adds passion to [his]534-cycnus woe , denies [the earth]1289-the earth [his]534-cycnus countenance , and thus laments ; “[0-i] [[My]0-i lot]1597-my lot was ever restless from the dawn of time , and [I]0-i am weary of this labour , void and endless . Therefore , let who will urge forth [[my]0-i car]1598-my car , light - bearing , and if none may dare , when [all the Gods of [Heaven]5-heaven]1599-all the gods of heaven acknowledge it , let [Jove]456-jove [himself]456-jove essay the task . Perchance , when [he]456-jove takes up the reins , [he]456-jove may forget [his]456-jove dreadful lightning that bereaves of [child]1600-child [a father]1601-a father 's love ; and as [he]456-jove tries the strength of those flame - footed steeds will know , in truth , [the lad who failed to guide [my]0-i chariot]1602-the lad who failed to guide my chariot deserved not death . ” But [all the Deities]5261-all the deities encircle [Phoebus]549-phoebus as [he]549-phoebus makes complaint , and with [their]5261-all the deities supplications [they]5261-all the deities entreat [him]549-phoebus not to plunge [the world]1360-the world in darkness . [Jove]456-jove would find excuses for the lightning - bolt , hurled from [his]456-jove hand , and adds imperious threats to [his]456-jove entreaties . [Phoebus]549-phoebus calls [his]549-phoebus steeds , frenzied with their maddening fires , and breaks [their]5261-all the deities fury , as [he]549-phoebus vents with stinging lash [his]549-phoebus rage upon [them]5261-all the deities , and in passion lays on [them]5261-all the deities the death of [Phaethon]501-phaethon [[his]549-phoebus son]5099-his son . Now after [Phaethon]501-phaethon had suffered death for the vast ruin wrought by scorching flames , all the great walls of [Heaven]5-heaven 's circumference , unmeasured , views [the Father of the Gods]5078-the father of the gods , with searching care , that [none impaired by heat]5265-none impaired by heat may fall in ruins . Well assured [they]5261-all the deities stand in self - sustaining strength , [his]549-phoebus view , at last , on all the mundane works of [man]1330-man is turned ; — [his]549-phoebus loving gaze long resting on [his]549-phoebus own Arcadia . And [he]549-phoebus starts [the streams]5267-the streams and springs that long have feared to flow ; paints [the wide earth]5268-the wide earth with [verdant fields]4941-verdant fields ; covers the trees with leaves , and clothes the injured forests in their green . While wandering in [the world]1360-the world , [he]549-phoebus stopped amazed , when [he]549-phoebus beheld [the lovely Nymph , Calisto , and fires of love]5271-the lovely nymph , calisto , and fires of love were kindled in [his]549-phoebus breast . [Calisto]536-calisto was not clothed in sumptuous robes , nor did [she]536-calisto deck [her]536-calisto hair in artful coils ; but with a buckle [she]536-calisto would gird [her]536-calisto robe , and bind [her]536-calisto long hair with a fillet white . [She]536-calisto bore a slender javelin in [her]536-calisto hand , or held the curving bow ; and thus in arms as chaste [Diana]484-diana , [none of [Maenalus]537-maenalus]5272-none of maenalus was loved by [that fair goddess]5273-that fair goddess more than [she]536-calisto . But everything must change . When bright the sun rolled down the sky , beyond [his]549-phoebus middle course , [she]536-calisto pierced a secret thicket , known to [her]536-calisto , and having slipped the quiver from [her]536-calisto arm , [she]536-calisto loosed the bended bow , and softly down upon the velvet turf reclining , pressed [her]536-calisto white neck on the quiver while [she]536-calisto slept . When [Jupiter]475-jupiter beheld [her]536-calisto , negligent and beautiful , [he]0-i argued thus , “[0-i] How can [[my]0-i consort]1603-my consort , [Juno]488-juno , learn of this ? And yet , if chance should give [her]1603-my consort knowledge , what care [I]0-i ? Let gain offset the scolding of [her]1603-my consort tongue ! ” This said , [the god]5013-the god transformed [himself]5013-the god and took [Diana]484-diana 's form — assumed [Diana]484-diana 's dress and imitating [her]536-calisto awoke [the maid]1503-the maid , and spoke in gentle tones , “[1603-my consort] What [mountain slope]1604-mountain slope , [O virgin of [[my]0-i train]1606-my train]1605-o virgin of my train , hath been [thy]1605-o virgin of my train chase ? ” Which , having heard , [Calisto]536-calisto , rose and said , “[1605-o virgin of my train] Hail , [goddess]1607-goddess ! greater than celestial Jove ! [I]0-i would declare it though [he]0-i heard the words . ” [Jove]456-jove heard and smiled , well pleased to be preferred above [himself]456-jove , and kissed [her]484-diana many times , and strained [her]484-diana in [his]456-jove arms , while [she]484-diana began to tell the varied fortunes of [her]484-diana hunt . — but when [his]456-jove ardent love was known to [her]484-diana , [she]484-diana struggled to escape from [his]456-jove embrace : ah , how could [she]484-diana , [a tender maid]5276-a tender maid , resist [almighty Jove]456-jove ? — Be sure , [Saturnia]538-saturnia if [thou]1605-o virgin of my train hadst only witnessed [her]484-diana [thy]1605-o virgin of my train heart had shown more pity ! — [Jupiter on wings , transcendent]5277-jupiter on wings , transcendent , sought [his]5277-jupiter on wings , transcendent glorious heights ; but [she]484-diana , in haste departing from that grove , almost forgot [her]484-diana quiver and [her]484-diana bow . Behold , [Diana]484-diana , with [her]484-diana virgin train , when hunting on [the slopes of Maenalus]5278-the slopes of maenalus , amidst the pleasures of exciting sport , espied [the Nymph]5012-the nymph and called [her]5012-the nymph , who , afraid that [Jove]456-jove apparelled in disguise deceived , drew backward for a moment , till appeared to [her]484-diana the lovely Nymphs that followed : thus , assured deceit was none , [she]484-diana ventured near . Alas , how difficult to hide disgrace ! [She]484-diana could not raise [her]484-diana vision from the ground , nor as [the leader of [the hunting Nymphs]5281-the hunting nymphs]5280-the leader of the hunting nymphs , as was [[her]484-diana wo nt]5282-her wo nt , walk by [the goddess]4979-the goddess ' side . [Her]484-diana silence and [her]484-diana blushes were the signs of injured honour . Ah [Diana]484-diana , [thou]5284-thou , if [thou]5284-thou wert not [a virgin]1462-a virgin , wouldst perceive and pity [her]484-diana unfortunate distress . The Moon 's bent horns were rising from [their]1608-their ninth sojourn , when , fainting from [Apollo]549-phoebus 's flames , [the goddess of the Chase]5286-the goddess of the chase observed [a cool umbrageous grove , from which a murmuring stream ran babbling gently over golden sands]5287-a cool umbrageous grove , from which a murmuring stream ran babbling gently over golden sands . When [she]5286-the goddess of the chase approved the spot , lightly [she]5286-the goddess of the chase struck [her]5286-the goddess of the chase foot against the ripples of [the stream]5090-the stream , and praising it began ; “[0-i] Far from the gaze of all the curious [we]1608-their may bathe [our]1608-their limbs , and sport in this clear water . ” Quickly [they]1608-their undid [their]1608-their garments , — but [Calisto]536-calisto hid behind [the others]5289-the others , till [they]1608-their knew [her]536-calisto state . — [Diana]484-diana in a rage exclaimed , “[1609-thou] Away ! [Thou]1609-thou must not desecrate [[our]1608-their sacred springs]1610-our sacred springs ! ” And [she]484-diana was driven thence . Ere this transpired , observed [the consort of [the Thunder - God]5291-the thunder - god [her]536-calisto altered mien]5290-the consort of the thunder - god her altered mien ; but [she]484-diana for ripening time withheld severe resentment . Now delay was needless for distracted [Juno]488-juno heard [Calisto]536-calisto of [the god of Heaven]5292-the god of heaven had borne [a boy called [Arcas]539-arcas]5293-a boy called arcas . Full of jealous rage , [her]488-juno eyes and thoughts enkindled as [she]488-juno cried ; “[1609-thou] And only this was wanting to complete [your]1611-you wickedness , that [you]1611-you should bear [a son]1612-a son and flaunt abroad the infamy of [Jove]456-jove ! Unpunished [you]1611-you shall not escape , for [I]0-i will spoil the beauty that has made [you]1611-you proud and dazzled [Jupiter]475-jupiter with wanton art . ” So saying , by [her]488-juno forehead 's tresses seized [the goddess]4979-the goddess on [her]488-juno rival ; and [she]488-juno dragged [her]488-juno roughly to the ground . Pleading [she]488-juno raised [her]488-juno suppliant arms and begged for mercy . — While [she]488-juno pled , black hair spread over [her]488-juno white limbs ; [her]488-juno hands were lengthened into feet , and claws long - curving tipped them ; snarling jaws deformed the mouth that [Jove]456-jove had kissed . And lest [her]488-juno prayers and piteous words might move [some listening God]5295-some listening god , and give remembrance , speech was so denied , that only from [her]488-juno throat came angry growls , now uttered hoarse and threatening . Still remains [her]488-juno understanding , though [her]488-juno body , thus transformed , makes [her]488-juno appear [a savage bear]5296-a savage bear . — [her]488-juno sorrows are expressed in many a groan , repeated as [she]488-juno lifts [her]488-juno hands — if [we]5297-we may call them so — repeated as [she]488-juno lifts them towards the stars and skies , ungrateful [Jove]456-jove regarding ; but [her]488-juno voice accuses not . Afraid to rest in [unfrequented woods]5298-unfrequented woods , [she]488-juno wandered in [the fields that once were [hers]488-juno]5299-the fields that once were hers , around [[her]488-juno well - known dwelling]5300-her well - known dwelling . Over crags , in terror , [she]488-juno was driven by the cries of hounds ; and many a time [she]488-juno fled in fear , a huntress from [the hunters]5301-the hunters , or [she]488-juno hid from savage animals ; forgetting [her]488-juno transformed condition . Changed into a bear , [she]488-juno fled affrighted from the bears that haunt [the rugged mountains]5302-the rugged mountains ; and [she]488-juno feared and fled the wolves , — although [[her]488-juno father]5022-her father was a wolf . When thrice five birthdays rounded out [the youth of [Arcas]539-arcas]5304-the youth of arcas , [offspring of [[Lycaon]466-lycaon 's child]5306-lycaon 's child]5305-offspring of lycaon 's child , [he]539-arcas hunted in [the forest of]5307-the forest of [his]539-arcas choice ; where , hanging with [his]539-arcas platted nets [the trees of [Erymanthian forest]5309-erymanthian forest]5308-the trees of erymanthian forest , [he]539-arcas espied [[his]539-arcas transformed mother]5310-his transformed mother , — but [he]539-arcas knew [her]5310-his transformed mother not ; [no one]5311-no one had told [him]539-arcas of [his]539-arcas parentage . Knowing [[her]5310-his transformed mother child]5312-her child , [she]5310-his transformed mother stood with levelled gaze , amazed and mute as [he]539-arcas began approach ; but [Arcas]539-arcas , frightened at the sight drew back to pierce [[his]539-arcas mother]1520-his mother 's breast with wounding spear . — but not permitting it [the god of Heaven]5292-the god of heaven averted , and removed [them]5292-the god of heaven from that crime . [He]539-arcas , in a mighty wind — through [vacant space]5315-vacant space , upbore [them]5292-the god of heaven to [the dome of starry heaven]5316-the dome of starry heaven , and fixed them , Constellations , bright amid the starry host . [Juno]488-juno on high beheld [Calisto]536-calisto crowned with glory — great with rage [her]488-juno bosom heaved . [She]488-juno flew across [the sea]1298-the sea , to hoary [Tethys]507-tethys and to old Oceanus , whom [all the Gods]5318-all the gods revere , and thus to [them]5318-all the gods in answer to [their]5318-all the gods words [she]488-juno made address ; “[0-i] And is it wondered that [the Queen of Gods]1613-the queen of gods comes hither from [ethereal abodes]1614-ethereal abodes ? [[My]0-i rival]1615-my rival sits upon [the Throne of [Heaven]5-heaven]1388-the throne of heaven : yea , when the wing of Night has darkened let [my]0-i fair word be deemed of no repute , if [you]1617-you behold not in the height of Heaven those new made stars , now honoured to [my]0-i shame , conspicuous ; fixed in the highest dome of space that circles the utmost axis of [the world]1360-the world . “ Who , then , should hesitate to put affront on [Juno]488-juno ? matchless goddess ! each offense redounds in benefit ! Who dreads [her]488-juno rage ? Oh boundless powers ! Oh unimagined deeds ! [[My]1620-his enemy]5319-my enemy assumes [a goddess]5320-a goddess ' form when [my]1620-his decree deprives [her]488-juno human shape ; — and thus [the guilty]5321-the guilty rue [their]5321-the guilty chastisement ! “[1620-his] Now let [high Jove to human shape]1619-high jove to human shape transform this hideous beast , as once before [he]1620-his changed [his]1620-his Io from a heifer . — Let [him]1620-his now divorce [his]1620-his Juno and consort with [her]1621-her , and lead [Calisto]536-calisto to [[his]1620-his couch]4956-his couch , and take that wolf , [Lycaon]466-lycaon , for [a father - in - law]1623-a father - in - law ! “ Oh , if an injury to [me]1624-the gods of ocean , [[your]1620-his child]5322-your child , may move [your]1620-his pity ! drive the Seven Stars from waters crystalline and azure - tint , and [your]1620-his domain debar from those that shine in Heaven , rewarded for [Jove]456-jove 's wickedness . — bathe not [a concubine in waters pure]5323-a concubine in waters pure . ”[1624-the gods of ocean] — [the Gods of [Ocean]87-ocean]1624-the gods of ocean granted [her]1621-her request . High in [her]1621-her graceful chariot through the air , translucent , wends [the goddess]4979-the goddess , [glorious child of [Saturn]463-saturn]1626-glorious child of saturn , with [her]1621-her peacocks many - hued : [her]1621-her peacocks , by the death of [Argus]490-argus limped , so gay were made when black as midnight turned [thy]1621-her wings , O chattering raven ! white of yore . For , long ago the ravens were not black — [their]1627-their plumage then was white as any dove — white - feathered , snow - white as the geese that guard with watchful cries [the Capitol]1628-the capitol : as white as swans that haunt [the streams]5267-the streams . [Disgrace]540-disgrace reversed the raven 's hue from white to black , because offense was given by [his]1630-his chattering tongue . O glorious [Phoebus]549-phoebus ! dutiful to [thee]1631-thee , [Coronis of [Larissa]83-larissa , fairest maid of [all Aemonia]84-all aemonia]541-coronis , was a grateful charm , a joy to [thee]1631-thee whilst faithful to [thy]1631-thee love , — while none defamed [her]541-coronis chastity . But when [the Raven]1632-the raven , bird of [Phoebus]549-phoebus , learned [the Nymph]5012-the nymph had been unfaithful , mischief - bent that bird , spreading [his]1630-his white wings , hastened to impart the sad news to [[his]1630-his master]1634-his master . After [him]1630-his [the prattling Crow]1635-the prattling crow followed with flapping wings , eager to learn what caused [the Raven]542-the raven 's haste . Concealing nothing , with [his]1630-his busy tongue [the Raven]1632-the raven gave the scandal to that bird : and unto [him]1630-his [the prattling Crow]1635-the prattling crow replied ; “ A fruitless errand has befooled [thy]1630-his wits ! Take timely warning of [my]1635-the prattling crow fateful cries : consider what [I]1635-the prattling crow was and what [I]1635-the prattling crow am : was justice done ? ' Twas [my]1635-the prattling crow fidelity that caused [my]1635-the prattling crow downfall . For , it came to pass , within a basket , fashioned of small twigs , [Minerva]543-minerva had enclosed [that spawn]5324-that spawn ; begot without [a mother]5325-a mother , [Ericthonius]544-ericthonius ; which to the wardship of [three virgins]5326-three virgins , born of [double - natured Cecrops]5327-double - natured cecrops , [she]543-minerva consigned with this injunction , ‘ Look [ye]5326-three virgins not therein , nor learn the secret . ’ — “[1635-the prattling crow] But [I]0-i saw [their]1638-their deeds while hidden in the leaves of a great tree two of [the sisters]1639-the sisters , [Herse]1640-herse and [Pandrosos]545-pandrosos , observed the charge , but scoffing at [their]1638-their fears , the third , [Aglauros]546-aglauros , with [her]546-aglauros nimble hands untied the knotted cords , and there disclosed a serpent and [an infant]1641-an infant . This [I]0-i told [Minerva]543-minerva ; but in turn , [she]543-minerva took away [her]543-minerva long protection , and degraded [me]0-i beneath the boding Owl . — [My]0-i punishment should warn the birds how many dangers [they]1642-they incur from chattering tongues . “ Not [my]0-i desire impelled [me]0-i to report to [her]543-minerva , nor did [I]0-i crave protection ; which , if [thou]5328-thou wilt ask [Minerva]543-minerva , though enraged [she]543-minerva must confirm . And when is told to [thee]5328-thou what lately fame established , [thou]5328-thou wilt not despise the Crow . “[0-i] Begot by [Coronaeus]547-coronaeus , who was lord of [all the land of [Phocis]86-phocis]1643-all the land of phocis , [I]0-i was once [a royal virgin]1644-a royal virgin , sought by [suitors rich and powerful]1645-suitors rich and powerful . But beauty proved the cause of [my]0-i misfortune ; for it came to pass , as [I]0-i was slowly walking on the sands that skirt [the merge of ocean]1646-the merge of ocean , where was oft [my]0-i wo nt to roam , [the god of [Ocean]87-ocean]1647-the god of ocean gazed impassioned , and with honied words implored [my]0-i love — but finding that [I]0-i paid no heed , and all [his]1647-the god of ocean words despised , [he]1647-the god of ocean fumed with rage and followed [me]0-i . “ [I]1647-the god of ocean fled from [that sea - shore]5329-that sea - shore , to [fields of shifting sands]5330-fields of shifting sands that all [my]1647-the god of ocean steps delayed : and in despair upon [the Gods]1395-the gods and [all mankind]5332-all mankind [I]1647-the god of ocean called for aid , but [I]1647-the god of ocean was quite alone and helpless . Presently [the chaste Minerva]5333-the chaste minerva , [me]1647-the god of ocean , [a virgin]1462-a virgin , heard and [me]1647-the god of ocean assistance gave : for as [my]1647-the god of ocean arms implored the Heavens , downy feathers grew from out the flesh ; and as [I]1647-the god of ocean tried to cast [my]1647-the god of ocean mantle from [my]1647-the god of ocean shoulders , wings appeared upon [my]1647-the god of ocean tender sides ; and as [I]1647-the god of ocean strove to beat [my]1647-the god of ocean naked bosom with [my]1647-the god of ocean hands , nor hands remained nor naked breast to beat . “[1647-the god of ocean] [I]0-i ran , and as [I]0-i sped the sands no more delayed [me]0-i ; [I]0-i was soaring from the ground ; and as [I]0-i winged the air , [Minerva]543-minerva chose [me]0-i for a life - companion ; but alas , although [my]0-i life was blameless , fate or chance deprived [me]0-i of [Minerva]543-minerva 's loving aid ; for soon [Nictimene]548-nictimene succeeded [me]0-i to [her]543-minerva protection and deserved esteem . — it happened in this way , — [Nictimene]548-nictimene committed the most wicked crimes , for which [Minerva]543-minerva changed [her]543-minerva to the bird of night — and ever since has claimed [her]543-minerva as [her]543-minerva own instead of [me]0-i ; and this despite the deed for which [she]543-minerva shuns the glorious light of day , and conscious of [her]543-minerva crime conceals [her]543-minerva shame in the dark night — [Minerva]543-minerva 's Owl now called . All the glad birds of day , indignant shun , and chase [her]543-minerva from the skies . ” But now replied [the Raven]1632-the raven to [the Crow]5336-the crow , that talked so much , “[1648-your] A mischief fall upon [your]1648-your prating head for this detention of [my]0-i flight . [Your]1648-your words and warnings [I]0-i despise . ” With which retort [he]0-i winged upon [his]0-i journey , swiftly thence in haste , despite the warning to inform [[his]0-i patron]5337-his patron , [Phoebus]549-phoebus , how [he]0-i saw [the fair Coronis]5338-the fair coronis with [a lad of Thessaly]5339-a lad of thessaly . And when [Apollo , Phoebus]549-phoebus , heard the tale [the busy Raven]542-the raven made such haste to tell , [he]0-i dropped [his]0-i plectrum and [his]0-i laurel wreath , and [his]0-i bright countenance went white with rage . [He]0-i seized [his]0-i trusted arms , and having bent [his]0-i certain bow , pierced with a deadly shaft that bosom which so often [he]0-i had pressed against [his]0-i own . [Coronis]541-coronis moaned in pain , — and as [she]541-coronis drew the keen shaft from the wound , [her]541-coronis snow - white limbs were bathed in purple blood : and thus [she]541-coronis wailed , “[1648-your] Ah , [Phoebus]549-phoebus ! punishment is justly [mine]1649-mine ! but wherefore didst [thou]1650-thou not await the hour of birth ? for by [my]0-i death [an innocent]1651-an innocent is slain . ” This said , [her]541-coronis soul expired with [her]541-coronis life - blood , and death congealed [her]541-coronis drooping form . Sadly [the love - lore God]5340-the love - lore god repents [his]5340-the love - lore god jealous deed ; regrets too late [his]5340-the love - lore god ready credence to the Raven 's tale . Mourning [his]5340-the love - lore god thoughtless deed , blaming [himself]5340-the love - lore god , [he]5340-the love - lore god vents [his]5340-the love - lore god rage upon the talking bird ; [he]5340-the love - lore god hates [his]5340-the love - lore god bow , the string , [his]5340-the love - lore god own right hand , the fateful arrow . As a last resource , and thus to overcome [her]541-coronis destiny , [he]5340-the love - lore god strove to cherish [her]541-coronis beloved form ; for vain were all [his]5340-the love - lore god medicinal arts . But when [he]5340-the love - lore god saw upraised [the funeral pyre]5341-the funeral pyre , where wreathed in flames [her]541-coronis body should be burnt , the sorrow of [his]5340-the love - lore god heart welled forth in sighs ; but tearless orbed , for no celestial face may tide of woe bedew . So grieves the poor dam , when , swinging from [his]5340-the love - lore god right the flashing ax , [the butcher]5342-the butcher with a sounding blow divides the hollow temples of [her]541-coronis sucking calf . Yet , after [Phoebus]549-phoebus poured the fragrant myrrh , sweet perfumes on [her]541-coronis breast , that now once more against [his]5340-the love - lore god own [he]5340-the love - lore god pressed , and after all the prematurely hastened rites were done , [he]5340-the love - lore god would not suffer [the offspring of [his]5340-the love - lore god loins]5343-the offspring of his loins to mingle with [her]541-coronis ashes , but [he]5340-the love - lore god plucked from out the flames , forth from [the mother]5344-the mother 's thighs [[his]5340-the love - lore god child]5345-his child , unborn , and carried to [the cave of double - natured [Chiron]550-chiron]5346-the cave of double - natured chiron . Then to [him]5340-the love - lore god [he]5340-the love - lore god called the silly raven , high in hopes of large requital due for all [his]5340-the love - lore god words ; but , angry with [his]5340-the love - lore god meddling ways , [the God]5013-the god turned the white feathers of that bird to black and then forbade forever more to perch among the favoured birds whose plumes are white . [Chiron]550-chiron , [the Centaur]5348-the centaur , taught [[his]550-chiron pupil]5349-his pupil ; proud that [he]550-chiron was honoured by that God - like charge . Behold , [[his]550-chiron lovely daughter]5350-his lovely daughter , who was born beside [the margin of a rapid stream]5351-the margin of a rapid stream , came forward , with [her]5350-his lovely daughter yellow hair as gold adown [her]5350-his lovely daughter shoulders . — [She]5350-his lovely daughter was known by name [Ocyroe]551-ocyroe . The hidden things that Fate conceals , [she]5350-his lovely daughter had the power to tell ; for not content was [she]5350-his lovely daughter to learn [[her]5350-his lovely daughter father]5022-her father 's arts , but rather pondered on mysterious things . So , when [the god of Frenzy]5353-the god of frenzy warmed [her]5350-his lovely daughter breast , gazing on [Aesculapius]552-aesculapius , — [the child of Phoebus]5354-the child of phoebus and [Coronis]541-coronis , while [her]5350-his lovely daughter soul was gifted , with prophetic voice [she]5350-his lovely daughter said ; “[1652-her] O [thou]1652-her who wilt bestow on all [the world]1360-the world the blessed boon of health , increase in strength ! To [thee]1652-her shall [mortals]4908-mortals often owe [their]4908-mortals lives : to [thee]1652-her is given the power to raise the dead . But when against the power of [Deities]1655-deities [thou]1652-her shalt presume to dare [thy]1652-her mortal skill , the bolts of Jove will shatter [thy]1652-her great might , and health no more be thine from thence to grant . And from [a god]4898-a god [thou]1652-her shalt return to dust , and once again from dust become [a God]4898-a god ; and [thou]1652-her shalt thus renew [thy]1652-her destiny . — “ And [thou]1652-her , dear father [Chiron]550-chiron , brought to birth with pledge of an immortal life , informed with ever - during strength , when biting flames of torment from the baneful serpent 's blood are coursing in [thy]1652-her veins , [thou]1652-her shalt implore a welcome death ; and [thy]1652-her immortal life [the Gods]1395-the gods shall suffer to the power of death . — and the three Destinies shall cut [thy]1652-her thread . ”[1652-her] [She]1652-her would continue these prophetic words but tears unbidden trickled down [her]1652-her face ; and , as it seemed [her]1652-her sighs would break [her]1652-her heart , [she]1652-her thus bewailed ; “ [The Fates]553-the fates constrain [my]1652-her speech and [I]1652-her can say no more ; [my]1652-her power has gone . Alas , [my]1652-her art , although of little force and doubtful worth , has brought upon [my]1652-her head the wrath of [Heaven]5-heaven . “[1652-her] Oh wherefore did [I]0-i know to cast the future ? Now [my]0-i human form puts on another shape , and the long grass affords [me]0-i needed nourishment . [I]0-i want to range [the boundless plains]1315-the boundless plains and have become , in image of [[my]0-i father]1438-my father 's kind , [a mare]1660-a mare : but gaining this , why lose [my]0-i human shape ? [[My]0-i father]1438-my father 's form is one of twain combined . ” And as [she]1652-her wailed the words became confused and scarcely understood ; and soon [her]1652-her speech was only as the whinny of a mare . Down to [the meadow]5356-the meadow 's green [her]1652-her arms were stretched ; [her]1652-her fingers joined together , and smooth hoofs made of five nails a single piece of horn . [Her]1652-her face and neck were lengthened , and [her]1652-her hair swept downward as a tail ; the scattered locks that clung around [her]1652-her neck were made a mane , tossed over to the right . [Her]1652-her voice and shape were altogether changed , and since that day the change has given [her]1652-her a different name . In vain [[her]1652-her hero father]5357-her hero father , [Chiron]550-chiron , prayed [the glorious God]5358-the glorious god , [Apollo]549-phoebus , [her]1652-her to aid . [He]549-phoebus could not thwart the will of [mighty Jove]456-jove ; and if the power were [his]549-phoebus , far from the spot , from thence afar [his]549-phoebus footsteps trod [the fields of [Elis]700-elis and [Messenia]90-messenia]5359-the fields of elis and messenia , far from thence . Now while [Apollo]549-phoebus wandered on [those plains]5360-those plains , — [his]549-phoebus shoulders covered with [a shepherd]5106-a shepherd 's skin , [his]549-phoebus left hand holding [his]549-phoebus long [shepherd]5362-shepherd 's staff , [his]549-phoebus right hand busied with the seven reeds of seven sizes , brooding over the death of [Hymenaeus]554-hymenaeus , lost from [his]549-phoebus delight ; while mournful ditties on the reeds were tuned , — [[his]549-phoebus kine]5363-his kine , forgotten , strayed away to graze over [the plains of [Pylos]91-pylos]5364-the plains of pylos . [Mercury]492-mercury observed them , unattended , and from thence drove [them]5363-his kine away and hid [them]5363-his kine in [the forest]5365-the forest . So deftly did [he]492-mercury steal them , [no one]5311-no one knew or noticed save [an ancient forester , well known to [all the neighbor - folk]5368-all the neighbor - folk , by [them]5368-all the neighbor - folk called [Battus]555-battus]5367-an ancient forester , well known to all the neighbor - folk , by them called battus . [He]555-battus was keeper of that wood , and [that green pasture where the blooded mares of [rich Neleus]92-rich neleus]5369-that green pasture where the blooded mares of rich neleus grazed . As [Mercury]492-mercury distrusted [him]555-battus , [he]0-i led [him]555-battus to one side and said ; “[1438-my father] [Good stranger]1662-good stranger , whosoever [thou]1662-good stranger art , if [any one]1663-any one should haply question [thee]1662-good stranger , if [thou]1662-good stranger hast seen these kine , deny it all ; and for [thy]1662-good stranger good will , ere the deed is done , [I]0-i give as [thy]1662-good stranger reward this handsome cow . ” Now when the gift was [his]0-i , [old Battus]555-battus said , “[0-i] Go hence in safety , if it be [thy]1662-good stranger will ; and should [my]0-i tongue betray [thee]1662-good stranger , let that stone make mention of the theft . ” And as [he]0-i spoke , [he]0-i pointed to a stone . [The son of [Jove]456-jove]5370-the son of jove pretended to depart , but quickly changed [his]5370-the son of jove voice and features , and retraced [his]5370-the son of jove steps , and thus again addressed [that ancient man]5371-that ancient man ; “[1662-good stranger] Kind sir , if [thou]1662-good stranger wouldst earn a fair reward , a heifer and a bull , if [thou]1662-good stranger hast seen some cattle pass , [I]0-i pray [thee]1662-good stranger give [thy]1662-good stranger help , and tell [me]0-i of the theft . ” So the reward was doubled ; and [the old man]5372-the old man answered [him]5371-that ancient man , “[1662-good stranger] Beyond [those hills]1664-those hills [they]1664-those hills be , ” and so [they]1664-those hills were ‘ Beyond [those hills]1664-those hills . ’ And , laughing , [Mercury]492-mercury said , “[1662-good stranger] [Thou]1662-good stranger treacherous man to [me]0-i dost [thou]1662-good stranger betray [myself]0-i ? Dost [thou]1662-good stranger bewray [me]0-i to [myself]0-i ? ” [The god]5013-the god indignant turned [his]5013-the god perjured breast into a stone which even now is called “[1662-good stranger] The Spy of Pylos , ” a disgraceful name , derived from days of old , but undeserved . High in [the dome of [Heaven]5-heaven]5071-the dome of heaven , behold the bright [Caduceus - Bearer]556-caduceus - bearer soared on balanced wings ; and far below [him]5013-the god through [a fruitful grove]5376-a fruitful grove , devoted to [[Minerva]543-minerva 's hallowed reign]5377-minerva 's hallowed reign , [some virgins]5378-some virgins bearing on [their]5378-some virgins lovely heads , in wicker baskets wreathed and decked with flowers , [their]5378-some virgins sacred offerings to [the citadel of [that chaste goddess]5380-that chaste goddess]5379-the citadel of that chaste goddess . And [the winged God]5381-the winged god , while circling in the clear unbounded skies , beheld that train of [virgins]5382-virgins , beautiful , as [they]5378-some virgins were thence returning on [their]5378-some virgins way . Not forward on a level line [he]5381-the winged god flew , but wheeled in circles round . Lo , the swift kite swoops round the smoking entrails , while [the priests]5383-the priests enclose in guarded ranks [their]5383-the priests sacrifice : wary with fear , that swiftest of all birds , dares not to venture from [his]5381-the winged god vantage height , but greedily hovers on [his]5381-the winged god waving wings around [his]5381-the winged god keen desire . So , [the bright God]5384-the bright god circled [those towers]5385-those towers , Actaean , round and round , in mazey circles , greedy as the bird . As much as [Lucifer]513-lucifer outshines the stars that emulate the glory of [his]513-lucifer rays , as greatly as bright [Phoebe]517-phoebe pales [thy]5386-thy light , O lustrous [Lucifer]513-lucifer ! so far surpassed in beauty [the fair maiden Herse]5387-the fair maiden herse , [all those lovely virgins of [that sacred train]5389-that sacred train , departing joyous from [[Minerva]543-minerva 's grove]5390-minerva 's grove]5388-all those lovely virgins of that sacred train , departing joyous from minerva 's grove . [The Son of Jove]5370-the son of jove , astonished , while [he]5381-the winged god wheeled on balanced pinions through the yielding air , burned hot ; as oft from [Balearic]93-balearic sling the leaden missile , hurled with sudden force , burns in a glowing heat beneath the clouds . Then sloped [the god]5013-the god [his]5381-the winged god course from airy height , and turned a different way ; another way [he]5381-the winged god went without disguise , in confidence of [his]5381-the winged god celestial grace . But though [he]5381-the winged god knew [his]5381-the winged god face was beautiful , [he]5381-the winged god combed [his]5381-the winged god hair , and fixed [his]5381-the winged god flowing raiment , that the fringe of radiant gold appeared . And in [his]5381-the winged god hand [he]5381-the winged god waved [his]5381-the winged god long smooth wand , with which [he]5381-the winged god gives the wakeful sleep or waketh ridded eyes . [He]5381-the winged god proudly glanced upon [his]5381-the winged god twinkling feet that sparkled with their scintillating wings . In a secluded part of [that great fane , devoted to [Minerva]543-minerva 's hallowed rites]5393-that great fane , devoted to minerva 's hallowed rites , [three chambers]5394-three chambers were adorned with tortoise shell and ivory and precious woods inlaid ; and there , devoted to [Minerva]543-minerva 's praise , [three well known sisters]5395-three well known sisters dwelt .
