When [Mercury]492-mercury drew near to [them]5397-those two , [Aglauros]546-aglauros first espied [the God]5013-the god , and ventured to enquire [his]5013-the god name , and wherefore [he]5013-the god was come . Then gracious spoke to [her]1667-thy devoted sister in answer [the bright son of Jove]5399-the bright son of jove ; “[1662-good stranger] Behold [the god who carries through the air the mandates of [almighty Jupiter]475-jupiter]1665-the god who carries through the air the mandates of almighty jupiter ! But [I]0-i come hither not to waste [my]0-i time in idle words , but rather to beseech [thy]1666-thy kindness and good aid , that [I]0-i may win the love of [[thy]1666-thy devoted sister]1667-thy devoted sister [Herse]557-herse . ” [Aglauros]546-aglauros , on [the son of [Jupiter]475-jupiter]5400-the son of jupiter , gazed with those eyes that only lately viewed the guarded secret of [the yellow - haired Minerva]5401-the yellow - haired minerva , and demanded as [her]5401-the yellow - haired minerva price gold of great weight ; before [he]0-i paid denied admittance of [the house]5402-the house . [Minerva]543-minerva turned , with orbs of stern displeasure , towards the maid [Aglauros]546-aglauros ; and [her]543-minerva bosom heaved with sighs so deeply laboured that [her]543-minerva Aegis - shield was shaken on [her]543-minerva valiant breast . For [she]543-minerva remembered when [Aglauros]546-aglauros gave to view [her]543-minerva charge , with impious hand , that monster form without [a mother]5325-a mother , maugre Nature 's law , what time [the god who dwells on Lemnos]5404-the god who dwells on lemnos loved . — now to requite [the god]5013-the god and [sister]1430-sister ; [her]543-minerva to punish whose demand of gold was great ; [Minerva]543-minerva to [the Cave of Envy sped]5407-the cave of envy sped . Dark , hideous with black gore , [her]543-minerva dread abode is hidden in [the deepest hollowed cave]5408-the deepest hollowed cave , in utmost limits where the genial sun may never shine , and where the breathing winds may never venture ; dismal , bitter cold , untempered by the warmth of welcome fires , involved forever in abounding gloom . When [the fair champion]5409-the fair champion came to [this abode]5410-this abode [she]543-minerva stood before [its]5410-this abode entrance , for [she]543-minerva deemed it not a lawful thing to enter [there]1500-there : and [she]543-minerva whose arm is mortal to [[her]543-minerva foes]5412-her foes , struck the black door - posts with [her]543-minerva pointed spear , and shook them to the center . Straight the doors flew open , and , behold , within was Envy ravening the flesh of vipers , self - begot , the nutriment of [her]543-minerva depraved desires . — when [the great goddess]5413-the great goddess met [her]543-minerva evil gaze [she]5413-the great goddess turned [her]5413-the great goddess eyes away . But [Envy]558-envy slow , in sluggish languor from the ground uprose , and left the scattered serpents half - devoured ; then moving with a sullen pace approached . — and when [she]543-minerva saw [the gracious goddess]5414-the gracious goddess , girt with beauty and resplendent in [her]543-minerva arms , [she]543-minerva groaned aloud and fetched up heavy sighs . [Her]5414-the gracious goddess face is pale , [her]5414-the gracious goddess body long and lean , [her]5414-the gracious goddess shifting eyes glance to the left and right , [her]5414-the gracious goddess snaggle teeth are covered with black rust , [her]5414-the gracious goddess hanging paps overflow with bitter gall , [her]5414-the gracious goddess slavered tongue drips venom to the ground ; busy in schemes and watchful in dark snares sweet sleep is banished from [her]5414-the gracious goddess blood - shot eyes ; [her]5414-the gracious goddess smiles are only seen when [others]4906-others weep ; with sorrow [she]5414-the gracious goddess observes [the fortunate]5416-the fortunate , and pines away as [she]5414-the gracious goddess beholds [their]5416-the fortunate joy ; [her]5414-the gracious goddess own existence is [her]5414-the gracious goddess punishment , and while tormenting [she]5414-the gracious goddess torments [herself]5414-the gracious goddess . Although [Minerva]543-minerva held [her]5414-the gracious goddess in deep scorn [she]543-minerva thus commanded [her]5414-the gracious goddess with winged words ; “[1668-thy] Instil [thy]1668-thy poison in [Aglauros]546-aglauros , [child of [Cecrops]559-cecrops]1669-child of cecrops ; [I]0-i command [thee]546-aglauros ; do [my]0-i will . ” [She]5414-the gracious goddess spake ; and spurning with [her]5414-the gracious goddess spear the ground departed ; and the sad and furtive - eyed envy observed [her]5414-the gracious goddess in [her]5414-the gracious goddess glorious flight : [she]5414-the gracious goddess murmured at [the goddess]4979-the goddess , great in arms : but waiting not [she]5414-the gracious goddess took in hand [her]5414-the gracious goddess staff , which bands of thorns encircled as a wreath , and veiled in midnight clouds departed thence . [She]5414-the gracious goddess blasted on [her]5414-the gracious goddess way [the ripening fields]5418-the ripening fields ; scorched [the green meadows]5419-the green meadows , starred with flowers , and breathed a pestilence throughout [the land]1295-the land and [the great cities]5421-the great cities . When [her]5414-the gracious goddess eyes beheld [the glorious citadel of [Athens]95-athens]5422-the glorious citadel of athens , great in art and wealth , abode of joyful peace , [she]5414-the gracious goddess hardly could refrain from shedding tears , that nothing might be witnessed worthy tears . [She]5414-the gracious goddess sought [the chamber where [Aglauros]546-aglauros slept]5423-the chamber where aglauros slept , and hastened to obey [the God]5013-the god 's behest . [She]5414-the gracious goddess touched [the maiden]5425-the maiden 's bosom with [her]5414-the gracious goddess hands , foul with corrupting stains , and pierced [her]5425-the maiden heart with jagged thorns , and breathed upon [her]5425-the maiden face a noxious venom ; and distilled through all the marrow of [her]5425-the maiden bones , and in [her]5425-the maiden lungs , a poison blacker than the ooze of pitch . And lest the canker of [her]5414-the gracious goddess poisoned soul might spread unchecked throughout increasing space , [she]5414-the gracious goddess caused a vision of [[her]5414-the gracious goddess sister]1501-her sister 's form to rise before [her]5414-the gracious goddess , happy with [the God who shone in [his]5427-the god who shone in his celestial beauty celestial beauty]5427-the god who shone in his celestial beauty . All appeared more beautiful than real life . — when [the most wretched daughter of Cecrops]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops had seen the vision secret torment seized on all [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops vitals ; and [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops groaned aloud , tormented by [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops frenzy day and night . A slow consumption wasted [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops away , as ice is melted by the slant sunbeam , when the cool clouds are flitting in the sky . If [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops but thought of [Herse]1501-her sister 's happiness [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops burned , as thorny bushes are consumed with smoldering embers under steaming stems . [She]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops could not bear to see [[her]5414-the gracious goddess sister]1501-her sister 's joy , and longed for death , an end of misery ; or schemed to end the torture of [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops mind by telling all [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops knew in shameful words , whispered to [[her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops austere and upright sire]5430-her austere and upright sire . But after many agonizing hours , [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops sat before the threshold of [[their]1671-their home]5431-their home to intercept [the God]5013-the god , who as [he]5013-the god neared spoke softly in smooth blandishment . “[0-i] Enough , ” [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops said , “[0-i] [I]0-i will not move from here until [thou]1670-thou hast departed from [my]0-i sight . ” “[0-i] Let [us]1671-their adhere to that which was agreed . ” Rejoined the graceful - formed [Cyllenian God]560-cyllenian god , who as [he]5013-the god spoke thrust open with a touch of [his]5013-the god compelling wand the carved door . But when [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops made an effort to arise , [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops thighs felt heavy , rigid and benumbed ; and as [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops struggled to arise [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops knees were stiffened ? and [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops nails turned pale and cold ; [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops veins grew pallid as the blood congealed . And even as the dreaded cancer spreads through all the body , adding to its taint the flesh uninjured ; so , a deadly chill entered by slow degrees [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops breast , and stopped [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops breathing , and the passages of life . [She]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops did not try to speak , but had [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops made an effort to complain there was not left a passage for [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops voice . [Her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops neck was changed to rigid stone , [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops countenance felt hard ; [she]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops sat a bloodless statue , but of stone not marble - white — [her]5428-the most wretched daughter of cecrops mind had stained it black . So from [the land of [Pallas]694-pallas]5433-the land of pallas went [the God]5013-the god , [his]5013-the god great revenge accomplished on the head of impious [Aglauros]546-aglauros ; and [he]5013-the god soared on waving wings into the opened skies : and there [[his]5013-the god father]1530-his father called [him]5013-the god to [his]1530-his father side , and said , — with words to hide [his]1530-his father passion ; — [Son]5011-son , — [[thou]5011-son faithful minister of [my]1671-their commands]5437-thou faithful minister of my commands . — let naught delay [thee]5011-son — swiftly take the way , accustomed , to [the land of [Sidon]97-sidon ( which adores [[thy]5013-the god mother]5136-thy mother 's star upon the left ) when there , drive over to [the sounding shore that royal herd , which far away is fed on [mountain grass]5441-mountain grass]5440-the sounding shore that royal herd , which far away is fed on mountain grass]5438-the land of sidon ( which adores thy mother 's star upon the left ) when there , drive over to the sounding shore that royal herd , which far away is fed on mountain grass . — [he]1671-their spoke , and instantly the herd was driven from [the mountain side]5442-the mountain side ; then headed for [the shore]5443-the shore , as [Jove]456-jove desired , — to where [[the great king]5444-the great king 's daughter]5445-the great king 's daughter often went in play , attended by [the maids of [Tyre]98-tyre]5446-the maids of tyre . — can love abide the majesty of [kings]5447-kings ? Love can not always dwell upon a throne . — [Jove]456-jove laid aside [his]456-jove glorious dignity , for [he]456-jove assumed the semblance of a bull and mingled with the bullocks in the groves , [his]456-jove colour white as virgin snow , untrod , unmelted by the watery Southern Wind . [His]456-jove neck was thick with muscles , dewlaps hung between [his]456-jove shoulders ; and [his]456-jove polished horns , so small and beautifully set , appeared the artifice of [man]1330-man ; fashioned as fair and more transparent than a lucent gem . [His]456-jove forehead was not lowered for attack , nor was there fury in [his]456-jove open eyes ; the love of peace was in [his]456-jove countenance . When [she]5445-the great king 's daughter beheld [his]456-jove beauty and mild eyes , [the daughter of Agenor]5449-the daughter of agenor was amazed ; but , daring not to touch [him]456-jove , stood apart until [her]5445-the great king 's daughter virgin fears were quieted ; then , near [him]456-jove , fragrant flowers in [her]5445-the great king 's daughter hand [she]5445-the great king 's daughter offered , — tempting , to [his]456-jove gentle mouth : and then [the loving god]5450-the loving god in [his]456-jove great joy kissed [her]5445-the great king 's daughter sweet hands , and could not wait [her]5445-the great king 's daughter will . [Jove]456-jove then began to frisk upon the grass , or laid [his]456-jove snow - white side on [the smooth sand]5451-the smooth sand , yellow and golden . As [her]5445-the great king 's daughter courage grew [he]456-jove gave [his]456-jove breast one moment for caress , or bent [his]456-jove head for garlands newly made , wreathed for [his]456-jove polished horns . [The royal maid]5452-the royal maid , unwitting what [she]5452-the royal maid did , at length sat down upon the bull 's broad back . Then by degrees [the god]5013-the god moved from [the land]1295-the land and from [the shore]5443-the shore , and placed [his]456-jove feet , that seemed but shining hoofs , in shallow water by [the sandy merge]5456-the sandy merge ; and not a moment resting bore [her]5452-the royal maid thence , across [the surface of [the Middle Sea]99-the middle sea]5457-the surface of the middle sea , while [she]5452-the royal maid affrighted gazed upon [the shore]5443-the shore — so fast receding . And [she]5452-the royal maid held [his]456-jove horn with [her]5452-the royal maid right hand , and , steadied by the left , held on [his]456-jove ample back — and in the breeze [her]5452-the royal maid waving garments fluttered as they went . Now [Jupiter]475-jupiter had not revealed [himself]475-jupiter , nor laid aside the semblance of a bull , until [they]5459-they stood upon [the plains of [Crete]100-crete]5460-the plains of crete . But not aware of this , [[her]5452-the royal maid father]5022-her father bade [[her]5452-the royal maid brother]5185-her brother [Cadmus]561-cadmus search through [all the world]5463-all the world , until [he]561-cadmus found [[his]561-cadmus sister]5464-his sister , and proclaimed [him]561-cadmus doomed to exile if [he]561-cadmus found [her]5464-his sister not ; — thus was [he]561-cadmus good and wicked in one deed . When [he]561-cadmus had vainly wandered over [the earth]1289-the earth ( for who can fathom the deceits of [Jove]456-jove ? ) [Cadmus]561-cadmus , [the son of [King Agenor]562-king agenor]5466-the son of king agenor , shunned [[his]561-cadmus country]5467-his country and [[his]561-cadmus father]1530-his father 's mighty wrath . But [he]561-cadmus consulted [the famed oracles of [Phoebus]549-phoebus]5469-the famed oracles of phoebus , and enquired of [them]5469-the famed oracles of phoebus what [land]1301-land might offer [him]561-cadmus a refuge and a home . And [Phoebus]549-phoebus answered [him]561-cadmus ; “[1671-their] When on [the plains]1672-the plains [a heifer , that has never known the yoke]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke , shall cross [thy]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke path go [thou]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke [thy]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke way with [her]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke , and follow where [she]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke leads ; and when [she]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke lies , to rest [herself]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke upon [the meadow green]1674-the meadow green , there shalt [thou]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke stop , as it will be a sign for [thee]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke to build upon that plain the walls of [a great city]1675-a great city : and [its]1675-a great city name shall be [the City of [Boeotia]59-boeotia]1676-the city of boeotia . ” [Cadmus]561-cadmus turned ; but hardly had descended from [the cave]5471-the cave , [Castalian]563-castalian , ere [he]561-cadmus saw [a heifer]1513-a heifer go unguarded , gentle - paced , without the scars of labour on [her]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke neck . [He]561-cadmus followed close upon [her]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke steps ( and silently adored [celestial Phoebus]549-phoebus , author of [his]549-phoebus way ) till over [the channel that [Cephissus]564-cephissus]5473-the channel that cephissus wears [he]561-cadmus forded to [the fields of [Panope]101-panope]5474-the fields of panope and even over to [Boeotia]59-boeotia . — there stood the slow - paced heifer , and [she]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke raised [her]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke forehead , broad with shapely horns , towards Heaven ; and as [she]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke filled the air with lowing , stretched [her]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke side upon the tender grass , and turned [her]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke gaze on [him]561-cadmus who followed in [her]1673-a heifer , that has never known the yoke path . [Cadmus]561-cadmus gave thanks and kissed the foreign soil , and offered salutation to [the fields]5475-the fields and [unexplored hills]5476-unexplored hills . Then [he]561-cadmus prepared to make large sacrifice to [Jupiter]475-jupiter , and ordered [slaves]5477-slaves to seek the living springs whose waters in libation might be poured . There was [an ancient grove , whose branching trees had never known the desecrating ax]5478-an ancient grove , whose branching trees had never known the desecrating ax , where hidden in the undergrowth a cave , with oziers bending round [its]5478-an ancient grove , whose branching trees had never known the desecrating ax low - formed arch , was hollowed in the jutting rocks — deep - found in the dark center of [that hallowed grove]5479-that hallowed grove — beneath [its]5478-an ancient grove , whose branching trees had never known the desecrating ax arched roof a beauteous stream of water welled serene . [Its]5478-an ancient grove , whose branching trees had never known the desecrating ax gloom concealed a dragon , sacred to the war - like [Mars]565-mars ; crested and gorgeous with radescent scales , and eyes that sparkled as the glow of coals . A deadly venom had puffed up [his]561-cadmus bulk , and from [his]561-cadmus jaws [he]561-cadmus darted forth three tongues , and in a triple row [his]561-cadmus sharp teeth stood . Now [those who ventured of [the Tyrian race]5481-the tyrian race]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race , [misfortuned followers of [Cadmus]561-cadmus]5482-misfortuned followers of cadmus , took the path that led [them]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race to [this grove]5483-this grove ; and when [they]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race cast down - splashing in the springs an urn , [the hidden dragon]5484-the hidden dragon stretched [his]5484-the hidden dragon azure head out from [the cavern]5485-the cavern 's gloom , and vented forth terrific hissings . Horrified [they]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race dropped [their]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race urns . A sudden trembling shook [their]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race knees ; and [their]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race life - blood was ice within [their]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race veins . [The dragon]5486-the dragon wreathed [his]5484-the hidden dragon scales in rolling knots , and with a spring , entwisted in great folds , reared up [his]5484-the hidden dragon bulk beyond the middle rings , high in the air from whence was given [his]5484-the hidden dragon gaze the extreme confines of [the grove]5487-the grove below . A size prodigious , [his]5484-the hidden dragon enormous bulk , if seen extended where was naught to hide , would rival in its length the Serpent 's folds , involved betwixt the planes of [the Twin Bears]566-the twin bears . The terrified Phoenicians , whether armed for conflict , or in flight precipitate , or whether held incapable from fear , [he]561-cadmus seized with sudden rage ; stung [them]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race to death , or crushed [them]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race in the grasp of crushing folds , or blasted with the poison of [his]561-cadmus breath . High in the Heavens the sun small shadow made when [Cadmus]561-cadmus , wondering what detained [[his]561-cadmus men]5488-his men , prepared to follow [them]5480-those who ventured of the tyrian race . Clothed in a skin torn from a lion , [he]561-cadmus was armed , complete , with lance of glittering steel ; and with a dart : but passing these [he]561-cadmus had a dauntless soul . When [he]561-cadmus explored [the grove]5487-the grove and there beheld the lifeless bodies , and above [them]5488-his men stretched the vast victorious dragon licking up the blood that issued from [their]5488-his men ghastly wounds ; [his]561-cadmus red tongues dripping gore ; then [Cadmus]561-cadmus filled with rage and grief ; “[0-i] Behold , [[my]0-i faithful ones]1677-my faithful ones ! [I]0-i will avenge [your]1677-my faithful ones deaths or [I]0-i will share it ! ” [He]561-cadmus spoke ; and lifted up a mill - stone huge , in [his]561-cadmus right hand , and having poised it , hurled with a tremendous effort dealing such a blow would crush the strongest builded walls ; yet neither did [the dragon]5486-the dragon flinch the shock nor was [he]5486-the dragon wounded , for [his]5486-the dragon armour - scales , fixed in [his]5486-the dragon hard and swarthy hide , repelled the dreadful impact . Not the javelin thus , so surely by [his]5486-the dragon armoured skin was foiled , for through the middle segment of [his]5486-the dragon spine the steel point pierced , and sank beneath the flesh , deep in [his]5486-the dragon entrails . Writhing in great pain [he]5486-the dragon turned [his]5486-the dragon head upon [his]5486-the dragon bleeding back , twisting the shaft , with force prodigious shook it back and forth , and wrenched it from the wound ; with difficulty wrenched it . But the steel remained securely fastened in [his]5486-the dragon bones . Such agony but made increase of rage : [his]5486-the dragon throat was swollen with great knotted veins ; a white froth gathered on [his]5486-the dragon poisonous jaws ; the earth resounded with [his]5486-the dragon rasping scales ; [he]5486-the dragon breathed upon the grass a pestilence , steaming mephitic from [his]5486-the dragon Stygian mouth . [His]5486-the dragon body writhes up in tremendous gyres ; [his]5486-the dragon folds , now straighter than a beam , untwist ; [he]5486-the dragon rushes forward on [[his]5486-the dragon vengeful foe]5491-his vengeful foe , [his]5486-the dragon great breast crushing the deep - rooted trees . Small space gave [Cadmus]561-cadmus to the dragon 's rage , for by the lion 's spoil [he]561-cadmus stood the shock , and thrusting in [[his]561-cadmus adversary]5492-his adversary 's jaws the trusted lance gave [check]561-cadmus [his]561-cadmus mad career . Wild in [his]5486-the dragon rage the dragon bit the steel and fixed [his]5486-the dragon teeth on the keen - biting point : out from [his]5486-the dragon poisoned palate streams of gore spouted and stained the green with sanguine spray . Yet slight the wound for [he]5486-the dragon recoiled in time , and drew [his]5486-the dragon wounded body from the spear ; by shrinking from the sharp steel saved [his]5486-the dragon throat a mortal wound . But [Cadmus]561-cadmus as [he]561-cadmus pressed the spear - point deeper in the serpent 's throat , pursued [him]5486-the dragon till an oak - tree barred the way ; to this [he]561-cadmus fixed [the dragon]5486-the dragon through the neck : the stout trunk bending with the monster 's weight , groaned at the lashing of [his]5486-the dragon serpent tail . While [the brave victor]5494-the brave victor gazed upon the bulk enormous of [[his]5494-the brave victor vanquished foe]5495-his vanquished foe , a voice was heard — from whence was difficult to know , but surely heard — “[567-agenor] [Son of Agenor]567-agenor , why art [thou]567-agenor here standing by this carcase - worm , for others shall behold [thy]567-agenor body changed into a serpent ? ” Terrified , amazed , [he]5486-the dragon lost [his]5486-the dragon colour and [his]5486-the dragon self - control ; [his]5486-the dragon hair stood upright from the dreadful fright . But lo , [[the hero]5496-the hero 's watchful Deity]5497-the hero 's watchful deity , [Minerva]543-minerva , from [the upper realms of air]5498-the upper realms of air appeared before [him]5486-the dragon . [She]543-minerva commanded [him]5486-the dragon to sow the dragon 's teeth in mellowed soil , from which might spring [another race of [men]1399-men]5499-another race of men . And [he]5486-the dragon obeyed : and as [he]5486-the dragon plowed [the land]1295-the land , took care to scatter in the furrowed soil the dragon 's teeth ; a seed to raise up [man]1330-man . ' Tis marvelous but true , when this was done the clods began to move . A spear - point first appeared above the furrows , followed next by helmet - covered heads , nodding [their]1399-men cones ; [their]1399-men shoulders , breasts and arms weighted with spears ; and largely grew the shielded crop of [men]1399-men . — so is it in the joyful theaters when the gay curtains , rolling from the floor , are upward drawn until the scene is shown , — it seems as if [the figures]5504-the figures rise to view : first [we]5505-we behold [their]5504-the figures faces , then [we]5505-we see [their]5504-the figures bodies , and [their]5504-the figures forms by slow degrees appear before [us]5505-we on the painted cloth . [Cadmus]561-cadmus , affrighted by [this host]5506-this host , prepared to arm for [his]561-cadmus defence ; but [one of those from [earth]1287-earth]5507-one of those from earth created cried ; “[567-agenor] Arm not ! Away from civil wars ! ” And with [his]5486-the dragon trenchant sword [he]5486-the dragon smote [an earth - born brother]5509-an earth - born brother , hand to hand ; even as [the vanquished so the victor]5510-the vanquished so the victor fell , pierced by a dart [some distant brother]5511-some distant brother hurled ; and likewise [he]5486-the dragon who cast that dart was slain : both breathing forth [their]5504-the figures lives upon the air so briefly [theirs]5504-the figures , expired together . [All as if demented]5512-all as if demented leaped in sudden rage , [each on the other , dealing mutual wounds]5513-each on the other , dealing mutual wounds . So , having lived the space allotted [them]5504-the figures , [the youthful warriors]5514-the youthful warriors perished as [they]5504-the figures smote [the earth]1289-the earth ( [[their]5504-the figures blood - stained mother]5516-their blood - stained mother ) with [their]5504-the figures breasts : and only five of [all the troop]5517-all the troop remained ; of whom [Echion]568-echion , by [Minerva]543-minerva warned , called on [[his]568-echion brothers]5518-his brothers to give up the fight , and cast [his]568-echion arms away in pledge of faith . — when [Cadmus]561-cadmus , exiled from [[Sidonia]102-sidonia 's gates]5519-sidonia 's gates , builded [the city]5520-the city by [Apollo]549-phoebus named , [these five]5521-these five were [trusted comrades in [his]561-cadmus toil]5522-trusted comrades in his toil . Now [Thebes]103-thebes is founded , who can deem [thy]5523-thy days unhappy in shine exile , [Cadmus]561-cadmus ? [Thou]561-cadmus , [the son - in - law of Mars]5524-the son - in - law of mars and [Venus]996-venus ; [thou]561-cadmus , whose glorious wife has borne to shine embrace [daughters]5525-daughters and [sons]5526-sons ? And [[thy]5523-thy grandchildren]5527-thy grandchildren join around [thee]5523-thy , almost grown to [[man]1330-man 's estate]5529-man 's estate . — nor should [we]5530-we say , “[1678-he] [He]1678-he leads a happy life , ” Till after death the funeral rites are paid . [[Thy]5523-thy grandson]5531-thy grandson , [Cadmus]561-cadmus , was the first to cast [thy]5523-thy dear felicity in sorrow 's gloom . Oh , it was pitiful to witness [him]561-cadmus , [his]561-cadmus horns outbranching from [his]561-cadmus forehead , chased by dogs that panted for [[their]5527-thy grandchildren master]5532-their master 's blood ! If [thou]561-cadmus shouldst well inquire it will be shown [his]561-cadmus sorrow was the crime of Fortune — not [his]561-cadmus guilt — for who maintains mistakes are crimes ? Upon a mountain stained with slaughtered game , [the young Hyantian]5533-the young hyantian stood . Already day , increasing to meridian , made decrease the flitting shadows , and the hot sun shone betwixt extremes in equal distance . Such the hour , when speaking to [[his]561-cadmus fellow friends]5534-his fellow friends , the while [they]5534-his fellow friends wandered by [those lonely haunts]5535-those lonely haunts , [actaeon of [Hyantis]569-hyantis]5536-actaeon of hyantis kindly thus ; “[1678-he] [Our]1679-our nets and steel are stained with slaughtered game , the day has filled its complement of sport ; now , when [Aurora]512-aurora in [[her]512-aurora saffron car]1680-her saffron car brings back the light of day , [we]1679-our may again repair to haunts of sport . Now [Phoebus]549-phoebus hangs in middle sky , cleaving [the fields]5475-the fields with heat . — enough of toil ; take down the knotted nets . ” — [all]5537-all did as [he]561-cadmus commanded ; and [they]5537-all sought [their]5537-all needed rest . There is [a valley called [Gargaphia]104-gargaphia]5538-a valley called gargaphia ; sacred to [Diana]484-diana , dense with pine trees and the pointed cypress , where , deep in [the woods that fringed [the valley]5540-the valley 's edge]5539-the woods that fringed the valley 's edge , was hollowed in frail sandstone and the soft white pumice of [the hills]1416-the hills an arch , so true it seemed the art of [man]1330-man ; for [Nature]570-nature 's touch ingenious had so fairly wrought the stone , making the entrance of [a grotto]5543-a grotto cool . Upon the right a limpid fountain ran , and babbled , as [its]5543-a grotto lucid channel spread into a clear pool edged with tender grass . Here , when a - wearied with exciting sport , [the Sylvan goddess]5544-the sylvan goddess loved to come and bathe [her]5544-the sylvan goddess virgin beauty in [the crystal pool]5545-the crystal pool . After [Diana]484-diana entered with [[her]484-diana nymphs]5546-her nymphs , [she]484-diana gave [her]484-diana javelin , quiver and [her]484-diana bow to [one accustomed to the care of arms]5547-one accustomed to the care of arms ; [she]484-diana gave [her]484-diana mantle to [another nymph who stood near by [her]484-diana as [she]484-diana took it off]5548-another nymph who stood near by her as she took it off ; [two others]5549-two others loosed the sandals from [her]484-diana feet ; but [Crocale]571-crocale , [the daughter of [Ismenus]523-ismenus]5550-the daughter of ismenus , more skillful than [[her]571-crocale sisters]1541-her sisters , gathered up [the goddess]4979-the goddess ' scattered tresses in a knot ; — [her]571-crocale own were loosely wantoned on the breeze . Then in [their]5546-her nymphs ample urns dipt up the wave and poured it forth , the cloud - nymph [Nephele]572-nephele , the nymph of crystal pools called [Hyale]105-hyale , [the rain - drop Rhanis , Psecas of the dews]5553-the rain - drop rhanis , psecas of the dews , and [[Phyale]573-phyale the guardian of [their]5546-her nymphs urns]5554-phyale the guardian of their urns . And while [they]5546-her nymphs bathed [Diana]484-diana in [[their]5546-her nymphs streams]5555-their streams , [Actaeon]574-actaeon , wandering through [the unknown woods]5556-the unknown woods , entered [the precincts of that sacred grove]5557-the precincts of that sacred grove ; with steps uncertain wandered [he]574-actaeon as fate directed , for [his]574-actaeon sport must wait till morn . — soon as [he]574-actaeon entered where the clear springs welled or trickled from [the grotto]5558-the grotto 's walls , [the nymphs , now ready for the bath]5559-the nymphs , now ready for the bath , beheld [the man]5560-the man , smote on [their]5559-the nymphs , now ready for the bath breasts , and made [the woods]1317-the woods resound , suddenly shrieking . Quickly gathered [they]5546-her nymphs to shield [Diana]484-diana with [their]5546-her nymphs naked forms , but [she]484-diana stood head and shoulders taller than [[her]484-diana guards]5562-her guards . — as clouds bright - tinted by the slanting sun , or purple - dyed Aurora , so appeared [Diana]484-diana 's countenance when [she]484-diana was seen . Oh , how [she]484-diana wished [her]484-diana arrows were at hand ! But only having water , this [she]484-diana took and dashed it on [his]5560-the man manly countenance , and sprinkled with the avenging stream [his]5560-the man hair , and said these words , presage of future woe ; “[1682-your] Go tell it , if [your]1682-your tongue can tell the tale , [your]1682-your bold eyes saw [me]0-i stripped of all [my]0-i robes . ” No more [she]484-diana threatened , but [she]484-diana fixed the horns of a great stag firm on [his]5560-the man sprinkled brows ; [she]484-diana lengthened out [his]5560-the man neck ; [she]484-diana made [his]5560-the man ears sharp at the top ; [she]484-diana changed [his]5560-the man hands and feet ; made long legs of [his]5560-the man arms , and covered [him]5560-the man with dappled hair — [his]5560-the man courage turned to fear . [The brave son of Autonoe]5563-the brave son of autonoe took to flight , and marveled that [he]5560-the man sped so swiftly on . — [he]5560-the man saw [his]5560-the man horns reflected in a stream and would have said , “[1682-your] Ah , wretched [me]0-i ! ” but now [he]5560-the man had no voice , and [he]5560-the man could only groan : large tears ran trickling down [his]5560-the man face , transformed in every feature . — Yet , as clear remained [his]5560-the man understanding , and [he]5560-the man wondered what [he]5560-the man should attempt to do : should [he]5560-the man return to [[his]5560-the man ancestral palace]5564-his ancestral palace , or plunge deep in vast vacuities of [forest wilds]5565-forest wilds ? Fear made [him]5560-the man hesitate to trust [the woods]1317-the woods , and shame deterred [him]5560-the man from [his]5560-the man homeward way . While doubting thus [his]5560-the man dogs espied [him]5560-the man there : first [Blackfoot]575-blackfoot and [the sharp nosed Tracer]5567-the sharp nosed tracer raised the signal : [Tracer of the Gnossian breed]5568-tracer of the gnossian breed , and [Blackfoot of the Spartan]575-blackfoot : swift as wind [the others]5289-the others followed .
