All richly dight [she]649-salmacis scanned [herself]649-salmacis and robes , to know that every charm should fair appear , and [she]649-salmacis be worthy : wherefore [she]649-salmacis began : “[1916-o godlike youth] [O godlike youth]1916-o godlike youth ! if [thou]1917-thou art of the skies , [thou]1917-thou art no other than [the god of Love]1918-the god of love ; if mortal , blest are [they]1919-they who gave [thee]1917-thou birth ; happy [[thy]1917-thou brother]1588-thy brother ; happy , fortunate [[thy]1917-thou sister]1921-thy sister ; happy , fortunate and blest [the nurse that gave [her]1917-thou bosom]1922-the nurse that gave her bosom ; but the joys surpassing all , dearest and tenderest , are [hers]1923-hers whom [thou]1917-thou shalt [we]1924-we d. So , let it be if [thou]1917-thou so young have deigned to marry , let [my]0-i joys be stolen ; if unmarried , join with [me]0-i in wedlock . ” So [she]649-salmacis spoke , and stood in silence waiting for [the youth]1554-the youth 's reply . [He]1554-the youth knows nor cares for love — with loveliness the mounting blushes tinge [his]1554-the youth youthful cheeks , as blush - red tint of apples on the tree , ripe in the summer sun , or as the hue of painted ivory , or the round moon red - blushing in [her]649-salmacis splendour , when the clash of brass resounds in vain . And long [the Nymph]5012-the nymph implored ; almost clung on [his]1554-the youth neck , as smooth and white as ivory ; unceasingly imploring [him]1554-the youth to kiss [her]649-salmacis , though as chaste as kisses to [a sister]5833-a sister ; but [the youth]1554-the youth outwearied , thus : “[0-i] [I]0-i do beseech [you]1925-you make an end of this ; or must [I]0-i fly [the place]1926-the place and leave [you]1925-you to [your]1925-you tears ? ” Affrighted then said [Salmacis]649-salmacis , “[0-i] To [you]1925-you [I]0-i freely give — [good stranger here]1927-good stranger here remain . ” Although [she]649-salmacis made fair presence to retire , [she]649-salmacis hid [herself]649-salmacis , that from a shrub - grown covert , on [her]649-salmacis knees [she]649-salmacis might observe unseen . As [any boy that heedless deems [his]1554-the youth mischief]5835-any boy that heedless deems his mischief unobserved , now here now there , [he]1554-the youth rambled on [the green]5836-the green ; now in the bubbly ripples dipped [his]1554-the youth feet , now dallied in the clear pool ankle - deep ; — the warm - cool feeling of the liquid then , so pleased [him]1554-the youth , that without delay [he]1554-the youth doffed [his]1554-the youth fleecy garments from [his]1554-the youth tender limbs . Ah , [Salmacis]649-salmacis , amazement is [thy]649-salmacis meed ! [Thou]649-salmacis art consumed to know [his]1554-the youth naked grace ! As the hot glitters of the round bright sun collected , sparkle from the polished plate , thine eyes are glistened with delirious fires . Delay [she]649-salmacis can not ; panting for [his]1554-the youth joy , languid for [his]1554-the youth caressing , crazed , distract , [her]649-salmacis passion difficult is held in check . — [He]1554-the youth claps [his]1554-the youth body with [his]1554-the youth hollow palms and lightly vaults into the limped wave , and darting through the water hand over hand shines in the liquid element , as though should one enhance a statue 's ivorine , or glaze the lily in [a lake of glass]5837-a lake of glass . And thus [the Naiad]5838-the naiad , “[0-i] [I]0-i have gained [my]0-i suit ; [his]1928-his love is [mine]0-i , — is mine ! ” Quickly disrobed , [she]649-salmacis plunged into the yielding wave — seized [him]1554-the youth , caressed [him]1554-the youth , clung to [him]1554-the youth a thousand ways , kissed [him]1554-the youth , thrust down [her]649-salmacis hands and touched [his]1554-the youth breast : reluctant and resisting [he]1554-the youth endeavours to make escape , but even as [he]1554-the youth struggles [she]649-salmacis winds [herself]649-salmacis about [him]1554-the youth , as entwines the serpent which [the royal bird on high]5839-the royal bird on high holds in [his]5839-the royal bird on high talons ; — as it hangs , it coils in sinuous folds around the eagle 's feet ; — twisting its coils around [his]1554-the youth head and wings : or as the ivy clings to sturdy oaks ; or as the polypus beneath the waves , by pulling down , with suckers on all sides , tenacious holds its prey . And yet [the youth]1554-the youth , descendant of [great Atlas]529-atlas , not relents nor gives the Naiad joy . Pressing [her]649-salmacis suit [she]649-salmacis winds [her]649-salmacis limbs around [him]1554-the youth and exclaims , “[1929-you] [You]1929-you shall not scape [me]0-i , struggle as [you]1929-you will , perverse and obstinate ! Hear [me]0-i , [[ye]1929-you Gods]1930-ye gods ! Let never time release [the youth]1554-the youth from [me]0-i ; time never let [me]0-i from [the youth]1554-the youth release ! ” Propitious deities accord [her]649-salmacis prayers : the mingled bodies of [the pair]5841-the pair unite and fashion in a single human form . So one might see two branches underneath a single rind uniting grow as one : so , these two bodies in a firm embrace no more are twain , but with a two - fold form nor [man]1330-man nor [woman]1432-woman may be called — Though both in seeming [they]5841-the pair are [neither one of twain]5844-neither one of twain . When that [Hermaphroditus]654-hermaphroditus felt the change , so wrought upon [him]654-hermaphroditus by the languid fount , considered that [he]654-hermaphroditus entered it [a man]5610-a man , and now [his]654-hermaphroditus limbs relaxing in the stream [he]654-hermaphroditus is not wholly male , but only half , — [he]0-i lifted up [his]0-i hands and thus implored , albeit with no manly voice ; “[0-i] Hear [me]0-i O [father]1933-father ! hear [me]0-i [mother]5115-mother ! grant to [me]0-i this boon ; to [me]0-i whose name is [yours]1933-father , [[your]1933-father son]1935-your son ; whoso shall enter in [this fount]1936-this fount [a man]5610-a man must leave [its]1936-this fount waters only half [a man]5610-a man . ” Moved by the words of [[their]1933-father bi - natured son]5846-their bi - natured son [both parents]5847-both parents yield assent : [they]5847-both parents taint the fount with essences of dual - working powers . Now though [the daughters of [King Minyas]623-king minyas]1812-the daughters of king minyas have made an end of telling tales , [they]1812-the daughters of king minyas make no end of labour ; for [they]1812-the daughters of king minyas so despise [the deity]5849-the deity , and desecrate [his]5849-the deity feast . While busily engaged , with sudden beat [they]1812-the daughters of king minyas hear resounding tambourines ; and pipes and crooked horns and tinkling brass renew , unseen , the note ; saffron and myrrh dissolve in dulcet odours ; and , beyond belief , the woven webs , dependent on the loom , take tints of green , put forth new ivy leaves , or change to grape - vines verdant . There the thread is twisted into tendrils , there the warp is fashioned into many - moving leaves — the purple lends its splendour to the grape . And now the day is past ; it is the hour when night ambiguous merges into day , which dubious owns nor light nor dun obscure ; and suddenly [the house]5402-the house begins to shake , and torches oil - dipped seem to flare around , and fires a - glow to shine in [every room]5851-every room , and phantoms , feigned of savage beasts , to howl . — Full of affright amid [the smoking halls]5852-the smoking halls [the sisters]1639-the sisters vainly hide , and wheresoever [they]1639-the sisters deem security from flaming fires , fearfully flit . And while [they]1639-the sisters seek to hide , a membrane stretches over every limb , and light wings open from [their]1639-the sisters slender arms . In the weird darkness [they]1639-the sisters are unaware what measure wrought to change [their]1639-the sisters wonted shape . No plumous vans avail to lift [their]1639-the sisters flight , yet fair [they]1639-the sisters balance on membraneous wing . Whenever [they]1639-the sisters would speak a tiny voice , diminutive , apportioned to [their]1639-the sisters size , in squeaking note complains . Adread the light , [their]1639-the sisters haunts avoid by day [the leafy woods]5854-the leafy woods , for sombre attics , where secure [they]1639-the sisters rest till forth the dun obscure [their]1639-the sisters wings may stretch at hour of Vesper ; — this accords [their]1639-the sisters name . Throughout [the land of [Thebes]103-thebes]5855-the land of thebes miraculous the power of [Bacchus]617-bacchus waxed ; and far and wide [Ino]597-ino , [[his]617-bacchus aunt]5599-his aunt , reported the great deeds by [this divinity performed]5857-this divinity performed . Of all [[her]597-ino sisters]1541-her sisters only [she]597-ino escaped unharmed , when Fate destroyed [them]1541-her sisters , and [she]597-ino knew not grief — only for sorrow of [[her]597-ino sisters]1541-her sisters ' woes . — While Ino vaunted of [[her]597-ino mother]4984-her mother - joys , and of [[her]597-ino kingly husband]5861-her kingly husband , [Athamas]605-athamas , and of [the mighty God]5862-the mighty god , [[her]597-ino foster - child]5863-her foster - child ; [Juno]488-juno , disdaining [her]597-ino in secret , said ; “[1939-the offspring of a concubine transform maeonian mariners] How shall [the offspring of a concubine transform Maeonian mariners]1939-the offspring of a concubine transform maeonian mariners , overwhelm [them]1939-the offspring of a concubine transform maeonian mariners in [the ocean]1288-the ocean , sacrifice [a son]1612-a son to [[his]1612-a son deluded mother]1942-his deluded mother , who insane , tears out [his]1612-a son entrails ; how shall [he]1612-a son invent wings for [three daughters of [King Minyas]623-king minyas]1943-three daughters of king minyas , while [Juno unavenged , bewails despite]1944-juno unavenged , bewails despite ? — Is it the end ? the utmost of [my]0-i power ? [His]1612-a son deeds instruct the way ; true wisdom heeds [an enemy]1945-an enemy 's device ; by the strange death of [Pentheus]598-pentheus , all that madness could perform was well revealed to all ; what then denies a frenzy may unravel [Ino]597-ino 's course to such a fate as wrought [[her]597-ino sisters]1541-her sisters ' woe ? ” A shelving path in shadows of sad yew through utter silence to the deep descends , infernal , where the languid Styx exhales vapours ; and there the shadows of the dead , descend , after [they]5864-they leave [their]5864-they sacred urns , and ghostly forms invade : and far and wide , those dreary regions Horror and bleak Cold obtain . The ghosts , arrived , not know the way , — which leadeth to [the Stygian city - gates]5865-the stygian city - gates , — not know [the melancholy palace where [the swarthy Pluto]5867-the swarthy pluto stays , though [streets]5868-streets and ways a thousand to [that city]5869-that city]5866-the melancholy palace where the swarthy pluto stays , though streets and ways a thousand to that city lead , and gates out - swing from every side : and as [the sea]1298-the sea with never - seen increase engulfs [the streams unnumbered of [the world]1360-the world]5871-the streams unnumbered of the world , [that realm]5167-that realm enfolds the souls of [men]1399-men , nor ever is it filled . Around [the shadowy spirits]5875-the shadowy spirits go ; bloodless boneless and bodiless ; [they]5875-the shadowy spirits throng [the place of judgment]5876-the place of judgment , or [they]5875-the shadowy spirits haunt [the mansion where abides the Utmost Tyrant]5877-the mansion where abides the utmost tyrant , or [they]5875-the shadowy spirits tend to various callings , as [their]5875-the shadowy spirits whilom way ; — appropriate punishment confines to pain [the multitude condemned]5878-the multitude condemned . To [this abode]5410-this abode , impelled by rage and hate , from habitation celestial , [Juno]488-juno , of Saturn born , descends , submissive to its dreadful element . No sooner had [she]488-juno entered the sad gates , than groans were uttered by the threshold , pressed by [her]488-juno immortal form , and [Cerberus]655-cerberus upraising [his]655-cerberus three - visaged mouths gave vent to triple - barking howls . — [She]488-juno called to [her]488-juno [the sisters]1639-the sisters , Night - begot , implacable , terrific Furies . [They]1639-the sisters did sit before the prison portals , adamant confined , combing black vipers from [their]1639-the sisters horrid hair . When [her]488-juno amid the night - surrounding shades [they]1639-the sisters recognized , [those Deities uprose . O dread confines]5881-those deities uprose . o dread confines ! dark seat of wretched vice ! Where stretched athwart [nine acres]5882-nine acres , [Tityus]656-tityus , must [thou]5883-thou endure thine entrails to be torn ! O [Tantalus]657-tantalus , [thou]5883-thou canst not touch the wave , and from [thy]5883-thou clutch the hanging branches rise ! O [Sisyphus]658-sisyphus , [thou]5883-thou canst not stay the stone , catching or pushing , it must fall again ! O [thou]5883-thou [Ixion]660-ixion ! whirled around , around , [thyself]660-ixion must follow to escape thyself ! And , O Belides , ( plotter of sad death upon [[thy]5883-thou cousins]5884-thy cousins ) [thou]5883-thou art always doomed to dip forever ever - spilling waves ! When that [the daughter of [Saturnus]659-saturnus]5885-the daughter of saturnus fixed a stern look on those wretches , first [her]5885-the daughter of saturnus glance arrested on [Ixion]660-ixion ; but the next on [Sisyphus]658-sisyphus ; and thus [the goddess]4979-the goddess spoke ; — “[1947-his] For why should [he]1947-his alone of all [[his]1947-his kin]1948-his kin suffer eternal doom , while [Athamas]605-athamas , luxurious in [a sumptuous palace]1949-a sumptuous palace reigns ; and , haughty with [[his]1947-his wife]1380-his wife , despises [me]0-i . ” So grieved [she]4979-the goddess , and expressed the rage of hate that such descent inspired , beseeching thus , no longer should [the House of [Cadmus]561-cadmus]127-the house of cadmus stand , so that [the sister Furies]5887-the sister furies plunge in crime overweening [Athamas]605-athamas . — Entreating [them]5887-the sister furies , [she]4979-the goddess mingled promises with [her]4979-the goddess commands . — When [Juno]488-juno ended speech , [Tisiphone , whose locks entangled are not ever smooth]5888-tisiphone , whose locks entangled are not ever smooth , tossed them around , that backward from [her]4979-the goddess face such crawling snakes were thrown ; — then answered [she]4979-the goddess : “[1380-his wife] Since what [thy]1951-thy will decrees may well be done , why need [we]1952-we to consult with many words ? Leave [thou]1951-thy [this hateful region]1953-this hateful region and convey [thyself]1954-thyself , contented , to [a better realm]1955-a better realm . ” Rejoicing [Juno]488-juno hastens to the clouds — before [she]488-juno enters [[her]488-juno celestial home]5889-her celestial home , [Iris]471-iris , [the child of [Thaumas]661-thaumas]5890-the child of thaumas , purifies [her]471-iris limbs in sprinkled water . Waiting not , [Tisiphone]662-tisiphone , revengeful , takes a torch ; — besmeared with blood , and vested in a robe , dripping with crimson gore , and twisting - snakes engirdled , [she]4979-the goddess departs [[her]4979-the goddess dire abode]5891-her dire abode — with twitching Madness , Terror , Fear and Woe : and when [she]4979-the goddess had arrived [the destined house]5892-the destined house , the door - posts shrank from [her]4979-the goddess , the maple doors turned ashen grey : the Sun amazed fled . Affrighted , [Athamas]605-athamas and [Ino]597-ino viewed and fled these prodigies ; but suddenly that baneful Fury stood across the way , blocking [the passage]5893-the passage — There [she]4979-the goddess stands with arms extended , and alive with twisting vipers . — [She]4979-the goddess shakes [her]4979-the goddess hair ; the moving serpents hiss ; they cling upon [her]4979-the goddess shoulders , and they glide around [her]4979-the goddess temples , dart [their]5894-their fangs , and vomit corruption . — Plucking from the midst two snakes , [she]4979-the goddess hurls [them]5894-their with [her]4979-the goddess pestilential hand upon [[her]4979-the goddess victims]5895-her victims , [Athamas]605-athamas and [Ino]597-ino , whom , although the vipers strike upon [their]5895-her victims breasts , no injury attacks [their]5895-her victims mortal parts ; — only [their]5895-her victims minds are stricken with wild rage , inciting to mad violence and crime . And with a monstrous composite of foam — once gathered from the mouth of [Cerberus]655-cerberus , the venom of Echidna , purposeless aberrances , crimes , tears , hatred — the lust of homicide , and the dark vapourings of foolish brains ; a liquid poison , mixed , and mingled with fresh blood , in hollow brass , and boiled , and stirred up with a slip of hemlock — [she]4979-the goddess took of it , and as [they]5895-her victims trembled , threw that mad - mixed poison on [them]5895-her victims ; and it scorched [their]5895-her victims inmost vitals — and [she]4979-the goddess waved [her]4979-the goddess torch repeatedly , within a circle 's rim — and added flame to flame . — Then , confident of having executed [her]4979-the goddess commands , [the Fury]663-the fury hastened to [the void expanse where [Pluto]664-pluto reigns]5896-the void expanse where pluto reigns , and swiftly put aside the serpents that were wreathed around [her]4979-the goddess robes . At once , [the son of [Aeolus]665-aeolus]5897-the son of aeolus , enraged , shouts loudly in [[his]0-i palace]5898-his palace ; “[1956-my lads] Ho , [[my]0-i lads]1956-my lads ! Spread out [your]1956-my lads nets ! [a savage lioness]1957-a savage lioness and [her]1957-a savage lioness twin whelps are lurking in [the wood]1723-the wood ; — behold them ! ” In [his]0-i madness [he]0-i believes [[his]0-i wife]1380-his wife a savage beast . [He]0-i follows [her]1380-his wife , and quickly from [her]1380-his wife bosom snatches up [[her]1380-his wife smiling babe]5900-her smiling babe , [Learchus]666-learchus , holding forth [his]666-learchus tiny arms , and whirls [him]666-learchus in the air , times twice and thrice , as whirls the whizzing sling , and dashes [him]666-learchus in pieces on [the rocks]5901-the rocks ; — cracking [his]666-learchus infant bones . [The mother , roused to frenzy]5902-the mother , roused to frenzy ( who can tell if grief the cause , or fires of scattered poison ? ) yells aloud , and with [her]1380-his wife torn hair tangled , running mad , [she]1380-his wife carries swiftly in [her]1380-his wife clutching arms , [her]1380-his wife little Melicerta ! and begins to shout , “[667-bacche] Evoe , [Bacche]667-bacche ! ” — [Juno]488-juno hears the shouted name of [Bacchus]617-bacchus , and [she]488-juno laughs , and taunts [her]488-juno ; — “[667-bacche] Let [[thy]1959-thy foster - child]1960-thy foster - child award ! ” There is a crag , out - jutting on the deep , worn hollow at the base by many waves , where not the rain may ripple on that pool ; — high up [the rugged summit overhangs its ragged brows above [the open sea]5904-the open sea]5903-the rugged summit overhangs its ragged brows above the open sea : there , [Ino]597-ino climbs with frenzy - given strength , and fearless , with [her]597-ino burden in [her]597-ino arms , leaps in the waves where whitening foams arise . [Venus]996-venus takes pity on [[her]996-venus guiltless child]5905-her guiltless child , [unfortunate grand - daughter]5906-unfortunate grand - daughter , and begins to soothe [[her]996-venus uncle]5907-her uncle [Neptune]472-neptune with these words ; — “[667-bacche] O [Neptune]472-neptune , ruler of [the deep]1961-the deep , to whom , next to the Power in Heaven , was given sway , consider [my]0-i request ! Open [thy]1959-thy heart to [[my]0-i descendants]1962-my descendants , which thine eyes behold , tossed on [the wild Ionian Sea]129-the wild ionian sea ! [I]0-i do implore [thee]1959-thy , remember [they]1963-their are [[thy]1959-thy true Deities]1964-thy true deities — are thine as well as [mine]0-i — for it is known [my]0-i birth was from the white foam of [[thy]1959-thy sea]1965-thy sea ; — a truth made certain by [my]0-i Grecian name . ” [Neptune]472-neptune regards [her]1959-thy prayer : [he]472-neptune takes from [them]1963-their [their]1963-their mortal dross : [he]472-neptune clothes in majesty , and hallows [their]1963-their appearance . Even [their]1963-their names and forms are altered ; [Melicerta]668-melicerta , changed , is now [Palaemon]669-palaemon called , and [Ino]597-ino , changed , [Leucothoe]670-leucothoe called , are known as [Deities]1655-deities . When [[her]1959-thy Sidonian attendants]5909-her sidonian attendants traced fresh footprints to [the last verge of the rock]5910-the last verge of the rock , and found no further vestige , [they]5909-her sidonian attendants declared [her]1959-thy dead , nor had [they]5909-her sidonian attendants any doubt of it . [They]5909-her sidonian attendants tore [their]5909-her sidonian attendants garments and [their]5909-her sidonian attendants hair — and wailed [the House of [Cadmus]561-cadmus]5911-the house of cadmus — and [they]5909-her sidonian attendants cursed at [Juno]488-juno , for the sad fate of [the wretched concubine]5912-the wretched concubine . [That goddess]5913-that goddess could no longer brook [their]5909-her sidonian attendants words , and thus made answer , “[0-i] [I]0-i will make of [you]1966-you eternal monuments of [my]0-i revenge ! ” [Her]5913-that goddess words were instantly confirmed — The one whose love for [Ino]597-ino was the greatest , cried ; “[0-i] Into [the deep]1961-the deep ; look — look — [I]0-i seek [[my]0-i queen]1968-my queen . ” But even as [she]597-ino tried to leap , [she]597-ino stood fast - rooted to [the ever - living rock]5914-the ever - living rock ; another , as [she]597-ino tried to beat [her]597-ino breast with blows repeated , noticed that [her]597-ino arms grew stiff and hard ; another , as by chance , was petrified with hands stretched over the waves : another could be seen , as suddenly [her]597-ino fingers hardened , clutching at [her]597-ino hair to tear it from the roots . — And each remained forever in the posture first assumed . — But [others of [those women]5916-those women , sprung from [Cadmus]561-cadmus]5915-others of those women , sprung from cadmus , were changed to birds , that always with wide wings skim lightly the dark surface of [that sea]5917-that sea . Unwitting that [[his]561-cadmus daughter]5054-his daughter and [[his]561-cadmus son]5099-his son are [Ocean deities]5920-ocean deities , [[Agenor]567-agenor 's son]5921-agenor 's son , — depressed by sorrow and unnumbered woes , calamities , and prodigies untold , — [the founder]5922-the founder fled [the city [he]561-cadmus had built]5923-the city he had built , as though fatalities that gathered round [that city]5869-that city grieved [him]561-cadmus deeper than the fate of [[his]561-cadmus own family]5925-his own family ; and thence , at last arrived [the confines of [Illyria]131-illyria]5926-the confines of illyria ; in exile with [[his]561-cadmus wife]1380-his wife . — Weighted with woe , bowed down with years , [their]5928-their minds recalled the time when first disaster fell upon [[their]5928-their House]5929-their house : — relating [their]5928-their misfortunes , [Cadmus]561-cadmus spoke ; “[0-i] Was that a sacred dragon that [my]0-i spear impaled , when on the way from [[Sidon]97-sidon 's gates]1969-sidon 's gates [I]0-i planted in [the earth]1289-the earth [those]1971-those dragon - teeth , unthought - of seed ? If haply ' tis [the Gods]1395-the gods , ( whose rage unerring , gives [me]0-i to revenge ) [I]0-i only pray that [I]0-i may lengthen out , as any serpent . ” Even as [he]561-cadmus spoke , [he]561-cadmus saw and felt [himself]561-cadmus increase in length . [His]561-cadmus body coiled into a serpent 's form ; bright scale 's enveloped [his]561-cadmus indurate skin , and azure macules in speckled pride , enriched [his]561-cadmus glowing folds ; and as [he]561-cadmus fell supinely on [his]561-cadmus breast , [his]561-cadmus legs were joined , and gradually tapered as a serpent 's tail . — Some time [his]561-cadmus arms remained , which stretching forth while tears rolled down [his]561-cadmus human face , not changed as yet , [he]561-cadmus said ; “[0-i] Hither , [O hapless one]1973-o hapless one ! Come hither [[my]0-i unhappy wife]1974-my unhappy wife , while aught is left of manhood ; touch [me]0-i , take [my]0-i hand , unchanged as yet — ah , soon this serpent - form will cover [me]0-i ! ” So did [he]561-cadmus speak , nor thought to make an end ; but suddenly [his]561-cadmus tongue became twin - forked . As often as [he]561-cadmus tried , a hissing sound escaped ; the only voice that [Nature]570-nature left [him]561-cadmus . — And [[his]561-cadmus wife]1380-his wife bewailed , and smote [her]1380-his wife breast , “[561-cadmus] Ah , [Cadmus]561-cadmus , ah ! Most helpless one , put off that monster - shape ! [Your]1975-your feet , [your]1975-your shoulders and [your]1975-your hands are gone ; [your]1975-your manly form , [your]1975-your very colour gone ; all — all is changed ! — Oh , why not , [[ye]1976-ye celestial Gods]1977-ye celestial gods , [me]0-i likewise , to [a serpent - shape transform]1978-a serpent - shape transform ! ” — So ended [her]1380-his wife complaint . [Cadmus]561-cadmus caressed [her]1380-his wife gently with [his]561-cadmus tongue ; and slid to [her]1380-his wife dear bosom , just as if [he]561-cadmus knew [[his]561-cadmus wife]1380-his wife ; and [he]561-cadmus embraced [her]1380-his wife , and [he]561-cadmus touched [her]1380-his wife neck . [All [their]5932-all their attendants attendants]5932-all their attendants , who had seen the change , were filled with fear ; but when as [crested snakes the twain]5933-crested snakes the twain appeared in brightly glistening mail , [their]5932-all their attendants grief was lightened : and [the pair , enwreathed in twisting coils]5934-the pair , enwreathed in twisting coils , departed from [that place]5935-that place , and sought a covert in [the nearest grove]5936-the nearest grove . — There , then , [these gentle serpents]5937-these gentle serpents never shun [mankind]5938-mankind , nor wound , nor strike with poisoned fangs ; for [they]5937-these gentle serpents are always conscious of the past . The fortune of [[their]5932-all their attendants grandson]5939-their grandson , [Bacchus]617-bacchus , gave great comfort to [them]5932-all their attendants — as [a god adored in [conquered India]5941-conquered india]5940-a god adored in conquered india ; by [Achaia]671-achaia praised in [stately temples]5942-stately temples . — But [Acrisius]604-acrisius [the son of [Abas]672-abas , of [the Cadmean race]5944-the cadmean race]5943-the son of abas , of the cadmean race , remained to banish [Bacchus]617-bacchus from [the walls of [Argos]60-argos]5945-the walls of argos , and to lift up hostile arms against [that deity]1697-that deity , who [he]604-acrisius denied was born to [Jove]456-jove . [He]604-acrisius would not even grant that [Perseus]673-perseus from [the loins of [Jupiter]475-jupiter]5947-the loins of jupiter was got of [Danae]787-danae in the showering gold . So mighty is the hidden power of truth , [Acrisius]604-acrisius soon lamented that affront to [Bacchus]617-bacchus , and that ever [he]604-acrisius refused to own [[his]604-acrisius grandson]5948-his grandson ; for [the one]5949-the one achieved [high heaven]5950-high heaven , and [the other]5036-the other , ( as [he]617-bacchus bore [the viperous monster - head]5952-the viperous monster - head ) on sounding wings hovered a conqueror in the fluent air , over [sands]5953-sands , [Libyan]133-libyan , where the Gorgon - head dropped clots of gore , that , quickening on the ground , became unnumbered serpents ; fitting cause to curse with vipers that infested [land]1301-land . Thence wafted by the never - constant winds through boundless latitudes , now here now there , as flits a vapour - cloud in dizzy flight , down - looking from the lofty skies on [earth]1287-earth , removed far , so compassed [he]617-bacchus [the world]1360-the world . Three times did [he]617-bacchus behold the frozen Bears , times thrice [his]617-bacchus gaze was on [the Crab]674-the crab 's bent arms . Now shifting to the west , now to the east , how often changed [his]617-bacchus course ? Time came , when day declining , [he]617-bacchus began to fear the night , by which [he]617-bacchus stopped [his]617-bacchus flight far in the west — [the realm of [Atlas]529-atlas]5957-the realm of atlas — where [he]617-bacchus sought repose till [Lucifer]513-lucifer might call [Aurora]512-aurora 's fires ; Aurora chariot of the Day . There dwelt huge [Atlas]529-atlas , vaster than the race of [man]1330-man : [son of [Iapetus]675-iapetus]5959-son of iapetus , [his]617-bacchus lordly sway extended over [those extreme domains]5960-those extreme domains , and over [oceans that command their waves to take the panting coursers of the Sun , and bathe the wearied Chariot of [the Day]137-the day]5961-oceans that command their waves to take the panting coursers of the sun , and bathe the wearied chariot of the day . For [him]617-bacchus a thousand flocks , a thousand herds overwandered [pasture fields]1483-pasture fields ; and [neighbour tribes]5963-neighbour tribes might none disturb [that land]5048-that land . Aglint with gold bright leaves adorn the trees , — boughs golden - wrought bear apples of pure gold . And [Perseus]673-perseus spoke to [Atlas]529-atlas , “[1980-thou] O [[my]0-i friend]1979-my friend , if [thou]1980-thou art moved to hear the story of [a noble race]1981-a noble race , [the author of]1982-the author of [my]0-i life is [Jupiter]475-jupiter ; if valiant deeds perhaps are [thy]475-jupiter delight [mine]0-i may deserve [thy]475-jupiter praise . — Behold of [thee]475-jupiter kind treatment [I]0-i implore — a place of rest . ” But [Atlas]529-atlas , mindful of an oracle since by [Themis]676-themis , [the Parnassian]5965-the parnassian , told , recalled these words , “[0-i] O [Atlas]529-atlas ! mark the day [a son of Jupiter]1983-a son of jupiter shall come to spoil ; for when [thy]475-jupiter trees been stripped of golden fruit , the glory shall be [his]1983-a son of jupiter . ” Fearful of this , [Atlas]529-atlas had built solid walls around [[his]529-atlas orchard]5966-his orchard , and secured a dragon , huge , that kept perpetual guard , and thence expelled [all strangers]5967-all strangers from [[his]529-atlas land]5968-his land . Wherefore [he]529-atlas said , “[475-jupiter] Begone ! The glory of [your]475-jupiter deeds is all pretense ; even [Jupiter]475-jupiter , will fail [your]475-jupiter need . ” With that [he]529-atlas added force and strove to drive [the hesitating Alien]5969-the hesitating alien from [his]529-atlas doors ; who pled reprieve or threatened with bold words . Although [he]0-i dared not rival [Atlas]529-atlas ' might , [Perseus]673-perseus made this reply ; “[475-jupiter] For that [my]0-i love [you]475-jupiter hold in light esteem , let this be [yours]475-jupiter . ” [He]0-i said no more , but turning [his]0-i own face , [he]0-i showed upon [his]0-i left [Medusa]677-medusa 's head , abhorrent features . — [Atlas]529-atlas , huge and vast , becomes [a mountain]5634-a mountain — [His]529-atlas great beard and hair are forests , and [his]529-atlas shoulders and [his]529-atlas hands mountainous ridges , and [his]529-atlas head the top of a high peak ; — [his]529-atlas bones are changed to rocks . Augmented on all sides , enormous height attains [his]529-atlas growth ; for so ordained it , [ye]5971-ye , [O mighty Gods]5972-o mighty gods ! who now [the heavens]5973-the heavens ' expanse unnumbered stars , on [him]529-atlas command to rest . In [[their]5974-their eternal prison]5975-their eternal prison , [Aeous]678-aeous , [grandson of [Hippotas]679-hippotas]5976-grandson of hippotas , had shut the winds ; and [Lucifer]513-lucifer , reminder of [our]5977-our toil , in splendour rose upon the lofty sky : and [Perseus]673-perseus bound [his]673-perseus wings upon [his]673-perseus feet , on each foot bound [he]673-perseus them ; [his]673-perseus sword [he]673-perseus girt and sped wing - footed through the liquid air . [Innumerous kingdoms far behind]5978-innumerous kingdoms far behind were left , till [peoples Ethiopic]138-peoples ethiopic and [the lands of [Cepheus]680-cepheus]5979-the lands of cepheus were beneath [his]673-perseus lofty view . There [Ammon]681-ammon , the Unjust , had made decree [Andromeda]682-andromeda , [the Innocent]5980-the innocent , should grieve [[her]682-andromeda mother]4984-her mother 's tongue . [They]5982-they bound [her]682-andromeda fettered arms fast to the rock . When [Perseus]673-perseus [her]682-andromeda beheld as marble [he]673-perseus would deem [her]682-andromeda , but the breeze moved in [her]682-andromeda hair , and from [her]682-andromeda streaming eyes the warm tears fell . [Her]682-andromeda beauty so amazed [his]673-perseus heart , unconscious captive of [her]682-andromeda charms , that almost [his]673-perseus swift wings forgot to wave . — Alighted on the ground , [he]673-perseus thus began ; “[475-jupiter] O fairest ! whom these chains become not so , but worthy are for links that [lovers]1984-lovers bind , make known to [me]0-i [[your]1985-your country]1986-your country 's name and [your]1985-your 's and wherefore bound in chains . ” A moment then , as overcome with shame , [she]682-andromeda made no sound : were not [she]682-andromeda fettered [she]682-andromeda would surely hide [her]682-andromeda blushing head ; but what [she]682-andromeda could perform that did [she]682-andromeda do — [she]682-andromeda filled [her]682-andromeda eyes with tears . So pleaded [he]673-perseus that lest refusal seem implied confession of a crime , [she]682-andromeda told [her]682-andromeda name , [[her]682-andromeda country]5983-her country 's name , and how [her]682-andromeda charms had been [[her]682-andromeda mother]4984-her mother 's pride . But as [she]682-andromeda spoke the mighty ocean roared . Over the waves a monster fast approached , its head held high , abreast [the wide expanse]5985-the wide expanse . — [The virgin]5026-the virgin shrieked ; — no aid [[her]5026-the virgin wretched father]5987-her wretched father gave , nor aid [[her]5026-the virgin still more wretched mother]5988-her still more wretched mother ; but [they]1987-they wept and mingled lamentations with [their]1987-they tears — clinging distracted to [her]5026-the virgin fettered form . And thus [the stranger]5989-the stranger spoke to [them]1987-they , “[0-i] Time waits for tears , but flies the moment of [our]1987-they need : were [I]0-i , who am [the son of [Regal Jove]683-jove]1988-the son of regal jove and [her]1989-her whom [he]0-i embraced in showers of gold , leaving [her]1989-her pregnant in [[her]1989-her brazen cell]1990-her brazen cell , — I , [Perseus]673-perseus , who destroyed [the Gorgon , wreathed with snake - hair]1991-the gorgon , wreathed with snake - hair , [I]0-i , who dared on waving wings to cleave etherial air — were [I]0-i to ask [the maid]1503-the maid in marriage , [I]0-i should be preferred above all others as [[your]1993-your son - in - law]1994-your son - in - law . Not satisfied with deeds achieved , [I]0-i strive to add such merit as [the Gods]1395-the gods permit ; now , therefore , should [my]0-i velour save [her]1989-her life , be it conditioned that [I]0-i win [her]1989-her love . ” To this [[her]1989-her parents]1840-her parents gave a glad assent , for who could hesitate ? And [they]1840-her parents entreat , and promise [him]0-i [the kingdom]5991-the kingdom as a dower . As [a great ship with steady prow speeds on]5992-a great ship with steady prow speeds on ; forced forwards by the sweating arms of [youth]5993-youth [it]5992-a great ship with steady prow speeds on plows the deep ; so , breasting [the great waves]5994-the great waves , [the monster]5004-the monster moved , until to reach [the rock]5996-the rock no further space remained than might the whirl of [Balearic string]93-balearic encompass , through the middle skies , with plummet - mold of lead . That instant , spurning with [his]0-i feet the ground , [the youth]1554-the youth rose upwards to a cloudy height ; and when the shadow of [the hero]5496-the hero marked [the surface of [the sea]1298-the sea]5999-the surface of the sea , [the monster]5004-the monster sought vainly to vent [his]5004-the monster fury on the shade . As the swift bird of Jove , when [he]0-i beholds a basking serpent in [an open field]6002-an open field , exposing to the sun its mottled back , and seizes on its tail ; lest it shall turn to strike with venomed fang , [he]0-i fixes fast [his]0-i grasping talons in the scaly neck ; so did [the winged youth]6003-the winged youth , in rapid flight through yielding elements , press down on [the great monster]6004-the great monster 's back , and thrust [his]6003-the winged youth sword , sheer to the hilt , in its right shoulder — loud its frightful torture sounded over the waves . — So fought [the hero - son of [Inachus]486-inachus]6005-the hero - son of inachus . Wild with the grievous wound , [the monster]5004-the monster rears high in the air , or plunges in the waves ; — or wheels around as turns the frightened boar shunning the hounds around [him]5496-the hero in full cry . [The hero]5496-the hero on [his]5496-the hero active wings avoids [the monster]5004-the monster 's jaws , and with [his]5496-the hero crooked sword tortures [its]5004-the monster back wherever [he]5496-the hero may pierce its mail of hollow shell , or strikes betwixt the ribs each side , or wounds its lashing tail , long , tapered as a fish . The monster spouts forth streams — incarnadined with blood — that spray upon [the hero]5496-the hero 's wings ; who drenched , and heavy with the spume , no longer dares to trust existence to [his]5496-the hero dripping wings ; but [he]5496-the hero discerns a rock , which rises clear above [the water]6010-the water when [the sea is calm]6011-the sea is calm , but now is covered by the lashing waves . On this [he]5496-the hero rests ; and as [his]5496-the hero left hand holds firm on the upmost ledge , [he]5496-the hero thrusts [his]5496-the hero sword , times more than three , unswerving in [his]5496-the hero aim , sheer through the monster 's entrails . — Shouts of praise resound along [the shores]1294-the shores , and even [the Gods]1395-the gods may hear [his]5496-the hero glory in [[their]1395-the gods high abodes]6014-their high abodes . [[Her]5496-the hero parents]1840-her parents , [Cepheus]680-cepheus and [Cassiope]684-cassiope , most joyfully salute [[their]1840-her parents son - in - law]6016-their son - in - law ; declaring [him]5496-the hero [the saviour of [[their]1840-her parents house]5929-their house]6017-the saviour of their house . And now , [her]5496-the hero chains struck off , the lovely cause and guerdon of [his]5496-the hero toil , walks on [the shore]5443-the shore . [The hero]5496-the hero washes [his]5496-the hero victorious hands in water newly taken from [the sea]1298-the sea : but lest the sand upon [the shore]5443-the shore might harm the viper - covered head , [he]5496-the hero first prepared a bed of springy leaves , on which [he]5496-the hero threw weeds of [the sea]1298-the sea , produced beneath the waves . On them [he]5496-the hero laid [Medusa]677-medusa 's awful face , [daughter of [Phorcys]685-phorcys]6024-daughter of phorcys ; — and the living weeds , fresh taken from [the boundless deep]6025-the boundless deep , imbibed [the monster]5004-the monster 's poison in [their]6027-their spongy pith : they hardened at the touch , and felt in branch and leaf unwonted stiffness . [Sea - Nymphs]6028-sea - nymphs , too , attempted to perform that prodigy on numerous other weeds , with like result : so pleased at [their]6028-sea - nymphs success , [they]6028-sea - nymphs raised new seeds , from plants wide - scattered on [the salt expanse]6029-the salt expanse . Even from that day the coral has retained such wondrous nature , that exposed to air it hardens . — Thus , a plant beneath the waves becomes a stone when taken from [the sea]1298-the sea . Three altars to [three Gods]6031-three gods [he]5496-the hero made of turf . To [thee]6032-thee , [victorious Virgin]6033-victorious virgin , did [he]5496-the hero build an altar on the right , to Mercury an altar on the left , and unto Jove an altar in the midst . [He]5496-the hero sacrificed a heifer to [Minerva]543-minerva , and a calf to [Mercury]492-mercury , the Wingfoot , and a bull to [thee]6032-thee , [O greatest of the Deities]6034-o greatest of the deities . Without a dower [he]5496-the hero takes [Andromeda]682-andromeda , [the guerdon of [his]5496-the hero glorious victory]6035-the guerdon of his glorious victory , nor hesitates . — Now pacing in [the van]6036-the van , both [Love]686-love and [Hymen]687-hymen wave the flaring torch , abundant perfumes lavished in the flames . [The houses]4928-the houses are bedecked with wreathed flowers ; and lyres and flageolets resound , and songs — [felicit]688-felicit notes that happy hearts declare . The portals opened , [sumptuous halls]6038-sumptuous halls display [their]6038-sumptuous halls golden splendours , and [the noble lords of [[Cepheus]680-cepheus ' court]6040-cepheus ' court]6039-the noble lords of cepheus ' court take places at the feast , magnificently served . After the feast , when every heart was warming to the joys of [genial Bacchus]617-bacchus , then , [Lyncidian Perseus]673-perseus asked about [the land]1295-the land and [its]1295-the land ways about the customs and the character of [[its]1295-the land heroes]6042-its heroes . Straightway one of [the dinner - companions]6043-the dinner - companions made reply , and asked in turn , “[673-perseus] Now , [valiant Perseus]673-perseus , pray tell the story of the deed , that all may know , and what the arts and power prevailed , when [you]673-perseus struck off the serpent - covered head . ” “[673-perseus] There is , ” continued [[Perseus]673-perseus of [the house of [Agenor]567-agenor]6045-the house of agenor]6044-perseus of the house of agenor , “[673-perseus] There is [a spot beneath cold [Atlas]529-atlas , where in bulwarks of enormous strength , to guard [its]529-atlas rocky entrance]1996-a spot beneath cold atlas , where in bulwarks of enormous strength , to guard its rocky entrance , dwelt [two sisters]1997-two sisters , born of [Phorcys]685-phorcys . These were wo nt to share in turn a single eye between [them]1997-two sisters : this by craft [I]0-i got possession of , when [one]1998-one essayed to hand it to [the other]5036-the other . — [I]0-i put forth [my]0-i hand and took it as it passed between : then , far , remote , through [rocky pathless crags]2000-rocky pathless crags , over [wild hills that bristled with great woods]2001-wild hills that bristled with great woods , [I]0-i thence arrived to where [the Gorgon]689-the gorgon dwelt . “ Along the way , in [fields]6046-fields and by [the roads]6047-the roads , [I]689-the gorgon saw on all sides [men]1399-men and animals — like statues — turned to flinty stone at sight of dread [Medusa]677-medusa 's visage . Nevertheless reflected on the brazen shield , [I]689-the gorgon bore upon [my]689-the gorgon left , [I]689-the gorgon saw [her]677-medusa horrid face . “[689-the gorgon] When [she]2002-her was helpless in the power of sleep and even [her]2002-her serpent - hair was slumber - bound , [I]0-i struck , and took [her]2002-her head sheer from the neck . — [To winged Pegasus the blood]2003-to winged pegasus the blood gave birth , [[his]0-i brother]2004-his brother also , [twins of rapid wing]2005-twins of rapid wing . ” So did [he]0-i speak , and truly told besides the perils of [his]0-i journey , arduous and long — [He]0-i told of seas and [lands that far beneath [him]0-i [he]0-i had seen]6049-lands that far beneath him he had seen , and of the stars that [he]0-i had touched while on [his]0-i waving wings . And yet , before [they]6050-they were aware , the tale was ended ; [he]0-i was silent . Then rejoined [a noble]6051-a noble with enquiry why alone of [those three sisters]6052-those three sisters , snakes were interspersed in dread [Medusa]677-medusa 's locks . And [he]0-i replied : — “[2003-to winged pegasus the blood] Because , [O Stranger]690-o stranger , it is [your]690-o stranger desire to learn what worthy is for [me]0-i to tell , hear [ye]690-o stranger the cause : Beyond all others [she]2006-her was famed for beauty , and the envious hope of [many suitors]2007-many suitors . Words would fail to tell the glory of [her]2006-her hair , most wonderful of all [her]2006-her charms — [A friend]2008-a friend declared to [me]0-i [he]2008-a friend saw its lovely splendour . [Fame]691-fame declares [the Sovereign of [the Sea]141-the sea]2009-the sovereign of the sea attained [her]2006-her love in [chaste [Minerva]543-minerva 's temple]2010-chaste minerva 's temple . While enraged [she]2006-her turned [her]2006-her head away and held [her]2006-her shield before [her]2006-her eyes . To punish that great crime [minerva]543-minerva changed [the Gorgon]2011-the gorgon 's splendid hair to serpents horrible . And now to strike [[her]2006-her foes]5412-her foes with fear , [she]2006-her wears upon [her]2006-her breast those awful vipers — creatures of [her]2006-her rage . While [Perseus]673-perseus , [the brave son of [Jupiter]475-jupiter]2013-the brave son of jupiter , surrounded at the feast by [[Cepheus]680-cepheus ' lords]2014-cepheus ' lords , narrated this , a raging multitude with sudden outcry filled [the royal courts]2015-the royal courts — not with the clamours of a wedding feast but boisterous rage , portentous of dread war . As when the fury of a great wind strikes [a tranquil sea]2016-a tranquil sea , tempestuous billows roll across [the peaceful bosom of [the deep]1961-the deep]2017-the peaceful bosom of the deep ; so were the pleasures at the banquet changed to sudden tumult . [Foremost of [that throng]2020-that throng]2019-foremost of that throng , [the rash ring - leader]2021-the rash ring - leader , [Phineus]692-phineus , shook [his]2021-the rash ring - leader spear , brass - tipped of ash , and shouted , “ Ha , ' tis [I]2021-the rash ring - leader ! [I]2021-the rash ring - leader come avenger of [[my]2021-the rash ring - leader ravished bride]6053-my ravished bride ! Let now [your]2021-the rash ring - leader flittering wings deliver [you]2021-the rash ring - leader , or even [Jupiter]475-jupiter , dissolved in showers of imitation gold . ”[2021-the rash ring - leader] So boasted [he]2021-the rash ring - leader , aiming [his]2021-the rash ring - leader spear at [Perseus]673-perseus . Thus to [him]2021-the rash ring - leader cried [Cepheus]680-cepheus : “ Hold [your]2021-the rash ring - leader hand , and strike [him]673-perseus not ! What strange delusions , O [[my]680-cepheus brother]6054-my brother , have compelled [you]2021-the rash ring - leader to this crime ? Is it the just requital of heroic worth ? A fair reguerdon for the life of [her]2022-her [you]2023-you loved ? “[680-cepheus] If truth were known , not [Perseus]673-perseus ravished [her]2022-her from [you]2023-you ; but , either ' twas the awful God that rules [the Nereides]142-the nereides ; or [Ammon , crowned with crescent horns]2024-ammon , crowned with crescent horns ; or [that monstrosity of Ocean]2025-that monstrosity of ocean 's vast abyss , which came to glut [his]673-perseus famine on the issue of [my]0-i loins . Nor was [your]2023-you suit abandoned till the time when [she]2022-her must perish and be lost to [you]2023-you . So cruel are [you]2023-you , seeking [[my]0-i daughter]1458-my daughter 's death , rejoicing lightly in [our]2027-our deep despair . — “ And was it not enough for [you]2023-you to stand supinely by , while [she]2022-her was bound in chains , and offer no assistance , though [you]2023-you were [[her]2022-her lover]1845-her lover and betrothed ? And will [you]2023-you grieve that [she]2022-her was rescued from a dreadful fate , and spoil [her]2022-her champion of [his]2028-his just rewards ? Rewards that now may seem magnificent , but not denied to [you]2023-you if [you]2023-you had won and saved , when [she]2022-her was fettered to [the rock]5996-the rock . “[2028-his] Let [him]2028-his , whose strength to [my]0-i declining years restored [[my]0-i child]2029-my child , receive the merit due [his]2028-his words and deeds ; and know [his]2028-his suit was not preferred to [yours]2030-yours , but granted to prevent [her]2029-my child certain death . ” not deigning to reply , against [them]6057-them [Phineus]692-phineus stood ; and glancing back from [him]692-phineus to [Perseus]673-perseus , with alternate looks , as doubtful which should feel [his]673-perseus first attack , made brief delay . Then vain at [Perseus]673-perseus hurled [his]673-perseus spear , with all the force that rage inspired , but , missing [him]673-perseus it quivered in a couch . Provoked beyond endurance [Perseus]673-perseus leaped forth from the cushioned seats , and fiercely sent that outwrenched weapon back . It would have pierced [his]673-perseus hostile breast had not [the miscreant]6058-the miscreant crouched behind the altars . Oh perverted good , that thus an altar should abet the wrong ! But , though [the craven Phineus]692-phineus escaped , not vainly flew the whizzing point , but struck in [Rhoetus]693-rhoetus ' forehead . As the barb was torn out of the bone , [the victim]6059-the victim 's heels began to kick upon the floor , and spouting blood defiled the festal board . Then truly flame in uncontrolled rage [the vulgar crowd]6060-the vulgar crowd , and hurl [their]6060-the vulgar crowd harmful darts . And there are some who hold that [Cepheus]680-cepheus and [[his]680-cepheus son - in - law]6061-his son - in - law deserved to die ; but [Cepheus]680-cepheus had passed forth the threshold of [[his]680-cepheus palace]5898-his palace : having called on all [the Gods of Hospitality and Truth and Justice to attest]6063-the gods of hospitality and truth and justice to attest , [he]680-cepheus gave no comfort to [the enemies of Peace]6064-the enemies of peace . Unconquered [Pallas]694-pallas is at hand and holds [her]694-pallas Aegis to protect [[her]694-pallas brother]5185-her brother 's life ; [she]694-pallas lends [him]5185-her brother dauntless courage . At the feast was one from [[India]118-india 's distant shores]6066-india 's distant shores , whose name was [Athis]695-athis . It was said that [Limnate]696-limnate , [the daughter of the River Ganges]6067-the daughter of the river ganges , [him]5185-her brother in [vitreous caverns bright had brought to birth]6068-vitreous caverns bright had brought to birth ; and now at sixteen summers in [his]5185-her brother prime , [the handsome youth]6069-the handsome youth was clad in costly robes . A purple mantle with a golden fringe covered [his]5185-her brother shoulders , and a necklace , carved of gold , enhanced the beauty of [his]5185-her brother throat . [His]5185-her brother hair encompassed with a coronal , delighted with sweet myrrh . Well taught was [he]5185-her brother to hurl the javelin at a distant mark , and [none with better skill]6070-none with better skill could stretch the bow . No sooner had [he]5185-her brother bent the pliant horns than [Perseus]673-perseus , with a smoking billet , seized from the mid - altar , struck [him]5185-her brother on the face , and smashed [his]5185-her brother features in [his]5185-her brother broken skull . And when [Assyrian Lycabas]616-lycabas had seen [[his]616-lycabas dear companion]6071-his dear companion , whom [he]616-lycabas truly loved , beating [his]616-lycabas handsome countenance in blood . And when [he]616-lycabas had bewailed [his]616-lycabas lost life , that ebbed away from that unpiteous wound , [he]616-lycabas snatched the bow that [Athis]695-athis used , and said ; “[2032-you] Let [us]2031-us in single combat seek revenge ; not long will [you]2032-you rejoice [the stripling]1575-the stripling 's fate ; a deed most worthy shame . ” So speaking , forth the piercing arrow bounded from the cord , which , though avoided , struck [the hero]5496-the hero 's cloak and fastened in its folds . — Then [Perseus]673-perseus turned upon [him]5185-her brother , with the trusted curving sword , cause of [Medusa]677-medusa 's death , and drove the blade deep in [his]5185-her brother breast . [The dying victim]6073-the dying victim 's eyes , now swimming in a shadowous night , looked ' round for [Athis]695-athis , whom , beholding , [he]616-lycabas reclined upon , and ushered to [the other world]6074-the other world , — sad consolation of united death . And [Phorbas]697-phorbas [the descendant of [Methion]698-methion]6075-the descendant of methion . Who hailed from far [Syene]144-syene , with [[his]697-phorbas friend Amphimedon of [Libya]58-libya]6076-his friend amphimedon of libya , in [their]2031-us haste to join the battle , slipped up in the blood and fell together : just as [they]2031-us arose that glittering sword was driven through the throat of [Phorbas]697-phorbas into the ribs of [[his]697-phorbas companion]6077-his companion . But [Erithus]699-erithus , [the son of [Actor]700-elis]6078-the son of actor , swung a battle - ax , so weighty , [Perseus]673-perseus chose not combat with [his]673-perseus curving blade . [He]673-perseus seized in [his]673-perseus two hands a huge bowl , wrought around with large design , outstanding from its mass . This , lifting up , [he]673-perseus dashes on [[his]673-perseus foe]6079-his foe , who vomits crimson blood , and falling back beats on the hard floor with [his]673-perseus dying head . And next [he]673-perseus slew [Caucasian Abaris]701-caucasian abaris , and [Polydaemon]702-polydaemon — from [Semiramis]630-queen semiramis nobly descended — and [Sperchius]703-sperchius , [son , Lycetus]6080-son , lycetus , long - haired [Elyces]704-elyces , unshorn , [Clytus]705-clytus and [Phlegias]706-phlegias , [the hero]5496-the hero slew ; — and trampled on [the dying heaped around]6082-the dying heaped around . Not daring to engage [[his]0-i enemy]6083-his enemy in open contest , [Phineus]692-phineus held aloof , and hurled [his]0-i javelin . Badly aimed — by some mischance or turned — it wounded [Idas]707-idas , who had followed neither side ; vain - hoping thus to shun the conflict . [Idas]707-idas , filled with rage , on [Phineus]692-phineus gazed with futile hate , and said , “[2032-you] Since [I]0-i am forced unwilling to such deeds , behold , whom [you]0-i have made [[your]0-i enemy]2034-your enemy , [O savage [Phineus]692-phineus]2035-o savage phineus ! Let [your]0-i recompense be stroke for stroke . ” So speaking , from the wound [he]0-i drew the steel , but , faint from loss of blood , before [his]0-i arm could hurl the weapon back , [he]0-i sank upon [his]0-i knees . Here , also , lies [Odytes]708-odytes , — noblest of [the Cephenes]709-the cephenes , save [Cepheus]680-cepheus only , — slaughtered by the sword of [Clymenus]710-clymenus . And [Prothoenor]711-prothoenor lies [the victim of [Hypseus]712-hypseus]6084-the victim of hypseus ; by [his]711-prothoenor side [Hypseus]712-hypseus slaughtered by [Lyncidas]713-lyncidas falls . And in the midst of this destruction stood [Emathion]714-emathion , now [an aged man]6085-an aged man , revered , who feared [the Gods , and stood for upright deeds]6086-the gods , and stood for upright deeds . And , since [his]714-emathion years denied [him]714-emathion strength for war , [he]714-emathion battled with [his]714-emathion tongue , and railed , and cursed [their]6087-their impious weapons . As [that aged man]6088-that aged man clings to the altar with [his]714-emathion trembling hands , [Chromis]715-chromis with ruthless sword cuts off [his]714-emathion head , which straightway falls upon the altar , whence [his]714-emathion dying tongue denounces them in words of execration : and [his]714-emathion soul expires amid the altar flames . Then [Broteas]716-broteas and [Ammon]681-ammon , [[his]714-emathion twin brother]6089-his twin brother , who not knew [[their]6087-their equals at the cestus , by the hand of [Phineus]692-phineus]6090-their equals at the cestus , by the hand of phineus fell ; for what avails in deed the cestus as a weapon matched with swords . [Ampycus]717-ampycus by the same hand fell , — [the priest of [Ceres]758-ceres]6091-the priest of ceres , with [his]717-ampycus temples wreathed in white . And O , [Iapetides]718-iapetides not for this did [you]2036-your attend the feast ! [Your]2036-your voice attuned melodious to the harp , was in request to celebrate the wedding - day with song , — a work of peace ; as [you]2036-your did stand aside , holding the peaceful plectrum in [your]2036-your hand , [the mocking Pettalus in ridicule]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule said , “[2036-your] Go sing [your]2036-your ditties to the Stygian shades . ” And , mocking thus , [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule drove [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule pointed sword in [[your]2036-your right temple]6093-your right temple . As [your]2036-your limbs gave way , [your]2036-your dying fingers swept the tuneful strings : and falling [you]2036-your did chant a mournful dirge . — [You]2036-your to avenge [enraged Lycormas]719-enraged lycormas tore a huge bar from the door - post , on the right , and dashing it against the mocker crushed [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule neck - bones : as a slaughtered bullock falls — [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule tumbled to the ground . Then on the left . [Cinyphian Pelates]720-cinyphian pelates began to wrench an oak plank from the door - post , but the spear of [Corythus]721-corythus , [the son of [Marmarus]722-marmarus]6094-the son of marmarus , pinioned [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule right hand to the wooden post ; and while [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule struggled [Abas]672-abas pierced [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule side . — [He]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule fell not to the floor , but dying hung suspended from the door - post by [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule hand . And of [the friends of [Perseus]673-perseus]6095-the friends of perseus , [Melaneus]723-melaneus was slain , and [Dorylas]724-dorylas whose wealth was large in [Nasamonian land]6096-nasamonian land . [No other lord]6097-no other lord , as [Dorylas]724-dorylas , [such vast estates]6098-such vast estates possessed ; [no other]6099-no other owned so many heaps of corn . The missile steel stood fastened in [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule groin , obliquely fixed , — a fatal spot — and when [the author of [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule wound]6100-the author of his wound , [Halcyoneus the Bactrian]725-halcyoneus the bactrian , beheld [[his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule victim]6101-his victim thus , rolling [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule eyes and sobbing forth [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule soul , [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule railed ; “[2036-your] Keep for [yourself]2037-yourself of all [[your]2037-yourself lands]2038-your lands as much as [you]2037-yourself can cover . ” And [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule left the bleeding corpse . But [Perseus]673-perseus in revenge hurled after [him]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule a spear , which , in [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule need , [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule ripped out from the wound , yet warm , and struck the boaster on the middle of [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule nose . The piercing steel , passed through [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule nose and neck , — remained projecting from the front and back . And while good fortune helped [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule hand , [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule slew [Clanis]726-clanis and [Clytius]727-clytius , of [one mother born]6102-one mother born , but with a different wound [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule slaughtered each : for , leveled by a mighty arm , [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule ashen spear drove through the thighs of [Clytius]727-clytius , right and left , and [Clanis]726-clanis bit the javelin with [his]726-clanis teeth . And by [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule might , [Mendesian Celadon]728-mendesian celadon and [Atreus]729-atreus fell , [[his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule mother of [the tribes of [Palestine]120-palestine]1815-the tribes of palestine , [[his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule father]1530-his father]6103-his mother of the tribes of palestine , his father was unknown . [Aethion]730-aethion , also , who could well foresee the things to come , but was at last deceived by some false omen . And [Thoactes]731-thoactes fell , [the armour - bearer of [the king]6107-the king]6106-the armour - bearer of the king ; and , next , [the infamous Agyrtes who had slain [[his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule father]1530-his father]6108-the infamous agyrtes who had slain his father . These [he]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule slew ; and though [his]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule strength was nearly spent , so many more remained : for now [the multitude with one accord]6110-the multitude with one accord conspired to slaughter [him]6092-the mocking pettalus in ridicule . From every side [the raging troops]6111-the raging troops assailed the better cause . In vain [the pious father]6112-the pious father and [the bride]6113-the bride , together with [[her]6113-the bride mother]4984-her mother , fill [the halls]6115-the halls with lamentations ; for the clash of arms , the groans of [fallen heroes]6116-fallen heroes drown [their]6110-the multitude with one accord cries . — [Bellona]732-bellona in a sea of blood has drenched [[their]6110-the multitude with one accord Household Gods]6117-their household gods , polluted by these deeds , and [she]732-bellona endeavours to renew the strife . [Perseus]673-perseus , alone against [that raging throng]6118-that raging throng , is now surrounded by [a myriad men]6119-a myriad men , led on by [Phineus]692-phineus ; and [their]6119-a myriad men flying darts , as thick as wintry tail , are showered around on every side , grazing [his]673-perseus eyes and ears . — Quickly [he]673-perseus fixed [his]673-perseus shoulder firm against the rock of a great pillar , which secured [his]673-perseus back from danger , and [he]673-perseus faced [[his]673-perseus foes]6120-his foes , and baffled [their]6120-his foes attack . Upon [his]673-perseus left [Chaonian Molpeus]733-chaonian molpeus pressed , and on [his]673-perseus right a Nabathe an called [Ethemon]734-ethemon pressed . — As when a tiger from [a valley]6121-a valley hears the lowing of two herds , in [separate fields]6122-separate fields , though hunger urges [he]673-perseus not knows on which to spring , but rages equally for each ; so , [Perseus]673-perseus doubtful which may first attack [his]673-perseus left or right , knows not on which to turn , but stands attentive witness to the flight of [Molpeus]733-chaonian molpeus , whom [he]673-perseus wounded in the leg . Nor could [he]673-perseus choose — [Ethemon]734-ethemon , full of rage , pressed on [him]673-perseus to inflict a fatal wound , deep in [his]673-perseus neck ; but with incautious force struck the stone pillar with [his]673-perseus ringing sword and shattered the metal blade , close to the hilt ; the flying fragment pierced [its owner]6123-its owner 's neck , but not with mortal wound . In vain [he]673-perseus pled for mercy , stretching forth [his]673-perseus helpless arms : perseus transfixed [him]673-perseus with [his]673-perseus glittering blade , [Cyllenian]651-hermes . But when [he]0-i saw [his]0-i strength was yielding to [the multitude]6124-the multitude , [he]0-i said , “[2036-your] Since [you]2039-you have forced disaster on [yourselves]2039-you , why should [I]0-i hesitate to save [myself]0-i ? — [O [friends]2041-friends]2040-o friends , avert [your]2041-friends faces if [ye]2041-friends stand before [me]0-i ! ” And [he]0-i raised [Medusa]677-medusa , s head . [Thescelus]735-thescelus answered [him]0-i ; “[2040-o friends] Seek other dupes to chase with wonders ! ” Just as [he]0-i prepared to hurl the deadly javelin from [his]0-i hand , [he]0-i stood , unmoving in that attitude , a marble statue . [Ampyx]736-ampyx , close to [him]0-i , exulting in a mighty spirit , made a lunge to pierce [Lyncides]737-lyncides in the breast ; but , as [his]736-ampyx sword was flashing in the air , [his]736-ampyx right arm grew so rigid , there [he]736-ampyx stood unable to draw back or thrust it forth . But [Nileus]738-nileus , who had feigned [himself]738-nileus begot by seven - fold [Nile]527-o nile , and carved [his]738-nileus shield with gold and silver streams , alternate seven , shouted ; “[673-perseus] Look , look ! [O Perseus]673-perseus , [him]673-perseus from whom [I]0-i sprung ! And [you]673-perseus shall carry to the silent shades a mighty consolation in [your]673-perseus death , that [you]673-perseus were slain by such a one as [I.]0-i ” But in the midst of boasting , the last words were silenced ; and [his]738-nileus open mouth , although incapable of motion , seemed intent to utter speech . Then [Eryx]739-eryx , chiding says ; “[673-perseus] [Your]673-perseus craven spirits have benumbed [you]673-perseus , not [Medusa]677-medusa 's poison . — Come with [me]0-i and strike [this youthful mover of magician charms]2042-this youthful mover of magician charms down to the ground . ” — [He]736-ampyx started with a rush ; the earth detained [his]736-ampyx steps ; it held [him]736-ampyx fast ; [he]736-ampyx could not speak ; [he]736-ampyx stood , complete with arms , a statue . Such a penalty was [theirs]6125-theirs , and justly earned ; but near by there was one , aconteus , who defending [Perseus]673-perseus , saw medusa as [he]736-ampyx fought ; and at the sight [the soldier]6126-the soldier hardened to an upright stone . — Assured [he]736-ampyx was alive , [Astyages]740-astyages now struck [him]736-ampyx with [his]740-astyages long sword , but the blade resounded with a ringing note ; and there , astonished at the sound , [Astyages]740-astyages , [himself]740-astyages , assumed that nature ; and remained with wonder pictured on [his]740-astyages marble face . And not to weary with the names of [men]1399-men , sprung from [the middle classes]6128-the middle classes , there remained [two hundred warriors eager for the fight]6129-two hundred warriors eager for the fight — as soon as [they]6129-two hundred warriors eager for the fight could see [Medusa]677-medusa 's face , [two hundred warriors]6130-two hundred warriors stiffened into stone . At last , repentant , [Phineus]692-phineus dreads the war , unjust , for in a helpless fright [he]692-phineus sees the statues standing in strange attitudes ; and , recognizing [[his]692-phineus adherents]6131-his adherents , calls on each by name to rescue from that death . Still unbelieving [he]692-phineus begins to touch the bodies , nearest to [himself]692-phineus , and all are hard stone . Having turned [his]692-phineus eyes away , [he]692-phineus stretched [his]692-phineus hands and arms obliquely back to [Perseus]673-perseus , and confessed [his]692-phineus wicked deeds ; and thus imploring spoke ; “[2042-this youthful mover of magician charms] Remove , [I]0-i pray , [O Perseus]673-perseus , [thou]2043-thou invincible , remove from [me]0-i that dreadful Gorgon : take away the stone - creating countenance of [[thy]673-perseus unspeakable Medusa]2044-thy unspeakable medusa ! For [we]2045-we warred not out of hatred , nor to gain a throne , but clashed [our]2045-we weapons for [a woman]5609-a woman 's sake . — “ [Thy]673-perseus merit proved [thy]673-perseus valid claim , and time gave argument for [mine]0-i . It grieves [me]2047-the craven not to yield , O bravest , only give [me]2047-the craven life , and all the rest be thine . ”[2047-the craven] Such words implored [the craven]2047-the craven , never daring to address [his]2047-the craven eyes to whom [he]2047-the craven spoke . And thus returned [the valiant Perseus]673-perseus ; “ [I]2048-my will grant to [you]2047-the craven , [[O]2047-the craven timid - hearted [Phineus]692-phineus]6132-o timid - hearted phineus ! as behoves [your]2047-the craven conduct ; and it should appear a gift , magnanimous , to [one who fears to move]6133-one who fears to move . — Take courage , for no steel shall violate [your]2047-the craven carcase ; and , moreover , [you]2047-the craven shall be a monument , that ages may record [your]2047-the craven unforgotten name . [You]2047-the craven shall be seen thus always , in [the palace where resides [[my]2048-my father]1438-my father - in - law]6134-the palace where resides my father - in - law , that [[my]2048-my surrendered spouse]6136-my surrendered spouse may soften [her]6136-my surrendered spouse great grief when [she]6136-my surrendered spouse but sees the darling image of [[her]6136-my surrendered spouse first betrothed]6137-her first betrothed . ”[2048-my] [He]2048-my spoke , and moved [Medusa]677-medusa to that side where [Phineus]692-phineus had turned [his]692-phineus trembling face : and as [he]692-phineus struggled to avert [his]692-phineus gaze [his]692-phineus neck grew stiff ; the moisture of [his]692-phineus eyes was hardened into stone . — And since that day [his]692-phineus timid face and coward eyes and hands , forever shall be guilty as in life . After such deeds , [victorious Perseus]673-perseus turned , and sought the confines of [[his]673-perseus native land]2049-his native land ; together with [[his]673-perseus bride]2050-his bride ; which , having reached , [he]673-perseus punished [Proetus]741-proetus — who by force of arms had routed [[his]741-proetus own brother]2051-his own brother from [the throne of [Argos]60-argos]2052-the throne of argos . By [his]2048-my aid [Acrisius]604-acrisius , although [[his]604-acrisius undeserving parent]2053-his undeserving parent , gained [[his]604-acrisius citadels]2054-his citadels once more : for [Proetus]741-proetus failed , with all [his]741-proetus arms and towers unjustly held , to quell [the grim - eyed monster , snake - begin]2055-the grim - eyed monster , snake - begin . Yet not the valour of [the youth]1554-the youth , upheld by many labours , nor [his]741-proetus grievous wrongs have softened [you]2057-your , [O Polydectes]742-o polydectes ! [king of [Little Seriphus]743-little seriphus]2058-king of little seriphus ; but bitter hate ungoverned , rankles in [your]2057-your hardened heart — there is no limit to [your]2057-your unjust rage . Even [his]741-proetus praises are defamed by [you]2057-your and all [your]2057-your arguments are given to prove [Medusa]677-medusa 's death a fraud . — [Perseus]673-perseus rejoined ; “ By this [we]6138-we give [our]6138-we true pledge of the truth , avert [your]2057-your eyes ! ”[673-perseus] And by [Medusa]677-medusa 's face [he]741-proetus made the features of [that impious king]2059-that impious king a bloodless stone . Through all these mighty deeds [Pallas]694-pallas , [Minerva]543-minerva , had availed to guide [[her]694-pallas gold - begotten brother]2060-her gold - begotten brother . Now [she]694-pallas sped , surrounded in a cloud , from [Seriphus]743-little seriphus , while [Cynthus]744-cynthus on the right , and [Gyarus]745-gyarus far faded from [her]694-pallas view . And where a path , high over [the deep sea]1436-the deep sea , leads the near way , [she]694-pallas winged the air for [Thebes]103-thebes , and [Helicon]45-virgin helicon haunt of [the Virgin Nine]746-the virgin nine . High on [that mount]2062-that mount [she]694-pallas stayed [her]694-pallas flight , and with these words bespoke [those well - taught sisters]2063-those well - taught sisters ; “ Fame has given to [me]694-pallas the knowledge of a new - made fountain — gift of [Pegasus]747-pegasus , [that fleet steed]6139-that fleet steed , from the blood of dread [Medusa]677-medusa sprung — it opened when [his]2060-her gold - begotten brother hard hoof struck the ground . — It is the cause that brought [me]694-pallas . — For [my]694-pallas longing to have seen this fount , miraculous and wonderful , grows not the less in that [myself]694-pallas did see the swift steed , nascent from maternal blood . ”[694-pallas] To which [Urania]748-urania thus ; “ Whatever the cause that brings [thee]748-urania to [[our]6140-our habitation]6141-our habitation , [thou]748-urania , [O goddess]6142-o goddess , art to [us]6140-our the greatest joy . And now , to answer [thee]748-urania , reports are true ; this fountain is the work of [Pegasus]747-pegasus , ”[748-urania] And having said these words , [she]694-pallas gladly thence conducted [Pallas]694-pallas to [the sacred streams]2064-the sacred streams . And [Pallas]694-pallas , after [she]694-pallas had long admired that fountain , flowing where the hoof had struck , turned round to view [the groves of ancient trees]2065-the groves of ancient trees ; [the grottoes]2066-the grottoes and the grass bespangled , rich with flowers unnumbered — all so beautiful [she]694-pallas deemed the charm of that locality a fair surrounding for the studious days of those Mnemonian Maids . But [one of [them]2068-them]2067-one of them addressed [her]694-pallas thus ; “ O [thou]748-urania whose valour gave [thy]748-urania mind to greater deeds ! if [thou]748-urania hadst stooped to [us]6140-our , [Minerva]543-minerva , [we]6140-our had welcomed [thee]748-urania most worthy of [our]6140-our choir ! [Thy]748-urania words are true ; and well hast [thou]748-urania approved the joys of art , and this retreat . Most happy would [we]6140-our be if only [we]6140-our were safe ; but wickedness admits of no restraint , and everything affrights [our]6140-our virgin minds ; and everywhere the dreadful [Pyrenaeus]749-pyrenaeus haunts [our]6140-our sight ; — scarcely have [we]6140-our recovered from the shock . “[2067-one of them] That savage , with [[his]2069-his troops of [Thrace]148-thrace]2070-his troops of thrace . had seized [the lands of [Daulis]149-daulis and of [Phocis]86-phocis]2071-the lands of daulis and of phocis , where [he]2069-his ruled in tyranny ; and when [we]2072-our sought [the Temples of [Parnassus]473-parnassus]2073-the temples of parnassus , [he]2069-his observed [us]2072-our on [our]2072-our way ; — and knowing [[our]2072-our estate]2074-our estate , pretending to revere [our]2072-our sacred lives , [he]2069-his said ; ‘ O [Muses]750-muses , [I]0-i beseech [you]750-muses pause ! Choose now the shelter of [my]0-i roof and shun the heavy stars that teem with pouring rain ; nor hesitate , for often [the glorious Gods]2075-the glorious gods have entered [humbler homes]2076-humbler homes . ’ “ Moved by [his]2069-his words , and by the growing storm , [we]2072-our gave assent , and entered [[his]2069-his first house]6143-his first house . But presently the storm abated , and the southern wind was conquered by the north ; the black clouds fled , and soon the skies were clear . “[749-pyrenaeus] At once [we]2072-our sought to quit [the house]5402-the house , but [Pyrenaeus]749-pyrenaeus closed all means of exit , — and prepared to force [our]2072-our virtue . Instantly [we]2072-our spread [our]2072-our wings , and so escaped ; but on [a lofty tower]2078-a lofty tower [he]2069-his stood , as if to follow , and exclaimed ; ‘ A path for [you]750-muses marks out a way for [me]0-i . , and quite insane , [he]2069-his leaped down from the top of [that high tower]2079-that high tower . — Falling on [his]2069-his face , the bones were crushed , and as [his]2069-his life ebbed out the ground was crimsoned with [his]2069-his wicked blood . ” So spoke [the Muse]6144-the muse . And now was heard the sound of pennons in the air , and voices , too , gave salutations from the lofty trees . [Minerva]543-minerva , thinking [they]6145-they were human tongues , looked up in question whence the perfect words ; but on the boughs , [nine ugly magpies]6146-nine ugly magpies perched , [those mockers of all sounds]6147-those mockers of all sounds , which now complained [their]6146-nine ugly magpies hapless fate . And as [she]6144-the muse wondering stood , [Urania]748-urania , [goddess of the Muse]6148-goddess of the muse , rejoined ; — “[5249-their mother] Look , those but lately worsted in dispute augment the number of unnumbered birds . — [Pierus]751-pierus was [[their]2080-their father]2081-their father , very rich in [lands of [Pella]150-pella]2082-lands of pella ; and [[their]2080-their mother]5249-their mother ( called Evippe of [Paeonia]151-paeonia ) when [she]5249-their mother brought [them]2080-their forth , nine times evoked , in labours nine , [Lucina]752-lucina 's aid . — Unduly puffed with pride , because it chanced [their]2080-their number equalled [ours]2084-us , [these stupid sisters]2085-these stupid sisters , hither to engage in wordy contest , fared through [many towns]2086-many towns ; — through all [Haemonia]152-haemonia and [Achaia]671-achaia came to [us]2084-us , and said ; — ‘ Oh , cease [your]2087-your empty songs , attuned to dulcet numbers , that deceive [the vulgar , untaught throng]2088-the vulgar , untaught throng . If aught is yours of confidence , [O Thespian Deities]753-o thespian deities contend with [us]2084-us : [our]2084-us number equals [yours]2089-your . [We]2084-us will not be defeated by [your]2089-your arts ; nor shall [your]2089-your songs prevail . — Then , conquered , give [Hyantean Aganippe]754-hyantean aganippe ; yield to [us]2084-us the Medusean Fount ; — and should [we]2084-us fail , [we]2084-us grant [[Emathia]755-emathia 's plains]2090-emathia 's plains , to where [uprise [Paeonia]151-paeonia 's peaks of snow]2091-uprise paeonia 's peaks of snow . — Let [chosen Nymphs]2092-chosen nymphs award the prize — . ’ ' Twas shameful to contend ; it seemed more shameful to submit . At once , [the chosen Nymphs]2093-the chosen nymphs swore justice by [their]2093-the chosen nymphs streams , and sat in judgment on [their]2093-the chosen nymphs thrones of rock . “ At once , although the lot had not been cast , [the leading sister]6149-the leading sister hastened to begin . — [She]6149-the leading sister chanted of celestial wars ; [she]6149-the leading sister gave [the Giants]465-the giants false renown ; [she]6149-the leading sister gave [the Gods]1395-the gods small credit for great deeds . — [She]6149-the leading sister droned out , ‘ Forth , [those deepest realms of [earth]1287-earth]6151-those deepest realms of earth , [Typhoeus]596-typhoeus came , and filled [the Gods]1395-the gods with fear .
