[They]1395-the gods turned [their]1395-the gods backs in flight to [Egypt]153-egypt ; and the wearied rout , where [Great Nile]527-o nile spreads [his]527-o nile seven - channeled mouth , were there received . — Thither the earth - begot [Typhoeus]596-typhoeus hastened : but [the Gods of [Heaven]5-heaven]5226-the gods of heaven deceptive shapes assumed . — [Lo]756-lo , [Jupiter]475-jupiter , ( As Libyan [Ammon]681-ammon 's crooked horns attest ) was hidden in [the leader of a flock]6155-the leader of a flock ; [Apollo]549-phoebus in a crow ; [Bacchus]617-bacchus in a goat ; [Diana]484-diana in a cat ; [Venus]996-venus in a fish ; [Saturnian Juno]488-juno in a snow - white cow ; [Cyllenian Hermes]651-hermes in an Ibis ' wings . ’ — Such stuff [she]2094-his droned out from [her]2094-his noisy mouth : and then [they]5226-the gods of heaven summoned [us]6156-our ; but , haply , time permits [thee]2094-his not , nor leisure [thee]2094-his permits , that [thou]2094-his shouldst hearken to [our]6156-our melodies . ”[2093-the chosen nymphs] “ Nay doubt it not , ”[757-calliope] quoth [Pallas]694-pallas , “ but relate [your]2094-his melodies in order . ”[2094-his] And [she]2094-his sat beneath the pleasant shadows of [the grove]5487-the grove . And thus again [Urania]748-urania ; “ On [our]6156-our side [we]6156-our trusted all to one . ”[748-urania] Which having said , [Calliope]757-calliope arose . [Her]757-calliope glorious hair was bound with ivy . [She]757-calliope attuned the chords , and chanted as [she]757-calliope struck the sounding strings : — “ [First Ceres]758-ceres broke with crooked plow the glebe ; first gave to [earth]1287-earth [its]1287-earth fruit and wholesome food ; first gave the laws ; — all things of [Ceres]758-ceres came ; of [her]758-ceres [I]757-calliope sing ; and oh , that [I]757-calliope could tell [her]758-ceres worth in verse ; in verse [her]758-ceres worth is due . “[757-calliope] Because [he]2094-his dared to covet heavenly thrones [Typhoeus]596-typhoeus , giant limbs are weighted down beneath [[Sicilia]759-sicilia 's Isle]2096-sicilia 's isle — vast in extent — how often thence [he]2094-his strains and strives to rise ? But [his]2094-his right hand [Pachynus]760-pachynus holds ; [his]2094-his legs are pressed by [Lilybaeus]761-lilybaeus , [Aetna]762-aetna weights [his]2094-his head . Beneath that ponderous mass [Typhoeus]596-typhoeus lies , flat on [his]596-typhoeus back ; and spues the sands on high ; and vomits flames from [his]596-typhoeus ferocious mouth . [He]596-typhoeus often strives to push [the earth]1289-the earth away , [the cities]2098-the cities and [the mountains]5190-the mountains from [his]596-typhoeus limbs — by which [the lands]1369-the lands are shaken . Even [the king , that rules the silent shades]2101-the king , that rules the silent shades is made to quake , for fear [the earth]1289-the earth may open and the ground , cleft in wide chasms , letting in the day , may terrify the trembling ghosts . Afraid of this disaster , [that dark despot]2103-that dark despot left [[his]596-typhoeus gloomy habitation]2104-his gloomy habitation ; carried forth by soot - black horses , in [[his]596-typhoeus gloomy car]2105-his gloomy car . “ [He]596-typhoeus circumspectly viewed [Sicilia]759-sicilia 's vast foundations . — Having well explored and proved no part was shattered ; having laid aside [his]596-typhoeus careful fears , [he]596-typhoeus wandered in [those parts]6158-those parts . “[2106-him] [Him]2106-him , [Venus]996-venus , [Erycina]763-erycina , in [her]996-venus mount thus witnessed , and embraced [[her]996-venus winged son]2107-her winged son , and said , ‘ O [Cupid]482-cupid ! [thou]2108-thou who art [[my]0-i son]5122-my son — [my]0-i arms , [my]0-i hand , [my]0-i strength ; take up those arms , by which [thou]2108-thou art victorious over all , and aim [thy]2108-thou keenest arrow at the heart of that divinity whom fortune gave the last award , what time the triple realm , by lot was portioned out . ‘ [The Gods of [Heaven]5-heaven]5226-the gods of heaven are overcome by [thee]2111-thee ; and [Jupiter]475-jupiter , and all [the Deities that swim the deep]2112-the deities that swim the deep , and [the great ruler of [the Water - Gods]155-the water - gods]2113-the great ruler of the water - gods : why , then , should [Tartarus]77-tartarus escape [our]2114-our sway — the third part of [the universe]1323-the universe at stake — by which [[thy]77-tartarus mother]5136-thy mother 's empire and [thy]77-tartarus own may be enlarged according to great need . ‘ How shameful is [our]2114-our present lot in [Heaven]1454-heaven , the powers of love and [I]0-i alike despised ; for , mark how [Pallas]694-pallas has renounced [my]0-i sway , besides [Diana]484-diana , [javelin - hurler]2118-javelin - hurler — so will [[Ceres]758-ceres ' daughter]2119-ceres ' daughter choose virginity , if [we]2114-our permit , — that way [her]2119-ceres ' daughter hopes incline . Do [[thou]2120-thou this goddess [Proserpine]764-proserpine , unite in marriage to [[her]764-proserpine uncle]5907-her uncle]2121-thou this goddess proserpine , unite in marriage to her uncle . [Venus]996-venus spoke ; — “ [Cupid]482-cupid then loosed [his]5907-her uncle quiver , and of all its many arrows , by [[his]5907-her uncle mother]1520-his mother 's aid , selected one ; the keenest of them all ; the least uncertain , surest from the string : and having fixed [his]5907-her uncle knee against the bow , bent back the flexile horn . — The flying shaft struck [Pluto]664-pluto in the breast . “[996-venus] There is [a lake of greatest depth]2123-a lake of greatest depth , not far from [Henna]765-henna 's walls , long since called [Pergus]766-pergus ; and the songs of swans , that wake Cayster , rival not the notes of swans melodious on its gliding waves : a fringe of trees , encircling as a wreath [its]2124-its compassed waters , with a leafy veil denies the heat of noon ; cool breezes blow beneath the boughs ; the humid ground is sprent with purpling flowers , and spring eternal reigns . “ While [Proserpine]764-proserpine once dallied in that grove , plucking white lilies and sweet violets , and while [she]764-proserpine heaped [her]764-proserpine basket , while [she]764-proserpine filled [her]764-proserpine bosom , in a pretty zeal to strive beyond all others ; [she]764-proserpine was seen , beloved , and carried off by [Pluto]664-pluto — such the haste of sudden love . “[4979-the goddess] [The goddess]4979-the goddess , in great fear , called on [[her]4979-the goddess mother]4984-her mother and on all [[her]4979-the goddess friends]2127-her friends ; and , in [her]4979-the goddess frenzy , as [her]4979-the goddess robe was rent , down from the upper edge , [her]4979-the goddess gathered flowers fell from [her]4979-the goddess loosened tunic . — This mishap , so perfect was [her]4979-the goddess childish innocence , increased [her]4979-the goddess virgin grief . — “ [The ravisher]6160-the ravisher urged on [his]6160-the ravisher chariot , and inspired [his]6160-the ravisher steeds ; called each by name , and on [their]6160-the ravisher necks and manes shook the black - rusted reins . [They]6160-the ravisher hastened through [deep lakes]6161-deep lakes , and through [the pools of Palici]6162-the pools of palici , which boiling upward from the ruptured earth smell of strong sulphur . And [they]6160-the ravisher bore [him]6160-the ravisher thence to where [the sons of Bacchus , who had sailed from [twin - sea Corinth]6164-twin - sea corinth , long ago had built [[a city]6165-a city 's walls between [unequal ports]6167-unequal ports]6166-a city 's walls between unequal ports]6163-the sons of bacchus , who had sailed from twin - sea corinth , long ago had built a city 's walls between unequal ports . “[767-cyane] Midway between [the streams of [Cyane]767-cyane]2128-the streams of cyane and [Arethusa]770-arethusa lies [a moon - like pool , of silvered narrow horns]2129-a moon - like pool , of silvered narrow horns . There stood [the Nymph]5012-the nymph , revered above all others in [that land]5048-that land , whose name was [Cyane]767-cyane . From [her]5012-the nymph [that pond]2132-that pond was always called . And as [she]5012-the nymph stood , concealed in middle waves that circled [her]5012-the nymph white thighs , [she]5012-the nymph recognized [the God]5013-the god , and said ; ‘ O [thou]2134-thou shalt go no further , [Pluto]664-pluto , [thou]2134-thou shalt not by force alone become [the son - in - law of Ceres]2135-the son - in - law of ceres . It is better to beseech [a mother]5325-a mother 's aid than drag [[her]5325-a mother child]5312-her child away ! And this sustains [my]0-i word , if [I]0-i may thus compare great things with small , [Anapis]768-anapis loved [me]0-i also ; but [he]768-anapis wooed and married [me]0-i by kind endearments ; not by fear , as [thou]2134-thou hast terrified [this girl]2138-this girl . ’ So did [she]5012-the nymph speak ; and stretching out [her]5012-the nymph arms on either side opposed [his]768-anapis way . “ [The son of Saturn]1396-the son of saturn blazed with uncontrolled rage ; and urged [his]1396-the son of saturn steeds , and hurled [his]1396-the son of saturn royal scepter in the pool . Cast with a mighty arm it pierced the deeps . [The smitten earth]6169-the smitten earth made way to [Tartarus]77-tartarus ; — it opened [a wide basin]6170-a wide basin and received [the plunging chariot]6171-the plunging chariot in the midst . — But now [the mournful Cyane]6172-the mournful cyane began to grieve , because from [her]5012-the nymph against [her]5012-the nymph fountain - rights [the goddess]4979-the goddess had been torn . The deepening wound still rankled in [her]5012-the nymph breast , and [she]5012-the nymph dissolved in many tears , and wasted in those waves which lately were submissive to [her]5012-the nymph rule . “[5012-the nymph] So [you]2139-you could see [[her]5012-the nymph members]2140-her members waste away : [her]5012-the nymph hones begin to bend ; [her]5012-the nymph nails get soft ; [her]5012-the nymph azure hair , [her]5012-the nymph fingers , legs and feet , and every slender part melt in the pool : so brief the time in which [her]5012-the nymph tender limbs were changed to flowing waves ; and after them [her]5012-the nymph back and shoulders , and [her]5012-the nymph sides and breasts dissolved and vanished into rivulets : and while [she]5012-the nymph changed , the water slowly filled [her]5012-the nymph faulty veins instead of living blood — and nothing that a hand could hold remained . “ Now it befell when [Proserpine]764-proserpine was lost , [[her]764-proserpine anxious mother]6174-her anxious mother sought through [every land]6175-every land and [every sea]6176-every sea in vain . [She]6174-her anxious mother rested not . [Aurora]512-aurora , when [she]512-aurora came with ruddy locks , might never know , nor even Hesperus , if [she]512-aurora might deign to rest . — [She]5012-the nymph lit two pines from [Aetna]762-aetna 's flames and held one in each hand , and restless bore them through the frosty glooms : and when serene the day had dimmed the stars [she]5012-the nymph sought [[her]5012-the nymph daughter]1816-her daughter by the rising sun ; and when the sun declined [she]5012-the nymph rested not . “[5012-the nymph] Wearied with labour [she]5012-the nymph began to thirst , for all this while no streams had cooled [her]5012-the nymph lips ; when , as by chance , [a cottage thatched with straw]2141-a cottage thatched with straw gladdened [her]5012-the nymph sight . Thither [the goddess]4979-the goddess went , and , after knocking at the humble door , waited until [an ancient woman]2143-an ancient woman came ; who , when [she]2143-an ancient woman saw [the goddess]4979-the goddess and had heard [her]2143-an ancient woman plea for water , gave [her]2143-an ancient woman a sweet drink , but lately brewed of parched barley - meal ; and while [the goddess]4979-the goddess quaffed this drink [a boy , of bold and hard appearance]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance , stood before and laughed and called [her]4979-the goddess greedy . While [he]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance spoke [the angry goddess]2147-the angry goddess sprinkled [him]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance with meal , mixed with the liquid which had not been drunk . “ [His]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance face grew spotted where the mixture struck , and legs appeared where [he]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance had arms before , a tail was added to [his]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance changing trunk ; and lest [his]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance former strength might cause great harm , all parts contracted till [he]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance measured less than common lizards . While [the ancient dame]6178-the ancient dame wondered and wept and strove for one caress , the reptile fled and sought [a lurking place]6179-a lurking place . — [His]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance very name describes [him]2146-a boy , of bold and hard appearance to the eye , a body starred with many coloured spots . “[2147-the angry goddess] [What lands]2148-what lands , what oceans [Ceres]758-ceres wandered then , would weary to relate . [The bounded world]2149-the bounded world was narrow for the search . Again [she]2147-the angry goddess passed through [Sicily]158-sicily ; again observed all signs ; and as [she]2147-the angry goddess wandered came to [Cyane]767-cyane , who strove to tell where [Proserpine]764-proserpine had gone , but since [her]2147-the angry goddess change , had neither mouth nor tongue , and so was mute . And yet [the Nymph]5012-the nymph made plain by certain signs what [she]5012-the nymph desired to say : for on the surface of [the waves]2151-the waves [she]5012-the nymph showed a well - known girdle [Proserpine]764-proserpine had lost , by chance had dropped it in [that sacred pool]2152-that sacred pool ; which when [the goddess]4979-the goddess recognized , at last , convinced [[her]4979-the goddess daughter]1816-her daughter had been forced from [her]4979-the goddess , [she]4979-the goddess tore [her]4979-the goddess streaming locks , and frenzied struck [her]4979-the goddess bosom with [her]4979-the goddess palms . And in [her]4979-the goddess rage , although [she]4979-the goddess wist not where [[her]4979-the goddess daughter]1816-her daughter was , [she]4979-the goddess blamed [all countries]2156-all countries and cried out against [their]2156-all countries base ingratitude ; and [she]4979-the goddess declared [the world]1360-the world unworthy of the gift of corn : but Sicily before [all other lands]2158-all other lands , for there was found the token of [her]4979-the goddess loss . “ For that [she]4979-the goddess broke with savage hand the plows , which there had turned the soil , and full of wrath leveled in equal death [the peasant]6180-the peasant and [his]6180-the peasant ox — both tillers of the soil — and made decree [that land]5048-that land should prove deceptive to the seed , and rot all planted germs . — [That fertile isle]6182-that fertile isle , so noted through [the world]1360-the world , becomes a waste ; the corn is blighted in the early blade ; excessive heat , excessive rain destroys ; the winds destroy , the constellations harm ; the greedy birds devour the scattered seeds ; thistles and tares and tough weeds choke the wheat . “[4979-the goddess] For this [the Nymph]5012-the nymph , [Alpheian]769-alpheian , raised [her]5012-the nymph head above Elean waves ; and having first pushed back [her]5012-the nymph dripping tresses from [her]5012-the nymph brows , back to [her]5012-the nymph ears , [she]5012-the nymph thus began to speak ; ‘ [O mother of [the virgin]5026-the virgin]2160-o mother of the virgin , sought throughout [the globe]1510-the globe ! [O mother of nutritious fruits]2163-o mother of nutritious fruits ! Let these tremendous labours have an end ; do not increase the violence of [thy]5012-the nymph wrath against [the Earth]22-earth , devoted to [thy]5012-the nymph sway , and not deserving blame ; for only force compelled [the Earth]1289-the earth to open for that wrong . Think not [my]0-i supplication is to aid [[my]0-i native country]2165-my native country ; hither [I]0-i am come [an alien]2166-an alien : [Pisa]159-pisa is [[my]0-i native land]2167-my native land , and [Elis]700-elis gave [me]0-i birth . Though [I]0-i sojourn a stranger in [this isle of Sicily]2168-this isle of sicily it yet delights [me]0-i more than all [the world]1360-the world . ‘ [I]0-i , [Arethusa]770-arethusa , claim [this isle]2170-this isle [[my]0-i home]5740-my home , and do implore [thee]2172-thy keep [my]0-i throne secure , [O greatest of [the Gods]1395-the gods]2173-o greatest of the gods ! A better hour , when [thou]2172-thy art lightened of [thy]2172-thy cares , will come , and when [thy]2172-thy countenance again is kind ; and then may [I]0-i declare what cause removed [me]0-i from [[my]0-i native place]2175-my native place — and through the waves of such a mighty ocean guided [me]0-i to find [Ortygia]160-ortygia . ‘ Through [the porous earth]2176-the porous earth by [deepest caverns]2177-deepest caverns , [I]0-i uplift [my]0-i head and see unwonted stars . Now it befell , as [I]0-i was gliding far beneath [the world]1360-the world , where flow [dark Stygian streams]161-dark stygian streams , [I]0-i saw [[thy]2172-thy [Proserpine]764-proserpine]2179-thy proserpine . Although [her]764-proserpine countenance betrayed anxiety and grief , [a queen [She]764-proserpine reigned supremely great in that opacous world queen consort mighty to [the King of [Hell]163-hell]2181-the king of hell]2180-a queen she reigned supremely great in that opacous world queen consort mighty to the king of hell . ’ “ Astonished and amazed , as thunderstruck , when [[Proserpina]771-proserpina 's mother]6184-proserpina 's mother heard these words , long while [she]6184-proserpina 's mother stood till great bewilderment gave way to heavy grief . Then to the skies , ethereal , [she]6184-proserpina 's mother mounted in [[her]6184-proserpina 's mother car]6185-her car and with beclouded face and streaming hair stood fronting [Jove]683-jove , opprobrious . ‘ [I]764-proserpine have come O [Jupiter]475-jupiter , a suppliant to [thee]475-jupiter , both for [[my]764-proserpine own offspring]6186-my own offspring as well as thine . If [thy]475-jupiter hard heart deny [a mother]5325-a mother grace , yet haply as [a father]1601-a father [thou]475-jupiter canst feel some pity for [[thy]475-jupiter daughter]6189-thy daughter ; and [I]764-proserpine pray [thy]475-jupiter care for [her]6189-thy daughter may not be valued less because [my]764-proserpine groaning travail brought [her]6189-thy daughter forth . — [[My]764-proserpine long - sought daughter]6190-my long - sought daughter has at last been found , if one can call it , found , when certain loss more certain has been proved ; or so may deem the knowledge of [her]6189-thy daughter state . — But [I]764-proserpine may bear [his]475-jupiter rude ways , if again [he]475-jupiter bring [her]6189-thy daughter back . ‘ [[Thy]764-proserpine worthy child]6191-thy worthy child should not be forced to [we]6192-we d [a bandit - chief]6193-a bandit - chief , nor should [[my]764-proserpine daughter]1458-my daughter 's charms reward [his]475-jupiter crime . ’ [She]764-proserpine spoke ; — and [Jupiter]475-jupiter took up the word ; ‘ [This daughter]6195-this daughter is a care , a sacred pledge to [me]764-proserpine as well as [thee]764-proserpine ; but if it please [us]6192-we to acknowledge truth , this is a deed of love and injures not . And if , O [goddess]1607-goddess , [thou]764-proserpine wilt not oppose , [such law - son]6197-such law - son can not compass [our]6192-we disgrace : for though all else were wanting , naught can need [[Jove]683-jove 's brother]6198-jove 's brother , who in fortune yields to none save [me]764-proserpine . But if [thy]764-proserpine fixed desire compel dissent , let [Proserpine]764-proserpine return to [Heaven]1454-heaven ; however , subject to the binding law , if there [her]764-proserpine tongue have never tasted food — a sure condition , by the Fates decreed . ’ [he]6198-jove 's brother spoke ; but [Ceres]758-ceres was no less resolved to lead [[her]758-ceres daughter]1816-her daughter thence . “[764-proserpine] Not so [the Fates]553-the fates permit . — [The virgin]5026-the virgin , thoughtless while [she]5026-the virgin strayed among [the cultivated Stygian fields]2183-the cultivated stygian fields , had broken fast . While there [she]5026-the virgin plucked the fruit by bending a pomegranate tree , and plucked , and chewed seven grains , picked from the pallid rind ; and [none]1829-none had seen except [Ascalaphus]772-ascalaphus — [him]772-ascalaphus Orphne , [famed of all Avernian Nymphs]2185-famed of all avernian nymphs , had brought to birth in [some infernal cave]2186-some infernal cave , days long ago , from [Acheron]773-acheron 's embrace — [he]772-ascalaphus saw it , and with cruel lips debarred [young Proserpine]764-proserpine 's return . Heaving a sigh , [the Queen of [Erebus]164-erebus]2187-the queen of erebus , indignant changed [that witness to an evil bird]2188-that witness to an evil bird : [she]2187-the queen of erebus turned [his]772-ascalaphus head , with sprinkled Phlegethonian lymph , into a beak , and feathers , and great eyes ; [his]772-ascalaphus head grew larger and [his]772-ascalaphus shape , deformed , was cased in tawny wings ; [his]772-ascalaphus lengthened nails bent inward ; — and [his]772-ascalaphus sluggish arms as wings can hardly move . So [he]772-ascalaphus became the vilest bird ; [a messenger of grief]2189-a messenger of grief ; the lazy owl ; sad omen to [mankind]5938-mankind . “ The telltale 's punishment was only just ; [O Siren Maids]774-o siren maids , but wherefore thus have [ye]774-o siren maids the feet and plumes of birds , although remain [your]774-o siren maids virgin features ? Is it from the day when [Proserpina]771-proserpina gathered vernal flowers ; because [ye]774-o siren maids mingled with [[her]771-proserpina chosen friends]6201-her chosen friends ? And after [she]771-proserpina was lost , in vain [ye]774-o siren maids sought through all [the world]1360-the world ; and wished for wings to waft [you]774-o siren maids over [the great deep]6203-the great deep , that soon [the sea]1298-the sea might feel [your]774-o siren maids great concern . — [The Gods]1395-the gods were kind : [ye]774-o siren maids saw [your]774-o siren maids limbs grow yellow , with a growth of sudden - sprouting feathers ; but because [your]774-o siren maids melodies that gently charm the ear , besides the glory of [your]774-o siren maids speech , might lose the blessing , of a tongue , [your]774-o siren maids virgin face and human voice remained . “[772-ascalaphus] But [Jupiter]475-jupiter , [the mediator of these rival claims]2191-the mediator of these rival claims , urged by [[his]475-jupiter brother]2004-his brother and [[his]475-jupiter grieving sister]2193-his grieving sister , divided the long year in equal parts . Now [Proserpina]771-proserpina , as [a Deity]1690-a deity , of equal merit , in two kingdoms reigns : — for six months with [[her]771-proserpina mother]4984-her mother [she]771-proserpina abides , and six months with [[her]771-proserpina husband]1381-her husband . — Both [her]771-proserpina mind and [her]771-proserpina appearance quickly were transformed ; for [she]771-proserpina who seemed so sad in [Pluto]664-pluto 's eyes , now as [a goddess]5320-a goddess beams in joyful smiles ; so , when the sun obscured by watery mist conquers the clouds , it shines in splendour forth . “ And [genial Ceres]758-ceres , full of joy , that now [[her]758-ceres daughter]1816-her daughter was regained , began to speak ; ‘ Declare the reason of [thy]771-proserpina wanderings , O Arethusa ! tell [me]2198-the fertile goddess wherefore [thou]771-proserpina wert made [a sacred stream]6207-a sacred stream . ’ [The waters]5216-the waters gave no sound ; but soon [that goddess]5913-that goddess raised [her]5913-that goddess head from the deep springs ; and after sue had dried [her]771-proserpina green hair with [her]771-proserpina hand , with fair address [she]771-proserpina told the ancient amours of [that stream which flows through [Elis]700-elis]6210-that stream which flows through elis . — ‘ [I]2198-the fertile goddess was one among [the Nymphs of old [Achaia]671-achaia]6211-the nymphs of old achaia , ’ — so [she]2198-the fertile goddess said — ‘ And none of [them]6211-the nymphs of old achaia more eager sped than [I]2198-the fertile goddess , along the tangled pathways ; and [I]2198-the fertile goddess fixed the hunting - nets with zealous care . — Although [I]2198-the fertile goddess strove not for the praise that beauty gives , and though [my]2198-the fertile goddess form was something stout for grace , it had the name of being beautiful . ‘ So worthless seemed the praise , [I]2198-the fertile goddess took no joy in [my]2198-the fertile goddess appearance — as [a country lass]6212-a country lass [I]2198-the fertile goddess blushed at those endowments which would give delight to [others]4906-others — even the power to please seemed criminal . — And [I]2198-the fertile goddess remember when returning weary from [Stymphal fan woods]6214-stymphal fan woods , and hot with toil , that made the glowing sun seem twice as hot , [I]2198-the fertile goddess chanced upon a stream , that flowed without a ripple or a sound so smoothly on , [I]2198-the fertile goddess hardly thought it moved . ‘ [The water]6010-the water was so clear that [one]1998-one could see and count the pebbles in the deepest parts , and silver willows and tall poplar trees , nourished by flowing waters , spread their shade over the shelving banks . So [I]2198-the fertile goddess approached , and shrinkingly touched [the cool stream]6217-the cool stream with [my]2198-the fertile goddess feet ; and then [I]2198-the fertile goddess ventured deeper to [my]2198-the fertile goddess knees ; and not contented doffed [my]2198-the fertile goddess fleecy robes , and laid them on a bending willow tree . Then , naked , [I]2198-the fertile goddess plunged deeply in [the stream]5090-the stream , and while [I]2198-the fertile goddess smote the water with [my]2198-the fertile goddess hands , and drew it towards [me]2198-the fertile goddess , striking boldly forth , moving [my]2198-the fertile goddess body in a thousand ways , [I]2198-the fertile goddess thought [I]2198-the fertile goddess heard a most unusual sound , a murmuring noise beneath [the middle stream]6219-the middle stream . ‘ Alarmed , [I]2198-the fertile goddess hastened to [the nearest bank]6220-the nearest bank , and as [I]2198-the fertile goddess stood upon [its]6220-the nearest bank edge , these words hoarsely [Alpheus]526-alpheus uttered from [his]526-alpheus waves ; ‘ Oh , whither dost [thou]6221-thou hasten ? ’ and again , ‘ Oh , whither dost [thou]6221-thou hasten ? ’ said [the voice]6222-the voice . ‘ Just as [I]2198-the fertile goddess was , [I]2198-the fertile goddess fled without [my]2198-the fertile goddess clothes , for [I]2198-the fertile goddess had left them on [the other bank]6223-the other bank ; which , when [he]526-alpheus saw , so much the more inflamed , more swiftly [he]526-alpheus pursued : [my]2198-the fertile goddess nakedness was tempting to [his]526-alpheus gaze . And thus [I]2198-the fertile goddess ran ; and thus relentlessly [he]526-alpheus pressed [my]2198-the fertile goddess steps : so from the hawk the dove with trembling wings ; and so , the hawk pursues the frightened dove . ‘ Swiftly and long [I]2198-the fertile goddess fled , with winding course , to [Orchamenus]775-orchamenus , Psophis and Cyllene , and [Maenalus]537-maenalus and [Erymanthus]776-erymanthus cold , and [Elis]700-elis . Neither could [he]526-alpheus gain by speed , although [his]526-alpheus greater strength must soon prevail , for [I]2198-the fertile goddess not longer could endure the strain . ‘ Still [I]2198-the fertile goddess sped onward through [the fields]5475-the fields and woods , by tangled wilds and over rocks and crags ; and as [I]2198-the fertile goddess hastened from the setting sun , [I]2198-the fertile goddess thought [I]2198-the fertile goddess saw a growing shadow move beyond [my]2198-the fertile goddess feet ; it may have been [my]2198-the fertile goddess fear imagined it , but surely now [I]2198-the fertile goddess heard the sound of footsteps : [I]2198-the fertile goddess could even feel [his]526-alpheus breathing on the loose ends of [my]2198-the fertile goddess hair ; and [I]2198-the fertile goddess was terrified . At last , worn out by all [my]2198-the fertile goddess efforts to escape , [I]2198-the fertile goddess cried ; ‘ Oh , help [me]2198-the fertile goddess — [thou]6225-thou whose bow and quivered darts [I]2198-the fertile goddess oft have borne — [[thy]6225-thou armour - bearer]6226-thy armour - bearer calls — O chaste Diana help , — or [I]2198-the fertile goddess am lost . ’ ‘ It moved [the goddess]4979-the goddess , and [she]4979-the goddess gathered up a dense cloud , and encompassed [me]2198-the fertile goddess about . — [The baffled River]167-the river circled round and round , seeking to find [me]2198-the fertile goddess , hidden in that cloud — twice went [the River]6228-the river round , and twice cried out , ‘ Ho , [Arethusa]770-arethusa ! [Arethusa]770-arethusa , Ho ! ’ ‘ What were [my]2198-the fertile goddess wretched feelings then ? Could [I]2198-the fertile goddess be braver than the Iamb that hears the wolves , howling around the high - protecting fold ? Or than the hare , which lurking in the bush knows of the snarling hounds and dares not move ? And yet , [Alpheus]526-alpheus thence would not depart , for [he]526-alpheus could find no footprints of [my]2198-the fertile goddess flight . ‘ [He]526-alpheus watched the cloud and spot , and thus besieged , a cold sweat gathered on [my]2198-the fertile goddess trembling limbs . The clear - blue drops , distilled from every pore , made pools of water where [I]2198-the fertile goddess moved [my]2198-the fertile goddess feet , and dripping moisture trickled from [my]2198-the fertile goddess hair . — Much quicker than [my]2198-the fertile goddess story could be told , [my]2198-the fertile goddess body was dissolved to flowing streams . — But still [the River]167-the river recognized the waves , and for the love of [me]2198-the fertile goddess transformed [his]167-the river shape from human features to [his]167-the river proper streams , that so [his]167-the river waters might encompass [mine]2198-the fertile goddess . ‘ [Diana]484-diana , therefore , opened up the ground , in which [I]2198-the fertile goddess plunged , and thence through [gloomy caves]6229-gloomy caves was carried to [Ortygia]160-ortygia — [blessed isle]6230-blessed isle ! To which [[my]2198-the fertile goddess chosen goddess]6231-my chosen goddess gave [her]6231-my chosen goddess name ! Where first [I]2198-the fertile goddess rose amid the upper air ! ’ “[2198-the fertile goddess] Thus [Arethusa]770-arethusa made an end of speech : and presently [the fertile goddess]2198-the fertile goddess yoked two dragons to [[her]2198-the fertile goddess chariot]2199-her chariot : [she]2198-the fertile goddess curbed [their]2200-their mouths with bits : [they]2200-their bore [her]2198-the fertile goddess through the air , in [her]2198-the fertile goddess light car betwixt [the earth]1289-the earth and skies , to [the Tritonian citadel]2202-the tritonian citadel , and to Triptolemus , to whom [she]2198-the fertile goddess furnished seed , that [he]2203-he might scatter it in [wasted lands]2204-wasted lands , and in [the fallow fields]2205-the fallow fields ; which , after long neglect , again were given to the plow . “ After [he]2203-he had traveled through uncharted skies , over [wide [Europe]168-europe and [vast Asian lands]6233-vast asian lands]6232-wide europe and vast asian lands , [he]2203-he lit upon the coast of [Scythia]4-scythia , where [a king called [Lyncus]777-lyncus reigned]6234-a king called lyncus reigned . And there , at once [he]2203-he sought [the palace of [that king]6236-that king]6235-the palace of that king , who said ; ‘ Whence come [you]2203-he , [stranger]6237-stranger , wherefore in [this land]6238-this land ? Come , tell to [me]2206-he [[your]2203-he nation]6239-your nation and [your]2203-he name . ’ “[2206-he] And after [he]2206-he was questioned thus , [he]2206-he said , ‘ [I]0-i came from [far - famed [Athens]95-athens]2207-far - famed athens and [they]2208-they call [my]0-i name [Triptolemus]778-triptolemus . [I]0-i neither came by [ship]2209-ship through waves , nor over [the dry land]2210-the dry land ; for [me]0-i the yielding atmosphere makes way . — [I]0-i bear the gifts of [Ceres]758-ceres to [[your]758-ceres land]1736-your land , which scattered over [[your]758-ceres wide realm]2212-your wide realm may yield an ample harvest of nutritious food . ’ “ [The envious Lyncus , wishing to appear the gracious author of all benefits]6240-the envious lyncus , wishing to appear the gracious author of all benefits , received [the unsuspecting youth]6241-the unsuspecting youth with smiles ; but when [he]2206-he fell into a heavy sleep that [savage king]6242-savage king attacked [him]2206-he with a sword — but while attempting to transfix [[his]2206-he guest]6243-his guest , [the goddess]4979-the goddess [Ceres]758-ceres changed [him]2206-he to a lynx : — and once again [she]2215-her sent [[her]2215-her favoured youth]6245-her favoured youth to drive [her]2215-her sacred dragons through the clouds . “[2213-the greatest of our number] [The greatest of [our]2214-our number]2213-the greatest of our number ended thus [her]2215-her learned songs ; and with concordant voice [the chosen Nymphs]2093-the chosen nymphs adjudged [the Deities]1400-the deities , on Helicon who dwell , should be proclaimed [the victors]2218-the victors . “ But [the vanquished nine]6246-the vanquished nine began to scatter [their]6246-the vanquished nine abuse ; to whom rejoined [the goddess]4979-the goddess ; ‘ Since it seems a trifling thing that [you]6248-you should suffer a deserved defeat , and [you]6248-you must add unmerited abuse to heighten [your]6248-you offence , and since by this appears the end of [our]2214-our endurance , [we]2214-our shall certainly proceed to punish [you]6248-you according to the limit of [our]2214-our wrath . ’ “[2093-the chosen nymphs] But [these Emathian sisters]2219-these emathian sisters laughed to scorn [our]2214-our threatening words ; and as [they]2219-these emathian sisters tried to speak , and made great clamour , and with shameless hands made threatening gestures , suddenly stiff quills sprouted from out [their]2219-these emathian sisters finger - nails , and plumes spread over [their]2219-these emathian sisters stretched arms ; and [they]2219-these emathian sisters could see the mouth of [each companion]2220-each companion growing out into a rigid beak . — And thus new birds were added to [the forest]5365-the forest . — While [they]2219-these emathian sisters made complaint , [these Magpies that defile [[our]2214-our groves]2223-our groves]2222-these magpies that defile our groves , moving [their]2222-these magpies that defile our groves stretched - out arms , began to float , suspended in the air . And since that time [their]2222-these magpies that defile our groves ancient eloquence , [their]2222-these magpies that defile our groves screaming notes , [their]2222-these magpies that defile our groves tiresome zeal of speech have all remained . ” All this [Minerva]543-minerva heard ; and [she]543-minerva approved [their]2222-these magpies that defile our groves songs and [their]2222-these magpies that defile our groves resentment ; but [her]543-minerva heart was brooding thus , “[2219-these emathian sisters] It is an easy thing to praise another , [I]0-i should do as [they]2219-these emathian sisters : [no creature of [the earth]1289-the earth]2224-no creature of the earth should ever slight the majesty that dwells in [me]0-i , — without just retribution . ” — So [her]543-minerva thought was turned upon the fortune of [Arachne]779-arachne — proud , who would not ever yield to [her]543-minerva the praise won by the art of deftly weaving wool , [a girl who had not fame for place of birth , nor fame for birth , but only fame for skill]6249-a girl who had not fame for place of birth , nor fame for birth , but only fame for skill ! For it was well known that [[her]779-arachne father]5022-her father dwelt in [Colophon]169-colophon ; where , at [his]5022-her father humble trade , [he]5022-her father dyed in Phocean purples , fleecy wool . [[Her]779-arachne mother]4984-her mother , also of [the lower class]6252-the lower class , had died . [Arachne]779-arachne in [a mountain town]6253-a mountain town by skill had grown so famous in [the Land of Lydia]6254-the land of lydia , that unnumbered curious nymphs eager to witness [her]779-arachne dexterity , deserted [the lush vineyards of [Timolus]170-timolus]6255-the lush vineyards of timolus ; or even left [the cool and flowing streams of bright [Pactolus]171-pactolus]6256-the cool and flowing streams of bright pactolus , to admire the cloth , or to observe [her]779-arachne deftly spinning wool . So graceful was [her]779-arachne motion then , — if [she]779-arachne was twisting the coarse wool in little balls , or if [she]779-arachne teased it with [her]779-arachne finger - tips , or if [she]779-arachne softened the fine fleece , drawn forth in misty films , or if [she]779-arachne twirled the smooth round spindle with [her]779-arachne energetic thumb , or if with needle [she]779-arachne embroidered cloth ; — in all [her]779-arachne motions one might well perceive how much [Minerva]543-minerva had instructed [her]779-arachne : but this [she]779-arachne ever would deny , displeased to share [her]779-arachne fame ; and said , “[2226-her] Let [her]2226-her contend in art with [me]0-i ; and if [her]2226-her skill prevails , [I]0-i then will forfeit all ! ” [Minerva]543-minerva heard , and came to [her]779-arachne , disguised with long grey hair , and with a staff to steady [her]779-arachne weak limbs . [She]779-arachne seemed [a feeble woman]6257-a feeble woman , very old , and quavered as [she]779-arachne said , “[2226-her] Old age is not the cause of every ill ; experience comes with lengthened years ; and , therefore , [you]2227-you should not despise [my]0-i words . It is no harm in [you]2227-you to long for praise of [mortals]4908-mortals , when [your]2227-you nimble hands are spinning the soft wool , — but [you]2227-you should not deny [Minerva]543-minerva 's art — and [you]2227-you should pray that [she]543-minerva may pardon [you]2227-you , for [she]543-minerva will grant [you]2227-you pardon if [you]2227-you ask . ” [Arachne]779-arachne , scowling with an evil face . Looked at [the goddess]4979-the goddess , as [she]779-arachne dropped [her]779-arachne thread . [She]779-arachne hardly could restrain [her]779-arachne threatening hand , and , trembling in [her]779-arachne anger , [she]779-arachne replied to [you]2227-you , disguised [Minerva]543-minerva : “[2229-silly fool] [Silly fool]2229-silly fool , — worn out and witless in [your]2227-you palsied age , a great age is [your]2227-you great misfortune ! — Let [[your]2227-you daughter]2230-your daughter and [[[your]2227-you son]1935-your son 's wife]2232-your son 's wife — if [the Gods]1395-the gods have blessed [you]2227-you — let [them]1395-the gods profit by [your]2227-you words ; within [myself]0-i , [my]0-i knowledge is contained sufficient ; [you]2227-you need not believe that [your]2227-you advice does any good ; for [I]0-i am quite unchanged in [my]0-i opinion . Get [you]2227-you gone , — advise [[your]2227-you goddess]2234-your goddess to come here [herself]2234-your goddess , and not avoid the contest ! ” Instantly , [the goddess]4979-the goddess said , “[543-minerva] [Minerva]543-minerva comes to [you]2227-you ! ” And with those brief words , put aside the shape of [the old woman]6260-the old woman , and revealed [herself]4979-the goddess , [Minerva]543-minerva , [goddess]1607-goddess . [All the other Nymphs]6262-all the other nymphs and [matrons of [Mygdonia]172-mygdonia]6263-matrons of mygdonia worshiped [her]4979-the goddess ; but not [Arachne]779-arachne , who defiant stood ; — although at first [she]779-arachne flushed up — then went pale — then blushed again , reluctant . — So , at first , the sky suffuses , as [Aurora]512-aurora moves , and , quickly when the glorious sun comes up , pales into white . [She]779-arachne even rushed upon [her]779-arachne own destruction , for [she]779-arachne would not give from [her]779-arachne desire to gain the victory . Nor did [the daughter of [almighty Jove]683-jove]6264-the daughter of almighty jove decline : disdaining to delay with words , [she]779-arachne hesitated not . And both , at once , selected [their]6265-their positions , stretched [their]6265-their webs with finest warp , and separated warp with sley . The woof was next inserted in the web by means of the sharp shuttles , which [their]6265-their nimble fingers pushed along , so drawn within the warp , and so the teeth notched in the moving sley might strike [them]6265-their . — [Both]5611-both , in haste , girded [their]6265-their garments to [their]6265-their breasts and moved [their]6265-their skilful arms , beguiling [their]6265-their fatigue in eager action . Myriad tints appeared besides the Tyrian purple — royal dye , extracted in [brass vessels]6267-brass vessels . — As the bow , that spans new glory in the curving sky , its glittering rays reflected in the rain , spreads out a multitude of blended tints , in scintillating beauty to the sight of all who gaze upon it ; — so the threads , inwoven , mingled in a thousand tints , harmonious and contrasting ; shot with gold : and there , depicted in those shining webs , were shown the histories of ancient days : — [Minerva]543-minerva worked [the Athenian Hill of [Mars]565-mars]6268-the athenian hill of mars , where [ancient Cecrops]6269-ancient cecrops built [[his]6269-ancient cecrops citadel]6270-his citadel , and showed the old contention for the name it should be given . — [Twelve celestial Gods]6271-twelve celestial gods surrounded [Jupiter]475-jupiter , on lofty thrones ; and all [their]6271-twelve celestial gods features were so nicely drawn , that each could be distinguished . — [Jupiter]475-jupiter appeared as [monarch of [those judging Gods]6273-those judging gods]6272-monarch of those judging gods . There [Neptune]472-neptune , [guardian of [the sea]1298-the sea]6274-guardian of the sea , was shown contending with [Minerva]543-minerva . As [he]472-neptune struck the Rock with [his]472-neptune long trident , a wild horse sprang forth which [he]472-neptune bequeathed to [man]1330-man . [He]472-neptune claimed [his]472-neptune right to name [the city]5520-the city for that gift . And then [she]543-minerva wove a portrait of [herself]543-minerva , bearing a shield , and in [her]543-minerva hand a lance , sharp - pointed , and a helmet on [her]543-minerva head — [her]543-minerva breast well - guarded by [her]543-minerva Aegis : there [she]543-minerva struck [her]543-minerva spear into [the fertile earth]6278-the fertile earth , from which a branch of olive seemed to sprout , pale with new clustered fruits . — And [those twelve Gods]6279-those twelve gods , appeared to judge , that olive as a gift surpassed the horse which [Neptune]472-neptune gave to [man]1330-man . And , so [Arachne]779-arachne , rival of [her]779-arachne fame , might learn the folly of [her]779-arachne mad attempt , from the great deeds of ancient histories , and what award presumption must expect , [Minerva]543-minerva wove four corners with life scenes of contest , brightly colored , but of size diminutive . In one of these was shown the snow - clad mountains , Rhodope , and Haemus , which for punishment were changed from [human beings]6281-human beings to those rigid forms , when [they]6281-human beings aspired to rival [the high Gods]6282-the high gods . And in another corner [she]543-minerva described that Pygmy , whom [the angry Juno]6283-the angry juno changed from [queen - ship]6284-queen - ship to a crane ; because [she]543-minerva thought [herself]543-minerva [an equal of [the living Gods]1912-the living gods]6285-an equal of the living gods , [she]543-minerva was commanded to wage cruel wars upon [[her]543-minerva former subjects]6287-her former subjects . In the third , [she]543-minerva wove the story of [Antigone]780-antigone , who dared compare [herself]780-antigone to [Juno]488-juno , [queen of [Jupiter]475-jupiter]6288-queen of jupiter , and showed [her]780-antigone as [she]780-antigone was transformed into a silly chattering stork , that praised [her]780-antigone beauty , with [her]780-antigone ugly beak . — Despite the powers of [Ilion]781-ilion and [[her]780-antigone sire]6289-her sire [Laomedon]782-laomedon , [her]780-antigone shoulders fledged white wings . And so , the third part finished , there was left one corner , where [Minerva]543-minerva deftly worked the story of [the father]1574-the father , [Cinyras]783-cinyras ; — as [he]783-cinyras was weeping on the temple steps , which once had been [[his]783-cinyras daughter]5054-his daughter 's living limbs . And [she]543-minerva adorned the border with designs of peaceful olive — [her]543-minerva devoted tree — which having shown , [she]543-minerva made an end of work . [Arachne]779-arachne , of [Maeonia]110-maeonia , wove , at first the story of [Europa]592-europa , as the bull deceived [her]779-arachne , and so perfect was [her]779-arachne art , it seemed a real bull in real waves . [Europa]592-europa seemed to look back towards [the land which [she]592-europa had left]6292-the land which she had left ; and call in [her]592-europa alarm to [[her]592-europa companions]6293-her companions — and as if [she]592-europa feared the touch of dashing waters , to draw up [her]592-europa timid feet , while [she]592-europa was sitting on the bull 's back . And [she]592-europa wove Asteria seized by the assaulting eagle ; and beneath the swan 's white wings showed [Leda]784-leda lying by [the stream]5090-the stream : and showed [Jove]683-jove dancing as [a Satyr]6295-a satyr , when [he]683-jove sought the beautiful Antiope , to whom was given twins ; and how [he]683-jove seemed [Amphitryon]785-amphitryon when [he]683-jove deceived [Alcmena]786-alcmena ; and how [he]683-jove courted [lovely Danae]787-danae luring [her]786-alcmena as a gleaming shower of gold ; and poor [Aegina]788-aegina , hidden in [his]683-jove flame , jove as [a shepherd with Mnemosyne]6296-a shepherd with mnemosyne ; and [beautiful [Proserpina]771-proserpina , involved by [him]683-jove , apparent as a spotted snake]771-proserpina . And in [her]592-europa web , [Arachne]779-arachne wove the scenes of [Neptune]472-neptune : — who was shown first as a bull , when [he]683-jove was deep in love with [virgin Arne]789-virgin arne then as [Enipeus]790-enipeus when [the giant twins , Aloidae]6297-the giant twins , aloidae , were begot ; and as the ram that gambolled with Bisaltis ; as a horse loved by [the fruitful Ceres , golden haired , all - bounteous mother of the yellow grain]6298-the fruitful ceres , golden haired , all - bounteous mother of the yellow grain ; and as the bird that hovered round [snake - haired Medusa]6299-snake - haired medusa , mother of the winged horse ; and as the dolphin , sporting with the Nymph , [Melantho]791-melantho . — All of these were woven true to life , in proper shades . And there [she]592-europa showed [Apollo]549-phoebus , when disguised in various forms : as when [he]549-phoebus seemed [a rustic]6300-a rustic ; and as when [he]549-phoebus wore hawk - wings , and then the tawny skin of a great lion ; and once more when [he]549-phoebus deluded [Isse]792-isse , as [a shepherd lad]6301-a shepherd lad . And there was [Bacchus]617-bacchus , when [he]617-bacchus was disguised as a large cluster of fictitious grapes ; deluding by that [wile the beautiful Erigone]793-wile the beautiful erigone ; — and [Saturn]463-saturn , as a steed , [begetter of the dual - natured Chiron]6302-begetter of the dual - natured chiron . And then [Arachne]779-arachne , to complete [her]779-arachne work , wove all around the web a patterned edge of interlacing flowers and ivy leaves . [Minerva]543-minerva could not find a fleck or flaw — even [Envy]558-envy can not censure perfect art — enraged because [Arachne]779-arachne had such skill [she]592-europa ripped the web , and ruined all the scenes that showed those wicked actions of [the Gods]1395-the gods ; and with [her]592-europa boxwood shuttle in [her]592-europa hand , struck [the unhappy mortal]6304-the unhappy mortal on [her]592-europa head , — struck sharply thrice , and even once again . [Arachne]779-arachne 's spirit , deigning not to brook such insult , brooded on it , till [she]779-arachne tied a cord around [her]779-arachne neck , and hung [herself]779-arachne . [Minerva]543-minerva , moved to pity at the sight , sustained and saved [her]779-arachne from that bitter death ; but , angry still , pronounced another doom : “[543-minerva] Although [I]0-i grant [you]2235-your life , [most wicked one]2236-most wicked one , [your]2235-your fate shall be to dangle on a cord , and [[your]2235-your posterity]2237-your posterity forever shall take [your]2235-your example , that [your]2235-your punishment may last forever ! ” Even as [she]592-europa spoke , before withdrawing from [[her]592-europa victim]6305-her victim 's sight , [she]592-europa sprinkled [her]779-arachne with juice — extract of herbs of [Hecate]794-hecate . At once all hair fell off , [her]592-europa nose and ears remained not , and [her]592-europa head shrunk rapidly in size , as well as all [her]592-europa body , leaving [her]592-europa diminutive . — [Her]592-europa slender fingers gathered to [her]592-europa sides as long thin legs ; and all [her]592-europa other parts were fast absorbed in [her]592-europa abdomen — whence [she]592-europa vented a fine thread ; — and ever since , [Arachne]779-arachne , as a spider , weaves [her]779-arachne web . [All Lydia]795-all lydia was astonished at [her]592-europa fate the Rumor spread to [Phrygia]175-phrygia , soon [the world]1360-the world was filled with fear and wonder . [Niobe]796-niobe had known [her]592-europa long before , — when in [[Maeonia]110-maeonia near to [Mount Sipylus]176-mount sipylus]6307-maeonia near to mount sipylus ; but the sad fate which overtook [Arachne]779-arachne , lost on [her]592-europa , [she]592-europa never ceased [her]592-europa boasting and refused to honor [the great Gods]6308-the great gods . So many things increased [her]592-europa pride : [She]592-europa loved to boast [[her]592-europa husband]1381-her husband 's skill , [[their]1381-her husband noble family]6310-their noble family , the rising grandeur of [[their]1381-her husband kingdom]6311-their kingdom . Such felicities were great delights to [her]592-europa ; but nothing could exceed the haughty way [she]592-europa boasted of [[her]592-europa children]6312-her children : and , in truth , [Niobe]796-niobe might have been adjudged on [earth]1287-earth , [the happiest mother of mankind]6314-the happiest mother of mankind , if pride had not destroyed [her]592-europa wit . It happened then , that [Manto]797-manto , [daughter of Tiresias , who told the future]6315-daughter of tiresias , who told the future ; when [she]797-manto felt the fire of prophecy descend upon [her]797-manto , rushed upon [the street]6316-the street and shouted in the midst : “[2238-your] [[You]2238-your women of [Ismenus]523-ismenus]2239-you women of ismenus ! go and give to high [Latona]798-latona and [[her]798-latona children]6312-her children , twain , incense and prayer . Go , and with laurel wreathe [your]2238-your hair in garlands , as [your]2238-your sacred prayers arise to heaven . Give heed , for by [my]0-i speech [Latona]798-latona has ordained these holy rites . ” At once , [the Theban women]6317-the theban women wreathe [their]6317-the theban women brows with laurel , and [they]6317-the theban women cast in hallowed flame the grateful incense , while [they]6317-the theban women supplicate all favors of [the ever - living Gods]6318-the ever - living gods . And while [they]6317-the theban women worship , [Niobe]796-niobe comes [there]1500-there , surrounded with a troup that follow [her]796-niobe , and most conspicuous in [her]796-niobe purple robe , bright with inwoven threads of yellow gold . Beautiful in [her]796-niobe anger , [she]796-niobe tosses back [her]796-niobe graceful head . The glory of [her]796-niobe hair shines on [her]796-niobe shoulders . Standing forth , [she]796-niobe looks upon [them]6317-the theban women with [her]796-niobe haughty eyes , and taunts [them]6317-the theban women , “[798-latona] Madness has prevailed on [you]2241-you to worship [some imagined Gods of Heaven]2242-some imagined gods of heaven , which [you]2241-you have only heard of ; but [the Gods that truly are on earth]2243-the gods that truly are on earth , and can be seen , are all neglected ! Come , explain to [me]0-i , why is [Latona]798-latona worshiped and adored , and frankincense not offered unto [me]0-i ? For [my]0-i divinity is known to [you]2241-you . “ [Tantalus]657-tantalus was [[my]5320-a goddess father]1438-my father , who alone approached the tables of [the Gods in [heaven]1454-heaven]6321-the gods in heaven ; [[my]5320-a goddess mother]6323-my mother , [sister of [the Pleiades]799-the pleiades]6324-sister of the pleiades , was [daughter of huge Atlas , who supports [the world]1360-the world upon [his]1438-my father shoulders]6325-daughter of huge atlas , who supports the world upon his shoulders ; [I]5320-a goddess can boast of [Jupiter]475-jupiter as [father of [[my]5320-a goddess sire]5132-my sire , [I]5320-a goddess count [him]475-jupiter also as [[my]5320-a goddess father - in - law]6329-my father - in - law]6327-father of my sire , i count him also as my father - in - law . [The peoples of [my]5320-a goddess [Phrygia]175-phrygia]6330-the peoples of my phrygia dread [my]5320-a goddess power , and [I]5320-a goddess am [mistress of [the palace built by [Cadmus]561-cadmus]6332-the palace built by cadmus]6331-mistress of the palace built by cadmus . By [[my]5320-a goddess husband]6333-my husband , [I]5320-a goddess am queen of those great walls that reared [themselves]6330-the peoples of my phrygia to the sweet music of [his]6333-my husband sounding lyre . [We]6334-we rule together [all the people [they]6335-all the people they encompass and defend encompass and defend]6335-all the people they encompass and defend . And everywhere [my]5320-a goddess gaze is turned , an evidence of wealth is witnessed . “[5320-a goddess] In [my]0-i features [you]2244-you can see the beauty of [a goddess]5320-a goddess , but above that majesty is all the glory due to [me]0-i , [the mother of [[my]0-i seven sons]2247-my seven sons]2246-the mother of my seven sons and [daughters]5525-daughters seven . And the time will come when by [their]2249-their marriage [they]2249-their will magnify the circle of [my]0-i power invincible . “ [All]5537-all must acknowledge [my]2250-my just cause of pride and must no longer worship , in despite of [my]2250-my superior birth , [this deity]1721-this deity , [a daughter of [ignoble Coeus]800-ignoble coeus]6338-a daughter of ignoble coeus , whom one time [the great Earth]6339-the great earth would not even grant sufficient space for travail : whom [the Heavens]177-the heavens , [the Land]178-the land , [the Sea]141-the sea together once compelled to wander , hopeless on [all hostile shores]6340-all hostile shores ! Throughout [the world]1360-the world [she]2250-my found [herself]2250-my rebuffed , till [Delos]111-delos , sorry for [the vagrant]6342-the vagrant , said , ‘ Homeless [you]2250-my roam [the lands]1369-the lands , and [I]2250-my [the seas]6344-the seas ! ’ And even [her]2250-my refuge always was adrift . “[2250-my] And there [she]2250-my bore [two children]2251-two children , who , compared with [mine]2252-mine , are but as [one to seven]2253-one to seven . Who denies [my]0-i fortunate condition ? — Who can doubt [my]0-i future ? — [I]0-i am surely safe . “ The wealth of [my]2254-my abundance is too strong for [Fortune]802-fortune to assail [me]2254-my . Let [her]2250-my rage despoil [me]2254-my of large substance ; yet so much would still be [mine]2254-my , for [I]2254-my have risen above the blight of apprehension . But , suppose [a few of [[my]2254-my fair children]6346-my fair children]6345-a few of my fair children should be taken ! Even so deprived , [I]2254-my could not be reduced to only two , as [this Latona , who , might quite as well be childless]6347-this latona , who , might quite as well be childless . — Get [you]2254-my gone from this insensate sacrifice . Make haste ! Cast off the wreathing laurels from [your]2254-my brows ! ”[2254-my] [They]2254-my plucked the garlands from [their]2254-my hair , and left the sacrifice , obedient to [her]2255-her will , although in gentle murmurs [they]2254-my adored the goddess [Niobe]796-niobe had so defamed . [Latona]798-latona , furious when [she]798-latona heard the speech , flew swiftly to the utmost peak of [Cynthus]744-cynthus , and spoke to [[her]798-latona two children]2256-her two children in these words : “ Behold [[your]2254-my mother]5112-your mother , proud of having borne [such glorious children]6349-such glorious children ! [I]798-latona will yield prestige before [no goddess]6350-no goddess — save alone [immortal Juno]488-juno ! [I]798-latona have been debased , and driven for all ages from [my]798-latona own — [my]798-latona altars , unto [me]798-latona devoted long , and so must languish through eternity , unless by [you]2254-my sustained . Nor is this all ; . [That daughter of [Tantalus]657-tantalus]6351-that daughter of tantalus , bold [Niobe]796-niobe , has added curses to [her]796-niobe evil deeds , and with a tongue as wicked as [[her]796-niobe sire]6289-her sire 's , has raised [[her]796-niobe base - born children]6353-her base - born children over [mine]798-latona . Has even called [me]798-latona childless ! A sad fate more surely should be [hers]796-niobe ! Oh , [I]798-latona entreat ”[798-latona] — But [Phoebus]549-phoebus answered [her]2257-her , “ No more complaint is necessary , for it only serves to hinder the swift sequel of [her]796-niobe doom . ”[549-phoebus] And with the same words [Phoebe]517-phoebe answered [her]2257-her . And having spoken , [they]2258-they descended through the shielding shadows of surrounding clouds , and hovered on [the citadel of [Cadmus]561-cadmus]2259-the citadel of cadmus . There , far below [them]2258-they , was [a level plain]2260-a level plain which swept around those walls ; where [trampling steeds , with horny hoofs , and multitudinous wheels]2261-trampling steeds , with horny hoofs , and multitudinous wheels , had beaten a wide track . And on [the field]5024-the field [the older sons of Niobe on steeds emblazoned with bright dyes]2263-the older sons of niobe on steeds emblazoned with bright dyes and harness rich with studded gold were circling . — One of these , [Ismenus]523-ismenus , [first - born of [[his]523-ismenus mother]1520-his mother]2264-first - born of his mother , while controlling [his]523-ismenus fleet courser 's foaming mouth , cried out , “ Ah wretched [me]523-ismenus ! ”[523-ismenus] A shaft had pierced the middle of [his]523-ismenus breast ; and as the reins dropped slowly on the rapid courser 's neck , [his]523-ismenus drooping form fell forward to the ground . Not far from [him]523-ismenus , [[his]523-ismenus brother]2004-his brother , [Sipylus]803-sipylus , could hear the whistling of a fatal shaft , and in [his]523-ismenus fright urged on the plunging steed : as when [the watchful pilot , sensible of storms approaching]2267-the watchful pilot , sensible of storms approaching , crowds on sail , hoping to catch a momentary breeze , so fled [he]523-ismenus , urging an impetuous flight ; but , while [he]523-ismenus fled the shaft , unerring , flew ; transfixed [him]523-ismenus with its quivering death ; struck where the neck supports the head and the sharp point protruded from [his]523-ismenus throat . In [his]523-ismenus swift flight , as [he]523-ismenus was leaning forward , [he]523-ismenus was struck ; and , rolling over the wild horse 's neck pitched to the ground , and stained it with [his]523-ismenus blood . [Unhappy Phaedimus]804-unhappy phaedimus , and [Tantalus]657-tantalus , ( So named from [[his]523-ismenus maternal grandsire]2268-his maternal grandsire ) now had finished coursing on the track , and smooth . Shining with oil , were wrestling in [the field]5024-the field ; and while [those brothers]2270-those brothers struggled — breast to breast — another arrow , hurtling from the sky , pierced [them]2270-those brothers together , just as [they]2270-those brothers were clinched . The mingled sound that issued from two throats was like a single groan . Convulsed with pain , [the wrestlers]2271-the wrestlers fell together on the ground , where , stricken with a double agony , rolling [their]2271-the wrestlers eyeballs , [they]2271-the wrestlers sobbed out [their]2271-the wrestlers lives . [Alphenor]805-alphenor saw [them]2271-the wrestlers die — beating [his]805-alphenor breast in agony — ran to lift in [his]805-alphenor arms [their]2271-the wrestlers lifeless bodies cold — while doing this [he]805-alphenor fell upon [them]2271-the wrestlers . [Phoebus]549-phoebus struck [him]805-alphenor so , piercing [his]805-alphenor midriff in a vital part , with fatal shot , which , when [he]805-alphenor pulled it forth , dragged with its barb a torn clot of [his]805-alphenor lung — [his]805-alphenor blood and life poured out upon the air . [The youthful Damasicthon next]2272-the youthful damasicthon next was struck , not only once ; an arrow pierced [his]805-alphenor leg just where the sinews of the thigh begin , and as [he]805-alphenor turned and stooped to pluck it out , another keen shaft shot into [his]805-alphenor neck , up to the fletching . — The blood drove it out , and spouted after it in crimson jets . Then , [Ilioneus]806-ilioneus , [last of [seven sons]2274-seven sons]2273-last of seven sons , lifted [his]806-ilioneus unavailing arms in prayer , and cried , “ O Universal Deities , [gods of eternal heaven]6354-gods of eternal heaven , spare [my]806-ilioneus life ! ”[806-ilioneus] — Besought too late , [Apollo of the Bow]807-apollo , could not prevail against the deadly shaft , already on its way : and yet [his]805-alphenor will , compellant , acted to retard its flight , so that it cut no deeper than [his]805-alphenor heart . The rumors of an awful tragedy , — the wailings of [sad [Niobe]796-niobe 's loved friends]2275-sad niobe 's loved friends , — the terror of [[her]796-niobe grieving relatives]2276-her grieving relatives , — all gave some knowledge of [her]796-niobe sudden loss : but so bewildered and enraged [her]796-niobe mind , that [she]796-niobe could hardly realize [the Gods]1395-the gods had privilege to dare against [her]796-niobe might . Nor would [she]796-niobe , till [[her]796-niobe lord]2278-her lord , [Amphion]808-amphion , thrust [his]808-amphion sword deep in [his]808-amphion breast , by which [his]808-amphion life and anguish both were ended in dark night . Alas , [proud Niobe]796-niobe , [once haughty queen]2279-once haughty queen ! [Proud Niobe]796-niobe who but so lately drove [[her]796-niobe people]2280-her people from [Latona]798-latona 's altars , while , moving majestic through the midst , [she]796-niobe hears [their]2280-her people plaudits , now so bitterly debased , [[her]796-niobe meanest enemy]2281-her meanest enemy may pity [her]796-niobe ! — [She]796-niobe fell upon the bodies of [[her]796-niobe sons]2282-her sons , and in a frenzy of maternal grief , kissed [their]2282-her sons unfeeling lips . Then unto Heaven with arms accusing , railed upon [[her]796-niobe foe]2283-her foe : “ Glut [your]2283-her foe revenge ! [Latona]798-latona , glut [your]2283-her foe rage ! Yea , let [my]2284-my lamentations be [your]2283-her foe joy ! Go — satiate [your]2283-her foe flinty heart with death ! Are not [[my]2284-my seven sons]2247-my seven sons all dead ? Am [I]2284-my not waiting to be carried to [my]2284-my grave ? — exult and triumph , [[my]2284-my victorious foe]6356-my victorious foe ! Victorious ? Nay ! — Much more remains to [me]2284-my in all [my]2284-my utmost sorrow , than to [you]2283-her foe , [you]2283-her foe gloater upon vengeance — Undismayed , [I]2284-my stand victorious in [[my]2284-my Field of Woe]6357-my field of woe ! ”[2284-my] no sooner had [she]2284-my spoken , than the cord twanged from the ever - ready bow ; and [all who heard the fatal sound]2285-all who heard the fatal sound , again were filled with fear , — save [Niobe]796-niobe , in misery bold , — defiant in misfortune . — Clothed in black , [the sisters of [the stricken brothers]2287-the stricken brothers]2286-the sisters of the stricken brothers stood , with hair disheveled , by [the funeral biers]2288-the funeral biers . And one while plucking from [[her]2284-my brother]5185-her brother 's heart a shaft , swooned unto death , fell on [her]2284-my face — on [[her]2284-my dear brother]2290-her dear brother 's corpse . [Another girl]2291-another girl , while [she]2291-another girl consoled [[her]2291-another girl mother]4984-her mother , suddenly , was stricken with an unseen , deadly wound ; and doubled in convulsions , closed [her]2291-another girl lips , tight held them , till both breath and life were lost . Another , vainly rushed away from death — [she]2291-another girl met it , and pitched head - first to the ground ; and still another died upon [her]2291-another girl corse , another vainly sought a secret death , and , then another slipped beyond 's life 's edge . So , altogether , six of seven died — [each victim]2293-each victim , strickened in a different way . [One child]2294-one child remained . Then in a frenzy - fear [the mother]5344-the mother , as [she]5344-the mother covered [her]2294-one child with all [her]5344-the mother garments and [her]5344-the mother body , wailed — “ Oh , leave [me]5344-the mother [this one child]6358-this one child ! [the youngest of [them]6360-them all]6359-the youngest of them all ! [[My]5344-the mother darling daughter]6361-my darling daughter — only leave [me]5344-the mother one ! ”[5344-the mother] But even while [she]5344-the mother was entreating for [its]2294-one child life — the life was taken from [[her]5344-the mother only child]2296-her only child . Childless — [she]5344-the mother crouched beside [[her]5344-the mother slaughtered sons]2297-her slaughtered sons , [[her]5344-the mother lifeless daughters]2298-her lifeless daughters , and [[her]5344-the mother husband]1381-her husband 's corpse . The breeze not even moved [her]5344-the mother fallen hair , a chill of marble spread upon [her]5344-the mother flesh , beneath [her]5344-the mother pale , set brows , [her]5344-the mother eyes moved not , [her]5344-the mother bitter tongue turned stiff in [her]5344-the mother hard jaws , [her]5344-the mother lovely veins congealed , and [her]5344-the mother stiff neck and rigid hands could neither bend nor move . — [her]5344-the mother limbs and body , all were changed to stone . Yet ever would [she]5344-the mother weep : and as [her]5344-the mother tears were falling [she]5344-the mother was carried from [the place]1926-the place , enveloped in a storm and mighty wind , far , to [[her]5344-the mother native land]2301-her native land , where fixed upon [a mountain summit]2302-a mountain summit [she]5344-the mother dissolves in tears , — and to this day the marble drips with tears . [All men]1428-all men and [women]1730-women , after this event , feared to incur [Latona]798-latona 's fateful wrath , and worshiped with more zeal [the Deity]5849-the deity , [mother of twins]2306-mother of twins . — And , as it is the way of [men]1399-men to talk of many other things after a strong occurrence , [they]1399-men recalled what other deeds [the goddess]4979-the goddess had performed ; — and [one of [them]1399-men]2067-one of them recited this event : ' Twas in the ancient days of long - ago , — [some rustics]2310-some rustics , in [the fertile fields of [Lycia]180-lycia]2311-the fertile fields of lycia , heedless , insulted [the goddess]4979-the goddess to [their]2310-some rustics harm : — perhaps [you]2313-you 've never heard of this event , because [those country clowns]2314-those country clowns were little known . The event was wonderful , but [I]0-i can vouch the truth of it . [I]0-i visited [the place]1926-the place and [I]0-i have seen [the pool of water]2316-the pool of water , where happened the miracle [I]0-i now relate . [[My]0-i good old father]2317-my good old father , then advanced in years , incapable of travel , ordered [me]0-i to fetch some cattle — thoroughbreds — from there , and had secured [a Lycian]2318-a lycian for [[my]0-i guide]2319-my guide , as [I]0-i traversed [the pastures]2320-the pastures , with [the man]5560-the man , it chanced , [I]0-i saw an ancient altar , — grimed with sacrificial ashes — in the midst of a large pool , with sedge and reeds around , a - quiver in the breeze . And there [[my]0-i guide]2319-my guide stood on the marge , and with an awe - struck voice began to whisper , “ Be propitious , hear [my]2319-my guide supplications , and forget not [me]2319-my guide ! ”[2319-my guide] And [I]0-i , observing [him]2319-my guide , echoed the words , “ Forget not [me]0-i ! ”[0-i] which , having done , [I]0-i turned to [him]2319-my guide and said , “ Whose altar can this be ? Perhaps a sacred altar of [the Fauns]6362-the fauns , or of [the Naiads]6363-the naiads , or [a native God]6364-a native god ? ”[0-i] To which [[my]0-i guide]2319-my guide replied , “ [Young man]6365-young man , such [Gods]456-jove may not be worshiped at this altar . [She]2319-my guide whom once [the royal Juno]6366-the royal juno drove away to wander [a harsh world]6367-a harsh world , alone permits this altar to be used : [that goddess whom [the wandering Isle of [Delos]111-delos]6369-the wandering isle of delos]6368-that goddess whom the wandering isle of delos , at the time it drifted as the foam , almost refused a refuge . There [Latona]798-latona , as [she]798-latona leaned against a palm - tree — and against the tree most sacred to [Minerva]543-minerva , brought forth [twins]6370-twins , although [[their]6370-twins harsh step - mother]6371-their harsh step - mother , [Juno]488-juno , strove to interfere . — And from [the island]6372-the island forced to fly by [jealous Juno]488-juno , on [her]798-latona breast [she]798-latona bore [[her]798-latona children]6312-her children , twin Divinities . At last , outwearied with the toil , and parched with thirst — long - wandering in those heated days over [the arid land of [Lycia]180-lycia]6374-the arid land of lycia , where was bred [the dire Chimaera]181-the dire chimaera — at the time [her]798-latona parching breasts were drained , [she]798-latona saw this pool of crystal water , shimmering in [the vale]6375-the vale . [Some countrymen]6376-some countrymen were there to gather reeds , and [useful osiers]6377-useful osiers , and the bulrush , found with sedge in fenny pools . To [them]6376-some countrymen approached [Latona]798-latona , and [she]798-latona knelt upon the merge to cool [her]798-latona thirst , with some refreshing water . But [those clowns]6378-those clowns forbade [her]798-latona and [the goddess]4979-the goddess cried , as [they]6378-those clowns so wickedly opposed [her]798-latona need : “[0-i] Why do [you]2324-you so resist [my]0-i bitter thirst ? The use of water is the sacred right of [all mankind]5332-all mankind , for Nature has not made the sun and air and water , for the sole estate of [any creature]2326-any creature ; and to [Her]2327-she kind bounty [I]0-i appeal , although of [you]2324-you [I]0-i humbly beg the use of it . Not here do [I]0-i intend to bathe [my]0-i wearied limbs . [I]0-i only wish to quench an urgent thirst , for , even as [I]0-i speak , [my]0-i cracking lips and mouth so parched , almost deny [me]0-i words . A drink of water will be like a draught of nectar , giving life ; and [I]0-i shall owe to [you]2324-you the bounty and [my]0-i life renewed . — ah , let [these tender infants]2328-these tender infants , whose weak arms implore [you]2324-you from [my]0-i bosom , but incline [your]2324-you hearts to pity ! ” And just as [she]2327-she spoke , it chanced [the children]6380-the children did stretch out [their]6380-the children arms and who would not be touched to hear such words , as spoken by [this goddess]6381-this goddess , and refuse ? But still [those clowns]6378-those clowns persisted in [their]6378-those clowns wrong against [the goddess]4979-the goddess ; for [they]6378-those clowns hindered [her]4979-the goddess , and threatened with [their]6378-those clowns foul , abusive tongues to frighten [her]4979-the goddess away — and , worse than all , [they]6378-those clowns even muddied with [their]6378-those clowns hands and feet [the clear pool]6384-the clear pool ; forcing [the vile , slimy dregs]6385-the vile , slimy dregs up from the bottom , in a spiteful way , by jumping up and down . — Enraged at this , [she]2327-she felt no further thirst , nor would [she]2327-she deign to supplicate again ; but , feeling all the outraged majesty of [her]2327-she high state , [she]2327-she raised [her]2327-she hands to Heaven , and exclaimed , “[2328-these tender infants] Forever may [you]2329-you live in [that mud - pool]2330-that mud - pool ! ” The curse as soon as uttered took effect , and [every one of [them]6378-those clowns]6386-every one of them began to swim beneath the water , and to leap and plunge deep in [the pool]6387-the pool . — Now , up [they]6378-those clowns raise [their]6378-those clowns heads , now swim upon the surface , now [they]6378-those clowns squat [themselves]6378-those clowns around [the marshy margent]6388-the marshy margent , now [they]6378-those clowns plump again down to [the chilly deeps]6389-the chilly deeps . And , ever and again , with croaking throats , indulge offensive strife upon [the banks]6390-the banks , or even under water , boom abuse . [Their]6378-those clowns ugly voices cause [their]6378-those clowns bloated necks to puff out ; and [their]6378-those clowns widened jaws are made still wider in the venting of [their]6378-those clowns spleen . [Their]6378-those clowns backs , so closely fastened to [their]6378-those clowns heads , make them appear as if [their]6378-those clowns shrunken necks have been cut off . [Their]6378-those clowns backbones are dark green ; white are [their]6378-those clowns bellies , now their largest part . — Forever since that time , the foolish frogs muddy [[their]6378-those clowns own pools]6391-their own pools , where [they]6378-those clowns leap and dive . So [he]6392-he related how [the clowns]6393-the clowns were changed to leaping frogs ; and after [he]6392-he was through , [another]6394-another told the tale of [Marsyas]809-marsyas , in these words : [The Satyr Marsyas]809-marsyas , when [he]809-marsyas played the flute in rivalry against [Apollo]807-apollo 's lyre , lost that audacious contest and , alas ! [His]809-marsyas life was forfeit ; for , [they]6395-they had agreed [the one who lost]6396-the one who lost should be [the victor]6397-the victor 's prey . And , as [Apollo]807-apollo punished [him]809-marsyas , [he]0-i cried , “[2331-you] Ah - h - h ! why are [you]2331-you now tearing [me]0-i apart ? A flute has not the value of [my]0-i life ! ” Even as [he]809-marsyas shrieked out in [his]809-marsyas agony , [his]809-marsyas living skin was ripped off from [his]809-marsyas limbs , till [his]809-marsyas whole body was a flaming wound , with nerves and veins and viscera exposed . But [all the weeping people of [that land]5048-that land]6398-all the weeping people of that land , and all [the Fauns]810-the fauns and [Sylvan Deities]753-o thespian deities , and [all the Satyrs]6400-all the satyrs , and [Olympus]11-olympus , [[his]809-marsyas loved pupil]6401-his loved pupil — even then renowned in song , and [all the Nymphs]6402-all the nymphs , lamented [his]809-marsyas sad fate ; and [all the shepherds]6403-all the shepherds , roaming on [the hills]1416-the hills , lamented as [they]6403-all the shepherds tended fleecy flocks . And all those falling tears , on [fruitful Earth]22-earth , descended to [her]6401-his loved pupil deepest veins , as drip the moistening dews , — and , gathering as a fount , turned upward from [[her]6401-his loved pupil secret - winding caves]6405-her secret - winding caves , to issue , sparkling , in the sun - kissed air , the clearest river in [the land of [Phrygia]175-phrygia]6406-the land of phrygia , — through which [it]6407-it swiftly flows between steep banks down to [the sea]1298-the sea : and , therefore , from [his]809-marsyas name , ' Tis called “[2331-you] [The Marsyas]809-marsyas ” to this very day . And after this was told , [the people]1439-the people turned and wept for [[Niobe]796-niobe 's loved children]6410-niobe 's loved children dead , and also , mourned [Amphion]808-amphion , sorrow - slain . [The Theban people]6411-the theban people hated [Niobe]796-niobe , but [Pelops]812-pelops , [[her]796-niobe own brother]6412-her own brother , mourned [her]796-niobe death ; and as [he]812-pelops rent [his]812-pelops garment , and laid bare [his]812-pelops white left shoulder , [you]6413-you could see the part composed of ivory . — At [his]812-pelops birth ' twas all of healthy flesh ; but when [[his]812-pelops father]1530-his father cut [his]812-pelops limbs asunder , and [the Gods]1395-the gods restored [his]812-pelops life , all parts were rightly joined , except part of one shoulder , which was wanting ; so to serve the purpose of the missing flesh , a piece of ivory was inserted there , making [his]812-pelops body by such means complete .
