[The lords of [many cities that were near]6417-many cities that were near]6416-the lords of many cities that were near , now met together and implored [[their]6416-the lords of many cities that were near kings]6418-their kings to mourn with [Pelops]812-pelops those unhappy deeds . — [The lords of [Argos]60-argos]6419-the lords of argos ; [Sparta]185-sparta and [Mycenae]186-mycenae ; and [Calydon]187-calydon , before it had incurred the hatred of [Diana]484-diana , [goddess of the chase]6420-goddess of the chase ; fertile Orchomenus and [Corinth]188-corinth , great in wealth of brass ; [Patrae]813-patrae and fierce Messena ; [Cleone]814-cleone , small ; and [Pylus]189-pylus and [Troezen]190-troezen , not ruled by [Pittheus]925-pittheus then , — and also , [all the other cities which are shut off by [the Isthmus]192-the isthmus there dividing by [its]192-the isthmus two seas]6421-all the other cities which are shut off by the isthmus there dividing by its two seas , and [all the cities which are seen from there]6422-all the cities which are seen from there . What seemed most wonderful , of [all [those towns]6424-those towns [Athens]95-athens alone]6423-all those towns athens alone was wanting , for a war had gathered from [the distant seas]6425-the distant seas , a host of [savage warriors]6426-savage warriors had alarmed [her]95-athens walls , and hindered [her]95-athens from mourning for the dead . Now [Tereus]815-tereus , then [the mighty king of [Thrace]148-thrace]6427-the mighty king of thrace , came to the aid of [Athens]95-athens as defense from [that fierce horde]6428-that fierce horde ; and there by [his]815-tereus great deeds achieved a glorious fame . Since [his]815-tereus descent was boasted from [the mighty Gradivus]6429-the mighty gradivus , and [he]815-tereus was gifted with enormous wealth , [Pandion]816-pandion , [king of [Athens]95-athens]6430-king of athens , gave to [him]815-tereus in sacred wedlock [[his]815-tereus dear daughter]6431-his dear daughter , [Procne]817-procne . But [Juno]488-juno , [guardian of the sacred rites]6432-guardian of the sacred rites attended not , nor [Hymenaeus]554-hymenaeus , nor the Graces . But [the Furies]6433-the furies snatched up brands from burning funeral pyres , and brandished them as torches . [They]6433-the furies prepared the nuptial couch , — a boding owl flew over [[the bride]6113-the bride 's room]6435-the bride 's room , and then sat silently upon the roof . With such bad omens [Tereus]815-tereus married [her]6113-the bride , [sad Procne]817-procne , and those omens cast a gloom on all [the household]6436-the household till the fateful birth of [[their]6433-the furies first born]6437-their first born . [All Thrace]6438-all thrace went wild with joy — and even [they]6433-the furies , rejoicing , blessed [the Gods]1395-the gods , when [he]1395-the gods , [the little Itys]6440-the little itys , saw the light ; and [they]6433-the furies ordained each year [their]6433-the furies wedding day , and every year the birthday of [[their]6433-the furies child]6441-their child , should be observed with festival and song : so the sad veil of fate conceals from [us]6442-us [our]6442-us future woes . Now [Titan]818-titan had drawn forth the changing seasons through five autumns , when , in gentle accents , [Procne]817-procne spoke these words : “[0-i] [[My]0-i dearest husband]2332-my dearest husband , if [you]2332-my dearest husband love [me]0-i , let [me]0-i visit [[my]0-i dear sister]2333-my dear sister , or consent that [she]2333-my dear sister may come to [us]2334-they and promise [her]2333-my dear sister that [she]2333-my dear sister may soon return . If [you]2332-my dearest husband will but permit [me]0-i to enjoy [her]2333-my dear sister company [my]0-i heart will bless [you]2332-my dearest husband as [I]0-i bless [the Gods]1395-the gods . ” At once [the monarch]6443-the monarch ordered [[his]6443-the monarch long ships]6444-his long ships to launch upon [the sea]1298-the sea ; and driven by sail , and hastened by the swiftly sweeping oars , [they]2334-they entered [the deep port of [Athens]95-athens , where [he]6443-the monarch made fair landing on [the fortified Piraeus]6447-the fortified piraeus]6446-the deep port of athens , where he made fair landing on the fortified piraeus . There , when time was opportune to greet [[his]6443-the monarch father - in - law]6448-his father - in - law and shake [his]6443-the monarch hand , [they]2334-they both exchanged [their]2334-they wishes for good health , and [Tereus]815-tereus told the reason why [he]815-tereus came . [He]815-tereus was relating all [[his]815-tereus wife]1380-his wife 's desire . Promising [Philomela]819-philomela 's safe return from a brief visit , when [Philomela]819-philomela appeared rich in [her]1380-his wife costly raiment , yet more rich in charm and beauty , just as if [a fair Dryad]6450-a fair dryad or [Naiad]6451-naiad should be so attired , appearing radiant , from dark solitudes . As if [someone]6452-someone should kindle whitening corn or the dry leaves , or hay piled in a stack ; so [Tereus]815-tereus , when [he]815-tereus saw [the beautiful and blushing virgin]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin , was consumed with love . [Her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin modest beauty was a worthy cause of worthy love ; but by [his]815-tereus heritage , derived from a debasing clime , [his]815-tereus love was base ; and fires unholy burned within from [his]815-tereus own lawless nature , just as fierce as are the habits of [[his]815-tereus evil race]6454-his evil race . In the wild frenzy of [his]815-tereus wicked heart , [he]815-tereus thought [he]815-tereus would corrupt [[her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin trusted maid]6455-her trusted maid , [[her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin tried attendants]6456-her tried attendants , and corrupt even [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin virtue with large presents : [he]815-tereus would waste [his]815-tereus kingdom in the effort . — [He]815-tereus prepared to seize [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin at the risk of cruel war . And [he]815-tereus would do or dare all things to feed [his]815-tereus raging flame . — [He]815-tereus could not brook delay . With most impassioned words [he]815-tereus begged for [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin , pretending [he]815-tereus gave voice to [Procne]817-procne 's hopes . — [his]815-tereus own desire made [him]815-tereus wax eloquent , as often as [his]815-tereus words exceeded bounds , [he]815-tereus pleaded [he]815-tereus was uttering [Procne]817-procne 's words . [His]815-tereus hypocritic eyes were filled with tears , as though they represented [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin desire — and , O [you]6457-you Gods above , what devious ways are harbored in the hearts of [mortals]4908-mortals ! Through [his]815-tereus villainous desire [he]815-tereus gathered praise , and many lauded [him]815-tereus for the great love [he]815-tereus bore [[his]815-tereus wife]1380-his wife . And even [Philomela]819-philomela desires [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin own undoing ; and with fond embraces nestles to [[her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin father]5022-her father , while [she]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin pleads for [his]5022-her father consent , that [she]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin may go to visit [[her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin dear sister]6461-her dear sister . — [Tereus]815-tereus viewed [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin pretty pleading , and in [his]815-tereus hot heart , imagined [he]815-tereus was then embracing [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin ; and as [he]815-tereus saw [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin kiss [[her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin father]5022-her father 's lips , [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin arms around [his]5022-her father neck , it seemed that each caress was [his]5022-her father ; and so [his]815-tereus fire increased . [He]815-tereus even wished [he]5022-her father were [[her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin father]5022-her father ; though , if it were so , [his]815-tereus passion would no less be impious . — Overcome at last by these entreaties , [[her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin kind father]6464-her kind father gave consent . Greatly [she]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin joyed and thanked [him]5022-her father for [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin own misfortune . [She]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin imagined a success , instead of all the sorrow that would come . The day declining , little of [his]5022-her father toil remained for [Phoebus]549-phoebus . Now [his]5022-her father flaming steeds were beating with [their]6465-their hoofs [the downward slope of [high Olympus]11-olympus]6466-the downward slope of high olympus ; and the regal feast was set before [the guests]6467-the guests , and flashing wine was poured in golden vessels , and the feast went merrily , until [the satisfied assembly]6468-the satisfied assembly sought in gentle sleep [their]6468-the satisfied assembly rest . Not so , the love - hot [Tereus]815-tereus , [king of [Thrace]148-thrace , who , sleepless , imaged in [his]815-tereus doting mind the form of [Philomela]819-philomela]819-philomela , recalled the shape of [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin fair hands , and in [his]815-tereus memory reviewed [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin movements . And [his]815-tereus flaming heart pictured [her]6453-the beautiful and blushing virgin beauties yet unseen . — [He]815-tereus fed [his]815-tereus frenzy on itself , and could not sleep . Fair broke the day ; and now [the ancient king]6469-the ancient king , [Pandion]816-pandion , took [[his]0-i son - in - law]6061-his son - in - law 's right hand to bid farewell ; and , as [he]0-i wept , commended [[his]0-i dear daughter]6431-his dear daughter , [Philomela]819-philomela , unto [his]0-i guarding care . “[1395-the gods] And in [your]2336-you care , [[my]0-i son - in - law]2337-my son - in - law , [I]0-i trust [[my]0-i daughter]1458-my daughter 's health . Good reason , grounded on [my]0-i love , compels [my]0-i sad approval . [You]2336-you have begged for [her]1458-my daughter , and both [[my]0-i daughters]2339-my daughters have persuaded [me]0-i . Wherefore , [I]0-i do entreat [you]2336-you and implore [your]2336-you honor , as [I]0-i call upon [the Gods]1395-the gods , that [you]2336-you will ever shield [her]1458-my daughter with the love of [a kind father]2341-a kind father and return [her]1458-my daughter safe , as soon as may be — [my]0-i last comfort given to bless [my]0-i doting age . And all delay will agitate and vex [my]0-i failing heart . “ And , O [[my]2342-the old king dearest daughter]6472-my dearest daughter , [Philomela]819-philomela , if [you]2336-you have any love for [me]2342-the old king , return without too long delay and comfort [me]2342-the old king , lest [I]2342-the old king may grieve ; for it is quite enough that [I]2342-the old king should suffer while [[your]2336-you sister]6473-your sister stays away . ”[2342-the old king] [The old king]2342-the old king made [them]2343-them promise , and [he]2342-the old king kissed [[his]2342-the old king daughter]5054-his daughter , while [he]2342-the old king wept . Then did [he]2342-the old king join [their]2343-them hands in pledge of [their]2343-them fidelity , and , as [he]2342-the old king gave [his]2342-the old king blessing , cautioned [them]2343-them to kiss [[his]2342-the old king absent daughter]2345-his absent daughter and [[her]2345-his absent daughter son]5619-her son for [his]2342-the old king dear sake . Then as [he]2342-the old king spoke a last farewell , [his]2342-the old king trembling voice was filled with sobs . And [he]2342-the old king could hardly speak ; — for a great fear from some vague intuition of [his]2342-the old king mind , surged over [him]2342-the old king , and [he]2342-the old king was left forlorn . So soon as [Philomela]819-philomela was safe aboard [the painted ship]2347-the painted ship and as [the sailors]1811-the sailors urged the swiftly gliding keel across [the deep]1961-the deep and [the dim land]2350-the dim land fast - faded from [their]1811-the sailors view , then [Tereus]815-tereus , in exultant humor , thought , “ Now all is well , the object of [my]815-tereus love sails with [me]815-tereus while [the sailors]1811-the sailors ply the oars . ”[815-tereus] , [He]815-tereus scarcely could control [his]815-tereus barbarous desire — with difficulty stayed [his]815-tereus lust , [he]815-tereus followed all [her]2351-her actions with hot eyes . — So , when the ravenous bird of [Jupiter]475-jupiter has caught with crooked talons the poor hare , and dropped it — ruthless , — in [his]815-tereus lofty nest , where there is no escape , [his]815-tereus cruel eyes gloat on the victim [he]815-tereus anticipates . And now , as [Tereus]815-tereus reached [his]815-tereus journey 's end , [they]2352-they landed from [the travel - wearied ship]2353-the travel - wearied ship , safe on [the shores of [[his]815-tereus own kingdom]2355-his own kingdom]2354-the shores of his own kingdom . Then [he]815-tereus hastened with the frightened [Philomela]819-philomela into [most wild and silent solitudes of [an old forest]2357-an old forest]2356-most wild and silent solitudes of an old forest ; where , concealed among deep thickets [a forbidding old house]2358-a forbidding old house stood : there [he]815-tereus immured [the pale and trembling maid]2359-the pale and trembling maid , who , vainly in [her]2359-the pale and trembling maid fright , began to call upon [[her]2359-the pale and trembling maid absent sister]2360-her absent sister , — and [her]2359-the pale and trembling maid tears implored [his]815-tereus pity . [His]815-tereus obdurate mind could not be softened by such piteous cries ; but even while [her]2359-the pale and trembling maid agonizing screams implored [[her]2359-the pale and trembling maid sister]1501-her sister 's and [[her]2359-the pale and trembling maid father]5022-her father 's aid , and while [she]2359-the pale and trembling maid vainly called upon [the Gods]1395-the gods , [he]815-tereus overmastered [her]2359-the pale and trembling maid with brutal force . — [The poor child]2364-the poor child trembled as [a frightened lamb , which , just delivered from the frothing jaws of a gaunt wolf]2365-a frightened lamb , which , just delivered from the frothing jaws of a gaunt wolf , dreads every moving twig . [She]2364-the poor child trembled as a timid injured dove , ( [her]2364-the poor child feathers dripping with [her]2364-the poor child own life - blood ) that dreads the ravening talons of a hawk from which some fortune has delivered [her]2364-the poor child . But presently , as consciousness returned , [she]2364-the poor child tore [her]2364-the poor child streaming hair and beat [her]2364-the poor child arms , and , stretching forth [her]2364-the poor child hands in frenzied grief , cried out , “ Oh , [barbarous and brutal wretch]6475-barbarous and brutal wretch ! [Unnatural monster of abhorrent deeds]6476-unnatural monster of abhorrent deeds ! Could not [[my]2364-the poor child anxious father]6477-my anxious father 's parting words , nor [his]6477-my anxious father foreboding tears restrain [your]2364-the poor child lust ? Have [you]2364-the poor child no slight regard for [[your]2364-the poor child chaste wife]6478-your chaste wife , [[my]2364-the poor child dearest sister]6479-my dearest sister , and are [you]2364-the poor child without all honor , so to spoil virginity now making [me]2364-the poor child invade [[my]2364-the poor child sister]6480-my sister 's claim , [you]2364-the poor child have befouled the sacred fount of life , — [you]2364-the poor child are a lawless bond of double sin ! “[2364-the poor child] Oh , this dark punishment was not [my]0-i due ! Come , finish with [my]0-i murder [your]2366-her black deed , so nothing wicked may remain undone . But oh , if [you]2366-her had only slaughtered [me]0-i before [your]2366-her criminal embrace befouled [my]0-i purity , [I]0-i should have had a shade entirely pure , and free from any stain ! Oh , if there is a Majesty in Heaven , and if [my]0-i ruin has not wrecked [the world]1360-the world , then , [you]2366-her shall suffer for this grievous wrong and time shall hasten to avenge [my]0-i wreck . “ [I]2366-her shall declare [your]2366-her sin before [the world]1360-the world , and publish [my]2366-her own shame to punish [you]2366-her ! And if [I]2366-her 'm prisoned in the solitudes , [my]2366-her voice will wake the echoes in the wood and move the conscious rocks . Hear [me]2366-her , O Heaven ! And let [my]2366-her imprecations rouse [the Gods]1395-the gods — ah - h - h , if there can be a god in Heaven ! ”[2366-her] [Her]2366-her cries aroused [the dastard tyrant]2368-the dastard tyrant 's wrath , and frightened [him]2368-the dastard tyrant , lest ever [his]2368-the dastard tyrant foul deed might shock [[his]2368-the dastard tyrant kingdom]2369-his kingdom : and , roused at once by rage and guilty fear ; [he]2368-the dastard tyrant seized [her]2366-her hair , forced [her]2366-her weak arms against [her]2366-her back , and bound them fast with brazen chains , then drew [his]2368-the dastard tyrant sword . When [she]2366-her first saw [his]2368-the dastard tyrant sword above [her]2366-her head . Flashing and sharp , [she]2366-her wished only for death , and offered [her]2366-her bare throat : but while [she]2366-her screamed , and , struggling , called upon [[her]2366-her father]5022-her father 's name , [he]2368-the dastard tyrant caught [her]2366-her tongue with pincers , pitiless , And cut it with [his]2368-the dastard tyrant sword . — The mangled root still quivered , but the bleeding tongue itself , fell murmuring on the blood - stained floor . As the tail of a slain snake still writhes upon the ground , so did the throbbing tongue ; and , while it died , moved up to [her]2366-her , as if to seek [her]2366-her feet . — And , it is said that after this foul crime , [the monster]5004-the monster violated [her]2366-her again . And after these vile deeds , [that wicked king]2372-that wicked king returned to [Procne]817-procne , who , when [she]2366-her first met [[her]2366-her brutal husband]2373-her brutal husband , anxiously inquired for tidings of [[her]2366-her sister]1501-her sister ; but with sighs and tears , [he]2373-her brutal husband told a false tale of [her]2366-her death , and with such woe that [all]5537-all believed it true . Then [Procne]817-procne , full of lamentation , took [her]2366-her royal robe , bordered with purest gold , and putting it away , assumed instead garments of sable mourning ; and [she]2366-her built a noble sepulchre , and offered there [her]2366-her pious gifts to an imagined shade ; — lamenting the sad death of [her]2366-her who lived . A year had passed by since that awful date — the sun had coursed [the Zodiac]820-the zodiac 's twelve signs . But what could [Philomela]819-philomela hope or do ? For like [a jail]2376-a jail the strong walls of [the house]5402-the house were built of massive stone , and guards around prevented flight ; and mutilated , [she]2366-her could not communicate with [anyone]2378-anyone to tell [her]2366-her injuries and tragic woe . But even in despair and utmost grief , there is an ingenuity which gives inventive genius to protect from harm : and now , the grief - distracted [Philomela]819-philomela wove in a warp with purple marks and white , a story of the crime ; and when ' twas done [she]2366-her gave it to [[her]2366-her one attendant]2379-her one attendant there and begged [her]2366-her by appropriate signs to take it secretly to [Procne]817-procne . [She]2366-her took the web , [she]2366-her carried it to [Procne]817-procne , with no thought of words or messages by art conveyed . [The wife of that inhuman tyrant]2380-the wife of that inhuman tyrant took the cloth , and after [she]2366-her unwrapped it saw and understood the mournful record sent . [She]2366-her pondered it in silence and [her]2366-her tongue could find no words to utter [her]2366-her despair ; — [her]2366-her grief and frenzy were too great for tears . — In a mad rage [her]2366-her rapid mind counfounded the right and wrong — intent upon revenge . Since it was now the time of festival , when [all the Thracian matrons]2381-all the thracian matrons celebrate the rites of [Bacchus]617-bacchus — every third year thus — night then was in [their]2381-all the thracian matrons secret ; and at night the slopes of Rhodope resounded loud with clashing of shrill cymbals . So , at night [the frantic queen of [Tereus]815-tereus]2382-the frantic queen of tereus left [[her]2382-the frantic queen of tereus home]2383-her home and , clothed according to the well known rites of [Bacchus]617-bacchus , hurried to [the wilderness]5027-the wilderness . [Her]2382-the frantic queen of tereus head was covered with the green vine leaves ; and from [her]2382-the frantic queen of tereus left side native deer skin hung ; and on [her]2382-the frantic queen of tereus shoulder rested a light spear . — so fashioned , [the revengeful Procne]817-procne rushed through [the dark woods]2385-the dark woods , attended by [a host of screaming followers]2386-a host of screaming followers , and wild with rage , pretended it was [Bacchus]617-bacchus urged [her]2366-her forth . At last [she]2366-her reached [the lonely building]2387-the lonely building , where [[her]2366-her sister]1501-her sister , [Philomela]819-philomela , was immured ; and as [she]2366-her howled and shouted “ Ee - woh - ee - e ! ”[2366-her] , [She]2366-her forced the massive doors ; and having seized [[her]2366-her sister]1501-her sister , instantly concealed [her]1501-her sister face in ivy leaves , arrayed [her]1501-her sister in the trappings of Bacchanalian rites . When this was done , [they]2390-they rushed from there , demented , to [the house where as [the Queen of [Tereus]815-tereus]2392-the queen of tereus]2391-the house where as the queen of tereus , [Procne]817-procne dwelt . When [Philomela]819-philomela knew [she]2366-her had arrived at [that accursed house]2393-that accursed house , [her]2366-her countenance , though pale with grief , took on a ghastlier hue : and , wretched in [her]2366-her misery and fright , [she]2366-her shuddered in convulsions . — [Procne]817-procne took the symbols , [Bacchanalian]821-bacchanalian , from [her]1501-her sister then , and as [she]817-procne held [her]1501-her sister in a strict embrace unveiled [her]1501-her sister downcast head . But [she]1501-her sister refused to lift [her]1501-her sister eyes , and fixing [her]1501-her sister sad gaze on vacant space , [she]1501-her sister raised [her]1501-her sister hand , instead ; as if in oath [she]1501-her sister called upon [the Gods]1395-the gods to witness truly [she]1501-her sister had done no wrong , but suffered a disgrace of violence . — [Lo]756-lo , [Procne]817-procne , wild with a consuming rage , cut short [[her]817-procne sister]1501-her sister 's terror in these words , “ This is no time for weeping ! awful deeds demand a great revenge — take up the sword , and any weapon fiercer than its edge ! [My]817-procne breast is hardened to the worst of crime make haste with [me]817-procne ! together let [us]2396-us put [this palace]6483-this palace to the torch ! “[817-procne] Come , let [us]2396-us maim , the beastly Tereus with revenging iron , cut out [his]2397-his tongue , and quench [his]2397-his cruel eyes , and hurl and burn [him]2397-his writhing in the flames ! Or , shall [we]2396-us pierce [him]2397-his with a grisly blade , and let [his]2397-his black soul issue from deep wounds a thousand . — Slaughter [him]2397-his with every death imagined in the misery of hate ! ” While [Procne]817-procne still was raving out such words , [Itys]822-itys , [[her]817-procne son]5619-her son , was hastening to [[his]2397-his mother]1520-his mother ; and when [she]817-procne saw [him]2397-his , [her]817-procne revengeful eyes conceiving a dark punishment , [she]817-procne said , “[5115-mother] Aha ! here comes the image of [[his]2397-his father]1530-his father ! ” [She]817-procne gave no other warning , but prepared to execute a horrible revenge . But when [the tender child]6486-the tender child came up to [her]817-procne , and called [her]817-procne “[5115-mother] [mother]5115-mother ” , put [his]6486-the tender child little arms around [her]817-procne neck , and when [he]6486-the tender child smiled and kissed [her]817-procne often , gracious in [his]6486-the tender child cunning ways , — again the instinct of true motherhood pulsed in [her]817-procne veins , and moved to pity , [she]817-procne began to weep in spite of [her]817-procne resolve . Feeling the tender impulse of [her]817-procne love unnerving [her]817-procne , [she]817-procne turned [her]817-procne eyes from [him]6486-the tender child and looked upon [[her]817-procne sister]1501-her sister , and from [her]817-procne glanced at [[her]817-procne darling boy]6488-her darling boy again . And so , while [she]817-procne was looking at [them]6489-them both , by turns , [she]817-procne said , “[2400-the little one] Why does [the little one]2400-the little one prevail with pretty words , while [Philomela]819-philomela stands in silence always , with [her]2400-the little one tongue torn out ? [She]2400-the little one can not call [[her]2400-the little one sister]1501-her sister , whom [he]819-philomela calls [[his]819-philomela mother]1520-his mother ! Oh , [[you]2403-you daughter of [Pandion]816-pandion]2404-you daughter of pandion , consider what a wretch [[your]2403-you husband]2405-your husband is ! [The wife of such a monster]2406-the wife of such a monster must be flint ; compassion in [her]2406-the wife of such a monster heart is but a crime . ” No more [she]817-procne hesitated , but as swift as the fierce tigress of [the Ganges]66-the ganges leaps , seizes the suckling offspring of the hind , and drags [it]2400-the little one through [the forest]5365-the forest to [its]2400-the little one lair ; so , [Procne]817-procne seized and dragged [the frightened boy]6491-the frightened boy to [a most lonely section of [the house]5402-the house]6492-a most lonely section of the house ; and there [she]817-procne put [him]6491-the frightened boy to the cruel sword , while [he]6491-the frightened boy , aware of [his]6491-the frightened boy sad fate , stretched forth [his]6491-the frightened boy little hands , and cried , “[5115-mother] Ah , [mother]5115-mother , — ah ! — ” And clung to [her]817-procne — clung to [her]817-procne , while [she]817-procne struck — [her]817-procne fixed eyes , maddened , glaring horribly — struck wildly , lopping off [his]6491-the frightened boy tender limbs . But [Philomela]819-philomela cut through [his]6491-the frightened boy tender throat . Then [they]6494-they together , mangled [his]6491-the frightened boy remains , still quivering with the remnant of [his]6491-the frightened boy life , and boiled a part of [him]6491-the frightened boy in steaming pots , that bubbled over with [the dead child]6495-the dead child 's blood , and roasted other parts on hissing spits . And , after all was ready , [Procne]817-procne bade [[her]817-procne husband]1381-her husband , [Tereus]815-tereus , to the loathsome feast , and with a false pretense of sacred rites , according to the custom of [[her]817-procne land]6497-her land , by which , but [one man]6498-one man may partake of it , [she]817-procne sent [the servants]6499-the servants from [the banquet hall]6500-the banquet hall . — [Tereus]815-tereus , majestic on [his]815-tereus ancient throne high in imagined state , devoured [[his]815-tereus son]5099-his son , and gorged [himself]815-tereus with flesh of [his]815-tereus own flesh — and in [his]815-tereus rage of gluttony called out for [Itys]822-itys to attend and share the feast ! [Curst]823-curst with a joy [she]817-procne could conceal no more , and eager to gloat over [his]815-tereus distress , [Procne]817-procne cried out , “[5115-mother] Inside [yourself]2408-you , [you]2408-you have the thing that [you]2408-you are asking for ! ” — Amazed , [he]815-tereus looked around and called [[his]815-tereus son]5099-his son again : — that instant , [Philomela]819-philomela sprang forth — [her]817-procne hair disordered , and all stained with blood of murder , unable then to speak , [she]817-procne hurled the head of [Itys]822-itys in [[his]5099-his son father]1530-his father 's fear - struck face , and more than ever longed for fitting words . [The Thracian Tereus]815-tereus overturned the table , and howling , called up from [the Stygian pit]6504-the stygian pit , [the viperous sisters]6505-the viperous sisters . Tearing at [his]815-tereus breast , in miserable efforts to disgorge the half - digested gobbets of [[his]815-tereus son]5099-his son , [he]815-tereus called [himself]815-tereus [[his]815-tereus own child]6507-his own child 's sepulchre , and wept the hot tears of [a frenzied man]6508-a frenzied man . Then with [his]815-tereus sword [he]815-tereus rushed at [the two sisters]6509-the two sisters . Fleeing from [him]815-tereus , [they]6509-the two sisters seemed to rise on wings , and it was true , for [they]6509-the two sisters had changed to birds . Then [Philomela]819-philomela , flitting to [the woods]1317-the woods , found refuge in the leaves : but [Procne]817-procne flew straight to the sheltering gables of a roof — and always , if [you]6511-you look , [you]6511-you can observe the brand of murder on the swallow 's breast — red feathers from that day . And [Tereus]815-tereus , swift in [his]815-tereus great agitation , and [his]815-tereus will to wreak a fierce revenge , [himself]815-tereus is turned into a crested bird . [His]815-tereus long , sharp beak is given [him]815-tereus instead of a long sword , and so , because [his]815-tereus beak is long and sharp , [he]815-tereus rightly bears the name of [Hoopoe]824-hoopoe . Before the number of [his]815-tereus years was told , [Pandion]816-pandion with the shades of [Tartarus]77-tartarus , because of this , has wandered in sad dooms . [Erectheus , next in line , with mighty sway and justice]6512-erectheus , next in line , with mighty sway and justice , ruled all [Athens]95-athens on the throne left vacant by [the good Pandion]816-pandion 's death . [Four daughters]6513-four daughters and [four sons]6514-four sons were granted [him]815-tereus ; and of [[his]815-tereus daughters]6515-his daughters , two were beautiful , and one of these was [we]6516-we d to [Cephalus]826-cephalus , [grandson of [Aeolus]665-aeolus]6517-grandson of aeolus . — But [mighty Boreas]460-boreas desired the hand of [Orithyia]827-orithyia , fair and lovable . — [King Tereus]828-king tereus and [the Thracians]6518-the thracians were then such obstacles to [Boreas]460-boreas [the god]5013-the god was long kept from [[his]815-tereus dear beloved]6520-his dear beloved . Although [the great king ( who compels the cold north - wind]6521-the great king ( who compels the cold north - wind ) had sought with prayers to win [her]6520-his dear beloved hand , and urged [his]815-tereus love in gentleness , not force . When quite aware [his]815-tereus wishes were disdained , [he]0-i roughly said , with customary rage and violence : “[5115-mother] Away with sentimental talk ! [My]0-i prayers and kind intentions are despised , but [I]0-i should blame [nobody]2409-nobody but [myself]0-i ; then why should [I]0-i , despising [my]0-i great strength , debase [myself]0-i to weakness and soft prayers ? — might is [my]0-i right , and violence [my]0-i strength ! — by force [I]0-i drive the force of gloomy clouds . “ Tremendous actions are the wine of life ! — [monarch of Violence , rolling on clouds]6522-monarch of violence , rolling on clouds , [I]0-i toss wide waters , and [I]0-i fell huge trees — knotted old oaks — and whirled upon ice - wings , [I]0-i scatter the light snow , and pelt [the Earth]1289-the earth with sleet and hail ! [I]0-i rush through boundless voids . [My]0-i thunders rumble in the hollow clouds — and crash upon [[my]0-i brothers]6524-my brothers — fire to fire ! “[0-i] Possessed of daemon - rage , [I]0-i penetrate , sheer to [the utmost caverns of [old Earth]22-earth]2410-the utmost caverns of old earth ; and straining , up from [those unfathomed deeps]2411-those unfathomed deeps , scatter the terror - stricken shades of hell ; and hurl death - dealing earthquakes through [the world]1360-the world ! “ Such are the fateful powers [I]460-boreas should use , and never trust entreaties to prevail , or win [[my]460-boreas bride]1474-my bride — Force is the law of life ! ”[460-boreas] And now impetuous [Boreas]460-boreas , having howled resounding words , unrolled [his]460-boreas rustling wings — that fan [the earth]1289-the earth and ruffle [the wide sea]2414-the wide sea — and , swiftly wrapping untrod mountain peaks in whirling mantles of far - woven dust , thence downward hovered to [the darkened world]2415-the darkened world ; and , canopied in artificial night of swarthy overshadowing wings , caught up the trembling Orithyia to [his]460-boreas breast : nor did [he]460-boreas hesitate in airy course until [his]460-boreas huge wings fanned the chilling winds around [Ciconian Walls]195-ciconian walls . There , [she]2416-she was pledged [the wife of [that cold , northern king of storms]2418-that cold , northern king of storms]2417-the wife of that cold , northern king of storms ; and unto [him]460-boreas [she]2416-she gave [those hero twins , endowed with wings of [[their]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face immortal sire]2420-their immortal sire , and graceful in [[their]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face mother]5249-their mother 's form and face]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face . [Their]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face bird - like wings were not fledged at [their]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face birth and [those twin boys]2422-those twin boys , [Zetes]829-zetes and [Calais]830-calais , at first were void of feathers and soft down . But when [their]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face golden hair and beards were grown , wings like an eagle 's came ; — and feather - down grew golden on [their]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face cheeks : and when from youth [they]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face entered manhood , quick [they]2419-those hero twins , endowed with wings of their immortal sire , and graceful in their mother 's form and face were to join [the Argonauts]831-the argonauts , who for [the Golden Fleece]832-the golden fleece , sought in [that first ship]2423-that first ship , ventured on [the sea]1298-the sea . Over the storm - tossed waves , [the Argonauts]831-the argonauts had sailed in [Argo]196-argo , [[their]831-the argonauts long ship]2425-their long ship to where [King Phineus]692-phineus , needy in [his]692-phineus old age , reigned — deprived of sight and feeble . When [the sons of [Boreas]460-boreas]2426-the sons of boreas had landed on [the shore]5443-the shore , and seen [the Harpies]2428-the harpies snatching from [the king]6107-the king [his]6107-the king nourishment , befouling it with beaks obscene , [they]831-the argonauts drove those human - vultures thence . And having suffered hardships and great toils , after the day [they]831-the argonauts rescued [the sad king]2430-the sad king from [the vile Harpies]2431-the vile harpies , [those twin valiant youths]2432-those twin valiant youths , [Zetes]829-zetes and [Calais]830-calais came with [[their]2432-those twin valiant youths chief]2433-their chief , the mighty Jason , where [the Phasis]68-phasis flows . From [the green margin of [that river]1511-that river]2434-the green margin of that river , [all the crew of [Argonauts]831-the argonauts]2436-all the crew of argonauts , by [Jason]833-jason led , went to [the king Aeetes]2437-the king aeetes and required the Golden Fleece , that [he]2437-the king aeetes received from [Phryxus]834-phryxus . When [they]831-the argonauts had bargained with [him]2437-the king aeetes , full of wiles [he]2437-the king aeetes offered to restore [the Golden Fleece]832-the golden fleece only to those who might to [him]2437-the king aeetes return , victorious from hard labors of great risk . [Medea]835-medea , [[the king]6107-the king 's daughter]2439-the king 's daughter , near [his]2437-the king aeetes throne , saw [Jason]833-jason , [leader of [the Argonauts]831-the argonauts]2440-leader of the argonauts , as [he]833-jason was pressing to secure a prize — and loved at sight with a consuming flame . Although [she]835-medea struggled to suppress [her]835-medea love , unable to restrain [herself]835-medea , [she]835-medea said , “ In vain [I]835-medea 've striven to subdue [my]835-medea heart : [some god it]6526-some god it must be , which [I]835-medea can not tell , is working to destroy [my]835-medea hapless life ; or else it is the burning flame of love that in [me]835-medea rages . If it is not love , why do the mandates of [[my]835-medea father]1438-my father seem too harsh ? [They]6528-they surely are too harsh . Why do [I]835-medea fear that [he]1438-my father may perish whom [I]835-medea have seen only once ? What is the secret cause that [I]835-medea am agitated by such fears ? — It is no other than [the god of Love]1918-the god of love . “[835-medea] Thrust from [your]2441-your virgin breast such burning flames and overcome [their]2442-their hot unhappiness — if [I]0-i could do so , [I]0-i should be [myself]0-i : but some deluding power is holding [me]0-i helpless against [my]0-i will . Desire persuades [me]0-i one way , but [my]0-i reason still persuades another way . [I]0-i see a better course and [I]0-i approve , but follow its defeat . — “ [O royal maiden]6530-o royal maiden , why are [you]2441-your consumed with love for [this strange man]6531-this strange man , and why are [you]2441-your so willing to be carried by the nuptial ties so far from [[your]2441-your own country]6532-your own country , where , indeed , are [many brave men worthy of [your]2441-your love]6533-many brave men worthy of your love ? “[1912-the living gods] Whether for life or death [his]2443-his numbered hours are in the mercy of [the living Gods]1912-the living gods , and that [he]2443-his may not suffer risk of death , too well foreseen , now let [my]0-i prayers prevail — righteously uttered of a generous heart without the stress of love . What wicked thing has [Jason]833-jason done ? [[His]833-jason handsome person]2445-his handsome person , youth , and noble ways , would move a heart of stone . “ Have [I]833-jason a heart of flint , or was [I]833-jason born [a tigress]6534-a tigress to deny [him]833-jason timely aid ? — Unless [I]833-jason interpose , [he]833-jason will be slain by the hot breath of brazen - footed bulls , or will be slaughtered by [the warriors]6535-the warriors , sprung miraculous from [earth]1287-earth , or will be given to satisfy the ravenous appetite of a huge dragon . “[833-jason] Let [my]0-i gloating eyes be satiate with [his]2443-his dying agonies ! Let [me]0-i incite the fury of these bulls ! Stir to [their]2443-his blood - lust [mad - born sons of Earth]2446-mad - born sons of earth ! Rouse up the never - sleeping dragon 's rage ! — “ Avert it [Gods]456-jove ! — “[456-jove] But why should [I]0-i cry out upon [the Gods]456-jove to save [him]2443-his from such wrong , when , by [my]0-i actions and [my]0-i power , [myself]0-i may shield [him]2443-his from all evils ? “ Such a course would wreck the kingdom of [[my]2443-his father]1438-my father — and by [me]2443-his [the wily stranger]6538-the wily stranger would escape from [him]2443-his ; and spreading to the wind [his]2443-his ready sails [he]2443-his would forget and leave [me]2443-his to [my]2443-his fate . — Oh , if [he]2443-his should forget [my]2443-his sacrifice , and so prefer [those who neglected [him]2443-his]6539-those who neglected him , let [him]2443-his then perish in [his]2443-his treachery . — “[2443-his] But these are idle thoughts : [his]2443-his countenance , reveals innate nobility and grace , that should dispel all fear of treachery , and guarantee [his]2443-his ever - faithful heart . [The Gods]1395-the gods will witness [our]2448-our united souls , and [he]2443-his shall pledge [his]2443-his faith . Secure of it [my]0-i fear will be removed . Be ready , then — and make a virtue of necessity : [[your]2449-you Jason]2450-your jason owes [himself]2450-your jason to [you]2449-you ; and [he]2450-your jason must join [you]2449-you in true wedlock . Then [you]2449-you shall be celebrated through [the land of [Greece]117-greece]2451-the land of greece , by throngs of [women]1730-women , for [the man [you]2449-you saved]2453-the man you saved . “ Shall [I]0-i then sail away , and so forsake [[my]0-i sister]6480-my sister , [brother]6541-brother , [father]1933-father , [Gods]6543-gods , and land that gave [me]0-i birth ? [[My]0-i father]1438-my father is indeed [a stern man]6545-a stern man , and [[my]0-i native land]2167-my native land is all too barbarous ; [[my]0-i brother]6054-my brother is [a child]6548-a child , — [[my]0-i sister]6480-my sister 's goodwill is good help for [me]0-i ; and heaven 's supreme god is within [my]0-i breast . “[0-i] [I]0-i shall not so be leaving valued hopes , but will be going surely to great things . And [I]0-i should gain applause from all [the world]1360-the world , as having saved the threatened Argonauts , [most noble of [the Greeks]2456-the greeks]2455-most noble of the greeks ; and in [[their]2457-their land]2458-their land , which certainly is better than [my]0-i own , become [the bride of [Jason]833-jason]2459-the bride of jason , for whose love [I]0-i should not hesitate to give [the world]1360-the world — and in whose love [the living Gods]1912-the living gods rejoice so greatly ; for [his]833-jason sake [they]1912-the living gods would bestow [their]1912-the living gods favors on [my]0-i head , and make the stars [my]0-i habitation . “ Should [I]0-i hesitate because [the wreck - strewn mountains]6550-the wreck - strewn mountains bar the way , and clash together in the Euxine waves ; or fear Charybdis , fatal to [large ships]6551-large ships , that sucks [the deep sea]1436-the deep sea in [its]1436-the deep sea whirling gulf and spouts far upward , with alternate force , or Scylla , circled with infuriate hounds howling in rage from [deep Sicilian waves]6553-deep sicilian waves ? “[0-i] Safe in the shielding arms of [him]833-jason [I]0-i love , on [Jason]833-jason 's bosom leaning , [I]0-i shall be borne safely over [wide and hostile seas]2462-wide and hostile seas ; and in [his]833-jason dear embrace forget [my]0-i fears — or if for anything [I]0-i suffer dread , it will be only for [the one [I]0-i love]2463-the one i love . — “ Alas , [Medea]835-medea , this vain argument has only furnished plausible excuse for criminal desires , and desecrates the marriage rite . It is a wicked thing to think upon . Before it is too late forget [your]835-medea passion and deny this guilt . ”[2463-the one i love] And after [she]2463-the one i love had said these words , [her]2463-the one i love eyes were opened to the prize of modesty , chaste virtue , and a pure affection : and [Cupid]482-cupid , vanquished , turned away and fled . Then , to an ancient altar of the goddess named [Hecate]794-hecate , [[Perse]836-perse 's daughter]2464-perse 's daughter took [her]2464-perse 's daughter way in the deep shadows of [a forest]5041-a forest . [She]2464-perse 's daughter was strong of purpose now , and all the flames of vanquished passion had died down ; but when [she]2464-perse 's daughter saw [the son of Aeson]2466-the son of aeson , dying flames leaped up again . [Her]2464-perse 's daughter cheeks grew red , then all [her]2464-perse 's daughter face went pale again ; as a small spark when hid beneath the ashes , if fed by a breath of wind grows and regains its strength , as it is fanned to life ; so now [her]2464-perse 's daughter love that had been smoldering , and which [you]2467-you would have thought was almost dead , when [she]2464-perse 's daughter had see again [his]2466-the son of aeson manly youth , blazed up once more . For on that day [his]2466-the son of aeson graceful person seemed as glorious as [a God]4898-a god ; — and as [she]2464-perse 's daughter gazed , and fixed [her]2464-perse 's daughter eyes upon [his]2466-the son of aeson countenance , [her]2464-perse 's daughter frenzy so prevailed , [she]2464-perse 's daughter was convinced that [he]2466-the son of aeson was not [a mortal]2469-a mortal . And [her]2464-perse 's daughter eyes were fascinated ; and [she]2464-perse 's daughter could not turn away from [him]2466-the son of aeson . But when [he]2466-the son of aeson spoke to [her]2464-perse 's daughter , and promised marriage , grasping [her]2464-perse 's daughter right hand : [she]2464-perse 's daughter answered , as [her]2464-perse 's daughter eyes suffused with tears ; “ [I]2464-perse 's daughter see what [I]2464-perse 's daughter will do , and ignorance of truth will not be [my]2464-perse 's daughter undoing now , but love itself . By [my]2464-perse 's daughter assistance [you]2466-the son of aeson shall be preserved ; but when preserved fulfill [your]2466-the son of aeson promise . ”[2464-perse 's daughter] [He]2466-the son of aeson swore that [she]2464-perse 's daughter could trust in [him]2466-the son of aeson . Then by [the goddess of the triple form]2470-the goddess of the triple form , [Diana]484-diana , [Trivia]200-trivia , or [Luna]201-luna called , and by [her]2470-the goddess of the triple form sacred groves and fanes , [he]2466-the son of aeson vowed , and by the hallowed Sun that sees all things , and by [his]2466-the son of aeson own adventures , and [his]2466-the son of aeson life , — on these the youthful [Jason]833-jason took [his]2466-the son of aeson oath . — With this [she]2464-perse 's daughter was assured and quickly gave to [him]2466-the son of aeson the magic herbs : [he]2466-the son of aeson learnt their use and full of joy withdrew into [[his]2466-the son of aeson house]2471-his house . Now when the dawn had dimmed the glittering stars , [the people]1439-the people hastened to [the sacred field of Mars]2473-the sacred field of mars , and on [the hills expectant]2474-the hills expectant stood . — Arrayed in purple , and in majesty distinguished by [his]2466-the son of aeson ivory sceptre , sat [the king]6107-the king , surrounded by a multitude . Below [them]2476-their on [the visioned Field of Mars]2477-the visioned field of mars , huge brazen - footed bulls were breathing forth from adamantine nostrils living flames , blasting the verdant herbage in [their]2476-their path ! As forges glowing with hot flames resound , or as much quick - lime , burnt in [earthen kilns]2478-earthen kilns , crackles and hisses as if mad with rage , sprinkled with water , liberating heat ; so [their]2476-their hot throats and triple - heated sides , resounding told of pent - up fires within . [The son of [Aeson]837-aeson]2466-the son of aeson went to meet [them]2476-their . As [he]2466-the son of aeson came to meet [them]2476-their the fierce animals turned on [him]2466-the son of aeson faces terrible , and sharp horns tipped with iron , and [they]2476-their pawed the dusty earth with cloven feet , and filled [the place]1926-the place with fiery bellowings . [The Minyans]838-the minyans were stark with fear ; [he]2466-the son of aeson went up to the bulls not feeling [their]2476-their hot breath at all , so great the power of [his]2466-the son of aeson charmed drugs ; and while [he]2466-the son of aeson was stroking [their]2476-their down - hanging dewlaps with a fearless hand , [he]2466-the son of aeson placed the yoke down on [their]2476-their necks and made [them]2476-their draw the heavy plow , and cut through fields that never felt the steel before . [The Colchians]839-the colchians were amazed and silent ; but the loud shouting of [the Minyans]2481-the minyans increased [[their]839-the colchians hero]2482-their hero 's courage . Taking then the serpent 's teeth out of a brazen helmet [he]2466-the son of aeson sowed them broadcast in the new - plowed field . The moist earth softened these seeds that were steeped in virulent poison and the teeth swelled up and took new forms . And just as in its mother [an infant]1641-an infant gradually assumes the form of [man]1330-man , and is perfected through all parts within , and does not come forth to the light till fully formed ; so , when the forms of [men]1399-men had been completed in the womb of [earth]1287-earth made pregnant , [they]838-the minyans rose up from it , and what is yet more wonderful , each one clashed weapons that had been brought forth with [him]1330-man . When [[his]2466-the son of aeson companions]5589-his companions saw [the warriors]6535-the warriors turn as if with one accord , to hurl [their]2476-their spears , sharp - pointed , at the head of [Jason]833-jason , fear unnerved the boldest and [their]2476-their courage failed . So , too , [the maid whose sorcery had saved [him]833-jason from much danger , when [she]2489-the maid whose sorcery had saved him from much danger , when she saw the youth encompassed by those raging enemies , and he alone against so many saw [the youth encompassed by those raging enemies]2490-the youth encompassed by those raging enemies , and [he]833-jason alone against so many]2489-the maid whose sorcery had saved him from much danger , when she saw the youth encompassed by those raging enemies , and he alone against so many — struck with sudden panic , [she]2489-the maid whose sorcery had saved him from much danger , when she saw the youth encompassed by those raging enemies , and he alone against so many turned ashen white , [her]2489-the maid whose sorcery had saved him from much danger , when she saw the youth encompassed by those raging enemies , and he alone against so many bloodless cheeks were blanched ; and chilled with fear [she]2489-the maid whose sorcery had saved him from much danger , when she saw the youth encompassed by those raging enemies , and he alone against so many wilted to the ground ; and lest the herbs , so lately given [him]833-jason , might fail [his]833-jason need [she]2489-the maid whose sorcery had saved him from much danger , when she saw the youth encompassed by those raging enemies , and he alone against so many added incantations and invoked mysterious arts . While [she]2489-the maid whose sorcery had saved him from much danger , when she saw the youth encompassed by those raging enemies , and he alone against so many protected [him]833-jason [He]833-jason seized upon a heavy stone , and hurled it in the midst of [[his]833-jason new enemies]2491-his new enemies — distracted by this cast , and murderous , [they]2491-his new enemies turned from [him]833-jason , and clashing [their]2491-his new enemies new arms , [those earth - born brothers]2492-those earth - born brothers fought among [themselves]2491-his new enemies till all were slaughtered in blood - thirsty strife . Gladly [the Greeks]2456-the greeks acclaimed [him]833-jason conqueror , and pressed around [him]833-jason for the first embrace . Then , too , [Medea]835-medea , [barbarous Colchian maid]2494-barbarous colchian maid , although [her]835-medea modesty restrained [her]835-medea heart , eagerly longed to fold [him]833-jason in [her]835-medea arms , but careful of [her]835-medea good name , held aloof , — rejoicing in deep , silent love ; and [she]835-medea acknowledged to [the Gods]456-jove [her]835-medea mighty gift of incantations . But [the dragon , still alert , — magnificent and terrible with gorgeous crest and triple tongue , and fangs barbed as a javelin]2495-the dragon , still alert , — magnificent and terrible with gorgeous crest and triple tongue , and fangs barbed as a javelin , guards the Golden Fleece : and [Jason]833-jason can obtain that quest only if slumber may seal up [the monster]5004-the monster 's eyes . — [Jason]833-jason , successful , sprinkled on [his]833-jason crest Lethean juices of a magic herb , and then recited thrice the words which bring deep slumber , potent words which would becalm [the storm - tossed ocean]2497-the storm - tossed ocean , and would stop the flow of the most rapid rivers of [[our]2498-our earth]2499-our earth : and slowly slumber sealed [the dragon]5486-the dragon 's eyes . While [that great monster]2501-that great monster slept , [the hero]5496-the hero took the Golden Fleece ; and proudly sailed away bearing [his]5496-the hero treasure and [the willing maid]2503-the willing maid , ( whose aid had saved [him]5496-the hero ) to [[his]5496-the hero native port [Iolcus]202-iolcus]2504-his native port iolcus — victorious with [the Argonauts]831-the argonauts . Now when [the valiant Argonauts]831-the argonauts returned to [Thessaly]27-thessaly , [[their]831-the argonauts happy relatives]2505-their happy relatives , [fathers]2506-fathers and [mothers]5775-mothers , praised [the living Gods]1912-the living gods ; and with [their]831-the argonauts hallowed gifts enhanced the flames with precious incense ; and [they]831-the argonauts offered [Jove]456-jove a sacred bullock , rich with gilded horns . But [[Jason]833-jason 's father]2509-jason 's father , [Aeson]837-aeson , came not down rejoicing to behold [[his]2509-jason 's father son]5099-his son , for now worn out with many years , [he]2509-jason 's father waited death . And [Jason]833-jason to [Medea]835-medea grieving said : “ Dearest , to whom [my]833-jason life and love are due , although [your]835-medea kindness has been great to [me]833-jason , and [you]835-medea have granted more than [I]833-jason should ask , yet one thing more [I]833-jason beg of [you]835-medea ; if [your]835-medea enchantments can accomplish [my]833-jason desire , take from [my]833-jason life some years that [I]833-jason should live and add them to [[my]833-jason father]1438-my father 's ending days . ”[833-jason] — And as [he]833-jason spoke [he]833-jason could not check [his]833-jason tears . [Medea]835-medea , moved by [his]833-jason affection , thought how much less [she]835-medea had grieved for [[her]835-medea loved sire]2511-her loved sire : and [she]835-medea replied : — “ A wicked thing [you]833-jason ask ! Can [I]835-medea be capable of using [you]833-jason in such a manner as to take [your]833-jason life and give it to another ? Ask not [me]835-medea a thing so dreadful ! May [the Gods]1395-the gods forbid ! — [I]835-medea will endeavor to perform for [you]833-jason a task much greater . By the powers of Night [I]835-medea will most certainly return to [him]2511-her loved sire the lost years of [[your]833-jason father]5123-your father , but must not deprive [you]833-jason of [your]833-jason own . — Oh grant the power , great goddess of the triple form , that [I]835-medea may fail not to accomplish this great deed ! ”[835-medea] Three nights were wanting for the moon to join [her]835-medea circling horns and form a perfect orb . When these were passed , the rounded light shone full and bright upon [the earth]1289-the earth . — Through the still night alone , [Medea]835-medea stole forth from [the house]5402-the house with feet bare , and in flowing garment clothed — [her]835-medea long hair unadorned and not confined . Deep slumber has relaxed [the world]1360-the world , and all that 's living , animals and birds and [men]1399-men , and even the hedges and the breathing leaves are still — and motionless the laden air . Only the stars are twinkling , and to [them]2516-them [she]835-medea looks and beckons with imploring hands . Now thrice around [she]835-medea paces , and three times besprinkles [her]835-medea long hair with water dipt from crystal streams , which having done [she]835-medea kneels a moment on [the cold , bare ground]2517-the cold , bare ground , and screaming three times calls upon the Night , — “ O faithful Night , regard [my]835-medea mysteries ! O golden - lighted Stars ! O softly - moving Moon — genial , [your]833-jason fire succeeds the heated day ! O Hecate ! [grave three - faced queen of these charms of enchanters and enchanters , arts]6557-grave three - faced queen of these charms of enchanters and enchanters , arts ! [O fruitful Earth]6558-o fruitful earth , giver of potent herbs ! O gentle Breezes and destructive Winds ! [You]833-jason Mountains , [Rivers]16-the rivers , Lakes and sacred Groves , and [every dreaded god of silent Night]6559-every dreaded god of silent night ! Attend upon [me]835-medea ! — “[835-medea] When [my]0-i power commands , the rivers turn from [their]2518-their accustomed ways and roll far backward to their secret springs ! [I]0-i speak — and [the wild , troubled sea]2519-the wild , troubled sea is calm , and [I]0-i command the waters to arise ! The clouds [I]0-i scatter — and [I]0-i bring the clouds ; [I]0-i smooth the winds and ruffle up their rage ; [I]0-i weave [my]0-i spells and [I]0-i recite [my]0-i charms ; [I]0-i pluck the fangs of serpents , and [I]0-i move the living rocks and twist the rooted oaks ; [I]0-i blast [the forests]5189-the forests . Mountains at [my]0-i word tremble and quake ; and from [[her]2521-her granite tombs]2522-her granite tombs [the liberated ghosts]2523-the liberated ghosts arise as [Earth]22-earth astonished groans ! From [your]2524-she appointed ways , O wonder - working Moon , [I]0-i draw [you]2524-she down against the magic - making sound of gongs and brazen vessels of [Temesa]840-temesa 's ore ; [I]0-i cast [my]0-i spells and veil the jeweled rays of [Phoebus]549-phoebus ' wain , and quench [Aurora]512-aurora 's fires . “ At [my]0-i command [you]2524-she tamed the flaming bulls which long disdained to bend beneath the yoke , until [they]6560-they pressed [their]6560-they necks against the plows ; and , subject to [my]0-i will , [you]2524-she raised up war till [the strong company of dragon - birth]6561-the strong company of dragon - birth were slaughtered as [they]6560-they fought amongst [themselves]6560-they ; and , last , [you]2524-she lulled asleep [the warden]6562-the warden 's eyes — [guards of the Golden Fleece]6563-guards of the golden fleece — till then awake and sleeping never — so , deceiving [him]6562-the warden , [you]2524-she sent the treasure to [the Grecian cities]6564-the grecian cities ! “[0-i] Witness [my]0-i need of super - natured herbs , elixirs potent to renew the years of age , giving the bloom of youth . — [You]2525-you shall not fail to grant [me]0-i this ; for not in vain the stars are flashing confirmation ; not in vain the flying dragons , harnessed by [their]2526-their necks , from skies descending bring [[my]0-i chariot]2527-my chariot down . ” [A chariot]6565-a chariot , sent from [heaven]1454-heaven , came to [her]2524-she — and soon as [she]2524-she had stroked the dragons ' necks , and shaken in [her]2524-she hands the guiding reins — as soon as [she]2524-she had mounted , [she]2524-she was borne quickly above , through unresisting air . And , sailing over [Thessaly]27-thessaly , [she]2524-she saw [the vale of Tempe , where the level soil is widely covered with a crumbling chalk]6567-the vale of tempe , where the level soil is widely covered with a crumbling chalk — [she]2524-she turned [her]2524-she dragons towards [new regions there]6568-new regions there : and [she]2524-she observed the herbs by Ossa born , the weeds on [lofty Pelion]204-pelion , [Othrys]519-othrys , [Pindus]30-pindus and [vast Olympus]11-olympus — and from here [she]2524-she plucked the needed roots , or there , the blossoms clipped all with a moon - curved sickle made of brass — many the wild weeds by [Apidanus]485-old apidanus , as well as blue [Amphrysus]841-amphrysus ' banks , [she]2524-she chose , and not escaped [Enipeus]790-enipeus from [her]2524-she search ; Peneian stretches and Spercheian banks all yielded what [she]2524-she chose : — and [Boebe]206-boebe 's shore where sway the rushes ; and [she]2524-she plucked up grass , a secret grass , from fair Euboean fields life - giving virtues in their waving blades , as yet unknown for transformation wrought on [Glaucus]842-glaucus . [All those fields [she]2524-she visited]6569-all those fields she visited , with ceaseless diligence in quest of charms , nine days and nine nights sought strong herbs , and the swift dragons with [their]6570-their active wings , failed not to guide the chariot where [she]2524-she willed — until [they]6570-their reached [[her]2524-she home]2383-her home . The dragons then had not been even touched by anything , except the odor of surrounding herbs , and yet [they]6570-their sloughed [their]6570-their skins , the growth of years . [She]2524-she would not cross the threshold of [[her]2524-she home]2383-her home nor pass [its]2383-her home gates ; but , standing in [the field]5024-the field , alone beneath the canopy of [Heaven]1454-heaven , [she]2524-she shunned all contact with [[her]2524-she husband]1381-her husband , while [she]2524-she built up from [the ever - living turf]6576-the ever - living turf two altars , one of which upon the right to [Hecate]794-hecate was given , but the one upon the left was sacred then to [you]6577-you , O Hebe , [goddess of eternal youth]6578-goddess of eternal youth ! Festooning woodland boughs and sweet vervain adorned these altars , near by which [she]2524-she dug as many trenches . Then , when all was done , [she]2524-she slaughtered a black ram , and sprinkled with blood [the thirsty trenches]6579-the thirsty trenches ; after which [she]2524-she poured from rich carchesian goblets generous wine and warm milk , grateful to propitious Gods — [the Deities of [earth]1287-earth on whom [she]2524-she called]6580-the deities of earth on whom she called — entreating , as [she]2524-she did so , [Pluto]664-pluto , lord of ghostly shades , and ravished [Proserpine]764-proserpine , that [they]6580-the deities of earth on whom she called should not , in undue haste , deprive [[her]2524-she patient]6582-her patient 's aged limbs of life . When certain [she]2524-she compelled [the God]5013-the god 's regard , assured [her]2524-she incantations and long prayers were both approved and heard , [she]2524-she bade [[her]2524-she people]2280-her people bring out the body of [[her]2524-she father - in - law]6585-her father - in - law — [old Aeson]837-aeson 's worn out body — and when [she]2524-she had buried [him]6585-her father - in - law in a deep slumber by [her]2524-she spells , as if [he]6585-her father - in - law were [a dead man]6586-a dead man , [she]2524-she then stretched [him]6585-her father - in - law out upon a bed of herbs . [She]2524-she ordered [Jason]833-jason and [[his]833-jason servants]5710-his servants thence , and warned [them]5710-his servants not to spy upon [her]2524-she rites , with eyes profane . As soon as [they]5710-his servants retired , [Medea]835-medea , with disheveled hair and wild abandon , as a Bacchanalian , paced times three around the blazing altars , while [she]2524-she dipped [her]2524-she torches , splintered at the top , into the trenches , dark : with blood , and lit the dipt ends in the sacred altar flames . Times three [she]2524-she purified [the ancient man]6588-the ancient man with flames , and thrice with water , and three times with sulphur , — as the boiling mixture seethed and bubbled in the brazen cauldron near . And into this , acerbic juices , roots , and flowers and seeds — from vales Hemonian — and mixed elixirs , into which [she]2524-she cast stones of strange virtue from [the Orient]207-the orient , and sifted sands of ebbing ocean 's tide ; white hoar - frost , gathered when the moon was full , the nauseating flesh and luckless wings of [the uncanny screech - owl]6589-the uncanny screech - owl , and the entrails from a mysterious animal that changed from wolf to [man , from man to wolf]6590-man , from man to wolf again ; the scaly sloughing of a water - snake , the medic liver of a long - lived stag , and the hard beak and head of an old crow which was alive nine centuries before ; these , and a thousand nameless things [the foreign sorceress prepared and mixed , and blended all together with a branch of peaceful olive]6591-the foreign sorceress prepared and mixed , and blended all together with a branch of peaceful olive , old and dry with years . — And while [she]2524-she stirred the withered olive branch in the hot mixture , it began to change from brown to green ; and presently put forth new leaves , and soon was heavy with a wealth of luscious olives . — As the ever - rising fire threw bubbling froth beyond the cauldron 's rim , the ground was covered with fresh verdure — flowers and all luxuriant grasses , and green plants . [Medea]835-medea , when [she]835-medea saw this wonder took [her]835-medea unsheathed knife and cut [the old man]5372-the old man 's throat ; then , letting all [his]5372-the old man old blood out of [him]5372-the old man [she]835-medea filled [his]5372-the old man ancient veins with rich elixir . As [he]5372-the old man received it through [his]5372-the old man lips or wound , [his]5372-the old man beard and hair no longer white with age , turned quickly to [their]6593-their natural vigor , dark and lustrous ; and [his]5372-the old man wasted form renewed , appeared in all the vigor of bright youth , no longer lean and sallow , for new blood coursed in [his]5372-the old man well - filled veins . — [Astonished]843-astonished , when released from [his]5372-the old man deep sleep , and strong in youth , [his]5372-the old man memory assured [him]5372-the old man , such [he]5372-the old man was years four times ten before that day ! — [Bacchus]617-bacchus , from [his]617-bacchus celestial vantage saw this marvel , and convinced [[his]617-bacchus nurses]6594-his nurses might then all regain [their]6594-his nurses former vigor , [he]617-bacchus pled with [Medea]835-medea to restore [their]6594-his nurses youth . [The Colchian woman]6595-the colchian woman granted [his]617-bacchus request . but so [her]835-medea malice might be satisfied [Medea]835-medea feigned [she]835-medea had a quarrel with [[her]835-medea husband]1381-her husband , and for safety [she]835-medea had fled to [Pelias]208-pelias . There , since [the king]6107-the king [himself]6107-the king was heavy with old age , [[his]6107-the king daughters]6515-his daughters gave [her]835-medea generous reception . And [these girls]6599-these girls [the shrewd Medea]6600-the shrewd medea in a short time won , by [her]835-medea false show of friendliness ; and while among the most remarkable of [her]835-medea achievements [she]835-medea was telling how [she]835-medea had rejuvenated [Aeson]837-aeson , and [she]835-medea dwelt particularly , on that strange event , [these daughters]6601-these daughters were induced to hope that by some skill like this [[their]6601-these daughters father]2081-their father might regain [his]6107-the king lost youth also . And [they]6601-these daughters begged of [her]835-medea this boon , persuading [her]835-medea to name the price ; no matter if it was large . [She]835-medea did not reply at once and seemed to hesitate , and so [she]835-medea held [their]6601-these daughters fond minds in a deep suspense by [her]835-medea feigned meditation . When [she]835-medea had at length declared [she]835-medea would restore [his]6107-the king youth , [she]835-medea said to [them]6601-these daughters : “[2525-you] That [you]2528-you may have strong confidence in this [my]0-i promised boon , [the oldest leader of [[your]2528-you flock of sheep]2530-your flock of sheep]2529-the oldest leader of your flock of sheep shall be changed to a lamb again by [my]0-i prized drugs . ” Straightway [a wooly ram , worn out with length of untold years]6603-a wooly ram , worn out with length of untold years was brought , [his]6107-the king great horns curved around [his]6107-the king hollow temples . After [she]835-medea had cut [his]6107-the king scrawny throat with [her]835-medea sharp knife Thessalian , barely staining it with [his]6107-the king thin blood , [Medea]835-medea plunged [his]6107-the king carcass in a bronze - made kettle , throwing in it at the same time juices of great potency . These made [his]6107-the king body shrink and burnt away [his]6107-the king two horns , and with horns [his]6107-the king years . And now thin bleating was heard from within the pot ; and even while [they]6601-these daughters wondered at the sound , a lamb jumped out and frisking , ran away to find some udder with its needed milk . Amazed [the daughters]6604-the daughters looked on and , now that these promises had been performed , [they]6601-these daughters urged more eagerly [their]6601-these daughters first request . Three times [Phoebus]549-phoebus unyoked [his]549-phoebus steeds after [their]6601-these daughters plunge in [[Ebro]209-ebro 's stream]6605-ebro 's stream , and on the fourth night stars shown brilliant on the dark foil of the sky , and then [the treacherous daughter of Aeetes]6606-the treacherous daughter of aeetes set some clear water over a hot fire and put in it herbs of no potency . And now a death - like sleep held [the king]6107-the king down , [his]6107-the king body all relaxed , and with [the king]6107-the king [[his]6107-the king guards]6609-his guards , a sleep which incantations with the potency of magic words had given . [[The sad king]2430-the sad king 's daughters]6611-the sad king 's daughters , as [they]6611-the sad king 's daughters had been bid , were in [[his]2430-the sad king room]6612-his room , and with [Medea]835-medea stood around [his]2430-the sad king bed . “[2531-your] Why do [you]2531-your hesitate , ” [Medea]835-medea said . “[2531-your] [[You]2531-your laggards]2532-you laggards , come and draw [your]2531-your swords ; let out [his]2533-his old blood that [I]0-i may refill [his]2533-his empty veins again with young blood . In [your]2531-your hands [[your]2531-your father]5123-your father 's life and youth are resting . [You]2531-your , [[his]2533-his daughters]6515-his daughters , must have love for [him]2533-his , and if the hopes [you]2531-your have are not all vain , come , do [your]2531-your duty by [[your]2531-your father]5123-your father ; drive out old age at the point of [your]2531-your good weapons ; and let out [his]2533-his blood enfeebled — cure [him]2533-his with the stroke of iron . ” Spurred on by these words , as [each one of [them]6614-their]6613-each one of them was filial [she]6615-she became [the leader]6616-the leader in the most unfilial act , and that [she]6615-she might not be most wicked did the wicked deed . Not one could bear to see [her]6615-she own blows , so [they]6614-their turned [their]6614-their eyes away ; and every face averted so , [they]6614-their blindly struck [him]2533-his with [their]6614-their cruel hands . [The old man]5372-the old man streaming with [his]5372-the old man blood , still raised [himself]5372-the old man on elbow , and half mangled tried to get up from [his]5372-the old man bed ; with all those swords around [him]5372-the old man , [he]5372-the old man stretched out [his]5372-the old man pale arms and [he]5372-the old man cried : “[2537-you] What will [you]2537-you do , [[my]0-i daughters]2339-my daughters ? What has armed [you]2537-you to the death of [[your]2537-you loved father]2539-your loved father ? ” [Their]6614-their wrong courage left [them]6614-their , and [their]6614-their hands fell . When [he]5372-the old man would have said still more , [Medea]835-medea cut [his]5372-the old man throat and plunged [his]5372-the old man mangled body into boiling water . Only because [her]835-medea winged dragons sailed swiftly with [her]835-medea up to the lofty sky , escaped [Medea]835-medea punishment for this unheard of crime . [[Her]835-medea chariot]2199-her chariot sailed above [embowered Pelion]204-pelion — [long the lofty home of [Chiron]550-chiron]6619-long the lofty home of chiron — over [Othrys]519-othrys , and [the vale]6375-the vale made famous where [Cerambus]844-cerambus met [his]844-cerambus fate . [Cerambus]844-cerambus , by the aid of [nymphs]1415-nymphs , from there was wafted through the air on wings , when earth was covered by [the overwhelming sea]6622-the overwhelming sea — and so escaped [Deucalion]474-deucalion 's flood , uncrowned . [She]835-medea passed by [Pittane]212-pittane upon the left , with [its]212-pittane huge serpent - image of hard stone , and also passed [the grove called [Ida]602-ida 's]6623-the grove called ida 's , where the stolen bull was changed by [Bacchus]617-bacchus ' power into a hunted stag — in [that same vale]6624-that same vale [Paris]845-paris lies buried in the sand ; and over fields where [Mera]846-mera warning harked , [Medea]835-medea flew ; over [the city of [Eurypylus]213-eurypylus]6625-the city of eurypylus upon [the Isle of Cos]214-the isle of cos , whose [women]1730-women wore the horns of cattle when from there had gone the herd of Hercules ; and over [Rhodes beloved of [Phoebus]549-phoebus]6627-rhodes beloved of phoebus , where [Telchinian tribes dwelt , whose bad eyes corrupting power shot forth]6628-telchinian tribes dwelt , whose bad eyes corrupting power shot forth ; — [Jove]456-jove , utterly despising , thrust them deep beneath [[his]456-jove brother]2004-his brother 's waves ; over the walls of old [Carthaea]215-carthaea , where [Alcidamas]847-alcidamas had seen with wonder a tame dove arise from [[his]456-jove own daughter]6630-his own daughter 's body . And [she]835-medea saw [the lakes of [Hyrie]216-hyrie]6631-the lakes of hyrie in [[Teumesia]217-teumesia 's Vale]6632-teumesia 's vale , by swans frequented — There to satisfy [his]456-jove love for [Cycnus]534-cycnus , [Phyllius]848-phyllius gave two living vultures : shell for [him]456-jove subdued a lion , and delivered it to [him]456-jove ; and mastered a great bull , at [his]456-jove command ; but when [the wearied Phyllius]848-phyllius refused to render to [[his]456-jove friend]6633-his friend the valued bull . Indignant , [the youth]1554-the youth said , “[2540-you] [You]2540-you shall regret [your]2540-you hasty words ; ” which having said , [he]456-jove leaped from a high precipice , as if to death ; but gliding through the air , on snow - white wings , was changed into a swan — Dissolved in tears , [[his]456-jove mother]1520-his mother [Hyrie]216-hyrie knew not [he]456-jove was saved ; and weeping , formed the lake that bears [her]216-hyrie name . And over [Pleuron]218-pleuron , where on trembling wings escaped [the mother Combe]6636-the mother combe from [[her]6636-the mother combe sons]2282-her sons , [Medea]835-medea flew ; and over [the far isle]6638-the far isle [Calauria]219-calauria , sacred to [Latona]798-latona . — [She]835-medea beheld [the conscious fields whose [lawful king]6640-lawful king , together with [[his]6640-lawful king queen]5074-his queen were changed to birds]6639-the conscious fields whose lawful king , together with his queen were changed to birds . Upon [her]835-medea right [Cyllene]850-cyllene could be seen ; there [Menephon]851-menephon , degraded as a beast , outraged [[his]851-menephon mother]1520-his mother . In the distance , [she]835-medea beheld [Cephisius]852-cephisius , who lamented long [[his]6640-lawful king hapless grandson]6643-his hapless grandson , by [Apollo]549-phoebus changed into a bloated sea - calf . And [she]835-medea saw [the house where king [Eumelus]853-eumelus mourned the death of [[his]6640-lawful king aspiring son]6645-his aspiring son]6644-the house where king eumelus mourned the death of his aspiring son . — Borne on the wings of [her]835-medea enchanted dragons , [she]835-medea arrived at [Corinth]188-corinth , whose inhabitants , ' tis said , from many mushrooms , watered by the rain sprang into being . There [she]835-medea spent some years . But after [the new wife]6646-the new wife had been burnt by [the Colchian]854-the colchian witchcraft and two seas had seen [[the king]6107-the king 's own palace]6648-the king 's own palace all aflame , then , savagely [she]835-medea drew [her]835-medea sword , and bathed it in the blood of [[her]835-medea own infant sons]6649-her own infant sons ; by which atrocious act [she]835-medea was revenged ; and [she]835-medea , [a wife]6650-a wife and [mother]5115-mother , fled the sword of [[her]835-medea own husband]6652-her own husband , [Jason]833-jason . On the wings of [her]835-medea enchanted Titan Dragons borne , [she]835-medea made escape , securely , nor delayed until [she]835-medea entered the defended walls of [great [Minerva]543-minerva 's city]6653-great minerva 's city , at the hour when [aged Periphas]6654-aged periphas — transformed by [Jove]456-jove , together with [[his]6654-aged periphas queen]5074-his queen , on eagle wings flew over [its]6653-great minerva 's city encircling walls : with whom [the guilty Halcyone , skimming seas]6656-the guilty halcyone , skimming seas safely escaped , upon [her]835-medea balanced wings . And after these events , [Medea]835-medea went to [Aegeus]855-aegeus , [king of [Athens]95-athens]6430-king of athens , where [she]835-medea found protection from [[her]835-medea enemies]6658-her enemies for all this evil done . With added wickedness [Aegeus]855-aegeus , after that , united [her]835-medea to [him]855-aegeus in marriage . — All unknown to [him]855-aegeus came [Theseus]856-theseus to [[his]855-aegeus kingly court]6659-his kingly court . — Before the time [his]855-aegeus valor had established peace on all [the isthmus]6660-the isthmus , raved by dual seas . [Medea]835-medea , seeking [his]855-aegeus destruction , brewed the juice of aconite , infesting [shores of [Scythia]4-scythia]6661-shores of scythia , where , ' tis fabled , the plant grew on soil infected by Cerberian teeth . There is a gloomy entrance to [a cave]6662-a cave , that follows a declivitous descent : there [Hercules]857-hercules with chains of adamant dragged from [the dreary edge of [Tartarus]77-tartarus]6663-the dreary edge of tartarus that monster - watch - dog , Cerberus , which , vain opposing , turned [his]855-aegeus eyes aslant from light — from dazzling day . Delirious , enraged , that monster shook the air with triple howls ; and , frothing , sprinkled as it raved , [the fields]5475-the fields , once green — with spewing of white poison - foam . And this , converted into plants , sucked up a deadly venom with the nourishment of former soils , — from which productive grew upon [the rock]5996-the rock , thus formed , the noxious plant ; by [rustics , from that cause , named aconite]6666-rustics , from that cause , named aconite .
