[Telamon]866-telamon was one of [them]6946-them and even [Peleus]872-peleus , [father of the great Achilles]6947-father of the great achilles ; and [the son of [Pheres]905-pheres]6948-the son of pheres joined , and [Iolas]906-iolas , [the swift Eurytion , Echion fleet of foot]6949-the swift eurytion , echion fleet of foot , [Narycian Lelex]907-narycian lelex — and [Panopeus]908-panopeus , and [Hyleus]909-hyleus and [Hippasus]910-hippasus , and [Nestor]911-nestor ( youthful then ) , and [the four sons Hippocoon from eld Amyclae sent]6950-the four sons hippocoon from eld amyclae sent , [the father - in - law of [queen Penelope]912-queen penelope]6951-the father - in - law of queen penelope , [Ancaeus of [Arcadia]249-arcadia]6952-ancaeus of arcadia , and [the wise soothsayer Mopsus]6953-the wise soothsayer mopsus , and [the prophet]5621-the prophet , [son of Oeclus]6955-son of oeclus , victim of [a traitor - wife]6956-a traitor - wife . — And [Atalanta]913-atalanta , virgin of [the groves]5058-the groves , of Mount Lycaeus , glory of [her]913-atalanta sex ; a polished buckle fastened [her]913-atalanta attire ; [her]913-atalanta lustrous hair was fashioned in a knot ; [her]913-atalanta weapons rattled in an ivory case , swung from [her]913-atalanta white left shoulder , and [she]913-atalanta held a bow in [her]913-atalanta left hand . [Her]913-atalanta face appeared as maidenly for [boy]6958-boy , or boyish for [girl]6959-girl . When [Meleager]895-meleager saw [her]913-atalanta , [he]895-meleager at once longed for [her]913-atalanta beauty , though [some god]6773-some god forbade . The fires of love flamed in [him]895-meleager ; and [he]895-meleager said , “[1379-the husband] Happy [the husband]1379-the husband who shall win [this girl]2138-this girl ! ” Neither the time nor [his]895-meleager own modesty permitted [him]895-meleager to say another word . But now the dreadful contest with the boar engaged [this hero]6961-this hero 's energy and thought . A wood , umbrageous , not impaired with age , slopes from [a plain]6962-a plain and shadows [the wide fields]6963-the wide fields , and there [this band of valiant heroes]6964-this band of valiant heroes went — eager to slay [the dreaded enemy]6965-the dreaded enemy , some spread the nets and [some let loose the dogs]6966-some let loose the dogs , some traced the wide spoor of the monster 's hoofs . There is [a deep gorge where the rivulets that gather from the rain , discharge themselves]6967-a deep gorge where the rivulets that gather from the rain , discharge themselves ; and there the bending willow , the smooth sedge , the marsh - rush , ozier and tall tangled reed in wild profusion cover up [the marsh]6968-the marsh . Aroused from this retreat the startled boar , as quick as lightning from the clashing clouds crashed all the trees that cumbered [his]6961-this hero mad way . — [The young men]6969-the young men raised a shout , leveled [their]6969-the young men spears , and brandished [their]6969-the young men keen weapons ; but the boar rushed onward through the yelping dogs , and scattered [them]6969-the young men with deadly sidelong stroke . [Echion]568-echion was the first to hurl [his]568-echion spear , but slanting in its course it only glanced a nearby maple tree , and next the spear of long - remembered [Jason]833-jason cut the air ; so swiftly hurled it seemed it might transfix [the boar]6702-the boar 's back , but with over - force it sped beyond [the monster]5004-the monster . Poising first [his]0-i dart , [the son of [Ampyx]736-ampyx]6972-the son of ampyx , as [he]0-i cast it , [he]0-i implored [Apollo]549-phoebus , “[1379-the husband] Grant [my]0-i prayer if [I]0-i have truly worshiped [you]2751-you , harken to [me]0-i as always [I]0-i adore [you]2751-you ! Let [my]0-i spear unerring strike its aim . ” [Apollo]549-phoebus heard , and guided the swift spear , but as it sped [Diana]484-diana struck the iron head from the shaft , and the blunt wood fell harmless from [his]0-i hide . Then was [the monster]5004-the monster 's savage anger roused ; as the bright lightning 's flash [his]0-i red eyes flamed ; [his]0-i breath was hot as fire . As when a stone is aimed at walls or [strong towers]6974-strong towers , which protect [encompassed armies]6975-encompassed armies , — launched by the taut rope it strikes with dreaded impact ; so [the boar with fatal onset]6976-the boar with fatal onset rushed among [this band of noble lads]6977-this band of noble lads , and stretched upon the ground [Eupalamon]914-eupalamon and [Pelagon whose guard was on the right]6978-pelagon whose guard was on the right ; and [[their]6977-this band of noble lads companions]6979-their companions bore [their]6977-this band of noble lads bodies from [the field]5024-the field . [Another youth]6981-another youth , [the brave son of [Hippocoon]915-hippocoon]6982-the brave son of hippocoon received a deadly wound — while turning to escape , the sinew of [his]6981-another youth thigh was cut and failed to bear [his]6981-another youth tottering steps . — And [Nestor]911-nestor might have perished then , so long before [he]911-nestor fought [the heroes of old [Troy]250-troy]6983-the heroes of old troy , but ever wise , [he]911-nestor vaulted on [his]911-nestor long lance from the ground into the branches of a sheltering tree ; where in a safe position , [he]911-nestor could look down on [[his]911-nestor baffled foe]6984-his baffled foe . The raging boar whetted [his]911-nestor gleaming tushes on an oak . Then with [his]911-nestor sharpened tusks [he]911-nestor gored the thigh of mighty [Hippasus]910-hippasus . Observed of all , and mounted on [their]6983-the heroes of old troy horses — whiter than [the northern snow]6985-the northern snow — [the twins ( long afterward transformed to constellations]6986-the twins ( long afterward transformed to constellations ) sallied forth , and brandishing [their]6983-the heroes of old troy lances , poised in air , determined to destroy the bristling boar . It thwarted [their]6983-the heroes of old troy design by hiding in a thicket intricate ; where neither steed nor lance could penetrate . But [Telamon]866-telamon pursued undaunted , and in haste tripped up by tangled roots , fell headlong . — [Peleus]872-peleus stooped to rescue [him]866-telamon . While [he]866-telamon regained [his]866-telamon feet , [the virgin]5026-the virgin , [Atalanta]913-atalanta , took [her]5026-the virgin bow and fitting a sharp arrow to the notch , twanged the tight cord . The feathered shaft quivered beneath [the monster]5004-the monster 's ear , the red blood stained [his]5004-the monster hard bristles . Flushed with [her]2752-a maid success rejoiced [the maid]1503-the maid , but not more gladly than [the hero Meleager]6990-the hero meleager . [He]6990-the hero meleager it was who first observed the blood , and pointed out the stain to [[his]6990-the hero meleager companions]5589-his companions as [he]6990-the hero meleager cried , “[0-i] Give honor to the courage of [a maid]2752-a maid ! ” Unwilling to be worsted by [a maid]2752-a maid , [the rushing heroes]6993-the rushing heroes raised a mighty cry and as [they]6993-the rushing heroes shouted in excitement , hurled [their]6993-the rushing heroes weapons in confusion ; and so great [the multitude]6124-the multitude [their]6993-the rushing heroes actions interfered . Behold ! [Ancaeus]916-ancaeus wielding [his]916-ancaeus war - axe , and rushing madly to [his]916-ancaeus fate , exclaimed , “[0-i] Witness it ! See the weapons of [a man]5610-a man excel [a woman]5609-a woman 's ! Ho , make way for [my]0-i achievement ! Let [Diana]484-diana shield [the brute]2755-the brute ! Despite [her]484-diana utmost effort [my]0-i right hand shall slaughter [him]2755-the brute ! ” So mighty in [his]916-ancaeus boast [he]916-ancaeus puffed [himself]916-ancaeus ; and , lifting with both hands [his]916-ancaeus double - edged axe , [he]916-ancaeus stood erect , on tiptoe fiercely bold . The savage boar caught [him]916-ancaeus , and ripped [his]916-ancaeus tushes through [his]916-ancaeus groin , a spot where death is sure . — [Ancaeus]916-ancaeus fell ; and [his]916-ancaeus torn entrails and [his]916-ancaeus crimson blood stained the fair verdure of the spot with death . [[Ixion]660-ixion 's doughty son]6995-ixion 's doughty son was running straight against the monster , shaking [his]6995-ixion 's doughty son long lance with nervous vigor in [his]6995-ixion 's doughty son strong right hand ; but [Theseus , standing at a distance]6996-theseus , standing at a distance called : “[484-diana] Beware ! beware , O , dearest of [[my]0-i friends]6756-my friends ; be valiant at a distance , or the fate of rashly - bold [Ancaeus]916-ancaeus may be [yours]2757-yours ! ” Even as [he]0-i spoke [he]0-i balanced in [his]0-i hand [his]0-i brazen - pointed lance of corner wood ; with aim so true it seemed the great boar 's death was certain , but an evergreen oak branch shielded the beast . — Then [Jason]833-jason hurled [his]833-jason dart , which turned by chance , transfixed a luckless dog and pinned [him]833-jason yelping , to [the sanguine earth]6997-the sanguine earth . — So fared [those heroes]6998-those heroes . Better fortune gave success to [Meleager]895-meleager ; first [he]895-meleager threw a spear that missed and quivered in the ground ; but next [he]895-meleager hurled a spear with certain aim . It pierced the middle of [the monster]5004-the monster 's back ; and rushing in upon the dreaded beast , while raging it was whirling round and round , [the fearless prince]7000-the fearless prince provoked to greater rage [the wounded adversary]7001-the wounded adversary . Bloody froth dripped down [his]895-meleager champing jaws — [his]895-meleager purple blood poured from a rankling wound . Without delay [the mighty Meleager]895-meleager plunged a spear deep in [the monster]5004-the monster 's shoulder . [All [his]895-meleager friends]7003-all his friends raised a glad shout , and gathering round [him]895-meleager , tried to grasp [his]895-meleager hand . — With wonder [they]7003-all his friends beheld [the monster]5004-the monster 's bulk stretched out upon [the plain]5033-the plain ; and fearful still to touch [him]895-meleager , [they]7003-all his friends began to stain [their]7003-all his friends weapons in [his]895-meleager spouting blood . At length [the hero Meleager]6990-the hero meleager pressed [his]0-i conquering foot upon [the monster]5004-the monster 's head and said , “[916-ancaeus] O Atalanta , [glorious maid , of [Nonacris]494-nonacris]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris , to [you]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris is yielded spoil , [my]0-i lawful right , and [I]0-i rejoice to share the merit of this glorious victory . ” And while [he]0-i spoke , [he]0-i gave to [her]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris the pelt , covered with horrid bristles , and the head frightful with gory tusks : and [she]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris rejoiced in [Meleager]895-meleager and [his]0-i royal gift . But [all the others]5734-all the others , envious , began to murmur ; and [the sons of Thestius]7009-the sons of thestius levelled [their]7009-the sons of thestius pointed spears , and shouted out ; “[2758-glorious maid , of nonacris] Give up the prize ! Let not the confidence of [your]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris great beauty be a snare to [you]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris ! [A woman]5609-a woman should not interfering filch the manly honors of a mighty hunt ! Aside ! and let [[your]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris witless lover]2760-your witless lover yield ! ” So threatened [they]7009-the sons of thestius and took from [her]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris the prize ; and forcibly despoiled [him]895-meleager of [his]895-meleager rights . [The warlike prince]7010-the warlike prince , indignant and enraged , — rowed with resentment , shouted out . “[2760-your witless lover] What ! Ho ! [[You]2758-glorious maid , of nonacris spoilers of this honor that is [ours]2762-ours]2761-you spoilers of this honor that is ours , brave deeds are different far from craven threats ! ” And with [his]895-meleager cruel sword [he]895-meleager pierced the breast of [rash Plexippus]7011-rash plexippus , taken unawares , and while [[his]895-meleager brother]2004-his brother , [Toxeus]900-toxeus , struck with fear , stood hesitating whether to avenge or run to safety , [Meleager]895-meleager plunged the hot sword , smoking with [a brother]7013-a brother 's blood , in [his]895-meleager breast also . And so perished [they]7009-the sons of thestius . Ere this , [Althaea]917-althaea , [mother of [the prince]6829-the prince]7014-mother of the prince , and [sister of the slaughtered twain]7016-sister of the slaughtered twain , — because [[her]917-althaea son]5619-her son had killed the boar , made haste to bear rich offerings to [the temples of [the Gods]1395-the gods]6910-the temples of the gods ; but when [she]917-althaea saw [[her]917-althaea slaughtered brothers]7020-her slaughtered brothers borne in sad procession , [she]917-althaea began to shriek , and filled [the city]5520-the city with [her]917-althaea wild lament . Unwilling to abide [her]917-althaea festal robes [she]917-althaea dressed in sable . — When [she]917-althaea was informed [[her]917-althaea own son]7022-her own son [Meleager]895-meleager was the cause , [she]917-althaea banished grief and lamentations , — thirsting for vengeance . [She]917-althaea remembered well , how , when [she]917-althaea lay in childbirth round [her]917-althaea stood [the three attendant sisters]7023-the three attendant sisters of [his]895-meleager fate . There was a billet in [the room]7024-the room , and this [they]2764-they took and cast upon the wasting flames , and as [they]2764-they spun and drew the fatal threads [they]2764-they softly chanted , “[2758-glorious maid , of nonacris] Unto [you]2763-you [we]2764-they give , [O child new - born]2765-o child new - born ! only the life of this ; the period of this billet is [your]2763-you life . ” And having spoken so , [they]2764-they vanished in the smoke . [Althaea]917-althaea snatched the billet from the fire , and having quenched it with drawn water , hid it long and secretly in [[her]917-althaea own room]7025-her own room , where , thus preserved , it acted as a charm to save the life of [Meleager]895-meleager . This [the mother]5344-the mother now brought forth , and fetched a pile of seasoned tinder ready for the torch . [She]917-althaea lit the torches and the ready pile , and as the flames leaped up , four times prepared to cast the fatal billet in the midst ; and four times hesitated to commit the dreadful deed , — so long the contest veered between the feelings of [a mother]5325-a mother 's breast and the fierce vengeance of [a sister]5833-a sister 's rage . Now is [the mother]5344-the mother 's visage pale with fear , and now [the sister]7030-the sister 's sanguinary rage glows in [her]917-althaea eyes . [Her]917-althaea countenance contorts with cruel threats and in bewildered ways dissolves compassionate : And even when the heat of anger had dried up [her]917-althaea eyes the conflict of [her]917-althaea passion brought new tears . As when the wind has seized upon [a ship]5175-a ship and blows against a tide of equal force , [the vexed vessel]7032-the vexed vessel feels repellent powers , and with unsteady motion sways to both ; so did [Althaea]917-althaea hesitate between the conflict of [her]917-althaea passions : when [her]917-althaea rage had cooled , [her]917-althaea fury was as fast renewed : but always the unsatisfied desire of blood , to ease the disembodied shades of [[her]917-althaea slain brothers]7033-her slain brothers , seemed to overcome the mother - instinct ; and intensity of conduct proved the utmost test of love . [She]917-althaea took the billet in [her]917-althaea arms and stood before the leaping flames , and said , “[2768-relentless gods of punishment] Alas , be this the funeral pyre of [my]0-i own flesh ! ” And as [she]917-althaea held in [her]917-althaea relentless hand the destiny of [him]2766-him [she]917-althaea loved , and stood before the flames , in all [her]917-althaea wretchedness [she]917-althaea moaned , “[2766-him] [[You]2766-him sad [Eumenides]918-eumenides]2767-you sad eumenides attend ! [Relentless Gods of punishment]2768-relentless gods of punishment , — turn , turn [your]2766-him dreadful vision on these baneful rites ! [I]0-i am avenging and committing crime ! With death must death be justified and crime be added unto crime ! Let funerals upon succeeding funerals attend ! “ Let these accumulating woes destroy [a wicked race]7034-a wicked race . Shall [happy Oeneus]7035-happy oeneus bask in the great fame of [[his]7035-happy oeneus victorious son]7036-his victorious son , and [Thestius]902-thestius mourn without [slaughtered ones]7037-slaughtered ones ? ' Tis better [they]7038-they should both lament the deed ! Witness the act of [my]2768-relentless gods of punishment affection , shades of [[my]2768-relentless gods of punishment departed brothers]7039-my departed brothers ! and accept [my]2768-relentless gods of punishment funeral offering , given at a cost beyond [my]2768-relentless gods of punishment strength to bear . [Ah]7040-ah wretched [me]2768-relentless gods of punishment ! Distracted is [my]2768-relentless gods of punishment reason ! Pity [me]2768-relentless gods of punishment , the yearnings of [a stricken mother]7041-a stricken mother 's heart withholding [me]2768-relentless gods of punishment from duty ! Aye , although [his]7036-his victorious son punishment be just , [my]2768-relentless gods of punishment hands refuse the office of such vengeance . What , shall [he]7036-his victorious son alive , victorious , flushed with [his]7036-his victorious son success , inherit [the broad realms of [Calydon]187-calydon]7042-the broad realms of calydon , and [you]7043-you , [[my]2768-relentless gods of punishment slaughtered brothers]7044-my slaughtered brothers , unavenged , dissolved in ashes , float upon the air , unpalpitating phantoms ? How can [I]2768-relentless gods of punishment endure the thought of it ? Oh let [the wretch]7045-the wretch forever perish , and with [him]7045-the wretch be lost the hopes of [[his]7045-the wretch sad father]7046-his sad father , in the wreck of [[his]7045-the wretch distracted kingdom]7047-his distracted kingdom . Where are now the love and feelings of [a mother]5325-a mother ; how can [I]2768-relentless gods of punishment forget the bitter pangs endured while twice times five the slow moon waxed and waned ? “[2768-relentless gods of punishment] O had [you]2769-your perished in [your]2769-your infancy by those first fires , and [I]0-i had suffered it ! [Your]2769-your life was in [my]0-i power ! and now [your]2769-your death is the result of wrongs which [you]2769-your have done — take now a just reward for what [you]2769-your did : return to [me]0-i the life [I]0-i gave and saved . When from the flames [I]0-i snatched the fatal brand . Return that gift or take [my]0-i wretched life , that [I]0-i may hasten to [[[my]0-i brothers]6524-my brothers ' tomb]2771-my brothers ' tomb . “ What dreadful deed can satisfy the law , when [I]2772-my for love against [my]2772-my love am forced ? For even as [[my]2772-my brothers]6524-my brothers ' wounds appear in visions dreadful to denounce [[my]2772-my son]5122-my son , the love so nurtured in [a mother]5325-a mother 's breast breaks down the resolution ! Wretched [me]2772-my ! Such vengeance for [[my]2772-my brothers]6524-my brothers overcomes first at [your]2769-your birth [I]2772-my gave it , and again the yearning of [a mother]5325-a mother for [[her]5325-a mother son]5619-her son ! Let not [my]2772-my love denounce [my]2772-my vengeance ! [My]2772-my soul may follow with its love the shade of [him]895-meleager [I]2772-my sacrifice , and following [him]895-meleager [my]2772-my shade and [his]895-meleager and [yours]7055-yours unite below . ”[2772-my] [She]2772-my spoke and as [she]2772-my turned [her]2772-my face away , [she]2772-my threw the fatal billet on the fire , and as the flames devoured it , a strange groan was heard to issue from the burning wood but [Meleager]895-meleager at a distance knows of naught to wreck [his]895-meleager hour of victory , until [he]895-meleager feels the flame of burning wood scorching with secret fire [his]895-meleager forfeit life . Yet with a mighty will , disdaining pain [he]895-meleager grieves [his]895-meleager bloodless and ignoble death . [He]895-meleager calls [Ancaeus]916-ancaeus happy for the wounds that caused [his]895-meleager death . With sighs and groans [he]895-meleager called [[his]895-meleager aged father]2773-his aged father 's name , and then the names of [brothers]1378-brothers , [sisters]1543-sisters , and [[his]895-meleager wife]1380-his wife — and last , [they]2777-they say [he]895-meleager called upon [[his]895-meleager mother]1520-his mother 's name . [His]895-meleager torment always with the fire increased , until , as little of the wood remained , — [his]895-meleager pain diminished with the heat 's decrease ; and as the flames extinguished , so [his]895-meleager life slowly ascended in the rising air . And [all the mighty realm of [Calydon]187-calydon]2779-all the mighty realm of calydon was filled with lamentations — young and old [the common people]2780-the common people and [the nobles]2781-the nobles mourned ; and [all the wailing women]2782-all the wailing women tore [their]2782-all the wailing women hair [[his]895-meleager father]1530-his father threw [his]1530-his father body on the ground , and as [he]1530-his father covered [his]1530-his father white hair and face with ashy dust , bewailed [his]1530-his father aged days . [Althaea]917-althaea , maddened in [[her]917-althaea mother]4984-her mother 's grief , has punished [herself]917-althaea with a ruthless hand ; [she]917-althaea pierced [her]917-althaea heart with iron . — Oh ! if [some God]6773-some god had given a resounding harp , a voice an hundred - fold more mighty , and a soul enlarged with genius , [I]0-i could never tell the grief of [[his]895-meleager unhappy sisters]2786-his unhappy sisters . — [They]2787-their , regardless of all shame , beat on [their]2787-their breasts ; before the body was consumed with fire , embraced it , and again embracing it , rained kisses on [[their]2787-their loved one]2788-their loved one and [the bier]2789-the bier . And when the flames had burnt [his]895-meleager shrinking form [they]2787-their strained [his]895-meleager gathered ashes to [their]2787-their breasts , and prostrate on [the tomb]5246-the tomb kissed [his]895-meleager dear name , cut only in the stone , — and bathed it with [their]2787-their tears [[Latona]798-latona 's daughter]2791-latona 's daughter , glutted with the woes inflicted on [[Parthaon]919-parthaon 's house]2792-parthaon 's house , now gave two of [the weeping sisters]2793-the weeping sisters wide - spread wings , but [Gorge]920-gorge and [the spouse of [Hercules]857-hercules]2794-the spouse of hercules not so were changed . [Latona]798-latona stretched long wings upon [their]2787-their arms , transformed [their]2787-their mouths to beaks , and sent [them]2787-their winging through the lucent air . And [Theseus]856-theseus , meantime , having done great deeds , was wending towards [[Tritonian Athen]921-tritonian athen 's towers]2795-tritonian athen 's towers , but [Achelous]922-achelous , swollen with great rains , opposed [his]856-theseus journey and delayed [his]856-theseus steps . “ [O famous son of [Athens]95-athens]7056-o famous son of athens , come to [me]922-achelous , beneath [my]922-achelous roof , and leave [my]922-achelous rapid floods ; for [they]7057-they are wo nt to bear enormous beams , and hurl up heavy stones to bar the way , — mighty with roaring , down [the steep ravines]7058-the steep ravines . And [I]922-achelous have seen the sheep - folds on [[my]922-achelous banks]7059-my banks swept down the flood , together with the sheep ; and in the current neither strength availed the ox for safety , nor swift speed the horse . When rushed the melting snows from [mountain peaks]7060-mountain peaks how many bodies of unwary men this flood has overwhelmed in whirling waves ! Rest safely then , until [[my]922-achelous river]7061-my river runs within [its]7061-my river usual bounds — till [it]7061-my river contains [[its]7061-my river flowing waters]7062-its flowing waters in [its]7061-my river proper banks . ”[922-achelous] and gladly answered [Theseus]856-theseus , “ [I]856-theseus will make good use of both [your]856-theseus dwelling and advice . ”[856-theseus] And waiting not [he]856-theseus entered [a rude hut]2796-a rude hut , of porous pumice and of rough stone built . The floor was damp and soft with springy moss , and rows of shells and murex arched the roof . And now [Hyperion]121-hyperion having measured quite two thirds of daylight , [Theseus]856-theseus and [[his]856-theseus friends]5709-his friends reclined upon the couches . — On [his]856-theseus right [[Ixion]660-ixion 's son]2798-ixion 's son was placed , and on [his]856-theseus left [the gray - haired hero Lelex]2799-the gray - haired hero lelex ; and others deemed worthy by [the Acarnanian - god who was so joyful in [his]2800-the acarnanian - god who was so joyful in his noble guests noble guests]2800-the acarnanian - god who was so joyful in his noble guests . Without delay [the barefoot nimble Nymphs attending to the banquet]2801-the barefoot nimble nymphs attending to the banquet , rich food brought ; and after all were satisfied with meat and dainties delicate , [the careful Nymphs]2802-the careful nymphs removed all traces of the feast , and served delicious wine in bowls embossed with gems . And after [they]2802-the careful nymphs had eaten , [Theseus]856-theseus arose , and as [he]856-theseus pointed with [his]856-theseus finger , said , “ Declare to [me]856-theseus what name [that island]7063-that island bears , or is it one or more than one [I]856-theseus see ? ”[856-theseus] To which [the ready River - God]2803-the ready river - god replied : “ It is not one [we]7064-we see but five are there , deceptive in the distance . And that [you]7065-you may wonder less at what [Diana]484-diana did , [those islands]7066-those islands were [five Naiads]7067-five naiads . — Long ago , ten bullocks for a sacrifice [they]2802-the careful nymphs slew ; and when the joyous festival was given , ignoring [me]856-theseus [they]2802-the careful nymphs bade [all other Gods]7068-all other gods . Indignant at the slight , [I]856-theseus swelled with rage as great as ever when [my]856-theseus banks are full , — and so redoubled both in rage and flood , [I]856-theseus ravished woods from [woods]7069-woods , and [fields]6046-fields from [fields]6046-fields , and hurled into [the sea]1298-the sea the very soil , together with [the Nymphs , who then at last remembered [their]7073-the nymphs , who then at last remembered their neglect neglect]7073-the nymphs , who then at last remembered their neglect . And soon [my]856-theseus waves , united with [the ocean streams]7074-the ocean streams , cut through the solid soil , and fashioned from the one , [five islands [you]2804-you may see amid the waves , which [men since then]7076-men since then , have called Echinades]7075-five islands you may see amid the waves , which men since then , have called echinades . “[856-theseus] But yet beyond [you]2804-you can observe how one most beautiful of all is far withdrawn ; and this which most delights [me]0-i , [mariners]1776-mariners have [Perimela]923-perimela named . [She]923-perimela was so fair that [I]0-i deprived [her]923-perimela of a precious wealth . And when [Hippodamas]924-hippodamas , [[her]923-perimela father]5022-her father , knew , enraged [he]924-hippodamas pushed [her]923-perimela , heavy then with [child]1600-child , forth from a rock into [the cruel sea]2808-the cruel sea , where [she]923-perimela must perish , — but [I]0-i rescued [her]923-perimela ; and as [I]0-i bore [her]923-perimela on [my]0-i swimming tide , [I]0-i called on [Neptune]472-neptune , [ruler of [the deep]1961-the deep]2809-ruler of the deep , ‘ O Trident - wielder , [you]2811-you who are preferred next to the god most mighty ! who by lot obtained [the empire of the flowing deep]2812-the empire of the flowing deep , to which [all sacred rivers]2813-all sacred rivers flow and end ; come here , O Neptune , and with gracious will grant [my]0-i desire ; — [I]0-i injured [her]923-perimela [I]0-i save ; — but if [Hippodamas]924-hippodamas , [[her]923-perimela father]5022-her father , when [he]924-hippodamas knew [my]0-i love , had been both kind and just , if [he]924-hippodamas had not been so unnatural , [he]924-hippodamas would have pitied and forgiven [her]923-perimela . Ah , [Neptune]472-neptune , [I]0-i beseech [you]472-neptune , grant [your]472-neptune power may find a place of safety for [this Nymph]2815-this nymph , abandoned to the deep waves by [[her]923-perimela sire]6289-her sire . Or if that can not be , let [her]2815-this nymph whom [I]0-i embrace to show [my]0-i love , let [her]2815-this nymph become a place of safety . ’ Instantly to [me]0-i [the King of [Ocean]87-ocean]2817-the king of ocean moved [his]2817-the king of ocean mighty head , and [all the deep waves]2818-all the deep waves quivered in response . “ [The Nymph]5012-the nymph , afraid , still struggled in the deep , and as [she]5012-the nymph swam [I]2817-the king of ocean touched [her]5012-the nymph throbbing breast ; and as [I]2817-the king of ocean felt [her]5012-the nymph bosom , trembling still , [I]2817-the king of ocean thought [her]5012-the nymph soft flesh was becoming hard ; for even then , new earth enclosed [her]5012-the nymph form ; and as [I]2817-the king of ocean prayed to [Neptune]472-neptune , earth encased [her]5012-the nymph floating limbs ; — and on [her]5012-the nymph changing form the heavy soil of [that fair island]7078-that fair island grew . ”[2817-the king of ocean] And at this point , [the River]167-the river said no more . This wonderful event astonished [all]5537-all ; but [one]1998-one was there , [[Ixion]660-ixion 's haughty son]2821-ixion 's haughty son — [a known despiser of the living Gods]2822-a known despiser of the living gods — who , laughing , scorned it as an idle tale . [He]2821-ixion 's haughty son made a jest of [those who heard]2823-those who heard , and said , “ A foolish fiction ! [Achelous]922-achelous , how can such a tale be true ? Do [you]922-achelous believe a god there is , in [heaven so powerful]7079-heaven so powerful , [a god to give and take away a form — transform created shapes]7080-a god to give and take away a form — transform created shapes ? Such impious words found no response in [those who heard [him]2821-ixion 's haughty son speak]7081-those who heard him speak . Amazed [he]2821-ixion 's haughty son could so doubt known truth , before [them]7081-those who heard him speak all , uprose to vindicate [the Gods]1395-the gods [the hero Lelex]7083-the hero lelex , wise in length of days . “[2821-ixion 's haughty son] The glory of [the living Gods]1912-the living gods , ” [he]2821-ixion 's haughty son said , “[2821-ixion 's haughty son] Is not diminished , nor [their]1912-the living gods power confined , and whatsoever [they]1912-the living gods decree is done . “ And [I]2821-ixion 's haughty son have this to tell , for all must know the evil of such words : — Upon [the hills of [Phrygia]175-phrygia]7084-the hills of phrygia [I]2821-ixion 's haughty son have seen two sacred trees , a lime - tree and an oak , so closely grown their branches interlace . A low stone wall is built around to guard [them]1912-the living gods from all harm . And that [you]922-achelous may not doubt it , [I]2821-ixion 's haughty son declare again , [I]2821-ixion 's haughty son saw [the spot]7085-the spot , for [Pittheus]925-pittheus there had sent [me]2821-ixion 's haughty son to attend [[[his]925-pittheus father]1530-his father 's court]7087-his father 's court . “[2821-ixion 's haughty son] Near by those trees are stagnant pools and fens , where coots and cormorants delight to haunt ; but it was not so always . Long ago ' Twas visited by [mighty Jupiter]475-jupiter , together with [[his]475-jupiter nimble - witted son , who first had laid aside [his]475-jupiter rod and Wings]2825-his nimble - witted son , who first had laid aside his rod and wings . “ As [weary travelers]7088-weary travelers over [all [the land]1295-the land [they]7088-weary travelers wandered]7089-all the land they wandered , begging for [their]7088-weary travelers food and bed ; and of [a thousand houses]7091-a thousand houses , all the doors were bolted and no word of kindness given — so wicked were [the people of [that land]5048-that land]7092-the people of that land . At last , by chance , [they]7088-weary travelers stopped at [a small house]7094-a small house , whose humble roof was thatched with reeds and straw ; — and here [a kind old couple]7095-a kind old couple greeted [them]7088-weary travelers . “[475-jupiter] [The good dame]2826-the good dame , [Baucis]926-baucis , seemed about the age of [old Philemon]927-philemon , [[her]2826-the good dame devoted man]2827-her devoted man ; [they]2828-they had been married in [their]2828-they early youth , in [that same cottage]2829-that same cottage and had lived in [it]2829-that same cottage , and grown together to a good old age ; contented with [their]2828-they lot because [they]2828-they knew [their]2828-they poverty , and felt no shame of it ; [they]2828-they had no need of [servants]2830-servants ; [the good pair]2831-the good pair were masters of [[their]2831-the good pair home]5431-their home and served [themselves]2831-the good pair ; [their]2831-the good pair own commands [they]2831-the good pair easily obeyed . “ Now when [the two Gods]7096-the two gods , [Jove]456-jove and [Mercury]492-mercury , had reached [this cottage]7097-this cottage , and with bending necks had entered the low door , [the old man]5372-the old man bade [them]7096-the two gods rest [their]7096-the two gods wearied limbs , and set a bench , on which [[his]5372-the old man good wife]7099-his good wife , [Baucis]926-baucis , threw a cloth ; and then with kindly bustle [she]7099-his good wife stirred up the glowing embers on the hearth , and then laid tinder , leaves and bark ; and bending down breathed on them with [her]7099-his good wife ancient breath until they kindled into flame . Then from [the house]5402-the house [she]7099-his good wife brought a store of faggots and small twigs , and broken branches , and above [them]7096-the two gods swung a kettle , not too large for [simple folk]7101-simple folk . And all this done , [she]7099-his good wife stripped some cabbage leaves , which [[her]7099-his good wife good husband]7102-her good husband gathered for the meal . “[5560-the man] Then with a two - pronged fork [the man]5560-the man let down a rusty side of bacon from aloft , and cut a little portion from the chine ; which had been cherished long . [He]5560-the man softened it in boiling water . All the while [they]2834-they tried with cheerful conversation to beguile , so [none]1829-none might notice a brief loss of time . “ Swung on a peg [they]2834-they had a beechwood trough , which quickly with warm water filled , was used for comfortable washing . And [they]2834-they fixed , upon a willow couch , a cushion soft of springy sedge , on which [they]2834-they neatly spread a well worn cloth preserved so many years ; ' Twas only used on rare and festive days ; and even it was coarse and very old , though not unfit to match a willow couch ! “[2837-the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully] Now as [the Gods]1395-the gods reclined , [the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully]2837-the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully , for so [she]2837-the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully tottered with [her]2837-the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully many years , fetched a clean table for the ready meal — but one leg of the table was too short , and so [she]2837-the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully wedged it with a potsherd — so made firm , [she]2837-the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully cleanly scoured it with fresh mint . “ And here is set the double - tinted fruit of [chaste Minerva]543-minerva , and the tasty dish of corner , autumn - picked and pickled ; these were served for relish ; and the endive - green , and radishes surrounding a large pot of curdled milk ; and eggs not overdone but gently turned in glowing embers — all served up in earthen dishes . Then sweet wine served up in clay , so costly ! all embossed , and cups of beechwood smoothed with yellow wax . “[2837-the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully] So now [they]2834-they had short respite , till the fire might yield the heated course . “ Again [they]2834-they served new wine , but mellow ; and a second course : sweet nuts , dried figs and wrinkled dates and plums , and apples fragrant , in wide baskets heaped ; and , in a wreath of grapes from purple vines , concealed almost , a glistening honey - comb ; and all these orchard dainties were enhanced by willing service and congenial smiles . “[2837-the good old dame , whose skirts were tucked up , moving carefully] But while [they]2834-they served , the wine - bowl often drained , as often was replenished , though unfilled , and [Baucis]926-baucis and [Philemon]927-philemon , full of fear , as [they]2834-they observed the wine spontaneous well , increasing when it should diminish , raised [their]2834-they hands in supplication , and implored indulgence for [their]2834-they simple home and fare . And now , persuaded by this strange event [such visitors]2838-such visitors were deities unknown , [this aged couple]2839-this aged couple , anxious to bestow [their]2839-this aged couple most esteemed possession , hastily began to chase the only goose [they]2839-this aged couple had — [the faithful guardian of [[their]2839-this aged couple little home]2841-their little home]2840-the faithful guardian of their little home — which [they]2839-this aged couple would kill and offer to [the Gods]1395-the gods . But swift of wing , at last it wearied [them]2839-this aged couple , and fled for refuge to [the smiling Gods]2843-the smiling gods . At once [the deities]1400-the deities forbade [their]2839-this aged couple zeal , and said , ‘ A righteous punishment shall fall severe upon this wicked neighborhood ; but by the might of [[our]1400-the deities divinity]2845-our divinity , no evil shall befall [this humble home]2846-this humble home ; but [you]2847-you must come , and follow as [we]1400-the deities climb [the summit of [this mountain]2849-this mountain]2848-the summit of this mountain ! ’ “ [Both]5611-both obeyed , and leaning on [their]5611-both staves toiled up the steep . Not farther from the summit than the flight of one swift arrow from [a hunter]7104-a hunter 's how , [they]5611-both paused to view [[their]5611-both little home]2841-their little home once more ; and as [they]5611-both turned [their]5611-both eyes , [they]5611-both saw [the fields around [their]5611-both own]7106-the fields around their own engulfed in a morass , although [their]5611-both own remained , — and while [they]5611-both wept bewailing the sad fate of [many friends]7107-many friends , and wondered at the change , [they]5611-both saw [[their]5611-both home]5431-their home , so old and little for [their]5611-both simple need — put on new splendor , and as it increased [it]5431-their home changed into [a temple of [the gods]1395-the gods]7109-a temple of the gods . Where first the frame was fashioned of rude stakes columns of marble glistened , and the thatch gleamed golden in the sun , and legends carved , adorned the doors . And al ] the ground shone white with marble rich , and after this was done , [the Son of [Saturn]463-saturn]1396-the son of saturn said with gentle voice , ‘ Now tell [us]2851-they , [good old man]7112-good old man and [you]926-baucis [[his]7112-good old man wife]1380-his wife , worthy and faithful , what is [your]926-baucis desire ? ’ “[927-philemon] [Philemon]927-philemon counselled with [old Baucis]926-baucis first ; and then discovered to [the listening Gods]2850-the listening gods [their]2850-the listening gods hearts ' desire , ‘ [We]2851-they pray [you]926-baucis let [us]2851-they have the care of [[your]926-baucis new temple]2852-your new temple ; and since [we]2851-they have passed so many years in harmony , let [us]2851-they depart this life together — Let the same hour take [us]2851-they both — [I]0-i would not see the tomb of [[my]0-i dear wife]6748-my dear wife ; and let [me]0-i not be destined to be buried by [her]6748-my dear wife hands ! ’ “ At once [their]2851-they wishes were fulfilled . So long as life was granted [they]2851-they were known to be [[the temple]4988-the temple 's trusted keepers]7115-the temple 's trusted keepers , and when age had enervated [them]2851-they with many years , as [they]2851-they were standing , by some chance , before the sacred steps , and were relating all these things as they had happened , [Baucis]926-baucis saw [Philemon]927-philemon , [[her]6748-my dear wife old husband]7116-her old husband , and [he]7116-her old husband , too , saw [Baucis]926-baucis , as [their]2851-they bodies put forth leaves ; and while the tops of trees grew over [them]2851-they , above [their]2851-they faces , — [they]2851-they spoke each to [each]7117-each ; as long as [they]2851-they could speak [they]2851-they said , ‘ Farewell , farewell , [my]2854-the people of tyana own ’ — and while [they]2851-they said farewell ; new leaves and branches covered both at once . “[2854-the people of tyana] [The people of [Tyana]253-tyana]2854-the people of tyana still point out two trees which grew there from a double trunk , two forms made into one . [Old truthful men]2855-old truthful men , who have no reason to deceive [me]0-i , told [me]0-i truly all that [I]0-i have told to [you]2856-you , and [I]0-i have seen the votive wreaths hung from the branches of the hallowed double - tree . And one time , as [I]0-i hung fresh garlands there , [I]0-i said , ‘ Those whom [the Gods]1395-the gods care for are [Gods]6543-gods ! And those who worshiped are now worshiped here . ’ ” [He]2859-o valiant hero ceased , and this miraculous event , and [he]2859-o valiant hero who told it , had astonished [them]2854-the people of tyana . But [Theseus]856-theseus above all . [The hero]5496-the hero asked to hear of other wonders wrought by [Gods]456-jove . [The Calydonian River - God]457-the calydonian river - god replied , and leaning on one elbow , said to [him]5496-the hero : “[0-i] There are , [O valiant hero]2859-o valiant hero , other things whose forms once - changed as these , have so remained , but there are [some who take on many shapes]2860-some who take on many shapes , as [you]2856-you have , [Proteus]928-proteus , dweller of [the deep]1961-the deep — the deep whose arms embrace [the earth]1289-the earth . For [some]4905-some have seen [you]2856-you as [a youth]2864-a youth , then as a lion , a furious boar one time , [a serpent next , so dreadful to the touch]2865-a serpent next , so dreadful to the touch — and sometimes horns have made [you]2856-you seem a bull — or now a stone , or now a tree , or now a slipping stream , or even — [the foe of water — next a fire]2866-the foe of water — next a fire . ” Now [[Erysichthon]929-erysichthon 's daughter]7119-erysichthon 's daughter , [Mestra]930-mestra , had that power of [Proteus]928-proteus — [she]930-mestra was called [the wife of deft Autolycus]7120-the wife of deft autolycus . — [[Her]930-mestra father]5022-her father spurned the majesty of [all the Gods]5318-all the gods , and gave no honor to [their]5318-all the gods altars . It is said [he]5022-her father violated with an impious axe [the sacred grove of [Ceres]758-ceres]7123-the sacred grove of ceres , and [he]5022-her father cut [her]758-ceres trees with iron . Long - standing in [[her]758-ceres grove]7124-her grove there grew an ancient oak tree , spread so wide , alone it seemed [a standing forest]7125-a standing forest ; and [its]7124-her grove trunk and branches held memorials , as , fillets , tablets , garlands , witnessing how many prayers [the goddess Ceres]7126-the goddess ceres granted . And underneath [it]7124-her grove laughing [Dryads]931-dryads loved to whirl in festal dances , hand in hand , encircling its enormous trunk , that thrice five ells might measure ; and to such a height [it]7124-her grove towered over all the trees around , as they were higher than the grass beneath . But [Erysichthon]929-erysichthon , heedless of all things , ordered [[his]929-erysichthon slaves]7127-his slaves to fell the sacred oak , and as [they]7127-his slaves hesitated , in a rage [the wretch]7045-the wretch snatched from the hand of one an axe , and said , “[0-i] If this should be the only oak loved by [the goddess of [this very grove]2868-this very grove]2867-the goddess of this very grove , or even were the goddess in this tree , [I]0-i 'll level to the ground its leafy head . ” So boasted [he]929-erysichthon , and while [he]929-erysichthon swung on high [his]929-erysichthon axe to strike a slanting blow , the oak beloved of [Ceres]758-ceres , uttered a deep groan and shuddered . Instantly its dark green leaves turned pale , and all its acorns lost their green , and even its long branches drooped [their]7127-his slaves arms . But when [his]929-erysichthon impious hand had struck the trunk , and cut its bark , red blood poured from the wound , — as when [a weighty sacrificial bull]7129-a weighty sacrificial bull has fallen at the altar , streaming blood spouts from [his]7129-a weighty sacrificial bull stricken neck . [All]5537-all were amazed . And one of [[his]929-erysichthon attendants]7131-his attendants boldly tried to stay [his]929-erysichthon cruel axe , and hindered [him]929-erysichthon ; but [Erysichthon]929-erysichthon , fixing [his]929-erysichthon stern eyes upon [him]929-erysichthon , said , “[0-i] Let this , then , be the price of all [your]0-i pious worship ! ” So [he]929-erysichthon turned the poised axe from the tree , and clove [his]929-erysichthon head sheer from [his]929-erysichthon body , and again began to chop the hard oak . From the heart of it these words were uttered ; “[0-i] Covered by the bark of this oak tree [I]0-i long have dwelt [a Nymph]2869-a nymph , [beloved of [Ceres]758-ceres]2870-beloved of ceres , and before [my]0-i death it has been granted [me]0-i to prophesy , that [I]0-i may die contented . Punishment for this vile deed stands waiting at [your]0-i side . ” No warning could avert [his]929-erysichthon wicked arm . Much weakened by [his]929-erysichthon countless blows , the tree , pulled down by straining ropes , gave way at last and leveled with its weight uncounted trees that grew around it . Terrified and shocked , [the sister - dryads]7132-the sister - dryads , grieving for the grove and what [they]7132-the sister - dryads lost , put on [their]7132-the sister - dryads sable robes and hastened unto [Ceres]758-ceres , whom [they]7132-the sister - dryads prayed , might rightly punish [Erysichthon]929-erysichthon 's crime ; — [the lovely goddess]7133-the lovely goddess granted [their]7132-the sister - dryads request , and by the gracious movement of [her]7133-the lovely goddess head [she]7133-the lovely goddess shook [the fruitful , cultivated fields]7134-the fruitful , cultivated fields , then heavy with the harvest ; and [she]7133-the lovely goddess planned an unexampled punishment deserved , and not beyond [his]929-erysichthon miserable crimes — the grisly bane of famine ; but because it is not in the scope of Destiny , that [two such deities]7135-two such deities should ever meet as [Ceres]758-ceres and gaunt [Famine]932-famine , — calling forth from [mountain - wilds]7136-mountain - wilds a rustic [Oread]933-oread , [the goddess Ceres]7126-the goddess ceres , said to [her]2873-her , “[934-torpid - frost] There is [an ice - bound wilderness of barren soil]2871-an ice - bound wilderness of barren soil in [utmost Scythia]4-scythia , desolate and bare of trees and corn , where [Torpid - Frost]934-torpid - frost , White - Death and Palsy and Gaunt - Famine , hold [their]2872-their haunts ; go there now , and command that Famine flit from there ; and let [her]2873-her gnawing - essence pierce the entrails of [this sacrilegious wretch]2874-this sacrilegious wretch , and there be hidden — Let [her]2873-her vanquish [me]0-i and overcome the utmost power of food . Heed not misgivings of the journey 's length , for [you]2875-you will guide [my]0-i dragon - bridled car through lofty ether . ” And [she]7133-the lovely goddess gave to [her]7133-the lovely goddess the reins ; and so [the swiftly carried Nymph]7138-the swiftly carried nymph arrived in [Scythia]4-scythia . There , upon the told of [steepy Caucasus]54-caucasus , when [she]7133-the lovely goddess had slipped [their]2872-their tight yoke from the dragons ' harnessed necks , [she]7133-the lovely goddess searched for [Famine]932-famine in [that granite land]7139-that granite land , and there [she]7133-the lovely goddess found [her]932-famine clutching at scant herbs , with nails and teeth . Beneath [her]932-famine shaggy hair [her]932-famine hollow eyes glared in [her]932-famine ghastly face , [her]932-famine lips were filthy and [her]932-famine throat was rough and blotched , and all [her]932-famine entrails could be seen , enclosed in nothing but [her]932-famine shriveled skin ; [her]932-famine crooked loins were dry uncovered bones , and where [her]932-famine belly should be was a void ; [her]932-famine flabby breast was flat against [her]932-famine spine ; [her]932-famine lean , emaciated body made [her]932-famine joints appear so large , [her]932-famine knobbled knees seemed large knots , and [her]932-famine swollen ankle - bones protruded . When [the Nymph , with keen sight]7140-the nymph , with keen sight , saw [the Famine - monster]7141-the famine - monster , fearing to draw near [she]7140-the nymph , with keen sight cried aloud the mandate [she]7140-the nymph , with keen sight had brought from fruitful [Ceres]758-ceres , and although the time had been but brief , and [Famine]932-famine far away , such hunger seized [the Nymph]5012-the nymph , [she]7140-the nymph , with keen sight had to turn [her]7140-the nymph , with keen sight dragon - steeds , and flee through yielding air and the high clouds ; — at [Thessaly]27-thessaly [she]7140-the nymph , with keen sight stopped . [Grim Famine]932-famine hastened to obey the will of [Ceres]758-ceres , though [their]7143-their deeds are opposite , and rapidly through [ether heights]7144-ether heights was borne to [[Erysichthon]929-erysichthon 's home]7145-erysichthon 's home . When [she]7140-the nymph , with keen sight arrived at midnight , slumber was upon [the wretch]7045-the wretch , and as [she]7140-the nymph , with keen sight folded [him]7045-the wretch in [her]7140-the nymph , with keen sight two wings , [she]7140-the nymph , with keen sight breathed [her]7140-the nymph , with keen sight pestilential poison through [his]7045-the wretch mouth and throat and breast , and spread the curse of utmost hunger in [his]7045-the wretch aching veins . When all was done as [Ceres]758-ceres had decreed , [she]7140-the nymph , with keen sight left [the fertile world]7147-the fertile world for [bleak abodes]7148-bleak abodes , and [[her]7140-the nymph , with keen sight accustomed caves]7149-her accustomed caves . While this was done sweet Sleep with charming pinion soothed the mind of [Erysichthon]929-erysichthon . In a dreamful feast [he]7045-the wretch worked [his]7045-the wretch jaws in vain , and ground [his]7045-the wretch teeth , and swallowed air as [his]7045-the wretch imagined food ; till wearied with the effort [he]7045-the wretch awoke to hunger scorching as a fire , which burned [his]7045-the wretch entrails and compelled [his]7045-the wretch raging jaws , so [he]7045-the wretch , demanding all the foods of [sea and earth]1557-sea and earth and air , raged of [his]7045-the wretch hunger , while the tables groaned with heaps before [him]7045-the wretch spread ; [he]7045-the wretch , banqueting , sought banquets for more food , and as [he]7045-the wretch gorged [he]7045-the wretch always wanted more . The food of [cities]4943-cities and [a nation]7152-a nation failed to satisfy the cravings of [one man]6498-one man . The more [his]7045-the wretch stomach gets , the more it needs — even as [the ocean]1288-the ocean takes [the streams of earth]7155-the streams of earth , although it swallows up [great rivers drawn from [lands remote]7157-lands remote]7156-great rivers drawn from lands remote , it never can be filled nor satisfied . And as devouring fire its fuel refuses never , but consumes unnumbered beams of wood , and burns for more the more ' tis fed , and from abundance gains increasing famine , so the raving jaws of [wretched Erysichthon]929-erysichthon , ever craved all food in [him]7045-the wretch , was on]y cause of food , and what [he]7045-the wretch ate made only room for more . And after Famine through [his]7045-the wretch gluttony at last had wasted [his]7045-the wretch ancestral wealth [his]7045-the wretch raging hunger suffered no decline , and [his]7045-the wretch insatiate gluttony increased . When all [his]7045-the wretch wealth at last was eaten up , [[his]7045-the wretch daughter]5054-his daughter , worthy of a fate more kind , alone was left to [him]7045-the wretch and [her]5054-his daughter [he]7045-the wretch sold . [Descendant of [a noble race]1981-a noble race]7159-descendant of a noble race , [the girl]7161-the girl refusing to be purchased as [a slave]7162-a slave , then hastened to [the near shore of the sea]7163-the near shore of the sea , and as [she]7161-the girl stretched [her]7161-the girl arms above the waves , implored [kind Neptune]472-neptune with [her]7161-the girl tears , “[2875-you] Oh , [you]2876-you who have deprived [me]0-i of virginity , deliver [me]0-i from [such a master]2877-such a master 's power ! ” Although [the master]7164-the master , seeking [her]7161-the girl , had seen [her]7161-the girl only at that moment , [Neptune]472-neptune changed [her]7161-the girl quickly from [a woman]5609-a woman to [a man]5610-a man , by giving [her]7161-the girl the features of [a man]5610-a man and garments proper to [a fisher - man]7168-a fisher - man : and there [she]7161-the girl stood . [He]472-neptune even looked at [her]7161-the girl and cried out , “[2876-you] Hey , there ! [Expert of the rod]2878-expert of the rod ! While [you]2879-you are casting forth the bit of brass , concealed so deftly in its tiny bait , — [gods - willing !]2880-gods - willing ! let [the sea]1298-the sea be smooth for [you]2879-you , and let the foolish fishes swimming up , never know danger till [they]2882-they snap the hook ! Now tell [me]0-i where is [she]2883-her , who only now , in tattered garment and wind - twisted hair , was standing on [this shore]2884-this shore — for [I]0-i am sure [I]0-i saw [her]2883-her standing on [this shore]2884-this shore , although no footstep shows [her]2883-her flight . ” By this assured the favor of [the god]5013-the god protected [her]2883-her ; delighted to be questioned of [herself]2883-her , [she]2883-her said , “[2883-her] No matter who [you]2886-you are , excuse [me]0-i . So busy have [I]0-i been at catching fish , [I]0-i have not had the time to move [my]0-i eyes from [this pool]2887-this pool ; and that [you]2886-you may be assured [I]0-i only tell the truth , may [Neptune]472-neptune , [God of [ocean]2889-ocean]2888-god of ocean witness it , [I]0-i have not seen [a man where [I]0-i am standing on [this shore]2884-this shore]2890-a man where i am standing on this shore — [myself]0-i excepted — not [a woman]5609-a woman has stood [here]2893-here . ” [[Her]2883-her master]7170-her master could not doubt it , and deceived retraced [his]7170-her master footsteps from [the sandy shore]7171-the sandy shore . As soon as [he]7170-her master had disappeared , [her]2883-her form unchanged , was given back to [her]2883-her . But when [[her]2883-her father]5022-her father knew [[his]5022-her father daughter]5054-his daughter could transform [her]5054-his daughter body and escape , [he]5022-her father often sold [her]5054-his daughter first to one and then another — [all of whom [she]5054-his daughter cheated]7174-all of whom she cheated — as a mare , bird , a cow , or as a stag [she]5054-his daughter got away ; and so brought food , dishonestly , to ease [his]5022-her father greed . And so [he]5022-her father lived until the growing strength of famine , gnawing at [his]5022-her father vitals , had consumed all [he]5022-her father could get by selling [her]5054-his daughter : [his]5022-her father anguish burned [him]5022-her father with increasing heat . [He]5022-her father gnawed [his]5022-her father own flesh , and [he]5022-her father tore [his]5022-her father limbs and fed [his]5022-her father body all [he]5022-her father took from it . ah , why should [I]5609-a woman dwell on the wondrous deeds of [others]4906-others — Even [I]5609-a woman , [O gathered youths]7176-o gathered youths , have such a power [I]5609-a woman can often change [my]5609-a woman body till [my]5609-a woman limit has been reached . A while appearing in [my]5609-a woman real form , another moment coiled up as a snake , then as [a monarch of the herd]7177-a monarch of the herd [my]5609-a woman strength increases in [my]5609-a woman horns — [my]5609-a woman strength increased in [my]5609-a woman two horns when [I]5609-a woman had two — but now [my]5609-a woman forehead , as [you]2894-you see , has lost one horn . And having ended with such words , — [he]5609-a woman groaned . To [him]5609-a woman [the hero , who proclaimed [himself]7178-the hero , who proclaimed himself a favored son of neptune [a favored son of Neptune]7179-a favored son of neptune]7178-the hero , who proclaimed himself a favored son of neptune , answered now ; “[5609-a woman] Declare the reason of [your]2894-you heavy sighs , and how [your]2894-you horn was broken ? ” And at once [the Calydonian River - God]457-the calydonian river - god replied , binding with reeds [his]5609-a woman unadorned rough locks : “[5609-a woman] It is a mournful task [you]2894-you have required , for who can wish to tell [his]2895-his own disgrace ? But truly [I]0-i shall speak without disguise , for [my]0-i defeat , if rightly understood , should be [my]0-i glory . — Even to have fought in battle with [a hero of such might]2896-a hero of such might , affords [me]0-i consolation . “ [Deianira]935-deianira ( [you]2894-you may have heard some tales of [her]935-deianira ) was once the envied hope of many . [She]935-deianira was then [a lovely virgin]7180-a lovely virgin . — [I]919-parthaon , among [the rest who loved [this maiden]7182-this maiden]7181-the rest who loved this maiden , entered [the fair home of [[her]935-deianira great father]7184-her great father [Oeneus]936-oeneus]7183-the fair home of her great father oeneus , and [I]919-parthaon said ; “[919-parthaon] ‘ Consider all [my]0-i claims , [[Parthaon]919-parthaon 's son]2897-parthaon 's son , for [I]0-i am come to plead [[your]919-parthaon daughter]2230-your daughter 's cause and [mine]0-i — So [you]919-parthaon may make [me]0-i [son - in - law]2899-son - in - law . , — ’ no sooner was it said , than [Hercules]857-hercules in such words also claimed [the virgin]5026-the virgin 's hand : all others quickly yielded to [our]2901-our claims . “ [He]857-hercules boasted [his]857-hercules descent from [Jupiter]475-jupiter ; the glory of [his]857-hercules labors and great deeds performed at [[his]857-hercules unjust stepmother]7185-his unjust stepmother 's wish . “[857-hercules] But as [he]857-hercules was not then [a God]4898-a god , it seemed disgraceful if [my]0-i state should yield [my]0-i right ; so [I]0-i contended with these haughty words , ‘ Why should this alien of [a foreign land]2903-a foreign land , contending for [[your]919-parthaon daughter]2230-your daughter , match [himself]857-hercules to [me]0-i ! king of [the waters in [this realm]2906-this realm]2905-the waters in this realm ! For as [I]0-i wind around , across [[your]919-parthaon lands]2038-your lands , [I]0-i must be of [[your]919-parthaon people]2908-your people , and a part of [your]919-parthaon great state . Oh , let it not be said , because [the jealous Juno]488-juno had no thought to punish [me]0-i by labors , [my]0-i descent is not so regal ! This tremendous boast , that [you]919-parthaon , [[Alcmena]786-alcmena 's son]2909-alcmena 's son , are sprung from Jove , falls at the touch of truth ; — or it reveals the shame of [a weak mother]2910-a weak mother , who so gained [your]919-parthaon doubtful glory of descent from Heaven ! Prove [your]919-parthaon descent from [Jupiter]475-jupiter is false , or else confess [you]919-parthaon are [the son of shame]2911-the son of shame ! ’ “ But [Hercules]857-hercules , unable to control the flame of [his]475-jupiter great wrath , scowled as [I]475-jupiter spoke . [He]857-hercules briefly answered [me]475-jupiter , ‘ [My]475-jupiter hand excels [my]475-jupiter tongue ; let [me]475-jupiter now overcome in fight , and [I]475-jupiter may suffer [your]475-jupiter offence of words . ’ “[475-jupiter] Full of unvented rage [he]475-jupiter rushed on [me]0-i , but firm [I]0-i stood , ashamed to yield a foot — [I]0-i had so largely boasted , no retreat was left , and so [I]0-i doffed [my]0-i green robe — Striking guard , with clenched hands doubled at [my]0-i breast , [I]0-i stood [my]0-i ground . [He]475-jupiter scooped up in [his]475-jupiter hand fine , yellow dust ; and tossed it on the air so that the tawny powder sprinkled [us]2912-us ; quick - shifting then [he]475-jupiter sought to strike [my]0-i neck , or feint at [my]0-i quick - moving legs , and turn swift moving to attack [me]0-i at all points . But as [a huge cliff in [the sea]1298-the sea]2913-a huge cliff in the sea remains unmoved , unshaken by the sounding waves , so [my]0-i great size , against [his]475-jupiter vain attacks , defended [me]0-i securely — Back [we]2912-us went ; retiring for a space ; then rushed again together , furious , and with foot to foot , determined not to yield , defiant stood , till , forward - bending from [my]0-i waist and hips , [I]0-i pressed [my]0-i forehead against [his]475-jupiter and locked [his]475-jupiter fingers into mine : so , have [I]0-i seen [two strong bulls]2915-two strong bulls rush in combat for the good of [some smooth heifer in [the pasture]2917-the pasture]2916-some smooth heifer in the pasture — while [the herd]2918-the herd a - tremble and uncertain , wait ; ready to give allegiance to [the one most worthy of dominion]2919-the one most worthy of dominion . “ Thrice in vain [Hercules]857-hercules strove to push [my]0-i breast from [his]857-hercules , but [I]0-i pressed ever closer — till , the fourth attempt succeeding , [he]857-hercules unloosed [my]0-i grip , and breaking from [my]0-i circling arms drew back , and struck [me]0-i such a buffet with [his]857-hercules hand , it twisted [me]0-i about , and instantly [he]857-hercules clung with all [his]857-hercules weight upon [my]0-i back — “[0-i] Believe [me]0-i [I]0-i have not suppressed the truth . Nor shall [I]0-i try to gain applause not due : [I]0-i seemed to bear a mountain on [my]0-i back . — straining and dripping sweat , [I]0-i broke [his]2920-his hold , — with great exertion [I]0-i unlocked [his]2920-his grip . [He]2920-his pressed upon [me]0-i , as [I]0-i strained for breath , preventing a renewal of [my]0-i strength , and seized upon [my]0-i neck . Then at the last , [my]0-i bent knee went down on [the gritty earth]2921-the gritty earth , [I]0-i bit the sand . So , worsted in [my]0-i strength , [I]0-i sought diversion by an artifice , and changed [me]0-i to a serpent . — [I]0-i then slipped from [his]2920-his tight clutches [my]0-i great length , and coiled [my]0-i body now transformed to snaky folds — hissing [I]0-i darted [my]0-i divided tongue . “ But [Hercules]857-hercules , [Alcides]937-alcides , only laughed and in derision of [my]0-i scheming , said , ‘ It was the pastime of [my]0-i cradle days to strangle better snakes than [you]0-i — and though [your]0-i great length may excel all of [your]0-i kind , how small a part of that Lernaean snake would [you]0-i — one serpent be ? [It]7186-it grew from wounds [I]0-i gave ( at first it had one hundred heads ) and every time [I]0-i severed one head from its neck two grew there in the place of one , by which its strength increased . This creature then outbranching with strong serpents , sprung from death and thriving on destruction , [I]0-i destroyed . — What do [you]0-i think will then become of [you]0-i , disguised so in deceitful serpent - form , wielding a borrowed weapon not [your]0-i own “[0-i] And after [he]2920-his had ridiculed [me]0-i thus , [he]2920-his gouged [his]2920-his fingers underneath [my]0-i jaws , so that [my]0-i throat was tortured , as if squeezed with forceps , while [I]0-i struggled in [his]2920-his grip . “ Twice was [I]2920-his vanquished , there remained to [me]2920-his a third form so again [I]2920-his changed to seem [a savage bull]7187-a savage bull , and with [my]2920-his limbs renewed in that form fought once more . [He]2920-his threw [his]2920-his arms about the left side of [my]2920-his ponderous neck , and dragging on [me]2920-his followed as [I]2920-his ran . [He]2920-his seized on [my]2920-his hard horns , and , tugging turned and twisted [me]2920-his , until [he]2920-his fastened them firm in the surface of [the earth]1289-the earth ; and pushed [me]2920-his , helpless , to the shifting sand beneath . Not yet content [he]2920-his laid [his]2920-his fierce right hand on [my]2920-his tough horn , and broke and tore it from [my]2920-his mutilated head . — This horn , now heaped with fruits delicious and sweet - smelling flowers , [the Naiads]6363-the naiads have held sacred from that hour , devoted to [the bounteous goddess Plenty]7190-the bounteous goddess plenty . ’ All this [the River - god]7191-the river - god said ; then a nymph , a lovely nymph like [fair Diana dressed , whose locks were flowing down on either side]7192-fair diana dressed , whose locks were flowing down on either side , came graceful to the board , and brought to [them]6363-the naiads of Autumn 's plenty in an ample horn , and gave to [them]6363-the naiads selected apples for a second course . And now , as early dawn appeared , and as the rising sunlight flashed on [golden summits of [surrounding hills]7194-surrounding hills]7193-golden summits of surrounding hills , [the young men]6969-the young men waited not until [the stream]5090-the stream subsiding , had resumed its peaceful way , but all arose , reluctant , and went forth . Then [Achelous]922-achelous , in [his]922-achelous moving waves , hid [his]922-achelous fine rustic features and [his]922-achelous head , scarred by the wound which gave the Horn of Plenty . Loss of [his]922-achelous horn had greatly humbled [him]922-achelous , it was so cherished though [his]922-achelous only loss , — but [he]922-achelous could hide the sad disgrace with reeds and willow boughs entwined about [his]922-achelous head . O , [Nessus]938-nessus ! [your]938-nessus fierce passion for [the same maid]7197-the same maid utterly destroyed even [you]938-nessus , pierced through the body by a flying arrow - point . Returning to [the city of]7198-the city of [his]922-achelous birth great [Hercules]857-hercules , [the son of [Jupiter]475-jupiter]5400-the son of jupiter , with [[his]922-achelous new bride]7200-his new bride , arrived upon [the bank of [swift Evenus]256-swift evenus]7201-the bank of swift evenus — after winter rains had swollen [it]7201-the bank of swift evenus so far beyond [its]7201-the bank of swift evenus wo nt , that , full of eddies , it was found to be impassable . [The hero]5496-the hero stood there , brave but anxious for [[his]5496-the hero bride]2050-his bride . [Nessus]938-nessus , [the centaur]5348-the centaur , strong - limbed and well - acquainted with [those fords]7205-those fords , came up to [him]5496-the hero and said , “[2920-his] Plunge in the flood and swim with unimpeded strength — for with [my]0-i help [she]2922-she will land safely over there . ” And so [the hero]5496-the hero , with no thought of doubt , trusted [the damsel to the centaur]7207-the damsel to the centaur 's care , though [she]2922-she was pale and trembling with [her]2922-she fear of [the swift river]7208-the swift river and the centaur 's aid . This done , [the hero]5496-the hero , burdened as [he]5496-the hero was with quiver and the lion skin ( for [he]5496-the hero had tossed [his]5496-the hero club and curving bow across [the river]6228-the river to the other bank ) , declared , “[0-i] Since [I]0-i have undertaken it , at once [this rushing water]2923-this rushing water must be overcome . ” And instantly , [he]5496-the hero plunged in without thought of where [he]5496-the hero might cross with most ease , for so [he]5496-the hero scorned to take advantage of smooth water . And after [he]5496-the hero had gained [the other bank]6223-the other bank , while picking up [his]5496-the hero bow which there was thrown , [he]5496-the hero heard [[his]5496-the hero wife]1380-his wife 's voice , anxious for [his]5496-the hero help . [He]5496-the hero called to [Nessus]938-nessus who was in the act then to betray [his]5496-the hero trust : “[0-i] Vain confidence ! [You]2924-you are not swift enough , [vile ravisher]2925-vile ravisher ! [[You]2924-you two - formed monster [Nessus]938-nessus]2926-you two - formed monster nessus , [I]0-i warn [you]2924-you ! Hear [me]0-i , and never dare to come between [me]0-i and [my]0-i love . If fear has no restraint , [[your]2924-you father]5123-your father 's dreadful fate on whirling wheel , should frighten [you]2924-you from this outrageous act : for [you]2924-you can not escape , although [you]2924-you trust the fleet - foot effort of a rapid horse . [I]0-i can not overtake [you]2924-you with [my]0-i feet but [I]0-i can shoot and halt [you]2924-you with a wound . ” [his]0-i deed sustained the final warning word . [He]0-i shot an arrow through [the centaur]5348-the centaur 's back , so that the keen barb was exposed beyond [his]0-i bleeding breast . [He]0-i tore it from both wounds , and life - blood spurted instantly , mixed with the deadly poison of Lernaean hydra . This [Nessus]938-nessus caught , and muttering , “[0-i] [I]0-i shall not die unavenged ” , [he]938-nessus gave [his]938-nessus tunic , soaked with blood to [Deianira]935-deianira as a gift ; and said , “[0-i] Keep this to strengthen waning love . ” Now many years passed by , and all the deeds , and labors of [the mighty Hercules]857-hercules , gave to [the wide world]5803-the wide world [his]938-nessus unequalled fame ; and finally appeased the hatred of [[his]938-nessus fierce stepmother]7215-his fierce stepmother . All victorious returning from [Oechalia]257-oechalia , [he]938-nessus prepared to offer sacrifice , when at [Cenaeum]258-cenaeum , upon an altar [he]938-nessus had built to [Jupiter]475-jupiter , but tattling Rumor , swollen out of truth from small beginning to a wicked lie , declared [brave Hercules]857-hercules , [[Amphitryon]785-amphitryon 's son]7216-amphitryon 's son , was burning for the love of [Iole]939-iole . And [Deianira]935-deianira — [[his]938-nessus fond wife]7217-his fond wife — convinced [herself]935-deianira , the wicked rumor must be true . Alarmed at the report of [his]938-nessus new love , at first , [poor wife]7218-poor wife , [she]7218-poor wife was dissolved in tears , and then [she]7218-poor wife sank in grievous misery . But soon in angry mood , [she]935-deianira rose and said : “[0-i] Why should [I]0-i give up to [my]0-i sorrow while [I]0-i drown [my]0-i wretched spirit in weak tears ? Let [me]0-i consider an effectual check — while it is possible — even before [she]2928-she comes , invader of [[my]0-i lawful bed]2929-my lawful bed : shall [I]0-i be silent or complain of it ? Must [I]0-i go back to [Calydon]187-calydon or stay ? Shall [I]0-i depart unbidden , from [[my]0-i house]2930-my house ? Or , if no other method can prevail , shall [I]0-i oppose [[my]0-i rival]1615-my rival 's first approach ? [O shade of [Meleager]895-meleager]2932-o shade of meleager , let [me]0-i prove [I]0-i am yet worthy to be called [[your]2933-your sister]6473-your sister ; and in the desperate slaughter of [this rival]2935-this rival , [the world]1360-the world , astonished , may be taught to fear the vengeance of [an injured woman]2937-an injured woman 's rage . ” So , torn by many moods , at last [her]2937-an injured woman mind fixed on one thought : — [she]2937-an injured woman might still keep [his]895-meleager love , could certainly restore it , if [she]2937-an injured woman sent to [him]895-meleager the tunic soaked in [Nessus]938-nessus ' blood . Unknowingly , [she]2937-an injured woman gave the fatal cause of [her]2937-an injured woman own woe to trusting [Lichas]940-lichas , whom [she]2937-an injured woman urged in gentle words to take the gift , from [her]2937-an injured woman to [[her]2937-an injured woman loved husband]7219-her loved husband [Hercules]857-hercules . [He]857-hercules , unsuspecting , put the tunic on , all covered with Lernaean hydra 's poison . [The hero]5496-the hero then was casting frankincense into the sacred flames , and pouring wine on marble altars , as [his]5496-the hero holy prayers were floating to [the Gods]1395-the gods . The hallowed heat striking upon [his]5496-the hero poisoned vesture , caused Echidna - bane to melt into [his]5496-the hero flesh . As long as [he]5496-the hero was able [he]5496-the hero withstood the torture . [His]5496-the hero great fortitude was strong . But when at last [his]5496-the hero anguish overcame even [his]5496-the hero endurance , [he]5496-the hero filled all the wild of [Oeta]19-oeta with [his]5496-the hero cries : [he]5496-the hero overturned those hallowed altars , then in frenzied haste [he]5496-the hero strove to pull the tunic from [his]5496-the hero back . The poisoned garment , cleaving to [him]5496-the hero , ripped [his]5496-the hero skin , heat - shriveled , from [his]5496-the hero burning flesh . Or , tightening on [him]5496-the hero , as [his]5496-the hero great strength pulled , stripped with it the great muscles from [his]5496-the hero limbs , leaving [his]5496-the hero huge bones bare . Even [his]5496-the hero blood audibly hissed , as red - hot blades when they are plunged in water , so the burning bane boiled in [his]5496-the hero veins . Great perspiration streamed from [his]5496-the hero dissolving body , as the heat consumed [his]5496-the hero entrails ; and [his]5496-the hero sinews cracked , brittle when burnt . The marrow in [his]5496-the hero bones dissolved , as it absorbed the venom - heat . There was no limit to [his]5496-the hero misery ; raising both hands up towards the stars of heaven , [he]5496-the hero cried , “[488-juno] Come [Juno]488-juno , feast upon [my]0-i death ; feast on [me]0-i , [cruel one]2938-cruel one , look down from [your]488-juno exalted seat ; behold [my]0-i dreadful end and glut [your]488-juno savage heart ! Oh , if [I]0-i may deserve some pity from [[my]0-i enemy]5319-my enemy , from [you]488-juno [I]0-i mean , this hateful life of [mine]0-i take from [me]0-i — sick with cruel suffering and only born for toil . The loss of life will be a boon to [me]0-i , and surely is a fitting boon , such as [stepmothers]2940-stepmothers give ! “ Was it for this [I]2940-stepmothers slew [Busiris]941-busiris , who defiled [his]941-busiris temples with [the strangers]7222-the strangers ' blood ? For this [I]2940-stepmothers took [[his]941-busiris mother]1520-his mother 's strength from fierce antaeus — that [I]2940-stepmothers did not show a fear before [the Spanish shepherd]7224-the spanish shepherd 's triple form ? Nor did [I]2940-stepmothers fear the monstrous triple form of [Cerberus]655-cerberus . — And is it possible [my]2940-stepmothers hands once seized and broke the strong bull 's horns ? And [Elis]700-elis knows [their]7225-their labor , and the waves of [Stymphalus]259-stymphalus , and [the Parthenian woods]7226-the parthenian woods . For this the prowess of these hands secured the Amazonian girdle wrought of gold ; and did [my]2940-stepmothers strong arms , gather all in vain the fruit when guarded by the dragon 's eyes . [The centaurs]7227-the centaurs could not foil [me]2940-stepmothers , nor the boar that ravaged in [Arcadian fruitful fields]7228-arcadian fruitful fields . Was it for this [the hydra]7229-the hydra could not gain double the strength from strength as it was lost ? And when [I]2940-stepmothers saw the steeds of [Thrace]148-thrace , so fat with human blood , and [[their]7227-the centaurs vile mangers]7230-their vile mangers heaped with mangled bodies , in a righteous rage [I]2940-stepmothers threw [them]7227-the centaurs to the ground , and slaughtered [them]7227-the centaurs , together with [[their]7227-the centaurs master]5532-their master ! In a cave [I]2940-stepmothers crushed [the Nemean monster]7232-the nemean monster with these arms ; and [my]2940-stepmothers strong neck upheld the wide - spread sky ! And even [the cruel Juno]7233-the cruel juno , [wife of [Jove]456-jove]7234-wife of jove — is weary of imposing heavy toils , but [I]2940-stepmothers am not subdued performing them . “[2940-stepmothers] A new calamity now crushes [me]0-i , which not [my]0-i strength , nor valor , nor the use of weapons can resist . Devouring flames have preyed upon [my]0-i limbs , and blasting heat now shrivels the burnt tissue of [my]0-i frame . But still [Eurystheus]942-eurystheus is alive and well ! And there are [those who yet believe in Gods]2941-those who yet believe in gods ! ” Just as a wild bull , in whose body spears are rankling , while [the frightened hunter]7235-the frightened hunter flies away for safety , so [the hero]5496-the hero ranged over sky - piercing [Oeta]19-oeta ; [his]5496-the hero huge groans , [his]5496-the hero awful shrieks resounding in [those cliffs]7237-those cliffs . At times [he]5496-the hero struggles with the poisoned robe . Goaded to fury , [he]5496-the hero has razed great trees , and scattered [the vast mountain rocks]7238-the vast mountain rocks around ! And stretched [his]5496-the hero arms towards [[his]5496-the hero ancestral skies]7239-his ancestral skies ! So , in [his]5496-the hero frenzy , as [he]5496-the hero wandered there , [he]5496-the hero chanced upon the trembling [Lichas]940-lichas , crouched in the close covert of [a hollow rock]7240-a hollow rock . Then in a savage fury [he]5496-the hero cried out , “[2941-those who yet believe in gods] Was it [you]2942-you , [Lichas]940-lichas , brought this fatal gift ?
