Shall [you]2942-you be called the author of [my]0-i death ? ” [Lichas]940-lichas , in terror , groveled at [his]5496-the hero feet , and begged for mercy — “[2942-you] Only let [me]0-i live ! ” But seizing on [him]940-lichas , [the crazed Hero]7241-the crazed hero whirled [him]940-lichas thrice and once again about [his]940-lichas head , and hurled [him]940-lichas , shot as by a catapult , into [the waves of [the Euboic Sea]260-the euboic sea]7242-the waves of the euboic sea . While [he]940-lichas was hanging in the air , [his]940-lichas form was hardened ; as , [we]7243-we know , rain drops may first be frozen by the cold air , and then change to snow , and as it falls through whirling winds may press , so twisted , into round hailstones : even so has ancient lore declared that when strong arms hurled [Lichas]940-lichas through the mountain air through fear , [his]940-lichas blood was curdled in [his]940-lichas veins . No moisture left in [him]940-lichas , [he]940-lichas was transformed into a flint - rock . Even to this day , a low crag rising from the waves is seen out of [the deep Euboean Sea]261-the deep euboean sea , and holds the certain outline of [a human form]7244-a human form , so sure]y traced , [the wary sailors]7245-the wary sailors fear to tread upon it , thinking it has life , and [they]7245-the wary sailors have called it [Lichas]940-lichas ever since . But , [O illustrious son of [Jupiter]475-jupiter]7246-o illustrious son of jupiter ! How many of the overspreading trees , thick - growing on [the lofty mountain - peak of [Oeta]19-oeta]7247-the lofty mountain - peak of oeta , did [you]7248-you level to the ground , and heap into a pyre ! And then [you]7248-you bade obedient [Philoctetes]943-philoctetes light a torch beneath it , and then take in recompense [your]7248-you bow with its capacious quiver full of arrows , arms that now again would see [the realm of [Troy]250-troy]7249-the realm of troy . And as [the pyre]7250-the pyre began to kindle with the greedy flames , [you]7248-you spread the Nemean lion skin upon the top , and , club for pillow , [you]7248-you lay down to sleep , as placid as if , with abounding cups of generous wine and crowned with garlands , [you]7248-you were safe , reclining on a banquet - couch . And now on every side the spreading flames were crackling fiercely , as they leaped from [earth]1287-earth upon the careless limbs of [Hercules]857-hercules . [He]857-hercules scorned [their]2943-your power . [The Gods]1395-the gods felt fear for [earth]1287-earth 's defender and [their]1395-the gods sympathy gave pleasure to [Saturnian Jove]944-saturnian jove — [he]0-i knew [their]1395-the gods thought — and joyfully [he]0-i said to [them]1395-the gods : “[2943-your] [Your]2943-your sudden fear is surely [my]0-i delight , [O heavenly Gods]2944-o heavenly gods ! [my]0-i heart is lifted up and joy prevails upon [me]0-i , in the thought that [I]0-i am called [the Father]1574-the father and [the King of [all this grateful race of Gods]2947-all this grateful race of gods]2946-the king of all this grateful race of gods . [I]0-i know [[my]0-i own beloved offspring]2948-my own beloved offspring is secure in [your]2943-your declared protection : [your]2943-your concern may justly evidence [his]2948-my own beloved offspring worth , whose deeds great benefits bestowed . Let not vain thoughts alarm [you]2943-your , nor the rising flames of [Oeta]19-oeta ; for [Hercules]857-hercules who conquered everything , shall conquer equally the spreading fires which now [you]2943-your see : and all that part of [him]857-hercules , celestial — inherited of [me]0-i — immortal , can not feel the power of death . It is not subject to the poison - heat . And therefore , since [his]857-hercules earth - life is now lost , [him]857-hercules [I]0-i 'll translate , unshackled from all dross , and purified , to [[our]2949-our celestial shore]2950-our celestial shore . [I]0-i trust this action seems agreeable to [all the Deities surrounding [me]0-i]2951-all the deities surrounding me . If [any jealous god of heaven]2952-any jealous god of heaven should grieve at the divinity of [Hercules]857-hercules , [he]2952-any jealous god of heaven may begrudge the prize but [he]2952-any jealous god of heaven will know at least ' twas given [him]857-hercules deservedly , and with this thought [he]2952-any jealous god of heaven must approve the deed . ” [The Gods]1395-the gods confirmed it : and though [Juno]488-juno seemed to be contented and to acquiesce , [her]488-juno deep vexation was not wholly hid , when [Jupiter]475-jupiter with [his]475-jupiter concluding words so plainly hinted at [her]488-juno jealous mind . Now , while [the Gods]1395-the gods conversed , the mortal part of [Hercules]857-hercules was burnt by [Mulciber]504-mulciber ; but yet an outline of a spirit - form remained . Unlike the well - known mortal shape derived by nature of [[his]857-hercules mother]1520-his mother , [he]857-hercules kept traces only of [[his]857-hercules father]1530-his father , [Jove]944-saturnian jove . And as a serpent , when it is revived from its old age , casts off the faded skin , and fresh with vigor glitters in new scales , so , when [the hero]5496-the hero had put off all dross , [his]5496-the hero own celestial , wonderful appeared , majestic and of godlike dignity . And [him]5496-the hero , [the glorious father of [the Gods in the great chariot drawn by four swift steeds]7260-the gods in the great chariot drawn by four swift steeds]7259-the glorious father of the gods in the great chariot drawn by four swift steeds , took up above the wide - encircling clouds , and set [him]5496-the hero there amid the glittering stars . Even [Atlas]529-atlas felt the weight of [Heaven]5-heaven increase , but [King Eurystheus]942-eurystheus , still implacable , vented [his]942-eurystheus baffled hatred on [the sons of [the great hero]7262-the great hero]7261-the sons of the great hero . Then [the Argive mother]7263-the argive mother , [Alcmena]786-alcmena , spent and anxious with long cares , the burden of [her]786-alcmena old age and [her]786-alcmena fears , could pass the weary hours with [Iole]939-iole in garrulous narrations of [his]939-iole worth , [his]939-iole mighty labors and [her]786-alcmena own sad days . [Iole]939-iole , by command of [Hercules]857-hercules , had been betrothed to [Hyllus]945-hyllus , and by [him]945-hyllus was gravid , burdened with [a noble child]7264-a noble child . And so to [Iole]939-iole , [Alcmena]786-alcmena told this story of the birth of [Hercules]857-hercules : — “[2952-any jealous god of heaven] Ah , may [the Gods]456-jove be merciful to [you]2953-you and give [you]2953-you swift deliverance in that hour when needful of all help [you]2953-you must call out for [Ilithyia]946-ilithyia , [the known goddess of all frightened mothers in [their]2955-their travail]2954-the known goddess of all frightened mothers in their travail , [she]2954-the known goddess of all frightened mothers in their travail whom [Juno]488-juno 's hatred overcame and made so dreadful against [me]0-i . For , when [my]0-i hour of bearing [Hercules]857-hercules was very near , and when the tenth sign of the zodiac was traversed by the sun , [my]0-i burden then became so heavy , and the one [I]0-i bore so large , [you]2953-you certainly could tell that [Jove]456-jove must be [the father of [the unborn child]2957-the unborn child]2956-the father of the unborn child . “ At last , no longer able to endure — ah [me]0-i , a cold sweat seizes on [me]0-i now ; only to think of it renews [my]0-i pains ! Seven days in agony , as many nights , exhausted in [my]0-i dreadful misery , [I]0-i stretched [my]0-i arms to heaven and invoked [Lucina]752-lucina and [three Nixian deities]7265-three nixian deities [the guardians of birth]7266-the guardians of birth . [Lucina]752-lucina came ; but before then [she]752-lucina had been pledged to give [my]0-i life to [cruel Juno]488-juno . While [Lucina]752-lucina sat on the altar near the door and listened , with [her]752-lucina right knee crossed over [her]752-lucina left knee , with fingers interlocked , [she]752-lucina stopped the birth : and in low muttered tones [she]752-lucina chanted Charms which there prevented [my]0-i deliverance . “[0-i] [I]0-i fiercely struggled , and insane with pain shrieked vain revilings against [Jupiter]475-jupiter ; [I]0-i longed for death , and [my]0-i delirious words then should have moved the most unfeeling rocks . [The Theban matrons]2958-the theban matrons , eager to help [me]0-i , stood near [me]0-i while [they]2958-the theban matrons asked the aid of [Heaven]5-heaven . “ And there was present of [the common class]7267-the common class , [[my]2958-the theban matrons maid]7268-my maid [Galanthis]947-galanthis — with [her]947-galanthis red - gold hair — efficient and most willing to obey [her]947-galanthis worthy character deserved [my]2958-the theban matrons love . [She]947-galanthis felt assured , [Juno]488-juno unjustly worked some spell of strong effect against [my]2958-the theban matrons life . And when [this maid]7269-this maid beheld [Lucina]752-lucina perched so strangely on the altar , with [her]752-lucina fingers inwoven on [her]752-lucina knees and tightly pressed together , in a gripping finger - comb , [she]7269-this maid guessed that jealous [Juno]488-juno was the cause . Quick - witted , in a ringing voice [this maid]7269-this maid cried out , ‘ Congratulations ! All is well ! [Alcmena]786-alcmena is delivered — [a fine child so safely brought forth]7271-a fine child so safely brought forth — [her]786-alcmena true prayers approved ! ’ “[2958-the theban matrons] [Lucina]752-lucina , who presides at birth , surprised leaped up , unclenched [her]752-lucina hands , as one amazed . Just as [her]752-lucina hands unfastened , and [her]752-lucina knees were parted from their stricture , [I]0-i could feel the bonds of stricture loosen ; and without more labor was delivered of [[my]0-i child]2029-my child . “ ' Tis said , [Galanthis]947-galanthis laughed and ridiculed [the cheated deity]7272-the cheated deity ; and as [she]947-galanthis laughed [the vixen goddess]7273-the vixen goddess caught [her]947-galanthis by the hair and dragging [her]947-galanthis upon the ground , while [she]7273-the vixen goddess was struggling to arise , held [her]947-galanthis , and there transformed both of [her]947-galanthis arms to animal forelegs . [Her]2960-her old activity remained ; [her]2960-her hair was not changed , but [she]2960-her did not keep [her]2960-her maiden form : and ever since that day , because [she]2960-her aided with deceitful lips , [[her]2960-her offspring]7274-her offspring are brought forth through the same mouth . Changed to a weasel [she]2960-her dwells now with [me]2960-her . ”[2960-her] When [she]2960-her had ended the sad tale , [she]2960-her heaved a deep sigh , in remembrance of [[her]2960-her tried]2961-her tried , [beloved servant]2962-beloved servant ; and [[her]2960-her daughter - in - law]2963-her daughter - in - law [Iole]939-iole kindly answered in these words : “ O [[my]939-iole dear mother]7275-my dear mother , if [you]7275-my dear mother weep because of [her]2960-her who was [[your]7275-my dear mother servant]7276-your servant , now transformed into [a weasel]7277-a weasel , how can [you]7275-my dear mother support the true narration of [[my]939-iole sister]6480-my sister 's fate ; which [I]939-iole must tell to [you]7275-my dear mother , although [my]939-iole tears and sorrows hinder and forbid [my]939-iole speech ? “[939-iole] [Most beautiful of [all Oechalian maids]2965-all oechalian maids]2964-most beautiful of all oechalian maids , was [Dryope]948-dryope , [[[her]2960-her mother]4984-her mother 's only child]2967-her mother 's only child , for [you]2968-you must know [I]0-i am [the daughter of [[my]0-i father 's second wife]2970-my father 's second wife]2969-the daughter of my father 's second wife . [She]948-dryope is not now [a maid]2752-a maid ; because , through violence of [him]2972-him who rules at [Delphi]262-delphi and at [Delos]111-delos , [she]948-dryope was taken by [Andraemon]949-andraemon , who since then has been accounted happy in [[his]2972-him wife]1380-his wife . “ There is [a lake]7279-a lake surrounded by sweet lawns , encircling beauties , where the upper slope is crowned with myrtles in fair sunny groves . Without a thought of danger [Dryope]948-dryope in worship one day went to gather flowers , ( who hears , has greater cause to be indignant ) delightful garlands , for the water - nymphs , and , in [her]948-dryope bosom , carried [[her]948-dryope dear son]5615-her dear son , not yet a year old , whom [she]948-dryope fed for love . Not far from that dream - lake , in moisture grew a lotus , beautiful in purple bloom , the blossoms promising its fruit was near . “[949-andraemon] At play with [[her]948-dryope sweet infant]2974-her sweet infant , [Dryope]948-dryope plucked them as toys for [him]2972-him . [I]0-i , too , was there , eagerly , also , [I]0-i put forth [my]0-i hand , and was just ready to secure a spray , when [I]0-i was startled by some drops of blood down - falling from the blossoms which were plucked ; and even the trembling branches shook in dread . “ Who wills , the truth of this may learn from [all quaint people of [that land]5048-that land , who still relate the Story of [Nymph Lotis]950-nymph lotis]7281-all quaint people of that land , who still relate the story of nymph lotis . [She]950-nymph lotis , [they]7281-all quaint people of that land , who still relate the story of nymph lotis say , while flying from [the lust of [Priapus]951-priapus]7283-the lust of priapus , was transformed quickly from [her]950-nymph lotis human shape , into this tree , though [she]950-nymph lotis has kept [her]950-nymph lotis name . “[948-dryope] But ignorant of all this , [Dryope]948-dryope , alarmed , decided [she]948-dryope must now return ; so , having first adored [the hallowed nymphs]2975-the hallowed nymphs , upright [she]948-dryope stood , and would have moved away , but both [her]948-dryope feet were tangled in a root . There , as [she]948-dryope struggled in its tightening hold , [she]948-dryope could move nothing save [her]948-dryope upper parts ; and growing from that root , live bark began to gather slowly upward from the ground , spreading around [her]948-dryope , till it touched [her]948-dryope loins : in terror when [she]948-dryope saw the clinging growth , [she]948-dryope would have torn [her]948-dryope hair out by the roots , but , when [she]948-dryope clutched at it , [her]948-dryope hands were filled with lotus leaves grown up from [her]948-dryope changed head . “ Alas , [[her]948-dryope little son]7284-her little son , [Amphissos]952-amphissos , felt [[his]952-amphissos mother]1520-his mother 's bosom harden to [his]952-amphissos touch , and no life - stream refreshed [his]952-amphissos eager lips . And while [I]949-andraemon saw [your]949-andraemon cruel destiny , O [[my]949-andraemon dear sister]2333-my dear sister ! and could give no help , [I]949-andraemon clung to [your]949-andraemon loved body and around the growing trunk and branches , hoping so to stop [their]2977-their evil growth ; and [I]949-andraemon confess , endeavored there to hide beneath the bark . “[949-andraemon] And , oh ! [Andraemon]949-andraemon and [[her]949-andraemon father]5022-her father , then appeared to [me]0-i while [they]2977-their were sadly seeking for [Dryope]948-dryope : so there [I]0-i had to show the lotus as it covered [her]948-dryope , and [they]2977-their gave kisses to the warm wood , and prostrate fell upon the ground , and clung to growing roots of [their]2977-their new darling tree , transformed from [her]948-dryope . — [Dear sister]2978-dear sister , there was nothing of [yourself]2978-dear sister remaining but [your]2978-dear sister face ; and [I]0-i could see [your]2978-dear sister tears drop slowly on the trembling leaves which had so marvellously grown on [you]2978-dear sister ; and while [your]2978-dear sister lips remained uncovered , all the air surrounding , echoed [your]2978-dear sister complaint : — “ If oaths of [wretched women]7287-wretched women can have force , [I]2978-dear sister swear [I]2978-dear sister have not merited this fate ! Though innocent , to suffer punishment ! And if one word of [my]2978-dear sister complaint is false , [I]2978-dear sister pray [I]2978-dear sister may soon wither , and [my]2978-dear sister leaves fall from [me]2978-dear sister as in blight , and let the axe devote [me]2978-dear sister , wretched to the flames . But take [this infant]7288-this infant from [my]2978-dear sister branches to [a nurse]7289-a nurse ; and let [him]7288-this infant often play beneath [his]7288-this infant tree , — [[his]7288-this infant mother]1520-his mother always . Let [him]7288-this infant drink [his]7288-this infant milk beneath [my]2978-dear sister shade . When [he]7288-this infant has learned to talk let [him]7288-this infant salute [me]2978-dear sister , and in sorrow say “[2978-dear sister] In this tree - trunk [[my]0-i mother]6323-my mother is concealed . ” O , let [him]7288-this infant dread the fate that lurks in ponds , and let [him]7288-this infant often play beneath [his]7288-this infant tree , — and let [him]7288-this infant be persuaded every shrub contains the body of [a goddess]5320-a goddess . — Ah ! Farewell [[my]0-i husband]6333-my husband , [— sister]7293-— sister , — and farewell [[my]0-i father]1438-my father ! If [my]0-i love remain in [you]2980-you remember to protect [my]0-i life from harm , so that the pruning - knife may never clip [my]0-i branches , and protect [my]0-i foliage from the browsing sheep . “[0-i] [I]0-i can not stoop to [you]2980-you ; 0h , if [you]2980-you love [me]0-i , lift [your]2980-you lips to [mine]0-i , and let [me]0-i kiss [you]2980-you , if but once again , before this growing lotus covers [me]0-i . Lift up [[my]0-i darling infant]2981-my darling infant to [my]0-i lips . How can [I]0-i hope to say much more to [you]2980-you ? The new bark now is creeping up [my]0-i neck , and creeping downward from [my]0-i covered brow ! Ah , do not close [my]0-i live eyes with [your]2980-you hands ; there is no need of it , for growing bark will spread and darken them before [I]0-i die ! ’ Such were the last words [her]2982-her poor smothered lips could utter ; for [she]2982-her was so quickly changed ; and long thereafter the new branches kept the warmth of [her]2982-her lost body , so transformed . ” And all the while that [Iole]939-iole told this , tearful in sorrow for [[her]2982-her sister]1501-her sister 's fate , [Alcmena]786-alcmena weeping , tried to comfort [her]2982-her . But as [they]7296-they wept together , suddenly a wonderful event astonished [them]7296-they ; for , standing in the doorway , [they]7296-they beheld [the old man Iolaus]7297-the old man iolaus , known to [them]7296-they , but now transformed from age to youth , [he]7297-the old man iolaus seemed almost [a boy]5624-a boy , with light down on [his]7297-the old man iolaus cheeks : for [[Juno]488-juno 's daughter [Hebe]953-hebe]7299-juno 's daughter hebe , had renewed [his]7299-juno 's daughter hebe years to please [[her]953-hebe husband]1381-her husband , [Hercules]857-hercules . Just at the time when ready to make oath , [she]953-hebe would not grant such gifts to [other men]7301-other men — [Themis]676-themis had happily prevented [her]953-hebe . “[2982-her] For even now , ” [she]953-hebe said , “[2982-her] a civil strife is almost ready to break forth in [Thebes]103-thebes , and [Capaneus]954-capaneus shall be invincible to all save the strong hand of [Jove]456-jove [himself]456-jove ; and there [two hostile brothers]2983-two hostile brothers shall engage in bloody conflict ; and [Amphiaraus]955-amphiaraus shall see [his]955-amphiaraus own ghost , deep in [yawning earth]2984-yawning earth . “ [[His]955-amphiaraus own son]1377-his own son , dutiful to [him]955-amphiaraus , shall be both just and unjust in a single deed ; for [he]1377-his own son , in vengeance for [[his]1377-his own son father]1530-his father 's death , shall slay [[his]1377-his own son mother]1520-his mother , and confounded lose both home and reason , — persecuted both by the grim Furies and the awful ghost of [[his]1377-his own son own murdered mother]7305-his own murdered mother ; this until [[his]1377-his own son wife]1380-his wife , deluded , shall request of [him]1377-his own son the fatal golden necklace , and until the sword of [Phegeus]956-phegeus drains [[his]1377-his own son kinsman]7307-his kinsman 's blood . “[955-amphiaraus] And then at last [[his]955-amphiaraus wife]1380-his wife [Callirhoe]553-the fates shall supplicate the mighty [Jupiter]475-jupiter to grant [[her]1380-his wife infant sons]2986-her infant sons the added years of youthful manhood . Then shall [Jupiter]475-jupiter let [Hebe]953-hebe , [guardian of ungathered days]2987-guardian of ungathered days , grant from the future to [[Callirhoe]553-the fates 's sons]2988-callirhoe 's sons , the strength of manhood in [their]2988-callirhoe 's sons infancy . Do not let [[their]2988-callirhoe 's sons victorious father]2989-their victorious father 's death be unavenged a long while . [Jove]456-jove prevailed upon , will claim beforehand all the gifts of [Hebe]953-hebe , who is [[his]955-amphiaraus known daughter - in - law]2990-his known daughter - in - law , and [[his]955-amphiaraus step - daughter]2991-his step - daughter , and with one act change [[Callirhoe]553-the fates 's beardless boys]2992-callirhoe 's beardless boys to [men of size]2993-men of size . ” When [Themis]676-themis , prophesying future days , had said these words , [the Gods of [Heaven]5-heaven]5226-the gods of heaven complained because [they]5226-the gods of heaven also could not grant the gift of youth to many others in this way . [Aurora]512-aurora wept because [[her]512-aurora husband]1381-her husband had white hair ; and [Ceres]758-ceres then bewailed the age of [her]758-ceres Iasion , grey and stricken old ; and [Mulciber]504-mulciber demanded with new life [his]504-mulciber [Erichthonius]957-erichthonius might again appear ; and [Venus]996-venus , thinking upon future days , said [old Anchises]958-old anchises ' years must be restored . And [every god]7310-every god preferred some favorite , until vexed with the clamor , [Jupiter]475-jupiter implored , “[2994-you] If [you]2994-you can have regard for [me]0-i , consider the strange blessings [you]2994-you desire : does [any one of [you]2994-you]2995-any one of you believe [he]2995-any one of you can prevail against the settled will of [Fate]959-fate ? As [Iolaus]960-iolaus has returned by fate , to those years spent by [him]960-iolaus ; so by [[the Fates Callirhoe]553-the fates 's sons]2996-the fates callirhoe 's sons from infancy must grow to manhood with no struggle on [their]2996-the fates callirhoe 's sons part , or force of [their]2996-the fates callirhoe 's sons ambition . And [you]2994-you should endure [your]2994-you fortune with contented minds : [I]0-i , also , must give all control to [Fate]959-fate . “ If [I]475-jupiter had power to change the course of Fate [I]475-jupiter would not let advancing age break down [[my]475-jupiter own son]7311-my own son [Aeacus]865-aeacus , nor bend [his]7311-my own son back with weight of year ; and [Rhadamanthus]961-rhadamanthus should retain an everlasting flower of youth , together with [[my]475-jupiter own son]7311-my own son [Minos]860-minos , who is now despised because of [his]860-minos great age , so that [his]860-minos scepter has lost dignity . ”[475-jupiter] Such words of [Jupiter]475-jupiter controlled [the Gods]456-jove , and [none]1829-none continued to complain , when [they]2998-they saw [Aeacus]865-aeacus and [Rhadamanthus]961-rhadamanthus old , and [Minos]860-minos also , weary of [his]860-minos age . And [they]2998-they remembered [Minos]860-minos in [his]860-minos prime , had warred against great nations , till [his]860-minos name if mentioned was a certain cause of fear . But now , enfeebled by great age , [he]475-jupiter feared [Miletus]962-miletus , [[Deione]963-deione 's son]2999-deione 's son , because of [his]962-miletus exultant youth and strength derived from [[his]962-miletus great father]3000-his great father [Phoebus]549-phoebus . And although [he]475-jupiter well perceived [Miletus]962-miletus ' eye was fixed upon [his]962-miletus throne , [he]475-jupiter did not dare to drive [him]962-miletus from [[his]962-miletus kingdom]2369-his kingdom . But although not forced , [Miletus]962-miletus of [his]962-miletus own accord did fly , by [swift ship]3002-swift ship , over to [the Asian shore]3003-the asian shore , across [the Aegean water]3004-the aegean water , where [he]962-miletus built [the city of]7198-the city of [his]962-miletus name . [Cyane]767-cyane , who was known to be the daughter of [the stream [Maeander]263-maeander]3006-the stream maeander , which with many a twist and turn flows wandering there — [Cyane]767-cyane said to be indeed most beautiful , when known by [him]475-jupiter , gave birth to [two]3007-two ; [a girl called [Byblis]964-byblis , who was lovely]3008-a girl called byblis , who was lovely , and [the brother Caunus]3009-the brother caunus — [twins]6370-twins . [Byblis]964-byblis is an example that the love of [every maiden]3011-every maiden must be within law . [Seized]965-seized with a passion for [[her]767-cyane brother]5185-her brother , [she]767-cyane loved [him]5185-her brother , [descendant of [Apollo]549-phoebus]3013-descendant of apollo , not as [sister]1430-sister loves [a brother]7013-a brother ; not in such a manner as the law of [man]1330-man permits . At first [she]767-cyane thought it surely was not wrong to kiss [him]5185-her brother passionately , while [her]767-cyane arms were thrown around [[her]767-cyane brother]5185-her brother 's neck , and so deceived [herself]767-cyane . And , as the habit grew , [[her]767-cyane sister]1501-her sister - love degenerated , till richly attired , [she]767-cyane came to see [[her]767-cyane brother]5185-her brother , with all endeavors to attract [his]5185-her brother eye ; and anxious to be seen most beautiful , [she]767-cyane envied [every woman who appeared of rival beauty]3020-every woman who appeared of rival beauty . But [she]767-cyane did not know or understand the flame , hot in [her]767-cyane heart , though [she]767-cyane was agitated when [she]767-cyane saw the object of [her]767-cyane swiftly growing love . Now [she]767-cyane began to call [him]5185-her brother [lord]3021-lord , and now [she]767-cyane hated to say [brother]6541-brother , and [she]767-cyane said , “ Do call [me]767-cyane [Byblis]964-byblis — never call [me]767-cyane [sister]1430-sister ! ”[767-cyane] And yet while feeling love so , when awake [she]767-cyane does not dwell upon impure desire ; but when dissolved in the soft arms of sleep , [she]767-cyane sees the very object of [her]767-cyane love , and blushing , dreams [she]767-cyane is embraced by [him]5185-her brother , till slumber has departed . For a time [she]767-cyane lies there silent , as [her]767-cyane mind recalls the loved appearance of [her]767-cyane lovely dream , until [her]767-cyane wavering heart , in grief exclaims : — “ What is this vision of the silent night ? Ah wretched [me]767-cyane ! [I]767-cyane can not count it true . And , if [he]5185-her brother were not [[my]767-cyane own brother]7314-my own brother , [he]5185-her brother why is [my]767-cyane fond heart tortured with this dream ? [He]5185-her brother is so handsome even to envious eyes , it is not strange [he]5185-her brother has filled [my]767-cyane fond heart ; so surely would be worthy of [my]767-cyane love . But it is [my]767-cyane misfortune [I]767-cyane am [[his]5185-her brother own sister]7315-his own sister . Let [me]767-cyane therefore strive , awake , to stand with honor , but let sleep return the same dream often to [me]767-cyane . — There can be no fear of any witness to a shade which phantoms [my]767-cyane delight . — O Cupid , swift of love - wing with [[your]7316-your mother]5112-your mother , and O [my]767-cyane beloved [Venus]996-venus ! wonderful the joys of [my]767-cyane experience in the transport . All as if reality sustaining , lifted [me]767-cyane up to elysian pleasure , while in truth [I]767-cyane lay dissolving to [my]767-cyane very marrow : the pleasure was so brief , and Night , headlong sped from [me]767-cyane , envious of [my]767-cyane coming joys . “[767-cyane] If [I]0-i could change [my]0-i name , and join to [you]3023-you , how good [a daughter]3024-a daughter [I]0-i would prove to [[your]3023-you dear father]3025-your dear father , and how good [a son]1612-a son would [you]3023-you be to [[my]0-i father]1438-my father . If [the Gods]1395-the gods agreed , then everything would be possessed by [us]3029-us in common , but this must exclude [ancestors]3030-ancestors . For [I]0-i should pray , compared with [mine]0-i [yours]3023-you might be quite superior . But , oh [my]0-i love , [some other woman]3031-some other woman by [your]3023-you love will be [a mother]5325-a mother ; but because , unfortunate , [[my]0-i parents]1753-my parents are the same as [yours]3023-you , [you]3023-you must be nothing but [a brother]7013-a brother . Sorrows , then , shall be to [us]3029-us in common from this hour . What have [my]0-i night - born vision signified ? What weight have dreams ? Do dreams have any weight ? [The Gods]456-jove forbid ! [The Gods]1395-the gods have [sisters]1543-sisters ! Truth declares even [Saturn]463-saturn married [Ops]966-ops , [[his]966-ops own blood - kin]3037-his own blood - kin , [Oceanus]967-oceanus [his]966-ops Tethys , [Jove]456-jove , [Olympian]968-olympian [his]966-ops Juno . But [the Gods]1395-the gods are so superior in [their]1395-the gods laws , [I]0-i should not measure human custom by the rights established in the actions of [divinities]3039-divinities . This passion must be banished from [my]0-i heart , or , if it can not be so , [I]0-i must pray that [I]0-i may perish , and be laid out dead upon [my]0-i couch so [[my]0-i dear brother]3040-my dear brother there may kiss [my]0-i lips . But then [he]3040-my dear brother must consent , and [my]0-i delight would seem to [him]3040-my dear brother a crime . “ Tis known [the sons of [Aeolus]665-aeolus]7318-the sons of aeolus embraced [[their]7318-the sons of aeolus sisters]7319-their sisters — But why should [I]3041-i think of these ? Why should [I]3041-i take example from such lives ? Must [I]3041-i do as [they]7318-the sons of aeolus did ? Far from it ! let such lawless flames be quenched , until [I]3041-i feel no evil love for [him]3040-my dear brother , although the pure affection of [a sister]5833-a sister may be [mine]3041-i , and cherished . If it should have happened first that [[my]3041-i dear brother]3040-my dear brother had loved [me]3041-i — ah then , [I]3041-i might have yielded love to [his]3040-my dear brother desire . Why not now ? [I]3041-i [myself]3041-i must woo [him]3040-my dear brother , since [I]3041-i could not have rejected [him]3040-my dear brother , if [he]3040-my dear brother had first wooed [me]3041-i . But is it possible for [me]3041-i to speak of it , with proper words describing such a strange confession ? Love will certainly compel and give [me]3041-i speech . But , if shame seal [my]3041-i lips , then secret flame in a sealed letter may be safely told . ”[3041-i] And after all this wavering , [her]3041-i mind at last was satisfied ; and as [she]3041-i leaned on [her]3041-i left elbow , partly raised from [her]3041-i half - dream position , [she]3041-i said , “ Let [him]3040-my dear brother see : let [me]3041-i at once confess [my]3041-i frantic passion without repression ! O [my]3041-i wretched heart ! What hot flame burns [me]3041-i ! ”[3041-i] But while speaking so , [she]3041-i took an iron pen in [her]3041-i right hand , and trembling wrote the heart - words as [she]3041-i could , all on a clean wax tablet which [she]3041-i held in [her]3041-i limp left hand . [She]3041-i begins and stops , and hesitates — [she]3041-i loves and hates [her]3041-i hot confession — writes , erases , changes here and there , condemns , approves , disheartened throws [her]3041-i tablets down and takes them up again : [her]3041-i mind refuses everything [she]3041-i does , and moves against each action as begun : shame , fear and bold assurance mingled showed upon [her]3041-i face , as [she]3041-i began to write , “ [[Your]7322-you sister]6473-your sister ”[3041-i] but at once decided [she]3041-i could not say [sister]1430-sister , and commenced instead , with other words on [her]3041-i amended wax . “ A health to [you]7322-you , which [she]6473-your sister who loves [you]7322-you fails to have , unless [you]7322-you grant the same to [her]6473-your sister . It shames [me]3041-i , oh [I]3041-i am ashamed to tell [my]3041-i name to [you]7322-you , and so without [my]3041-i name , [I]3041-i would [I]3041-i might plead well until the hopes of [my]3041-i desires were realized , and then [you]7322-you might know safely , [Byblis]964-byblis is [my]3041-i name . “[3041-i] [You]3043-you might have knowledge of [my]0-i wounded heart , because [my]0-i pale , drawn face and down - cast eyes so often tearful , and [my]0-i sighs without apparent cause have shown it — and [my]0-i warm embraces , and [my]0-i frequent kisses , much too tender for [a sister]5833-a sister . All of this has happened , while with agitated heart and in hot passion , [I]0-i have tried all ways , ( [I]0-i call upon [the Gods]1395-the gods to witness it ! ) that [I]0-i might force [myself]0-i to sanity . And [I]0-i have struggled , wretched nights and days , to overcome the cruelties of love , too dreadful for [a frail girl]3046-a frail girl to endure , for they most surely are all [Cupid]482-cupid 's art . “ [I]3047-her have been overborne and must confess [my]3047-her passion , while with timid prayers [I]3047-her plead ; for only [you]3043-you can save [me]3047-her . [You]3043-you alone may now destroy [the one who loves [you]3043-you best]7324-the one who loves you best : so [you]3043-you must choose what will be the result . [The one who prays]7325-the one who prays is not [[your]3043-you enemy]2034-your enemy ; but one most closely joined to [you]3043-you , yet asks to knit the tie more firmly . Let [old men]7327-old men be governed by propriety , and talk of what is right and wrong , and hold to all the nice distinctions of strict laws . But Love , has no fixed law for those whose age is [ours]7328-we , is heedless and compliant . And [we]7328-we have not yet discovered what is right or wrong , and all [we]7328-we should do is to imitate the known example of [the Gods]1395-the gods . [We]7328-we have [no father]6817-no father 's harsh rule , and [we]7328-we have no care for reputation , and no fear that keeps [us]7328-we from each other . But there may be cause for fear , and [we]7328-we may hide [our]7328-we stolen love , because [a sister]5833-a sister is at liberty to talk with [[her]5833-a sister dear brother]2290-her dear brother — quite apart : [we]7328-we may embrace and kiss [each other]1824-each other , though in public . What is wanting ? Pity [her]5833-a sister whose utmost love compels [her]5833-a sister to confess ; and let it not be written on [[her]5833-a sister tomb]7334-her tomb , [her]5833-a sister death was for [your]7335-your sake and love denied . ”[3047-her] Here when [she]3047-her dropped the tablet from [her]3047-her hand , it was so full of fond words , which were doomed to disappointment , that the last line traced the edge : and without thinking of delay , [she]3047-her stamped the shameful letter with [her]3047-her seal , and moistened it with tears ( [her]3047-her tongue failed [her]3047-her for moisture ) . Then , hot - blushing , [she]3047-her called [one of [[her]3047-her attendants]3049-her attendants]3048-one of her attendants , and with timid voice said , coaxing , “ [[My]3047-her most trusted servant]7336-my most trusted servant , take these tablets to [my]3047-her — ”[3047-her] after long delay [she]3047-her said , “ [[my]3047-her brother]6054-my brother . ”[3047-her] While [she]3047-her gave the tablets they suddenly slipped from [her]3047-her hands and fell . Although disturbed by this bad omen , [she]3047-her still sent the letter , which [the servant]3050-the servant found an opportunity to carry off . [He]3050-the servant gave the secret love - confession . This [[her]3047-her brother]5185-her brother , [grandson of [Maeander]263-maeander]3052-grandson of maeander , read but partly , and with sudden passion threw the tablets from [him]3050-the servant . [He]3050-the servant could barely hold [himself]3050-the servant from clutching on the throat of [[her]3047-her fear - trembling servant]3053-her fear - trembling servant ; as , enraged , [he]3050-the servant cried , “ [Accursed pander to forbidden lust]7338-accursed pander to forbidden lust , be gone ! — before the knowledge of [your]3053-her fear - trembling servant death is added to this unforeseen disgrace ! ”[3050-the servant] [The servant]3050-the servant fled in terror , and told all [[her]3047-her brother]5185-her brother 's actions and [his]3050-the servant fierce reply to [Byblis]964-byblis : and when [she]3050-the servant had heard [her]3050-the servant love had been repulsed , [her]3050-the servant startled face went pale , and [her]3050-the servant whole body trembled in the grip of ice - chills . Quickly as [her]3050-the servant mind regained its usual strength , [her]3050-the servant maddening love returned , came back with equal force , and while [she]3050-the servant choked with [her]3050-the servant emotion , gasping [she]3050-the servant said this : “ [I]3050-the servant suffer only from [my]3050-the servant folly ! why did [I]3050-the servant so rashly tell [him]3050-the servant of [my]3050-the servant wounded heart ? And why did [I]3050-the servant so hastily commit to tablets all [I]3050-the servant should have kept concealed ? [I]3050-the servant should have edged [my]3050-the servant way by feeling first , obscurely hinting till [I]3050-the servant knew [his]3050-the servant mind and disposition towards [me]3050-the servant . And so that [my]3050-the servant first voyage might get favorable wind , [I]3050-the servant should have tested with a close - reefed sail , and , knowing what the wind was , safely fared . But now with sails full spread [I]3050-the servant have been tossed by unexpected winds . And so [[my]3050-the servant ship]5723-my ship is on the rocks ; and , overwhelmed with all the power of Ocean , [I]3050-the servant have not the strength to turn back and recover what is lost . “[3050-the servant] Surely clear omens warned [me]0-i not to tell [my]0-i love so soon , because the tablets fell just when [I]0-i would have put them in the hand of [[my]0-i picked servant]3056-my picked servant — certainly a sign [my]0-i hasty hopes were destined to fall down . Is it not clear [I]0-i should have changed the day ; and even [my]0-i intention ? Rather say should not the day have been postponed at once ? [The god]5013-the god [himself]5013-the god gave [me]0-i unerring signs , if [I]0-i had not been so deranged with love . [I]0-i should have spoken to [him]5013-the god , face to face ; and with [my]0-i own lips have confessed it all ; and then [my]0-i passion had been seen by [him]5013-the god , and , as [my]0-i face was bathed in tears , [I]0-i could have told [him]5013-the god so much more than words engraved on tablets ; and , while [I]0-i was telling [him]5013-the god [I]0-i could have thrown [my]0-i arms around [his]5013-the god neck , and if rejected could have seemed almost at point of death ; as [I]0-i embraced [his]5013-the god feet , while prostrate , even might have begged for life . [I]0-i could have tried so many plans , and they together would have won [his]5013-the god stubborn heart . “ Perhaps [[my]3058-my stupid servant]7340-my stupid servant , in mistake , did not approach [him]5013-the god at a proper time , and even sought an hour [his]5013-the god mind was full of other things . “[3058-my] All this has harmed [my]0-i case ; there is no other reason ; [he]5013-the god was not born of a tigress , and [his]5013-the god heart is not of flint or solid iron , or of adamant ; and no [she]3058-my - lion suckled [him]5013-the god . [He]5013-the god shall be won to [my]0-i affection ; and [I]0-i must attempt again , again , nor ever cease so long as [I]0-i have breath . If it were not too late already to undo what has been done , ' twere wiser not begun at all . But since [I]0-i have begun , it now is best to end it with success . How can [he]5013-the god help remembering what [I]0-i dared , although [I]0-i should abandon [my]0-i design ! In such a case , because [I]0-i gave up , [I]0-i must be to [him]5013-the god weak , fickle - minded ; or perhaps [he]5013-the god may believe [I]0-i tried to tempt [him]5013-the god with a snare . But come what may , [he]5013-the god will not think of [me]0-i as overcome by [some god who inflames and rules the heart]3059-some god who inflames and rules the heart . [He]5013-the god surely will believe [I]0-i was so actuated by [my]0-i lust . “ If [I]3060-her do nothing more , [my]3060-her innocence is gone forever . [I]3060-her have written [him]5013-the god and wooed [him]5013-the god also , in a way so rash and unmistakable , that if [I]3060-her should do nothing more than this , [I]3060-her should be held completely guilty in [[my]3060-her brother]6054-my brother 's sight — but [I]3060-her have hope , and nothing worse to fear . ”[3060-her] Then back and forth [she]3060-her argues ; and so great is [her]3060-her uncertainty , [she]3060-her blames [herself]3060-her for what [she]3060-her did , and is determined just as surely to succeed . [She]3060-her tries all arts , but is repeatedly repulsed by [him]5013-the god , until unable to control [her]3060-her ways , [[her]3060-her brother]5185-her brother in despair , fled from the shame of [her]3060-her designs : and in [another land]3062-another land [he]5013-the god founded [a new city]3063-a new city . Then , [they]3064-they say , [the wretched daughter of [Miletus]962-miletus]3065-the wretched daughter of miletus lost control of reason . [She]3060-her wrenched from [her]3060-her breast [her]3060-her garments , and quite frantic , beat [her]3060-her arms , and publicly proclaims unhallowed love . Grown desperate , [she]3060-her left [[her]3060-her hated home]3066-her hated home , [[her]3060-her native land]2301-her native land , and followed the loved steps of [[her]3060-her departed brother]3068-her departed brother . Just as those crazed by [[your]3069-your thyrsus]3070-your thyrsus , [son of Semele]3071-son of semele ! [The Bacchanals of [Ismarus]264-ismarus]3072-the bacchanals of ismarus , aroused , howl at [your]3069-your orgies , so [her]3060-her shrieks were heard by [the shocked women of [Bubassus]265-bubassus]3073-the shocked women of bubassus , where [the frenzied Byblis]3074-the frenzied byblis howled across [the fields]5475-the fields , and so through [Caria]125-caria and through [Lycia]180-lycia , over [the mountain Cragus]3076-the mountain cragus and beyond [the town]3077-the town , [Lymira]266-lymira , and [the flowing stream called Xanthus]3078-the flowing stream called xanthus , and [the ridge where dwelt]3079-the ridge where dwelt [Chimaera]181-the dire chimaera , serpent - tailed and monstrous beast , fire breathing from its lion head and neck . [She]3060-her hurried through [the forest of that ridge]3080-the forest of that ridge — and there at last worn out with [your]3069-your pursuit , O [Byblis]964-byblis , [you]3069-your fell prostrate , with [your]3069-your hair spread over the hard ground , and [your]3069-your wan face buried in fallen leaves . Although [the young , still tender - hearted nymphs of [Leleges]971-leleges]3081-the young , still tender - hearted nymphs of leleges , advised [her]3060-her fondly how to cure [her]3060-her love , and offered comfort to [her]3060-her heedless heart , and even lifted [her]3060-her in [their]3081-the young , still tender - hearted nymphs of leleges soft arms ; without an answer [Byblis]964-byblis fell from [them]3081-the young , still tender - hearted nymphs of leleges , and clutched the green herbs with [her]964-byblis fingers , while [her]964-byblis tears continued to fall on the grass . [They]3081-the young , still tender - hearted nymphs of leleges say [the weeping Naiads]3082-the weeping naiads gave to [her]964-byblis a vein of tears which always flows there from [her]964-byblis sorrows — nothing better could be done . Immediately , as drops of pitch drip forth from the gashed pine , or sticky bitumen distils out from the rich and heavy earth , or as the frozen water at the approach of a soft - breathing wind melts in the sun ; so [Byblis]964-byblis , [sad descendant of the Sun , dissolving in [her]964-byblis own tears]3083-sad descendant of the sun , dissolving in her own tears , was there changed into a fountain ; which to this late day , in all [those valleys]3084-those valleys has no name but [hers]964-byblis , and issues underneath a dark oak - tree . The tale of this unholy passion would perhaps , have filled [[Crete]100-crete 's hundred cities]3085-crete 's hundred cities then , if [Crete]100-crete had not a wonder of [its]100-crete own to talk of , in the change of [Iphis]977-iphis . Once , there lived at [Phaestus]268-phaestus , not far from [the town of Gnossus]3086-the town of gnossus , [a man Ligdus , not well known ; in fact obscure , of humble parentage , whose income was no greater than [his]3087-his birth]972-a man ligdus , not well known ; in fact obscure , of humble parentage , whose income was no greater than his birth ; but [he]3087-his was held trustworthy and [his]3087-his life had been quite blameless . When the time drew near [[his]3087-his wife]1380-his wife should give birth to [a child]6548-a child , [he]3087-his warned [her]1380-his wife and instructed [her]1380-his wife , with words [we]3090-we quote : — “ There are two things which [I]3087-his would ask of Heaven : that [you]1380-his wife may be delivered with small pain , and that [[your]1380-his wife child]5322-your child may surely be [a boy]5624-a boy . [Girls]7344-girls are such trouble , fair strength is denied to [them]7344-girls . — Therefore ( may [Heaven]5-heaven refuse the thought ) if chance should cause [[your]1380-his wife child]5322-your child to be [a girl]7346-a girl , ( gods pardon [me]3087-his for having said the word ! ) [we]3091-we must agree to have [her]5322-your child put to death . ”[3087-his] And all the time [he]3087-his spoke such dreaded words , [their]3091-we faces were completely bathed in tears ; not only [hers]1380-his wife but also [his]3087-his while [he]3087-his forced on [her]1380-his wife that unnatural command . Ah , [Telethusa]973-telethusa ceaselessly implored [[her]1380-his wife husband]1381-her husband to give way to fortune 's cast ; but [Ligdus]972-a man ligdus , not well known ; in fact obscure , of humble parentage , whose income was no greater than his birth held [his]3087-his resolution fixed . And now the expected time of birth was near , when in the middle of the night [she]1380-his wife seemed to see [the goddess]4979-the goddess [Isis]974-isis , standing by [her]974-isis bed , in [company of serious spirit forms]3094-company of serious spirit forms ; [Isis]974-isis had crescent horns upon [her]974-isis forehead , and a bright garland made of golden grain encircled [her]974-isis fair brow . It was a crown of regal beauty : and beside [her]1380-his wife stood the dog Anubis , and [Bubastis]975-bubastis , there [the sacred , dappled Apis]3095-the sacred , dappled apis , and [the God of silence]3096-the god of silence with pressed finger on [his]3096-the god of silence lips ; the sacred rattles were there , and [Osiris]976-osiris , known the constant object of [[his]976-osiris worshippers]3097-his worshippers ' desire , and there the Egyptian serpent whose quick sting gives long - enduring sleep . [She]1380-his wife seemed to see [them]3098-them all , and even to hear [the goddess]4979-the goddess say to [her]1380-his wife , “ O [Telethusa]973-telethusa , [one of [[my]4979-the goddess remembered worshippers]7348-my remembered worshippers]7347-one of my remembered worshippers , forget [your]1380-his wife grief ; [[your]1380-his wife husband]2405-your husband 's orders need not be obeyed ; and when [Lucina]752-lucina has delivered [you]1380-his wife , save and bring up [[your]1380-his wife child]5322-your child , if either [boy]6958-boy or [girl]6959-girl . [I]4979-the goddess am [the goddess who brings help to all who call upon [me]4979-the goddess]7353-the goddess who brings help to all who call upon me ; and [you]1380-his wife shall never complain of [me]4979-the goddess — that [you]1380-his wife adored [a thankless deity]7354-a thankless deity . ”[4979-the goddess] So [she]3100-she advised by vision [the sad mother]3101-the sad mother , and left [her]3101-the sad mother . [The Cretan woman]3102-the cretan woman joyfully arose from [her]3102-the cretan woman sad bed , and supplicating , raised ecstatic hands up towards the listening stars , and prayed to [them]3103-them [her]3102-the cretan woman vision might come true . Soon , when [her]3102-the cretan woman pains gave birth , [the mother]5344-the mother knew [[her]5344-the mother infant]3105-her infant was [a girl]7346-a girl ( [the father]1574-the father had no knowledge of it , as [he]1574-the father was not there ) . Intending to deceive , [the mother]5344-the mother said , “ Feed [the dear boy]7355-the dear boy . ”[5344-the mother] All things had favored [her]5344-the mother deceit — [no one]5311-no one except [the trusted nurse]3110-the trusted nurse , knew of it . And [the father]1574-the father paid [his]1574-the father vows , and named [the child]5602-the child after [[its]5602-the child grandfather]3113-its grandfather , whose name was honored [Iphis]977-iphis . Hearing it so called , [the mother]5344-the mother could not but rejoice , because [[her]5344-the mother child]5312-her child was given a name of common gender , and [she]5344-the mother could use it with no more deceit . [She]5344-the mother took good care to dress [it]5602-the child as [a boy]5624-a boy , and either as [a boy]5624-a boy or [girl]6959-girl , [its]5602-the child face must always be accounted lovable . And so [she]5344-the mother grew , — ten years and three had gone , and then [[your]3119-you father]5123-your father found a bride for [you]3119-you O [Iphis]977-iphis — promised [you]3119-you should take to wife [the golden - haired Ianthe]3121-the golden - haired ianthe , praised by [all the women of [Phaestus]268-phaestus]3122-all the women of phaestus for the dower of [her]3121-the golden - haired ianthe unequalled beauty , and well known , [the daughter of [a Cretan named [Telestes]978-telestes]3124-a cretan named telestes]3123-the daughter of a cretan named telestes . Of equal age and equal loveliness , [they]3125-their had received from [the same teachers]3126-the same teachers , all instruction in [their]3125-their childish rudiments . So unsuspected love had filled [their]3125-their hearts with equal longing — but how different ! [Ianthe]979-ianthe waits in confidence and hope the ceremonial as agreed upon , and is quite certain [she]979-ianthe will [we]3127-we d [a man]5610-a man . But [Iphis]977-iphis is in love without one hope of passion 's ecstasy , the thought of which only increased [her]977-iphis flame ; and [she]977-iphis [a girl]7346-a girl is burnt with passion for [another girl]2291-another girl ! [She]979-ianthe hardly can hold back [her]979-ianthe tears , and says : “ O what will be the awful dreaded end , with such a monstrous love compelling [me]979-ianthe ? If [the Gods]1395-the gods should wish to save [me]979-ianthe , certainly [they]1395-the gods should have saved [me]979-ianthe ; but , if [their]1395-the gods desire was for [my]979-ianthe ruin , still [they]1395-the gods should have given some natural suffering of humanity . The passion for a cow does not inflame a cow , [no mare]7357-no mare has ever sought another mare . The ram inflames the ewe , and every doe follows a chosen stag ; so also birds are mated , and in all [the animal world]7358-the animal world [no female]7359-no female ever feels love passion for [another female]7360-another female — why is it in [me]979-ianthe ? “[979-ianthe] Monstrosities are natural to [Crete]100-crete , [the daughter of the Sun]3131-the daughter of the sun there loved a bull — it was [a female]3132-a female 's mad love for [the male]3133-the male — but [my]0-i desire is far more mad than [hers]3132-a female , in strict regard of truth , for [she]3132-a female had hope of love 's fulfillment . [She]3132-a female secured the bull by changing [herself]3132-a female to a heifer 's form ; and in that subtlety it was [the male deceived at last]3134-the male deceived at last . Though all the subtleties of all [the world]1360-the world should be collected here ; — if [Daedalus]882-daedalus [himself]882-daedalus should fly back here upon [his]882-daedalus waxen wings , what could [he]882-daedalus do ? What skillful art of [his]882-daedalus could change [my]0-i sex , [a girl]7346-a girl into [a boy]5624-a boy — or could [he]882-daedalus change [Ianthe]979-ianthe ? What a useless thought ! Be bold take courage Iphis , and be strong of soul . This hopeless passion stultifies [your]3138-your heart ; so shake it off , and hold [your]3138-your memory down to the clear fact of [your]3138-your birth : unless [your]3138-your will provides deception for [yourself]3138-your : do only what is lawful , and confine strictly , [your]3138-your love within [a woman]5609-a woman 's right . “ Hope of fulfillment can beget true love , and hope keeps it alive . [You]3138-your are deprived of this hope by the nature of [your]3138-your birth . [No guardian]7361-no guardian keeps [you]3138-your from [her]5609-a woman dear embrace , [no watchful jealous husband]7362-no watchful jealous husband , and [she]5609-a woman has [no cruel father]7363-no cruel father : [she]5609-a woman does not deny [herself]5609-a woman to [you]3138-your . With all that liberty , [you]3138-your can not have [her]5609-a woman for [[your]3138-your happy wife]7364-your happy wife , though [Gods]6543-gods and [men]1399-men should labor for [your]3138-your wish . None of [my]5609-a woman prayers has ever been denied ; [the willing Deities]7367-the willing deities have granted [me]5609-a woman whatever should be , and [[my]5609-a woman father]1438-my father helps [me]5609-a woman to accomplish everything [I]5609-a woman plan : [she]5609-a woman and [[her]5609-a woman father]5022-her father also , always help . But Nature is more powerful than all , and only [Nature]570-nature works for [my]5609-a woman distress . “[5609-a woman] The wedding - day already is at hand ; the longed - for time is come ; [Ianthe]979-ianthe soon will be [mine]3140-mine only — and yet , not [my]0-i own : with water all around [me]0-i [I]0-i shall thirst ! O why must [Juno]488-juno , [goddess of sweet brides]3141-goddess of sweet brides , and why should [Hymen]687-hymen also , favor [us]3142-us when [man]1330-man with [woman]1432-woman can not join in wedlock , but [both]5611-both are [brides]5691-brides ? ” And so [she]5609-a woman closed [her]5609-a woman lips . [The other maiden]7370-the other maiden flamed with equal love , and often prayed for [Hymen]687-hymen to appear . But [Telethusa]973-telethusa , fearing that event , the marriage which [Ianthe]979-ianthe keenly sought , procrastinated , causing first delay by some pretended illness ; and then gave pretence of omens and of visions seen , sufficient for delay , until [she]5609-a woman had exhausted every avenue of excuse , and only one more day remained before the fateful time , it was so near at hand . Despairing then of finding other cause which might prevent the fated wedding - day , [the mother]5344-the mother took the circled fillets from [her]5344-the mother own head , and [[her]5344-the mother daughter]1816-her daughter 's head , and prayed , as [she]5344-the mother embraced the altar — [her]5344-the mother long hair spread out upon the flowing breeze — and said : “[974-isis] O [Isis]974-isis , [goddess of Paraetonium , the Mareotic fields , Pharos]3147-goddess of paraetonium , the mareotic fields , pharos , and Nile of seven horns divided — oh give help ! [Goddess of nations]3148-goddess of nations ! heal [us]3149-us of [our]3149-us fears ! [I]0-i saw [you]3150-your , [goddess]1607-goddess , and [your]3150-your symbols once , and [I]0-i adored them all , the clashing sounds of sistra and the torches of [[your]3150-your train]3152-your train , and [I]0-i took careful note of [your]3150-your commands , for which [[my]0-i daughter]1458-my daughter lives to see the sun , and also [I]0-i have so escaped from harm ; — all this is of [your]3150-your counsel and [your]3150-your gift ; oh , pity [both of [us]3149-us]3154-both of us — and give [us]3149-us aid ! ” Tears emphasized [her]3148-goddess of nations prayer ; [the goddess]4979-the goddess seemed to move — in truth it was the altar moved ; the firm doors of [the temple]4988-the temple even shook — and [her]4979-the goddess horns , crescent , flashed with gleams of light , and [her]4979-the goddess loud sistrum rattled noisily . Although not quite free of all fear , yet pleased by that good omen , gladly [the mother]5344-the mother left [the temple]4988-the temple with [[her]5344-the mother daughter]1816-her daughter [Iphis]977-iphis , who beside [her]5344-the mother walked , but with a lengthened stride . [Her]4979-the goddess face seemed of a darker hue , [her]4979-the goddess strength seemed greater , and [her]4979-the goddess features were more stern . [Her]4979-the goddess hair once long , was unadorned and short . There is more vigor in [her]4979-the goddess than [she]4979-the goddess showed in [[her]4979-the goddess girl]7378-her girl ways . For in the name of truth , [Iphis]977-iphis , who was [a girl]7346-a girl , is now [a man]5610-a man ! Make offerings at [the temple]4988-the temple and rejoice without a fear ! — [They]7382-they offer at the shrines , and add a votive tablet , on which this inscription is engraved : these gifts are paid by [Iphis]977-iphis as [a man which as [a maid]2752-a maid [he]5610-a man vowed to give]7383-a man which as a maid he vowed to give . The morrow 's dawn revealed [the wide world]5803-the wide world ; on the day agreed , [Venus]996-venus , [Juno]488-juno and [Hymen]687-hymen , all have met [[our]7386-our happy lovers]7387-our happy lovers at the marriage fires ; and [Iphis]977-iphis , [a new man]7388-a new man , gained [his]7388-a new man Ianthe . Veiled in a saffron mantle , through the air unmeasured , after the strange wedding , [Hymen]687-hymen departed swiftly for [Ciconian land]7389-ciconian land ; regardless and not listening to the voice of [tuneful Orpheus]981-orpheus . [Truly Hymen]687-hymen there was present during the festivities of [Orpheus]981-orpheus and [Eurydice]982-eurydice , but gave no happy omen , neither hallowed words nor joyful glances ; and the torch [he]7388-a new man held would only sputter , fill the eyes with smoke , and cause no blaze while waving . The result of that sad wedding , proved more terrible than such foreboding fates . While through the grass delighted [Naiads]650-the naiads wandered with [the bride]6113-the bride , a serpent struck its venomed tooth in [her]6113-the bride soft ankle — and [she]6113-the bride died . — After [the bard of [Rhodope]983-rhodope]7391-the bard of rhodope had mourned , and filled the highs of [heaven]1454-heaven with the moans of [his]7391-the bard of rhodope lament , determined also [the dark underworld]7393-the dark underworld should recognize the misery of death , [he]7391-the bard of rhodope dared descend by the Taenarian gate down to [the gloomy Styx]7394-the gloomy styx . And there passed through pale - glimmering phantoms , and the ghosts escaped from sepulchres , until [he]7391-the bard of rhodope found [Persephone]984-persephone and [Pluto]664-pluto , [master - king of [shadow realms below]7396-shadow realms below]7395-master - king of shadow realms below : and then began to strike [his]7391-the bard of rhodope tuneful lyre , to which [he]7391-the bard of rhodope sang : — “[3155-o deities of this dark world beneath the earth] [O deities of [this dark world beneath [the earth]1289-the earth]3156-this dark world beneath the earth]3155-o deities of this dark world beneath the earth ! [this shadowy underworld , to which [all mortals]3159-all mortals must descend]3158-this shadowy underworld , to which all mortals must descend ! If [it]3160-it can be called lawful , and if [you]3161-you will suffer speech of strict truth ( all the winding ways of Falsity forbidden ) [I]0-i come not down here because of curiosity to see [the glooms of [Tartarus]77-tartarus]3162-the glooms of tartarus and have no thought to bind or strangle the three necks of the Medusan Monster , vile with snakes . But [I]0-i have come , because [[my]0-i darling wife]3163-my darling wife stepped on a viper that sent through [her]3163-my darling wife veins death - poison , cutting off [her]3163-my darling wife coming years . “ If able , [I]3163-my darling wife would bear it , [I]3163-my darling wife do not deny [my]3163-my darling wife effort — but [the god of Love]1918-the god of love has conquered [me]3163-my darling wife — a god so kindly known in all [the upper world]7398-the upper world . [We]7399-we are not sure [he]1918-the god of love can be known so well in [this deep world]7400-this deep world , but have good reason to conjecture [he]1918-the god of love is not unknown here , and if old report almost forgotten , that [you]3164-you stole [[your]3164-you wife]7401-your wife is not a fiction , Love united [you]3164-you the same as [others]4906-others . By [this Place of Fear]7403-this place of fear [this huge void]7404-this huge void and [these vast and silent realms]7405-these vast and silent realms , renew the life - thread of [Eurydice]982-eurydice . “[3163-my darling wife] All things are due to [you]3164-you , and though on [earth]1287-earth it happens [we]3166-we may tarry a short while , slowly or swiftly [we]3166-we must go to one abode ; and it will be [[our]3166-we final home]3167-our final home . Long and tenaciously [you]3164-you will possess unquestioned mastery of [the human race]3168-the human race . [She]3169-she also shall be [yours]3164-you to rule , when full of age [she]3169-she shall have lived the days of [her]3169-she allotted years . So [I]0-i ask of [you]3164-you possession of [her]3169-she few days as a boon . But if the fates deny to [me]0-i this prayer for [[my]0-i true wife]3170-my true wife , [my]0-i constant mind must hold [me]0-i always so that [I]0-i can not return — and [you]3164-you may triumph in the death of two ! ” While [he]0-i sang all [his]0-i heart said to the sound of [his]0-i sweet lyre , the bloodless ghosts [themselves]7406-themselves were weeping , and [the anxious Tantalus]7407-the anxious tantalus stopped clutching at return - flow of the wave , [Ixion]660-ixion 's twisting wheel stood wonder - bound ; and [Tityus]656-tityus ' liver for a while escaped the vultures , and [the listening Belides]7408-the listening belides forgot [their]7408-the listening belides sieve - like bowls and even [you]3164-you , [O Sisyphus]658-sisyphus ! sat idly on [your]3164-you rock ! Then [Fame]691-fame declared that conquered by the song of [Orpheus]981-orpheus , for the first and only time the hard cheeks of [the fierce Eumenides]918-eumenides were wet with tears : nor could [the royal queen]7409-the royal queen , nor [he]0-i who rules [the lower world]7410-the lower world deny the prayer of [Orpheus]981-orpheus ; so [they]7411-they called to [them]7411-they Eurydice , who still was held among [the new - arriving shades]7412-the new - arriving shades , and [she]7413-she obeyed the call by walking to [them]7411-they with slow steps , yet halting from [her]7413-she wound . So [Orpheus]981-orpheus then received [[his]981-orpheus wife]1380-his wife ; and [Pluto]664-pluto told [him]981-orpheus [he]981-orpheus might now ascend from [these Avernian vales]7415-these avernian vales up to the light , with [[his]981-orpheus Eurydice]7416-his eurydice ; but , if [he]981-orpheus turned [his]981-orpheus eyes to look at [her]1380-his wife , the gift of [her]1380-his wife delivery would be lost . [They]7411-they picked [their]7411-they way in silence up [a steep and gloomy path of darkness]7417-a steep and gloomy path of darkness . There remained but little more to climb till [they]7411-they would touch earth 's surface , when in fear [he]981-orpheus might again lose [her]1380-his wife , and anxious for another look at [her]1380-his wife , [he]981-orpheus turned [his]981-orpheus eyes so [he]981-orpheus could gaze upon [her]1380-his wife . Instantly [she]1380-his wife slipped away . [He]981-orpheus stretched out to [her]1380-his wife [his]981-orpheus despairing arms , eager to rescue [her]1380-his wife , or feel [her]1380-his wife form , but could hold nothing save the yielding air . Dying the second time , [she]1380-his wife could not say a word of censure of [[her]1380-his wife husband]1381-her husband 's fault ; what had [she]1380-his wife to complain of — [his]981-orpheus great love ? [Her]1380-his wife last word spoken was , “[3164-you] Farewell ! ” which [he]981-orpheus could barely hear , and with no further sound [she]1380-his wife fell from [him]981-orpheus again to [Hades]269-hades . — Struck quite senseless by this double death of [[his]981-orpheus dear wife]2622-his dear wife , [he]981-orpheus was as fixed from motion as [the frightened one who saw the triple necks of [Cerberus]655-cerberus]7420-the frightened one who saw the triple necks of cerberus , that dog whose middle neck was chained . The sight filled [him]981-orpheus with terror [he]981-orpheus had no escape from , until petrified to stone ; or like [Olenos]985-olenos , changed to stone , because [he]981-orpheus fastened on [himself]981-orpheus the guilt of [[his]981-orpheus wife]1380-his wife . O unfortunate Lethaea ! Too boastful of [your]7422-your beauty , [you]7422-your and [he]981-orpheus , united once in love , are now two stones upon [the mountain Ida]7423-the mountain ida , moist with springs . [Orpheus]981-orpheus implored in vain [the ferryman]7424-the ferryman to help [him]981-orpheus cross [the River Styx]270-the river styx again , but was denied the very hope of death . Seven days [he]981-orpheus sat upon [[Death]986-death 's river bank]7425-death 's river bank , in squalid misery and without all food — nourished by grief , anxiety , and tears — complaining that [the Gods of [Erebus]164-erebus]7426-the gods of erebus were pitiless , at last [he]981-orpheus wandered back , until [he]981-orpheus came to [lofty Rhodope and Haemus]7427-lofty rhodope and haemus , beaten by the strong north wind . Three times the Sun completed [his]981-orpheus full course to [watery Pisces]271-watery pisces , and in all that time , shunning [all women]7428-all women , [Orpheus]981-orpheus still believed [his]981-orpheus love - pledge was forever . So [he]981-orpheus kept away from [women]1730-women , though so many grieved , because [he]981-orpheus took no notice of [their]1730-women love . The only friendship [he]981-orpheus enjoyed was given to [the young men of [Thrace]148-thrace]7430-the young men of thrace . There was [a hill which rose up to a level plateau , high and beautiful with green grass]7431-a hill which rose up to a level plateau , high and beautiful with green grass ; and there was not any shade for comfort on the top and there on that luxuriant grass [the bard]7432-the bard , while heaven - inspired reclined , and struck such harmonies on [his]7432-the bard sweet lyre that shade most grateful to [the hill]7433-the hill was spread around . Strong trees came up there — the Chaonian oak the Heliads ' poplar , and the lofty - branched deep mast - tree , the soft linden and the beech , the brittle hazel , and the virgin laurel - tree , the ash for strong spears , the smooth silver - fir , the flex bent with acorns and the plane , the various tinted maple and with those , the lotus and green willows from their streams , evergreen box and slender tamarisks , rich myrtles of two colors and the tine , bending with green - blue berries : and [you]7434-you , too , the pliant - footed ivy , came along with tendril - branching grape - vines , and the elm all covered with twist - vines , the mountain - ash , pitch - trees and arbute - trees of blushing fruit , the bending - palm prized after victories , the bare - trunk pine of tufted foliage , bristled upon the top , a pleasant sight delightful to [the Mother of [the Gods]1395-the gods]7435-the mother of the gods ; since [Attis]987-attis dear to [Cybele]988-cybele , exchanged [his]987-attis human form which hardened in that tree . In all the throng the cone - shaped cypress came ; a tree now , it was changed from [a dear youth loved by [the god who strings the lyre and bow]7438-the god who strings the lyre and bow . For there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by [those nymphs who haunt [the fields Carthaean]7440-the fields carthaean]7439-those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean . [His]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean great antlers spread so wide , they gave an ample shade to [his]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean own head .
