Free of fear , and now no longer shy , frequenting homes of [[men]1399-men [he]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean knew]7442-men he knew , [he]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean offered [his]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean soft neck even to [strangers]7443-strangers for [their]7443-strangers petting hands . But more than by all others , [he]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean was loved by [you]7444-you , [O Cyparissus]989-o cyparissus , [fairest youth of [all the lads of [Cea]272-cea]7446-all the lads of cea]7445-fairest youth of all the lads of cea . It was [you]7444-you who led [the pet stag]7447-the pet stag to fresh pasturage , and to [the waters of the clearest spring]7448-the waters of the clearest spring . Sometimes [you]7444-you wove bright garlands for [his]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean horns , and sometimes , like a horseman on [his]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean back , now here now there , [you]7444-you guided [his]7437-a dear youth loved by the god who strings the lyre and bow . for there was at one time , a mighty stag held sacred by those nymphs who haunt the fields carthaean soft mouth with purple reins . It was upon a summer day , at high noon when [the Crab , of spreading claws]7449-the crab , of spreading claws , loving [the sea - shore]7450-the sea - shore , almost burnt beneath the sun 's hot burning rays ; and [the pet stag]7447-the pet stag was then reclining on [the grassy earth]7452-the grassy earth and , wearied of all action , found relief under the cool shade of [the forest trees]7453-the forest trees ; that as [he]7447-the pet stag lay [there]1500-there [Cyparissus]989-o cyparissus pierced [him]7447-the pet stag with a javelin : and although it was quite accidental , when [the shocked youth]7455-the shocked youth saw [his]7455-the shocked youth loved stag dying from the cruel wound [he]7455-the shocked youth could not bear it , and resolved on death . What did not [Phoebus]549-phoebus say to comfort [him]7447-the pet stag ? [He]549-phoebus cautioned [him]7447-the pet stag to hold [his]7447-the pet stag grief in check , consistent with the cause . But still [the lad]5180-the lad lamented , and with groans implored [the Gods]1395-the gods that [he]7447-the pet stag might mourn forever . [His]7447-the pet stag life force exhausted by long weeping , now [his]7447-the pet stag limbs began to take a green tint , and [his]7447-the pet stag hair , which overhung [his]7447-the pet stag snow - white brow , turned up into a bristling crest ; and [he]7447-the pet stag became a stiff tree with a slender top and pointed up to the starry heavens . And [the God , groaning with sorrow]7458-the god , groaning with sorrow , said ; “[3171-you] [You]3171-you shall be mourned sincerely by [me]0-i , surely as [you]3171-you mourn for [others]4906-others , and forever [you]3171-you shall stand in grief , where [others]4906-others grieve . ” Such was the grove by [Orpheus]981-orpheus drawn together ; and [he]981-orpheus sat surrounded by assembled animals , and many strange Birds . When [he]0-i tried the chords by touching with [his]0-i thumb , and was convinced the notes were all in harmony , although attuned to various melody , [he]0-i raised [his]0-i voice and sang : “[3174-my loved mother] Oh [[my]0-i loved mother]3174-my loved mother , [Muse]990-muse , from [Jove]456-jove inspire [my]0-i song — for all things yield , to [the unequalled sway of [Jove]456-jove]3175-the unequalled sway of jove — oh , [I]0-i have sung so often [Jupiter]475-jupiter 's great power before this day , and in a wilder strain , [I]0-i 've sung the giants and victorious bolts hurled on [Phlegraean plains]273-phlegraean plains . But now [I]0-i need the gentler touch ; for [I]0-i would sing of [boys]3176-boys , the favorites of [Gods]6543-gods , and even of [maids who had to pay the penalty of wrong]3178-maids who had to pay the penalty of wrong . ” [The king of [all the Gods]5318-all the gods]7459-the king of all the gods once burned with love for [Ganymede of [Phrygia]175-phrygia]274-ganymede of phrygia . [He]7459-the king of all the gods found a shape more pleasing even than [his]7459-the king of all the gods own . [Jove]456-jove would not take the form of any bird , except the eagle 's , able to sustain the weight of [his]456-jove own thunderbolts . Without delay , [Jove]456-jove on fictitious eagle wings , stole and flew off with [that loved Trojan boy]7461-that loved trojan boy : who even to this day , against the will of [Juno]488-juno , mingles nectar in the cups of [[his]456-jove protector]7462-his protector , mighty [Jupiter]475-jupiter . [You]7463-you also , [Hyacinthus]991-hyacinthus , would have been set in the sky ! if [Phoebus]549-phoebus had been given time which [the cruel fates]7464-the cruel fates denied for [you]7463-you . But in a way [you]7463-you are immortal too . Though [you]7463-you have died . Always when warm spring drives winter out , and [Aries]992-aries ( [the Ram]7465-the ram ) succeeds to Pisces ( watery Fish ) , [you]7463-you rise and blossom on the green turf . And the love [[my]3179-you father]1438-my father had for [you]7463-you was deeper than [he]1438-my father felt for [others]4906-others . [[Delphi]262-delphi center of [the world]1360-the world]7468-delphi center of the world , had [no presiding guardian]7470-no presiding guardian , while [the God]5013-the god frequented [the Eurotas]275-the eurotas and [the land of [Sparta]185-sparta]7472-the land of sparta , never fortified with walls . [His]1438-my father zither and [his]1438-my father bow no longer fill [his]1438-my father eager mind and now without a thought of dignity , [he]1438-my father carried nets and held the dogs in leash , and did not hesitate to go with [Hyacinthus]991-hyacinthus on [the rough , steep mountain ridges]7473-the rough , steep mountain ridges ; and by all of such associations , [his]1438-my father love was increased . Now [Titan]818-titan was about midway , betwixt the coming and the banished night , and stood at equal distance from those two extremes . Then , when [the youth]1554-the youth and [Phoebus]549-phoebus were well stripped , and gleaming with rich olive oil , [they]7475-they tried a friendly contest with [the discus]7476-the discus . First [Phoebus]549-phoebus , well - poised , sent it awhirl through air , and cleft the clouds beyond with its broad weight ; from which at length it fell down to [the earth]1289-the earth , a certain evidence of strength and skill . Heedless of danger [Hyacinthus]991-hyacinthus rushed for eager glory of the game , resolved to get the discus . But it bounded back from off [the hard earth]7478-the hard earth , and struck full against [your]7479-your face , [O Hyacinthus]991-hyacinthus ! Deadly pale [the God]5013-the god 's face went — as pallid as [the boy]5600-the boy 's . With care [he]1438-my father lifted the sad huddled form . [The kind god]7482-the kind god tries to warm [you]7479-your back to life , and next endeavors to attend [your]7479-your wound , and stay [your]7479-your parting soul with healing herbs . [His]1438-my father skill is no advantage , for the wound is past all art of cure . As if [someone]6452-someone , when in [a garden]7484-a garden , breaks off violets , poppies , or lilies hung from golden stems , then drooping [they]6452-someone must hang [their]6452-someone withered heads , and gaze down towards [the earth beneath them]7485-the earth beneath them ; so , [the dying boy]7486-the dying boy 's face droops , and [his]7486-the dying boy bent neck , a burden to itself , falls back upon [his]7486-the dying boy shoulder : “[3179-you] [You]3179-you are fallen in [your]3179-you prime defrauded of [your]3179-you youth , O [Hyacinthus]991-hyacinthus ! ” Moaned [Apollo]549-phoebus . “[0-i] [I]0-i can see in [your]3179-you sad wound [my]0-i own guilt , and [you]3179-you are [my]0-i cause of grief and self - reproach . [My]0-i own hand gave [you]3179-you death unmerited — [I]0-i only can be charged with [your]3179-you destruction . — What have [I]0-i done wrong ? Can it be called a fault to play with [you]3179-you ? Should loving [you]3179-you be called a fault ? And oh , that [I]0-i might now give up [my]0-i life for [you]3179-you ! Or die with [you]3179-you ! But since [our]3180-our destinies prevent [us]3180-our [you]3179-you shall always be with [me]0-i , and [you]3179-you shall dwell upon [my]0-i care - filled lips . The lyre struck by [my]0-i hand , and [my]0-i true songs will always celebrate [you]3179-you . A new flower [you]3179-you shall arise , with markings on [your]3179-you petals , close imitation of [my]0-i constant moans : and there shall come another to be linked with this new flower , [a valiant hero]3181-a valiant hero shall be known by the same marks upon its petals . ” And while [Phoebus]549-phoebus , [Apollo]549-phoebus , sang these words with [his]549-phoebus truth - telling lips , behold the blood of [Hyacinthus]991-hyacinthus , which had poured out on the ground beside [him]549-phoebus and there stained the grass , was changed from blood ; and in its place a flower , more beautiful than Tyrian dye , sprang up . It almost seemed a lily , were it not that one was purple and the other white . But [Phoebus]549-phoebus was not satisfied with this . For it was [he]549-phoebus who worked the miracle of [his]549-phoebus sad words inscribed on flower leaves . These letters AI , AI , are inscribed on them . And [Sparta]185-sparta certainly is proud to honor [Hyacinthus]991-hyacinthus as [[her]185-sparta son]5619-her son ; and [his]991-hyacinthus loved fame endures ; and every year [they]7488-they celebrate [his]991-hyacinthus solemn festival . If [you]3179-you should ask [Amathus]994-amathus , which is rich in metals , how can [she]185-sparta rejoice and take a pride in deeds of [her]185-sparta Propoetides ; [she]185-sparta would disclaim it and repudiate [them]7488-they all , as well as those of [transformed men , whose foreheads were deformed by two rough horns]7489-transformed men , whose foreheads were deformed by two rough horns , from which [their]7489-transformed men , whose foreheads were deformed by two rough horns name Cerastae . By [their]7489-transformed men , whose foreheads were deformed by two rough horns gates an altar unto [Jove]456-jove stood . If by chance [a stranger]7490-a stranger , not informed of [their]7489-transformed men , whose foreheads were deformed by two rough horns dark crimes , had seen the horrid altar smeared with blood , [he]7490-a stranger would suppose that suckling calves and sheep of [Amathus]994-amathus , were sacrificed thereon — it was in fact the blood of [slaughtered guests]7491-slaughtered guests ! [Kind - hearted Venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice , was ready to desert [[her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice cities]7493-her cities and [[her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice snake - infested plains]7494-her snake - infested plains ; “[3181-a valiant hero] But how , ” said [she]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice , “[3181-a valiant hero] have [[their]3182-their delightful lands]3183-their delightful lands together with [[my]0-i well built cities]3184-my well built cities sinned ? What crime have [they]3182-their done ? — [Those inhabitants]3185-those inhabitants should pay the penalty of [their]3185-those inhabitants own crimes by exile or by death ; or it may be a middle course , between exile and death ; and what can that be , but the punishment of a changed form ? ” And while [she]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice hesitates , in various thoughts of what form [they]3182-their should take , [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice eyes by chance , observed [their]3182-their horns , and that decided [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice ; such horns could well be on [them]3182-their after any change occurred , and [she]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice transformed [their]3182-their big and brutal bodies to savage bulls . But even after that , [the obscene Propoetides]7495-the obscene propoetides dared to deny divinity of [Venus]996-venus , for which fault , ( and it is common fame ) [they]3182-their were the first to criminate [their]3182-their bodies , through the wrath of [Venus]996-venus ; and so blushing shame was lost , white blood , in [their]3182-their bad faces grew so fast , so hard , it was no wonder [they]3182-their were turned with small change into hard and lifeless stones . [Pygmalion]995-pygmalion saw [these women]7496-these women waste [their]7496-these women lives in wretched shame , and critical of faults which nature had so deeply planted through [their]3182-their female hearts , [he]995-pygmalion lived in preference , for many years unmarried . — But while [he]995-pygmalion was single , with consummate skill , [he]995-pygmalion carved a statue out of snow - white ivory , and gave to it exquisite beauty , which [no woman of [the world]1360-the world]7497-no woman of the world has ever equalled : [she]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice was so beautiful , [he]995-pygmalion fell in love with [his]995-pygmalion creation . It appeared in truth [a perfect virgin with the grace of life]7499-a perfect virgin with the grace of life , but in the expression of such modesty all motion was restrained — and so [his]995-pygmalion art concealed [his]995-pygmalion art . [Pygmalion]995-pygmalion gazed , inflamed with love and admiration for the form , in semblance of [a woman]5609-a woman , [he]995-pygmalion had carved . [He]995-pygmalion lifts up both [his]995-pygmalion hands to feel the work , and wonders if it can be ivory , because it seems to [him]995-pygmalion more truly flesh . — [his]995-pygmalion mind refusing to conceive of it as ivory , [he]995-pygmalion kisses it and feels [his]995-pygmalion kisses are returned . And speaking love , caresses it with loving hands that seem to make an impress , on the parts [they]7501-they touch , so real that [he]995-pygmalion fears [he]995-pygmalion then may bruise [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice by [his]995-pygmalion eager pressing . Softest tones are used each time [he]995-pygmalion speaks to [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice . [He]995-pygmalion brings to [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice such presents as are surely prized by [sweet girls]7502-sweet girls ; such as smooth round pebbles , shells , and birds , and fragrant flowers of thousand tints , lilies , and painted balls , and amber tears of Heliads , which distill from [far off trees]7503-far off trees . — [he]995-pygmalion drapes [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice in rich clothing and in gems : rings on [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice fingers , a rich necklace round [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice neck , pearl pendants on [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice graceful ears ; and golden ornaments adorn [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice breast . All these are beautiful — and [she]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice appears most lovable , if carefully attired , — or perfect as a statue , unadorned . [He]995-pygmalion lays [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice on a bed luxurious , spread with coverlets of Tyrian purple dye , and naming [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice [the consort of [his]995-pygmalion couch]4955-the consort of his couch , lays [her]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice reclining head on the most soft and downy pillows , trusting [she]7492-kind - hearted venus , outraged by such deeds of sacrifice could feel . The festal day of [Venus]996-venus , known throughout [all Cyprus]7505-all cyprus , now had come , and [throngs]7506-throngs were there to celebrate . Heifers with spreading horns , all gold - tipped , fell when given the stroke of death upon [their]7506-throngs snow - white necks ; and frankincense was smoking on the altars . There , intent , [Pygmalion]995-pygmalion stood before an altar , when [his]995-pygmalion offering had been made ; and although [he]995-pygmalion feared the result , [he]995-pygmalion prayed : “[456-jove] If it is true , [O Gods]456-jove , that [you]456-jove can give all things , [I]0-i pray to have as [[my]0-i wife]2658-my wife — ” but , [he]995-pygmalion did not dare to add “[0-i] [[my]0-i ivory statue - maid]3187-my ivory statue - maid , ” and said , “[0-i] One like [my]0-i ivory — . ” [Golden Venus]996-venus heard , for [she]996-venus was present at [her]996-venus festival , and [she]996-venus knew clearly what the prayer had meant . [She]996-venus gave a sign that [her]996-venus Divinity favored [his]995-pygmalion plea : three times the flame leaped high and brightly in the air . When [he]995-pygmalion returned , [he]995-pygmalion went directly to [[his]995-pygmalion image - maid]7507-his image - maid , bent over [her]7507-his image - maid , and kissed [her]7507-his image - maid many times , while [she]7507-his image - maid was on [her]7507-his image - maid couch ; and as [he]995-pygmalion kissed , [she]7507-his image - maid seemed to gather some warmth from [his]995-pygmalion lips . Again [he]995-pygmalion kissed [her]7507-his image - maid ; and [he]995-pygmalion felt [her]7507-his image - maid breast ; the ivory seemed to soften at the touch , and its firm texture yielded to [his]995-pygmalion hand , as honey - wax of [Mount Hymettus]997-mount hymettus turns to many shapes when handled in the sun , and surely softens from each gentle touch . [He]995-pygmalion is amazed ; but stands rejoicing in [his]995-pygmalion doubt ; while fearful there is some mistake , again and yet again , gives trial to [his]995-pygmalion hopes by touching with [his]995-pygmalion hand . It must be flesh ! The veins pulsate beneath the careful test of [his]995-pygmalion directed finger . Then , indeed , [the astonished hero]7508-the astonished hero poured out lavish thanks to [Venus]996-venus ; pressing with [his]995-pygmalion raptured lips [his]995-pygmalion statue 's lips . Now real , true to life — [the maiden]5425-the maiden felt the kisses given to [her]5425-the maiden , and blushing , lifted up [her]5425-the maiden timid eyes , so that [she]5425-the maiden saw the light and sky above , as well as [[her]5425-the maiden rapt lover]7510-her rapt lover while [he]995-pygmalion leaned gazing beside [her]5425-the maiden — and all this at once — [the goddess]4979-the goddess graced the marriage [she]4979-the goddess had willed , and when nine times a crescent moon had changed , increasing to the full , [the statue - bride]7512-the statue - bride gave birth to [[her]4979-the goddess dear daughter]7513-her dear daughter [Paphos]998-paphos . From which famed event [the island]6372-the island takes its name . [Parents]7519-parents ! shun this tale ! But if [my]0-i verse has charmed [your]7520-your thought , do not give [me]0-i such credit in this part ; convince [yourself]7520-your it can not be true life ; or , if against [my]0-i wish [you]7520-your hear and must believe it , then be sure to notice how such wickedness gets certain punishment . And yet , if Nature could permit such crimes as this to happen , [I]0-i congratulate [Ismarian people]7521-ismarian people and [all Thrace]6438-all thrace as well , and [I]0-i congratulate [this nation]7523-this nation , which [we]7524-we know is far away from [the land where this vile abomination did occur]7525-the land where this vile abomination did occur . [The land [we]7524-we call [Panchaia]277-panchaia]7526-the land we call panchaia may be rich in balsam , cinnamon , and costum sweet for ointment , frankincense distilled from trees , with many flowers besides . All this large wealth combined could never compensate [the land]1295-the land for this detestable , one crime : even though [the new Myrrh - Tree]999-the new myrrh - tree advanced on that rich soil . [Cupid]482-cupid declares [his]0-i weapons never caused an injury to [Myrrha]1000-myrrha , and denies [his]0-i torches ever could have urged [her]1000-myrrha crime . — [one of [the three bad sisters]7529-the three bad sisters]7528-one of the three bad sisters kindled this , with fire brand from [the Styx]278-the styx , and poisoned [you]7530-your with swollen vipers . — It is criminal to hate [a parent]7531-a parent , but love such as [hers]1000-myrrha is certainly more criminal than hate . [The chosen princes of [all lands]7533-all lands]7532-the chosen princes of all lands desire [you]7530-your now in marriage , and [young men throughout [the Orient]207-the orient]7534-young men throughout the orient are vying for [your]7530-your hand . Choose , [Myrrha]1000-myrrha one from all of these for [[your]7530-your good husband]7535-your good husband ; but exclude from such a thought [[your]7530-your father]5123-your father only . [She]1000-myrrha indeed is quite aware , and struggles bitterly against [her]1000-myrrha vile desires , and argues in [her]1000-myrrha heart : — “[0-i] What am [I]0-i tending to ? O listening Gods [I]0-i pray for aid , [I]0-i pray to Natural Love ! Ah , may the sacred rights of [parents]7519-parents keep this vile desire from [me]0-i , defend [me]0-i from a crime so great — If it indeed is crime . [I]0-i am not sure it is — [I]0-i have not heard that any god or written law condemns the union of [a parent]7531-a parent and [[his]7531-a parent child]5345-his child . All animals will mate as [they]3191-they desire — a heifer may endure [[her]3192-her sire]6289-her sire , and who condemns it ? And [the happy stud]3194-the happy stud is not refused by [[his]7531-a parent mare - daughters]3195-his mare - daughters : the [he]3196-he - goat consorts unthought - of with the flock of which [he]7531-a parent is [the father]1574-the father ; and the birds conceive of those from whom [they]3198-they were [themselves]3198-they begot . Happy are [they]3198-they who have such privilege ! [Malignant men]3199-malignant men have given spiteful laws ; and what is right to Nature is decreed unnatural , by jealous laws of [men]1399-men . “ But it is said there are some tribes today , in which [the mother]5344-the mother marries [[her]5344-the mother own son]7022-her own son ; [the daughter]7539-the daughter takes [[her]7539-the daughter father]5022-her father ; and by this , the love kind [Nature]570-nature gives [them]7541-them is increased into a double bond . — Ah wretched [me]1601-a father ! Why was it not [my]1601-a father fortune to be born in [that love - blessed land]7542-that love - blessed land ? [I]1601-a father must abide , depressed by [my]1601-a father misfortunes , in [this place]7543-this place . “[1601-a father] Why do [I]0-i dwell on these forbidden hopes ? [[My]0-i father]1438-my father is most worthy of [my]0-i love , but only as [a father]1601-a father . — If [I]0-i were not born [the daughter of [great Cinyras]783-cinyras]3204-the daughter of great cinyras , [I]0-i might be joined to [him]783-cinyras ; but , as it stands , because [he]783-cinyras is [mine]0-i [he]783-cinyras is never [mine]0-i ; because near to [me]0-i [he]783-cinyras is far from [me]0-i . “ It would be better for [me]783-cinyras , if [we]7544-we were but [strangers to each other]7545-strangers to each other ; for [I]783-cinyras then , could wish to go , and leave [[my]783-cinyras native land]2167-my native land , and so escape temptation to this crime : but [my]783-cinyras unhappy passion holds [me]783-cinyras here , that [I]783-cinyras may see [Cinyras]783-cinyras face to face , and touch [him]783-cinyras , talk with [him]783-cinyras and even kiss [him]783-cinyras — the best , if nothing else can be allowed . “[783-cinyras] But what more could be asked for , by [the most depraved]3205-the most depraved ? Think of the many sacred ties and loved names , [you]3206-your are dragging to the mire : [the rival of [[your]3206-your mother]5112-your mother]3207-the rival of your mother , will [you]3206-your be [the mistress of [[your]3206-your father]5123-your father]3209-the mistress of your father , and be named [the sister of [[your]3206-your son]1935-your son]3211-the sister of your son , and make [yourself]3206-your [the mother of [[your]3206-your brother]3214-your brother]3213-the mother of your brother ? And will [you]3206-your not dread the sisters with black snakes for hair . Whom guilty creatures , such as [you]3206-your , can see brandish relentless flames before [their]3215-their eyes and faces ? While [your]3206-your body has not sinned [you]3206-your must not let sin creep into [your]3206-your heart , and violate great Nature 's law with [your]3206-your unlawful rovings . If [you]3206-your had the right to long for [his]5123-your father endearment , it could not be possible . [He]5123-your father is [a virtuous man]3216-a virtuous man and is regardful of the moral law — oh how [I]0-i wish [my]0-i passion could be [his]5123-your father ! ” And so [she]3213-the mother of your brother argued and declared [her]3213-the mother of your brother love : but [Cinyras]783-cinyras , [[her]3213-the mother of your brother father]5022-her father , who was urged by [such a throng of [suitors]7549-suitors]7548-such a throng of suitors for [her]3213-the mother of your brother hand , that [he]783-cinyras could make no choice , at last inquired of [her]3213-the mother of your brother , so [she]3213-the mother of your brother might make [her]3213-the mother of your brother heart 's wish known . And as [he]783-cinyras named [them]7550-them over , asked [her]3213-the mother of your brother which [she]3213-the mother of your brother fixed [her]3213-the mother of your brother gaze upon [[her]3213-the mother of your brother father]5022-her father 's face , in doubtful agony what [she]3213-the mother of your brother could say , while hot tears filled [her]3213-the mother of your brother eyes . [[Her]3213-the mother of your brother father]5022-her father , sure it all was of a virginal alarm , as [he]783-cinyras is telling [her]3213-the mother of your brother [she]3213-the mother of your brother need not weep dries [her]3213-the mother of your brother wet cheeks and kisses [her]3213-the mother of your brother sweet lips . Too much delighted with [his]783-cinyras gentle words and kind endearments , [Myrrha]1000-myrrha , when [he]783-cinyras asked again , which one might be [[her]3213-the mother of your brother husband]1381-her husband , said , “[3217-yourself] The one just like [yourself]3217-yourself . ” , And [he]783-cinyras replied not understanding what [her]3213-the mother of your brother heart would say , “[3217-yourself] [You]3217-yourself answer as [a loving - daughter]3218-a loving - daughter should . ” When [she]3213-the mother of your brother heard “[3219-loving - daughter] [loving - daughter]3219-loving - daughter ” said , [the girl]7161-the girl too conscious of [her]7161-the girl guilt , looked on the ground . It was now midnight , peaceful sleep dissolved the world - care of [all mortals]3159-all mortals , but of [her]3213-the mother of your brother who , sleepless through the night , burnt in the flame of [her]3213-the mother of your brother misplaced affection . First despair compels [her]3213-the mother of your brother to abandon every hope , and then [she]3213-the mother of your brother changes and resolves to try ; and so [she]3213-the mother of your brother wavers from desire to shame , for [she]3213-the mother of your brother could not adhere to any plan . As a great tree , cut by the swinging axe is chopped until the last blow has been struck , then sways and threatens danger to all sides ; so does [her]3213-the mother of your brother weak mind , cut with many blows , waver unsteadily — this way and that — and turning back and forth it finds no rest from passion , save the rest that lies in death . The thought of death gave comfort to [her]3213-the mother of your brother heart . Resolved to hang [herself]3213-the mother of your brother , [she]3213-the mother of your brother sat upright ; then , as [she]3213-the mother of your brother tied [her]3213-the mother of your brother girdle to a beam , [she]3213-the mother of your brother said , “[3217-yourself] Farewell , [beloved Cinyras]783-cinyras , and may [you]783-cinyras know the cause of [my]0-i sad death . ” And while [she]3213-the mother of your brother spoke those words , [her]3213-the mother of your brother fingers fixed the noosed rope close around [her]3213-the mother of your brother death - pale neck . [They]7556-they say the murmur of despairing words was heard by [[her]3213-the mother of your brother attentive nurse who watched outside [the room]7024-the room]7557-her attentive nurse who watched outside the room . And , faithful as of old , [she]3213-the mother of your brother opened the shut door . But , when [she]3213-the mother of your brother saw the frightful preparations made for death , [the odd nurse]7559-the odd nurse screamed and beat and tore [her]3213-the mother of your brother breast , then seized and snatched the rope from [Myrrha]1000-myrrha 's neck ; and after [she]3213-the mother of your brother had torn the noose apart , at last [she]3213-the mother of your brother had the time to weep and time , while [she]3213-the mother of your brother embraced [the girl]7161-the girl , to ask [her]7559-the odd nurse why the halter had been fastened round [her]3213-the mother of your brother neck . [The girl]7161-the girl in stubborn silence only fixed [her]7161-the girl eyes upon the ground — sad that [her]7161-the girl first attempt at death , because too slow , was foiled . [The old nurse - woman]7562-the old nurse - woman urged and urged , and showed [her]3213-the mother of your brother gray hair and [her]3213-the mother of your brother withered breasts , and begged [her]7161-the girl by the memory of [her]3213-the mother of your brother cradle days , and baby nourishment , to hide no more from [[her]3213-the mother of your brother long - trusted nurse]7563-her long - trusted nurse what caused [her]3213-the mother of your brother grief . [The girl]7161-the girl turned from [her]7161-the girl questions with a sigh . [The nurse]7565-the nurse , still more determined to know all , promised fidelity and [her]7565-the nurse best aid — “[783-cinyras] Tell [me]0-i , ” [she]7565-the nurse said , “[783-cinyras] and let [me]0-i give [you]3220-your help ; [my]0-i old age offers means for [your]3220-your relief : if it be frantic passion , [I]0-i have charms and healing herbs ; or , if an evil spell was worked on [you]3220-your by [someone]6452-someone , [you]3220-your shall be cured to [your]3220-your perfect self by magic rites ; or , if [your]3220-your actions have enraged [the Gods]1395-the gods , a sacrifice will satisfy [their]1395-the gods wrath . What else could be the cause ? [[Your]3220-your family]3223-your family and [you]3220-your are prosperous — [[your]3220-your mother]5112-your mother dear , and [[your]3220-your loved father]2539-your loved father are alive and well . ” And , when [she]7565-the nurse heard [her]7565-the nurse say the name of [father]1933-father , a sigh heaved up from [her]7565-the nurse distracted heart . But even after that [the nurse]7565-the nurse could not conceive such evil in [the girl]7161-the girl 's sick heart ; and yet [she]7565-the nurse had a feeling it must be only a love affair could cause the crime : and with persistent purpose begged the cause . [She]7565-the nurse pressed [the weeping girl]7569-the weeping girl against [her]7565-the nurse breast ; and as [she]7565-the nurse held [her]7569-the weeping girl in [her]7565-the nurse feeble arms , [she]7565-the nurse said , “[0-i] Sweet heart , [I]0-i know [you]3220-your are in love : in this affair [I]0-i am entirely [yours]3220-your for [your]3220-your good service , [you]3220-your must have no fear , [[your]3220-your father]5123-your father can not learn of it from [me]0-i . , ” just like [a mad girl]7570-a mad girl , [Myrrha]1000-myrrha sprang away , and with [her]1000-myrrha face deep - buried in a couch , sobbed out , “[5123-your father] Go from [me]0-i or stop asking [me]0-i [my]0-i cause of grief — it is a crime of shame — [I]0-i can not tell it ! ” Horrified [the nurse]7565-the nurse stretched forth [her]7565-the nurse trembling hands , palsied with age and fear . [She]7565-the nurse fell down at the feet of [[her]7565-the nurse loved foster - child]7572-her loved foster - child , and coaxing [her]7572-her loved foster - child and frightening [her]7572-her loved foster - child , [she]7565-the nurse threatened to disclose [her]7565-the nurse knowledge of the halter and of what [she]7565-the nurse knew of [her]7565-the nurse attempted suicide ; and after all was said , [she]7565-the nurse gave [her]7565-the nurse word to help [the girl]7161-the girl , when [she]7565-the nurse had given to [her]7161-the girl a true confession of [her]7565-the nurse sad heart - love . [The girl]7161-the girl just lifted up [her]7161-the girl face , and laid it , weeping , on the bosom of [[her]7161-the girl nurse]7575-her nurse . [She]7161-the girl tried so often to confess , and just as often checked [her]7161-the girl words , [her]7161-the girl shamed face hid deep in [her]7161-the girl garment : “[5115-mother] Oh ” , at last [she]7161-the girl groans , “[5115-mother] O [mother]5115-mother blessed in [[your]5115-mother husband]2405-your husband — oh ! ” Only that much [she]7161-the girl said and groaned . [The nurse]7565-the nurse felt a cold horror stealing through [her]7565-the nurse heart and frame , for [she]7565-the nurse now understood it all . And [her]7161-the girl white hair stood bristling on [her]7161-the girl head , while with the utmost care of love and art [she]7565-the nurse strove to use appropriate words and deeds , to banish the mad passion of [the girl]7161-the girl . Though [Myrrha]1000-myrrha knew that [she]1000-myrrha was truly warned , [she]1000-myrrha was resolved to die , unless [she]1000-myrrha could obtain the object of [her]1000-myrrha wicked love . [The nurse]7565-the nurse gave way at last as in defeat , and said , “[5115-mother] Live and enjoy — ” but did not dare to say , “[5123-your father] [[your]5115-mother father]5123-your father ” , did not finish , though , [she]7565-the nurse promised and confirmed it with an oath . It was the time when [matrons]5692-matrons celebrate the annual festival of [Ceres]758-ceres . Then , all robed in decent garments of snow - white , [they]5692-matrons bring garlands of precious wheat , which are first fruits of worship ; and for nine nights [they]5692-matrons must count forbidden every act of love , and shun the touch of [man]1330-man . And in [that throng]2020-that throng , [Cenchreis]1001-cenchreis , [[the king]6107-the king 's wife]7583-the king 's wife , with constant care attended every secret rite : and so while [[the king]6107-the king 's bed]7585-the king 's bed was lacking [[his]6107-the king true wife]7586-his true wife , one of those nights , — [King Cinyras]783-cinyras was drunk with too much wine , — [the scheming nurse]7587-the scheming nurse informed [him]6107-the king of [a girl most beautiful , whose love for [him]6107-the king was passionate]7588-a girl most beautiful , whose love for him was passionate ; in a false tale [she]7587-the scheming nurse pictured a true passion . — When [he]6107-the king asked [the maiden]5425-the maiden 's age , [she]7587-the scheming nurse answered , “[1000-myrrha] Just the same as [Myrrha]1000-myrrha 's . ” Bidden by [the king]6107-the king to go and fetch [her]5425-the maiden , [the officious old nurse]7591-the officious old nurse , when [she]7591-the officious old nurse found [the girl]7161-the girl , cried out ; “[1000-myrrha] Rejoice , [[my]0-i dear]3230-my dear , [we]3231-we have contrived it ! ” [The unhappy girl]7593-the unhappy girl could not feel genuine joy in [her]7593-the unhappy girl amazed and startled body . [Her]7593-the unhappy girl dazed mind was filled with strange forebodings ; but [she]7593-the unhappy girl did believe [her]7593-the unhappy girl heart was joyful . — Great excitement filled [her]7593-the unhappy girl wrecked heart with such inconsistencies . Now was the time when nature is at rest ; between [the Bears]566-the twin bears , [Bootes]1002-bootes turned [his]1002-bootes wain down to the west , and [the guilty Myrrha]7594-the guilty myrrha turns to [her]7594-the guilty myrrha enormity . The golden moon flies from [the heaven]7595-the heaven , and black clouds cover the hiding stars and Night has lost [her]7594-the guilty myrrha fires . The first to hide were stars of [Icarus]885-icarus and of [Erigone]793-wile the beautiful erigone , in hallowed love devoted to [[her]7594-the guilty myrrha father]5022-her father . [Myrrha]1000-myrrha thrice was warned by omen of [her]1000-myrrha stumbling foot ; [the funeral screech - owl]7597-the funeral screech - owl also warned [her]1000-myrrha thrice , with dismal cry ; yet [Myrrha]1000-myrrha onward goes . It seems to [her]1000-myrrha the black night lessens shame . [She]1000-myrrha holds fast to [[her]1000-myrrha nurse]7575-her nurse with [her]1000-myrrha left hand , and with the other hand gropes through the dark . And now [they]7599-they go until [she]1000-myrrha finds the door . Now at the threshold of [[[her]1000-myrrha father]5022-her father 's room]7601-her father 's room , [she]1000-myrrha softly pushes back the door , [[her]1000-myrrha nurse]7575-her nurse takes [her]1000-myrrha within . [The girl]7161-the girl 's knees trembling sink beneath [her]1000-myrrha . [Her]7161-the girl drawn bloodless face has lost its color , and while [she]7161-the girl moves to the crime , bad courage goes from [her]7161-the girl until afraid of [her]7161-the girl bold effort , [she]7161-the girl would gladly turn unrecognized . But as [she]7161-the girl hesitates , [the aged crone]7604-the aged crone still holds [her]7161-the girl by the hand ; and leading [her]7161-the girl up to the high bed there delivering [Myrrha]1000-myrrha , says , “[1000-myrrha] Now [Cinyras]783-cinyras , [you]783-cinyras take [her]3232-her , [she]3232-her is [yours]783-cinyras ; ” and leaves [the pair]5841-the pair doomed in [their]5841-the pair crime — [the father to pollute [his]7606-the father to pollute his own flesh in his own bed own flesh in [[his]7606-the father to pollute his own flesh in his own bed own bed]7607-his own bed]7606-the father to pollute his own flesh in his own bed ; where [he]7606-the father to pollute his own flesh in his own bed tries first to encourage [her]7161-the girl from maiden fears , by gently talking to [the timid girl]7608-the timid girl . [He]7606-the father to pollute his own flesh in his own bed chanced to call [her]7161-the girl “[3233-daughter] [daughter]3233-daughter , ” as a name best suited to [her]7161-the girl age ; and [she]7161-the girl in turn , endearing , called [him]7606-the father to pollute his own flesh in his own bed “[1933-father] [father]1933-father ” , so no names might be omitted to complete [their]5841-the pair guilt . [She]7161-the girl staggered from [[his]7606-the father to pollute his own flesh in his own bed chamber]7609-his chamber with the crime of [[her]7161-the girl own father]7610-her own father hidden in [her]7161-the girl womb , and [their]5841-the pair guilt was repeated many nights ; till [Cinyras]783-cinyras — determined [he]783-cinyras must know [[his]783-cinyras mistress]5084-his mistress , after many meetings , brought a light and knew [his]783-cinyras crime had harmed [[his]783-cinyras daughter]5054-his daughter . Speechless in shame [he]783-cinyras drew forth [his]783-cinyras bright sword out from the scabbard where it hung near by . — but frightened [Myrrha]1000-myrrha fled , and so escaped death in the shadows of dark night . Groping [her]7161-the girl pathless way at random through [the fields]5475-the fields , [she]7161-the girl left [Arabia]122-arabia , famed for spreading palms , and wandered through [Panchaean lands]7614-panchaean lands . Until after nine months of aimless wandering days , [she]7161-the girl rested in [Sabaea]280-sabaea , for [she]7161-the girl could not hold the burden [she]7161-the girl had borne so long . Not knowing what to pray for , moved alike by fear of death and weariness of life , [her]7161-the girl wishes were expressed in prayer : “[456-jove] O [Gods]456-jove , if [you]456-jove will listen to [my]0-i prayer , [I]0-i do not shun a dreadful punishment deserved ; but now because [my]0-i life offends the living , and dying [I]0-i offend [the dead]3235-the dead , drive [me]0-i from both conditions ; change [me]0-i , and refuse [my]0-i flesh both life and death ! ” [Some god]6773-some god did listen to [her]7161-the girl unnatural prayer ; [her]7161-the girl last petition had answering gods . For even as [she]7161-the girl prayed , the earth closed over [her]7161-the girl legs ; roots grew out and , stretching forth obliquely from [her]7161-the girl nails , gave strong support to [her]7161-the girl up - growing trunk ; [her]7161-the girl bones got harder , and [her]7161-the girl marrow still unchanged , kept to the center , as [her]7161-the girl blood was changed to sap , as [her]7161-the girl outstretching arms became long branches and [her]7161-the girl fingers twigs ; and as [her]7161-the girl soft skin hardened into bark : and the fast - growing tree had closely bound [her]7161-the girl womb , still heavy , and had covered [her]7161-the girl soft bosom ; and was spreading quickly up to [her]7161-the girl neck . — [She]7161-the girl can not endure the strain , and sinking down into the rising wood , [her]7161-the girl whole face soon was hidden in the bark . Although all sense of human life was gone , as quickly as [she]7161-the girl lost [her]7161-the girl human form , [her]7161-the girl weeping was continued , and warm drops distilled from [her]7161-the girl ( the tree ) cease not to fall . There is a virtue even in [her]7161-the girl tears — the valued myrrh distilling from the trunk , keeps to [her]7161-the girl name , by which [she]7161-the girl still is known , and can not be forgot of aging time . [The guilt - begotten child]7616-the guilt - begotten child had growth while wood was growing , and endeavored now to find a way of safe birth . The tree - trunk was swelling and tightened against [Myrrha]1000-myrrha , who , unable to express [her]7161-the girl torture , could not call upon [Lucina]752-lucina in the usual words of travail . But then just like [a woman in great pain]7617-a woman in great pain , the tree bends down and , while it groans , bedews itself with falling tears . [Lucina]752-lucina stood in pity near the groaning branches , laid [her]752-lucina hands on them , and uttered charms to aid the hindered birth . The tree cracked open then , the bark was rent asunder , and it gave forth its living weight , [a wailing baby - boy]7618-a wailing baby - boy . [The Naiads]6363-the naiads laid [him]7618-a wailing baby - boy on soft leaves , and [they]6363-the naiads anointed [him]7618-a wailing baby - boy with [[his]7618-a wailing baby - boy own mother]7620-his own mother 's tears . Even [Envy]558-envy would not fail to praise [the child]5602-the child , as beautiful as naked cupids seen in chosen paintings . Only give to [him]7618-a wailing baby - boy a polished quiver , or take theirs from [them]6363-the naiads , and [no keen eye]7622-no keen eye could choose [him]7618-a wailing baby - boy from [their]6363-the naiads midst . Time gliding by without [our]7623-our knowledge cheats [us]7623-our , and nothing can be swifter than the years . [That son of [sister]1430-sister and [grandfather]7626-grandfather , who was lately hidden in [his]7618-a wailing baby - boy parent tree]7624-that son of sister and grandfather , who was lately hidden in his parent tree , just lately born , [a lovely baby - boy]7627-a lovely baby - boy is now [a youth]2864-a youth , now [man more beautiful than during growth]7629-man more beautiful than during growth . [He]7618-a wailing baby - boy wins the love of [Venus]996-venus and so avenges [[his]7618-a wailing baby - boy own mother]7620-his own mother 's passion . For while [[the goddess]4979-the goddess ' son]7632-the goddess ' son with quiver held on shoulder , once was kissing [[his]7618-a wailing baby - boy loved mother]7633-his loved mother , it chanced unwittingly [he]7618-a wailing baby - boy grazed [her]7633-his loved mother breast with a projecting arrow . Instantly [the wounded goddess]7634-the wounded goddess pushed [[her]7634-the wounded goddess son]5619-her son away ; but the scratch had pierced [her]7633-his loved mother deeper than [she]7634-the wounded goddess thought and even [Venus]996-venus was at first deceived . Delighted with the beauty of [the youth]1554-the youth , [she]996-venus does not think of [[her]996-venus Cytherian shores]7637-her cytherian shores and does not care for [Paphos]998-paphos , which is girt by [the deep sea]1436-the deep sea , nor [Cnidos]282-cnidos , haunts of fish , nor [Amathus]994-amathus far - famed for precious ores . [Venus]996-venus , neglecting [heaven]1454-heaven , prefers [Adonis]1003-adonis to [heaven]1454-heaven , and so [she]996-venus holds close to [his]1003-adonis ways as [[his]1003-adonis companion]6077-his companion , and forgets to rest at noon - day in the shade , neglecting care of [her]996-venus sweet beauty . [She]996-venus goes through [the woods]1317-the woods , and over mountain ridges and [wild fields]7643-wild fields , rocky and thorn - set , bare to [her]996-venus white knees after [Diana]484-diana 's manner . And [she]996-venus cheers the hounds , intent to hunt for harmless prey , such as the leaping hare , or the wild stag , high - crowned with branching antlers , or the doe . — [she]996-venus keeps away from fierce wild boars , away from ravenous wolves ; and [she]996-venus avoids the bears of frightful claws , and lions glutted with the blood of slaughtered cattle . [She]996-venus warns [you]3236-you , [Adonis]1003-adonis , to beware and fear [them]1004-boars . If [her]996-venus fears for [you]3236-you were only heeded ! “[3235-the dead] Oh be brave , ” [she]996-venus says , “[3235-the dead] against those timid animals which fly from [you]3236-you ; but courage is not safe against the bold . [Dear boy]3237-dear boy , do not be rash , do not attack the wild beasts which are armed by nature , lest [your]3236-you glory may cost [me]0-i great sorrow . Neither youth nor beauty nor the deeds which have moved [Venus]996-venus have effect on lions , bristling boars , and on the eyes and tempers of wild beasts . [Boars]1004-boars have the force of lightning in [their]1004-boars curved tusks , and the rage of tawny lions is unlimited . [I]0-i fear and hate [them]3238-them all . ” When [he]3236-you inquires the reason , [she]996-venus says : “[0-i] [I]0-i will tell it ; [you]3236-you will be surprised to learn the bad result caused by an ancient crime . — But [I]0-i am weary with unaccustomed toil ; and see ! a poplar convenient , offers a delightful shade and [this lawn]3239-this lawn gives a good couch . Let [us]3240-us rest [ourselves]3240-us here on the grass . ” So saying , [she]996-venus reclined upon [the turf]7644-the turf and , pillowing [her]996-venus head against [his]3236-you breast and mingling kisses with [her]996-venus words , [she]996-venus told [him]3236-you the following tale : Perhaps [you]3236-you may have heard of [a swift maid]7645-a swift maid , who ran much faster than [swift - footed men contesting in the race]7646-swift - footed men contesting in the race . What [they]3238-them have told is not an idle tale . — [She]7645-a swift maid did excel [them]3238-them all — and [you]3236-you could not have said whether [her]7645-a swift maid swift speed or [her]7645-a swift maid beauty was more worthy of [your]3236-you praise . When [this maid]7269-this maid once consulted with [an oracle]7648-an oracle , of [her]7645-a swift maid fate after marriage , [the god]5013-the god answered [her]7645-a swift maid : “[3241-you] [You]3241-you , [Atalanta]913-atalanta , never will have need of [husband]3242-husband , who will only be [your]3241-you harm . For [your]3241-you best good [you]3241-you should avoid the tie ; but surely [you]3241-you will not avoid [your]3241-you harm ; and while yet living [you]3241-you will lose [yourself]3241-you . ” [She]7645-a swift maid was so frightened by [the oracle]4987-the oracle , [she]7645-a swift maid lived unwedded in [far shaded woods]7651-far shaded woods ; and with harsh terms repulsed [insistent throngs of [suitors]7549-suitors]7652-insistent throngs of suitors . “[0-i] [I]0-i will not be won , ” [she]7645-a swift maid said , “[0-i] Till [I]0-i am conquered first in speed . Contest the race with [me]0-i . [A wife]6650-a wife and [couch]3244-couch shall both be given to reward the swift , but death must recompense [the one who lags behind]3245-the one who lags behind . This must be the condition of a race . ” Indeed [she]7645-a swift maid was that pitiless , but such the power of beauty , [a rash multitude]7654-a rash multitude agreed to [her]7645-a swift maid harsh terms . [Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes had come , [a stranger]7490-a stranger , to the cruel race , with condemnation in [his]1005-hippomenes heart against [the racing young men]7656-the racing young men for [their]7656-the racing young men headstrong love ; and said , “[6650-a wife] Why seek [a wife]6650-a wife at such a risk ? ” But when [he]0-i saw [her]7645-a swift maid face , and perfect form disrobed for perfect running , such a form as [mine]7657-mine , [Adonis]1003-adonis , or as [yours]3247-you — if [you]3247-you were [woman]1432-woman — [he]0-i was so astonished [he]0-i raised up [his]0-i hands and said , “[6650-a wife] Oh pardon [me]0-i brave men whom [I]0-i was blaming , [I]0-i could not then realize the value of the prize [you]3247-you strove for . ” And as [he]0-i is praising [her]7645-a swift maid , [his]0-i own heart leaping with love 's fire , [he]0-i hopes [no young man]7659-no young man may outstrip [her]7645-a swift maid in the race ; and , full of envy , fears for the result . “[0-i] But why , ” [he]0-i cries , “[0-i] is [my]0-i chance in the race untried ? Divinity helps [those who dare]3248-those who dare . ” But while [the hero]5496-the hero weighed it in [his]0-i mind [the virgin]5026-the virgin flew as if [her]5026-the virgin feet had wings . Although [she]5026-the virgin seemed to [him]0-i in flight as swift as any Scythian arrow , [he]0-i admired [her]5026-the virgin beauty more ; and [her]5026-the virgin swift speed appeared in [her]5026-the virgin most beautiful . The breeze bore back the streamers on [her]5026-the virgin flying ankles , while [her]5026-the virgin hair was tossed back over [her]5026-the virgin white shoulders ; the bright trimmed ribbons at [her]5026-the virgin knees were fluttering , and over [her]5026-the virgin white girlish body came a pink flush , just as when a purple awning across [a marble hall]7662-a marble hall gives it a wealth of borrowed hues . And while [Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes in wonder gazed at [her]5026-the virgin , the goal was reached ; and [Atalanta]913-atalanta crowned victorious with festal wreath . — But [all the vanquished youths]7663-all the vanquished youths paid the death - penalty with sighs and groans , according to the stipulated bond . Not frightened by the fate of [those young men]7664-those young men , [he]0-i stood up boldly in the midst of all ; and fixing [his]0-i strong eyes upon [the maiden]5425-the maiden , said : “[0-i] Where is the glory in an easy victory over [such weaklings]3249-such weaklings ? Try [your]3250-you fate with [me]0-i ! If fortune fail to favor [you]3250-you , how could it shame [you]3250-you to be conquered by [a man]5610-a man ? [Megareus of Onchestus]1006-megareus of onchestus is [[my]0-i father]1438-my father , [[his]1438-my father grandsire]5706-his grandsire , [Neptune]472-neptune , god of [all the seas]3254-all the seas . [I]0-i am [descendant of [the King of Waves]3256-the king of waves]3255-descendant of the king of waves : and add to this , [my]0-i name for manly worth has not disgraced the fame of [my]0-i descent . If [you]3250-you should prove victorious against this combination , [you]3250-you will have achieved a great enduring name — [the only one who ever bested [great Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes]3257-the only one who ever bested great hippomenes . ” While [he]0-i was speaking , [Atalanta]913-atalanta 's gaze grew softer , in [her]913-atalanta vacillating hopes to conquer and be conquered ; till at last , [her]913-atalanta heart , unbalanced , argued in this way : “[1005-hippomenes] It must be [some god envious of youth]3258-some god envious of youth , wishing to spoil this one prompts [him]3258-some god envious of youth to seek wedlock with [me]0-i and risk [his]3258-some god envious of youth own dear life . [I]0-i am not worth the price , if [I]0-i may judge . [His]3258-some god envious of youth beauty does not touch [me]0-i — but [I]0-i could be moved by it — [I]0-i must consider [he]3258-some god envious of youth is but [a boy]5624-a boy . It is not [he]3258-some god envious of youth [himself]3258-some god envious of youth who moves [me]0-i , but [his]3258-some god envious of youth youth . Sufficient cause for thought are [his]3258-some god envious of youth great courage and [his]3258-some god envious of youth soul fearless of death . What of [his]3258-some god envious of youth high descent ; — [great grandson of [the King of [all the seas]3254-all the seas]3261-the king of all the seas]3260-great grandson of the king of all the seas ?
