[O strange boy]3263-o strange boy , go from [me]0-i while [you]3263-o strange boy can ; abandon hope of this alliance stained with blood — A match with [me]0-i is fatal . [Other maids]3264-other maids will not refuse to [we]3265-we d [you]3263-o strange boy , and [a wiser girl]3266-a wiser girl will gladly seek [your]3263-o strange boy love . — But what concern is it of [mine]0-i , when [I]0-i but think of [those who have already perished]3267-those who have already perished ! Let [him]3258-some god envious of youth look to it [himself]3258-some god envious of youth ; and let [him]3258-some god envious of youth die . Since [he]3258-some god envious of youth is not warned by [his]3258-some god envious of youth knowledge of the fate of [many other suitors]3268-many other suitors , [he]3258-some god envious of youth declares quite plainly , [he]3258-some god envious of youth is weary of [his]3258-some god envious of youth life . — “ Shall [he]3258-some god envious of youth then die , because it must be [his]3258-some god envious of youth one hope to live with [me]3258-some god envious of youth ? And suffer death though undeserved , for [me]3258-some god envious of youth because [he]3258-some god envious of youth loves ? [My]3258-some god envious of youth victory will not ward off the hate , the odium of the deed ! But it is not a fault of [mine]3258-some god envious of youth . — [Oh fond , fond man]7666-oh fond , fond man , [I]3258-some god envious of youth would that [you]7666-oh fond , fond man had never seen [me]3258-some god envious of youth ! But [you]7666-oh fond , fond man are so madly set upon it , [I]3258-some god envious of youth could wish [you]7666-oh fond , fond man may prove much the swifter ! Oh how dear how lovable is [his]3258-some god envious of youth young girlish face ! — ah , [doomed Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes , [I]3258-some god envious of youth only wish mischance had never let [you]7666-oh fond , fond man see [me]3258-some god envious of youth ! [You]7666-oh fond , fond man are truly worthy of a life on [earth]1287-earth . If [I]3258-some god envious of youth had been more fortunate , and not denied a happy marriage day ; [I]3258-some god envious of youth would not share [my]3258-some god envious of youth bed with [any man]7668-any man but [you]7666-oh fond , fond man . ”[3258-some god envious of youth] All this [the virgin Atalanta]3269-the virgin atalanta said ; and knowing nothing of the power of love , [she]3269-the virgin atalanta is so ignorant of what [she]3269-the virgin atalanta does , [she]3269-the virgin atalanta loves and does not know [she]3269-the virgin atalanta is in love . Meanwhile [[her]3269-the virgin atalanta father]5022-her father and [the people]1439-the people , all loudly demanded [the accustomed race]3272-the accustomed race . [A suppliant]5588-a suppliant , [the young Hippomenes]3274-the young hippomenes invoked [me]0-i with [his]3274-the young hippomenes anxious voice , “ [I]3274-the young hippomenes pray to [you]0-i , O [Venus]996-venus , [Queen of Love]7669-queen of love , be near and help [my]3274-the young hippomenes daring — smile upon the love [you]0-i have inspired ! ”[3274-the young hippomenes] The breeze , not envious , wafted this prayer to [me]0-i ; and [I]0-i confess , it was so tender it did move [my]0-i heart — [I]0-i had but little time to give [him]3274-the young hippomenes aid . There is a field there which [the natives]3275-the natives call [the Field Tamasus]3276-the field tamasus — the most prized of [all the fertile lands of [Cyprus]284-cyprus]3277-all the fertile lands of cyprus . [This rich field]3278-this rich field , in ancient days , was set apart for [me]0-i , by [chosen elders who decreed it should enrich [my]0-i temples]3279-chosen elders who decreed it should enrich my temples yearly . In [this field]3280-this field there grows a tree , with gleaming golden leaves , and all its branches crackle with bright gold . Since [I]0-i was coming from [there]1500-there , by some chance , [I]0-i had three golden apples in [my]0-i hand , which [I]0-i had plucked . With them [I]0-i planned to aid [Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes . While quite invisible to all but [him]3274-the young hippomenes , [I]0-i taught [him]3274-the young hippomenes how to use those golden apples for [his]3274-the young hippomenes benefit . The trumpet soon gave signal for the race and both of [them]3282-them crouching flashed quickly forth and skimmed the surface of the sandy course with flying feet . [You]3283-you might even think [those two]5397-those two could graze [the sea]1298-the sea with unwet feet and pass over the ripened heads of standing grain . Shouts of applause gave courage to [the youth]1554-the youth : [the cheering multitude]3287-the cheering multitude cried out to [him]3274-the young hippomenes : — “ Now is the time to use [your]3274-the young hippomenes strength . Go on ! [Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes ! Bend to the work ! [You]3274-the young hippomenes 're sure to win ! ”[3287-the cheering multitude] It must be doubted who was most rejoiced by those brave words , [[Megareus]1006-megareus of onchestus ' son]3288-megareus ' son , or [[Schoeneus]1007-schoeneus ' daughter]3289-schoeneus ' daughter . Oh , how often , when [she]3289-schoeneus ' daughter could have passed [him]3274-the young hippomenes , [she]3289-schoeneus ' daughter delayed [her]3289-schoeneus ' daughter speed ; and after gazing long upon [his]3274-the young hippomenes face reluctantly again would pass [him]3274-the young hippomenes ! Now dry panting breath came from [his]3274-the young hippomenes weary throat — the goal still far away . — Then [Neptune]472-neptune 's scion threw one of three gold apples . [Atalanta]913-atalanta with wonder saw it — eager to possess the shining fruit , [she]913-atalanta turned out of [her]913-atalanta course , picked up the rolling gold . [Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes passed by [her]913-atalanta , while [spectators]3290-spectators roared applause . Increasing speed , [she]913-atalanta overcame delay , made up for time lost , and again [she]913-atalanta left [the youth]1554-the youth behind . [She]913-atalanta was delayed again because [he]3274-the young hippomenes tossed another golden apple . [She]913-atalanta followed [him]3274-the young hippomenes , and passed [him]3274-the young hippomenes in the race . The last part of the course remained . [He]3274-the young hippomenes cried “ Be near [me]3274-the young hippomenes , [goddess]1607-goddess , while [I]3274-the young hippomenes use [your]1607-goddess gift . ”[3274-the young hippomenes] With youthful might [he]3274-the young hippomenes threw the shining gold , in an oblique direction to the side , so that pursuit would mean a slow return . [The virgin]5026-the virgin seemed to hesitate , in doubt whether to follow after this third prize . [I]0-i forced [her]5026-the virgin to turn for it ; take it up ; and , adding weight to the gold fruit , [she]5026-the virgin held , impeded [her]5026-the virgin with weight and loss of time . For fear [my]0-i narrative may stretch beyond the race itself , — [the maiden]5425-the maiden was outstripped ; [Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes then led [his]1005-hippomenes prize away . [Adonis]1003-adonis , did [I]0-i not deserve [his]1003-adonis thanks with tribute of sweet incense ? But [he]1003-adonis was ungrateful , and , forgetful of [my]0-i help , [he]1003-adonis gave [me]0-i neither frankincense nor thanks . Such conduct threw [me]0-i into sudden wrath , and , fretting at the slight , [I]0-i felt [I]0-i must not be despised at any future time . [I]0-i told [myself]0-i ' twas only right to make a just example of [them]3294-their . [They]3294-their were near [a temple]3295-a temple , hidden in [the forest]5365-the forest , which glorious [Echion]568-echion in remembered time had built to [Rhea]1008-rhea , [Mother of [the gods]1395-the gods]3297-mother of the gods , in payment of a vow . So , wearied from the distance traveled , [they]3294-their were glad to have a needed rest . [Hippomenes]1005-hippomenes while [there]1500-there , was seized with love [his]1005-hippomenes heart could not control . — a passion caused by [my]0-i divinity . Quite near [the temple]4988-the temple was [a cave - like place , covered with pumice . [It]3301-a cave - like place , covered with pumice . it was hallowed by religious veneration of the past was hallowed by religious veneration of the past]3301-a cave - like place , covered with pumice . it was hallowed by religious veneration of the past . Within the shadows of [that place]5935-that place , [a priest]3303-a priest had stationed many wooden images of [olden gods]3304-olden gods . [The lovers]3305-the lovers entered [there]1500-there and desecrated [it]1500-there . The images were scandalized , and turned [their]3305-the lovers eyes away . [The tower - crowned Mother]3307-the tower - crowned mother , [Cybele]988-cybele , at first prepared to plunge [the guilty pair beneath the waves of Styx]3308-the guilty pair beneath the waves of styx , but such a punishment seemed light . And so [their]3294-their necks , that had been smooth . Were covered instantly with tawny manes ; [their]3294-their fingers bent to claws ; [their]3294-their arms were changed to fore - legs ; and [their]3294-their bosoms held [their]3294-their weight ; and with [their]3294-their tails [they]3294-their swept [the sandy ground]3309-the sandy ground . [Their]3294-their casual glance is anger , and instead of words [they]3294-their utter growls . [They]3294-their haunt [the woods]1317-the woods , [a bridal - room to [their]3294-their ferocious taste]3311-a bridal - room to their ferocious taste . And now fierce lions [they]3294-their are terrible to all of life ; except to [Cybele]988-cybele ; whose harness has subdued [their]3294-their champing jaws . [[My]0-i dear]3230-my dear [Adonis]1003-adonis keep away from all such savage animals ; avoid all those which do not turn [their]3294-their fearful backs in flight but offer [their]3294-their bold breasts to [your]3313-your attack , lest courage should be fatal to [us]3314-us both . Indeed [she]988-cybele warned [him]1003-adonis . — Harnessing [her]988-cybele swans , [she]988-cybele traveled swiftly through the yielding air ; but [his]1003-adonis rash courage would not heed advice . By chance [his]1003-adonis dogs , which followed a sure track , aroused a wild boar from [his]1003-adonis hiding place ; and , as [he]1003-adonis rushed out from [[his]1003-adonis forest lair]3315-his forest lair , [Adonis]1003-adonis pierced [him]1003-adonis with a glancing stroke . Infuriate , the fierce boar 's curved snout first struck the spear - shaft from [his]1003-adonis bleeding side ; and , while [the trembling youth]1553-the trembling youth was seeking where to find a safe retreat , the savage beast raced after [him]1003-adonis , until at last [he]1003-adonis sank [his]1003-adonis deadly tusk deep in [Adonis]1003-adonis ' groin ; and stretched [him]1003-adonis dying on the yellow sand . And now [sweet [Aphrodite]652-aphrodite , borne through air in [her]652-aphrodite light chariot]3317-sweet aphrodite , borne through air in her light chariot , had not yet arrived at [Cyprus]284-cyprus , on the wings of [her]652-aphrodite white swans . Afar [she]652-aphrodite recognized [his]1003-adonis dying groans , and turned [her]652-aphrodite white birds towards the sound . And when down looking from the lofty sky , [she]652-aphrodite saw [him]1003-adonis nearly dead , [his]1003-adonis body bathed in blood , [she]652-aphrodite leaped down — tore [her]652-aphrodite garment — tore [her]652-aphrodite hair — and beat [her]652-aphrodite bosom with distracted hands . And blaming [Fate]959-fate said , “ But not everything is at the mercy of [your]3318-your cruel power . [My]959-fate sorrow for [Adonis]1003-adonis will remain , enduring as a lasting monument . Each passing year the memory of [his]1003-adonis death shall cause an imitation of [my]959-fate grief . “[959-fate] [Your]3318-your blood , [Adonis]1003-adonis , will become a flower perennial . Was it not allowed to [you]3318-your [Persephone]984-persephone , to transform [Menthe]1009-menthe 's limbs into sweet fragrant mint ? And can this change of [[my]0-i loved hero]3319-my loved hero be denied to [me]0-i ? ” [Her]652-aphrodite grief declared , [she]652-aphrodite sprinkled [his]1003-adonis blood with sweet - smelling nectar , and [his]1003-adonis blood as soon as touched by it began to effervesce , just as transparent bubbles always rise in rainy weather . Nor was there a pause more than an hour , when from [Adonis]1003-adonis , blood , exactly of its color , a loved flower sprang up , such as pomegranates give to [us]7671-us , small trees which later hide their seeds beneath a tough rind . But the joy it gives to [man]1330-man is short - lived , for the winds which give the flower its name , Anemone , shake it right down , because its slender hold , always so weak , lets it fall to the ground from its frail stem . While with [his]1003-adonis songs , [Orpheus]981-orpheus , [the bard of [Thrace]148-thrace]7673-the bard of thrace , allured the trees , the savage animals , and even the insensate rocks , to follow [him]1003-adonis ; [Ciconian matrons , with [their]7674-ciconian matrons , with their raving breasts concealed in skins of forest animals , from the summit of a hill raving breasts concealed in skins of forest animals , from [the summit of a hill]7675-the summit of a hill]7674-ciconian matrons , with their raving breasts concealed in skins of forest animals , from the summit of a hill observed [him]1003-adonis there , attuning love songs to a sounding harp . [One of [those women]5916-those women]7676-one of those women , as [her]7676-one of those women tangled hair was tossed upon the light breeze shouted , “[3320-the poet who has scorned our love] See ! Here is [the poet who has scorned [our]3321-their love]3320-the poet who has scorned our love ! ” Then hurled [her]7676-one of those women spear at the melodious mouth of [great [Apollo]549-phoebus 's bard]7678-great apollo 's bard : but the spear 's point , trailing in flight a garland of fresh leaves , made but a harmless bruise and wounded not . The weapon of another was a stone , which in the very air was overpowered by the true harmony of [his]1003-adonis voice and lyre , and so disabled lay before [his]1003-adonis feet , as asking pardon for that vain attempt . The madness of such warfare then increased . All moderation is entirely lost , and a wild Fury overcomes the right . — although [their]3321-their weapons would have lost all force , subjected to the power of [Orpheus]981-orpheus ' harp , the clamorous discord of [their]3321-their boxwood pipes , the blaring of [their]3321-their horns , [their]3321-their tambourines and clapping hands and Bacchanalian yells , with hideous discords drowned [his]981-orpheus voice and harp . — at last the stones that heard [his]981-orpheus song no more fell crimson with [the Thracian poet]7679-the thracian poet 's blood . Before [his]981-orpheus life was taken , [the maenads]7680-the maenads turned [their]7680-the maenads threatening hands upon the many birds , which still were charmed by [Orpheus]981-orpheus as [he]981-orpheus sang , the serpents , and the company of beasts — [fabulous audience of [that worshipped bard]7682-that worshipped bard]7681-fabulous audience of that worshipped bard . And then [they]7680-the maenads turned on [him]981-orpheus [their]7680-the maenads blood - stained hands : and flocked together swiftly , as wild birds , which , by some chance , may see the bird of night beneath the sun . And as the savage dogs rush on the doomed stag , loosed some bright fore - noon , on blood - sand of the amphitheatre ; [they]7680-the maenads rushed against [the bard]7432-the bard , with swift hurled thyrsi which , adorned with emerald leaves had not till then been used for cruelty . And some threw clods , and others branches torn from trees ; and [others]4906-others threw flint stones at [him]981-orpheus , and , that no lack of weapons might restrain [their]7680-the maenads savage fury then , not far from there by chance [they]7680-the maenads found some oxen which turned up the soil with ploughshares , and in [fields nearby]7685-fields nearby were [strong - armed peasants , who with eager sweat worked for the harvest as [they]7686-strong - armed peasants , who with eager sweat worked for the harvest as they dug hard fields dug [hard fields]7687-hard fields]7686-strong - armed peasants , who with eager sweat worked for the harvest as they dug hard fields ; and [all those peasants]7688-all those peasants , when [they]7688-all those peasants saw [the troop of [frantic women]7690-frantic women]7689-the troop of frantic women , ran away and left [their]7688-all those peasants implements of labor strown upon [deserted fields]7691-deserted fields — harrows and heavy rakes and [their]7688-all those peasants long spades after [the savage mob]7692-the savage mob had seized upon those implements , and torn to pieces oxen armed with threatening horns , [they]7680-the maenads hastened to destroy [the harmless bard]7693-the harmless bard , devoted [Orpheus]981-orpheus ; and with impious hate , murdered [him]981-orpheus , while [his]981-orpheus out - stretched hands implored [their]7680-the maenads mercy — the first and only time [his]981-orpheus voice had no persuasion . O great [Jupiter]475-jupiter ! Through those same lips which had controlled the rocks and which had overcome ferocious beasts , [his]981-orpheus life breathed forth , departed in the air . The mournful birds , the stricken animals , the hard stones and [the weeping woods]7694-the weeping woods , all these that often had followed [your]7695-your inspiring voice , bewailed [your]7695-your death ; while trees dropped their green leaves , mourning for [you]7695-your , as if [they]7680-the maenads tore [their]7680-the maenads hair . [They]7680-the maenads say [sad rivers]7696-sad rivers swelled with [their]7680-the maenads own tears — [naiads]7697-naiads and [dryads with dishevelled hair]7698-dryads with dishevelled hair wore garments of dark color . [His]981-orpheus torn limbs were scattered in strange places . [Hebrus]1010-hebrus then received [his]981-orpheus head and harp — and , wonderful ! While [his]981-orpheus loved harp was floating down [the stream]5090-the stream , it mourned for [him]981-orpheus beyond [my]3320-the poet who has scorned our love power to tell . [His]981-orpheus tongue though lifeless , uttered a mournful sound and mournfully [[the river]6228-the river 's banks]7701-the river 's banks replied : onward borne by [the river]6228-the river to [the sea]1298-the sea [they]7680-the maenads left [[their]7680-the maenads native stream]7704-their native stream and reached [the shore of [Lesbos]285-lesbos at [Methymna]286-methymna]7705-the shore of lesbos at methymna . Instantly , a furious serpent rose to attack the head of [Orpheus]981-orpheus , cast up on [that foreign sand]7706-that foreign sand — the hair still wet with spray . [Phoebus]549-phoebus at last appeared and saved the head from that attack : before the serpent could inflict a sting , [he]549-phoebus drove it off , and hardened its wide jaws to rigid stone . Meanwhile the fleeting shade of [Orpheus]981-orpheus had descended under [earth]1287-earth : remembering now [those regions that [he]981-orpheus saw when there before]7708-those regions that he saw when there before , [he]981-orpheus sought [Eurydice]982-eurydice through fields frequented by the blest ; and when [he]981-orpheus found [her]982-eurydice , folded [her]982-eurydice in eager arms . Then lovingly [they]7709-they wandered side by side , or [he]981-orpheus would follow when [she]982-eurydice chose to lead , or at another time [he]981-orpheus walked in front , looking back , safely , — at [Eurydice]982-eurydice . [Bacchus]617-bacchus would not permit the wickedness of those who slaughtered [Orpheus]981-orpheus to remain unpunished . Grieving for the loss of [his]617-bacchus loved bard of sacred rites , at once [he]617-bacchus bound with twisted roots the feet of [everyone of [those Edonian women who had caused the crime of [Orpheus]981-orpheus ' death]7711-those edonian women who had caused the crime of orpheus ' death]7710-everyone of those edonian women who had caused the crime of orpheus ' death . [Their]7710-everyone of those edonian women who had caused the crime of orpheus ' death toes grew long . [He]617-bacchus thrust the sharp points in the solid earth . As when a bird entangled in a snare , hid by [the cunning fowler]7712-the cunning fowler , knows too late that it is held , then vainly beats its wings , and fluttering only makes more tight the noose with every struggle ; so [each woman - fiend whose feet were sinking in the soil]7713-each woman - fiend whose feet were sinking in the soil , when [she]7713-each woman - fiend whose feet were sinking in the soil attempted flight , was held by deepening roots . And while [she]982-eurydice looks down where [her]982-eurydice toes and nails and feet should be , [she]982-eurydice sees wood growing up from them and covering all [her]982-eurydice graceful legs . Full of delirious grief , endeavoring to smite with right hand on [her]982-eurydice changing thigh , [she]982-eurydice strikes on solid oak . [Her]982-eurydice tender breast and shoulders are transformed to rigid oak . [You]7714-you would declare that [her]982-eurydice extended arms are real branches of a forest tree , and such a thought would be the very truth . And not content with this , [Bacchus]617-bacchus resolved to leave [that land]5048-that land , and with [a worthier train]7716-a worthier train went to [the vineyards of [[his]617-bacchus own Tmolus]7718-his own tmolus]7717-the vineyards of his own tmolus and to [Pactolus]171-pactolus , though [the river]6228-the river was not golden , nor admired for precious sands . [[His]617-bacchus usual throng of [Satyrs]1417-satyrs and of [Bacchanals]7722-bacchanals]7720-his usual throng of satyrs and of bacchanals surrounded [him]617-bacchus ; but not [Silenus]625-silenus , who was then detained from [him]617-bacchus . [The Phrygian folk]7723-the phrygian folk had captured [him]617-bacchus , as [he]617-bacchus was staggering , faint with palsied age and wine . And after [they]7723-the phrygian folk bound [him]617-bacchus in garlands , [they]7723-the phrygian folk led [him]617-bacchus to [[their]7723-the phrygian folk king]6737-their king [Midas]1012-midas , to whom with [the Cecropian Eumolpus]1013-the cecropian eumolpus , [Thracian Orpheus]981-orpheus had shown all the Bacchic rites . When [Midas]1012-midas recognized [[his]1012-midas old time friend [Silenus]625-silenus , who had been so often [[his]1012-midas companion in the rites of [Bacchus]617-bacchus]7726-his companion in the rites of bacchus , [he]1012-midas kept joyful festival , with [[his]1012-midas old comrade]7727-his old comrade]7725-his old time friend silenus , who had been so often his companion in the rites of bacchus , he kept joyful festival , with his old comrade , twice five days and nights . Upon the eleventh day , when [Lucifer]513-lucifer had dimmed the lofty multitude of stars , [King Midas]1012-midas and [Silenus]625-silenus went from [there]1500-there joyful together to [the Lydian lands]7729-the lydian lands . There [Midas]1012-midas put [Silenus]625-silenus carefully under the care of [[his]1012-midas loved foster - child]7730-his loved foster - child , [young Bacchus]617-bacchus . [He]625-silenus with great delight , because [he]625-silenus had [[his]625-silenus foster - father]7731-his foster - father once again , allowed [the king]6107-the king to choose [his]6107-the king own reward — a welcome offer , but it led to harm . And [Midas]1012-midas made this ill - advised reply : “[3320-the poet who has scorned our love] Cause whatsoever [I]0-i shall touch to change at once to yellow gold . ” [Bacchus]617-bacchus agreed to [his]617-bacchus unfortunate request , with grief that [Midas]1012-midas chose for harm and not for good . [The Berecynthian hero]7733-the berecynthian hero , [king of [Phrygia]175-phrygia]7734-king of phrygia , with joy at [his]7733-the berecynthian hero misfortune went away , and instantly began to test the worth of [Bacchus]617-bacchus ' word by touching everything . Doubtful [himself]7733-the berecynthian hero of [his]7733-the berecynthian hero new power , [he]7733-the berecynthian hero pulled a twig down from a holm - oak , growing on a low hung branch . The twig was turned to gold . [He]7733-the berecynthian hero lifted up a dark stone from the ground and it turned pale with gold . [He]7733-the berecynthian hero touched a clod and by [his]7733-the berecynthian hero potent touch the clod became a mass of shining gold . [He]7733-the berecynthian hero plucked some ripe , dry spears of grain , and all that wheat [he]7733-the berecynthian hero touched was golden . Then [he]7733-the berecynthian hero held an apple which [he]7733-the berecynthian hero gathered from a tree , and [you]7735-you would think that [the Hesperides]7736-the hesperides had given [it]7737-it . If [he]7733-the berecynthian hero but touched a lofty door , at once each door - post seemed to glisten . When [he]7733-the berecynthian hero washed [his]7733-the berecynthian hero hands in liquid streams , the lustrous drops upon [his]7733-the berecynthian hero hands might have been those which once astonished [Danae]787-danae . [He]7733-the berecynthian hero could not now conceive [his]7733-the berecynthian hero large hopes in [his]7733-the berecynthian hero grasping mind , as [he]7733-the berecynthian hero imagined everything of gold . And , while [he]7733-the berecynthian hero was rejoicing in great wealth , [[his]7733-the berecynthian hero servants]5710-his servants set a table for [his]7733-the berecynthian hero meal , with many dainties and with needful bread : but when [he]7733-the berecynthian hero touched the gift of [Ceres]758-ceres with [his]7733-the berecynthian hero right hand , instantly the gift of [Ceres]758-ceres stiffened to gold ; or if [he]7733-the berecynthian hero tried to bite with hungry teeth a tender bit of meat , the dainty , as [his]7733-the berecynthian hero teeth but touched it , shone at once with yellow shreds and flakes of gold . And wine , another gift of [Bacchus]617-bacchus , when [he]7733-the berecynthian hero mixed it in pure water , can be seen in [his]7733-the berecynthian hero astonished mouth as liquid gold . Confounded by [his]7733-the berecynthian hero strange misfortune — rich and wretched — [he]7733-the berecynthian hero was anxious to escape from [his]7733-the berecynthian hero unhappy wealth . [He]7733-the berecynthian hero hated all [he]7733-the berecynthian hero had so lately longed for . [Plenty]1014-plenty could not lessen hunger and no remedy relieved [his]7733-the berecynthian hero dry , parched throat . The hated gold tormented [him]7733-the berecynthian hero no more than [he]7733-the berecynthian hero deserved . Lifting [his]7733-the berecynthian hero hands and shining arms to heaven , [he]7733-the berecynthian hero moaned . “[0-i] Oh pardon [me]0-i , [father [Lenaeus]1015-lenaeus]3322-father lenaeus ! [I]0-i have done wrong , but pity [me]0-i , [I]0-i pray , and save [me]0-i from this curse that looked so fair . ” How patient are [the gods]1395-the gods ! [Bacchus]617-bacchus forthwith , because [King Midas]1012-midas had confessed [his]1012-midas fault , restored [him]617-bacchus and annulled the promise given , annulled the favor granted , and [he]1012-midas said : “[0-i] That [you]3323-you may not be always cased in gold , which [you]3323-you unhappily desired , depart to [the stream that flows by [that great town of Sardis]3325-that great town of sardis and upward trace [its]3324-the stream that flows by that great town of sardis and upward trace its waters waters]3324-the stream that flows by that great town of sardis and upward trace its waters , as [they]3326-they glide past [Lydian heights]3327-lydian heights , until [you]3323-you find [[their]3326-they source]3328-their source . Then , where the spring leaps out from [mountain rock]3329-mountain rock , plunge head and body in the snowy foam . At once the flood will take away [your]3323-you curse . ” [King Midas]1012-midas did as [he]1012-midas was told and plunged beneath the water at [[the river]6228-the river 's source]7741-the river 's source . And the gold virtue granted by [the god]5013-the god , as it departed from [his]1012-midas body , tinged [the stream]5090-the stream with gold . And even to this hour [adjoining fields]7744-adjoining fields , touched by this ancient vein of gold , are hardened where [the river]6228-the river flows and colored with the gold that [Midas]1012-midas left . Abhorring riches [he]1012-midas inhabited [the woods and fields]7746-the woods and fields , and followed [Pan]496-pan who dwells always in [mountain - caves]7747-mountain - caves : but still obtuse remained , from which [his]1012-midas foolish mind again , by an absurd decision , harmed [his]1012-midas life . [He]1012-midas followed [Pan]496-pan up to [the lofty mount Tmolus]7748-the lofty mount tmolus , which from [its]7748-the lofty mount tmolus great height looks far across [the sea]1298-the sea . Steep and erect [it]7748-the lofty mount tmolus stands between [great Sardis]287-great sardis and the small Hypaepa . While [Pan]496-pan was boasting [there]1500-there to mountain nymphs of [his]496-pan great skill in music , and while [he]496-pan was warbling a gay tune upon the reeds , cemented with soft wax , in [his]496-pan conceit [he]496-pan dared to boast to [them]7751-them how [he]496-pan despised [Apollo]549-phoebus 's music when compared with [his]549-phoebus — . At last to prove it , [he]496-pan agreed to stand against [Apollo]549-phoebus in a contest which it was agreed should be decided by [Tmolus]1016-tmolus as [[their]7751-them umpire]7752-their umpire . [This old god]7753-this old god sat down on [[his]7753-this old god own mountain]7754-his own mountain , and first eased [his]7753-this old god ears of many mountain growing trees , oak leaves were wreathed upon [his]7753-this old god azure hair and acorns from [his]7753-this old god hollow temples hung . First to [the Shepherd - god Tmolus]1016-tmolus spoke : “[0-i] [My]0-i judgment shall be [yours]3330-yours with no delay . [Pan]496-pan made some rustic sounds on [his]496-pan rough reeds , delighting [Midas]1012-midas with [his]496-pan uncouth notes ; for [Midas]1012-midas chanced to be there when [he]496-pan played . When [Pan]496-pan had ceased , [divine Tmolus]1016-tmolus turned to [Phoebus]549-phoebus , and [the forest]5365-the forest likewise turned just as [he]0-i moved . [Apollo]549-phoebus 's golden locks were richly wreathed with fresh Parnassian laurel ; [his]549-phoebus robe of Tyrian purple swept the ground ; [his]549-phoebus left hand held [his]549-phoebus lyre , adorned with gems and Indian ivory . [His]549-phoebus right hand held the plectrum — as [an artist]3332-an artist [he]549-phoebus stood there before [Tmolus]1016-tmolus , while [his]549-phoebus skilful thumb touching the strings made charming melody . Delighted with [Apollo]549-phoebus 's artful touch , [Tmolus]1016-tmolus ordered [Pan]496-pan to hold [his]496-pan reeds excelled by beauty of [Apollo]549-phoebus 's lyre . That judgment of [the sacred mountain god]3333-the sacred mountain god pleased all those present , all but [Midas]1012-midas , who blaming [Tmolus]1016-tmolus called the award unjust . [The Delian god]3334-the delian god forbids [his]3334-the delian god stupid ears to hold their native human shape ; and , drawing them out to a hideous length , [he]3334-the delian god fills them with gray hairs , and makes them both unsteady , wagging at the lower part : still human , only this one part condemned , [Midas]1012-midas had ears of a slow - moving ass . [Midas]1012-midas , careful to hide [his]1012-midas long ears , wore a purple turban over both , which hid [his]1012-midas foul disgrace from laughter . But one day [a servant]3335-a servant , who was chosen to cut [his]3335-a servant [hair with steel , when it was long]3336-hair with steel , when it was long , saw [his]3335-a servant disgrace . [He]3335-a servant did not dare reveal what [he]3335-a servant had seen , but eager , to disclose the secret , dug a shallow hole , and in a low voice told what kind of ears were on [[his]3335-a servant master]1634-his master 's head . All this [he]3335-a servant whispered in [the hollow earth]3338-the hollow earth [he]3335-a servant dug , and then [he]3335-a servant buried all [he]3335-a servant said by throwing back the loose earth in the hole so everything was silent when [he]3335-a servant left . A grove thick set with quivering reeds began to grow there , and when it matured , about twelve months after [that servant]3339-that servant left , the grove betrayed [its planter]3340-its planter . For , moved by a gentle [South Wind]288-south wind , it repeated all the words which [he]3335-a servant had whispered , and disclosed from earth the secret of [[his]3335-a servant master]1634-his master 's ears . [His]3335-a servant vengence now complete , [[Latona]798-latona 's son]3342-latona 's son borne through the liquid air , departed from [Tmolus]1016-tmolus , and then rested on [the land of]3343-the land of [Laomedon]782-laomedon , this side [the narrow sea dividing [Phrygia]175-phrygia]3344-the narrow sea dividing phrygia from [the land of [Thrace]148-thrace]3345-the land of thrace . [The promontory of Sigaeum right and on the left]3346-the promontory of sigaeum right and on the left [Rhoetaeum]1017-rhoetaeum loftily arose ; and at that place an ancient altar had been dedicated to [great Jove]456-jove , [the god Panomphaean]3347-the god panomphaean . And near [that place]5935-that place [he]3335-a servant saw [laomedon]782-laomedon , beginning then to build [the walls of [famous Troy]250-troy]3349-the walls of famous troy . [He]3335-a servant was convinced the task exceeded all the power of [man]1330-man , requiring great resource . Together with [the trident - bearing father of [the deep]1961-the deep]3351-the trident - bearing father of the deep , [he]3335-a servant assumed a mortal form : and [those two gods]3353-those two gods agreed to labor for a sum of gold and built the mighty wall . But [that false king]3354-that false king refused all payment , adding perjury to [his]3354-that false king false bargaining . [Neptune]472-neptune , enraged , said , “ [You]3335-a servant shall not escape [your]3335-a servant punishment . ”[472-neptune] And [he]472-neptune drove all [his]472-neptune waters high upon [the shores of [Troy]250-troy]3355-the shores of troy — built there through perfidy . [The sad land]3356-the sad land seemed [a sea]3357-a sea : the hard - earned wealth of all [[its]3356-the sad land farmers]3358-its farmers was destroyed and overwhelmed by furious waves . This awful punishment was not enough . [The daughter of [the king]6107-the king]3359-the daughter of the king was soon required as food for [a sea - monster]3361-a sea - monster — . [Hesione]1018-hesione was chained to rugged rocks . But [Hercules]857-hercules delivered from all harm [the royal maid]5452-the royal maid and justly [he]857-hercules demanded of [the king]6107-the king , [[her]5452-the royal maid father]5022-her father , payment of the promised steeds ; but [that perfidious king]3365-that perfidious king refused to keep [his]3365-that perfidious king promise . [Hercules]857-hercules enraged , because all payment was denied to [him]857-hercules for [his]857-hercules great service , captured the twice - perjured walls of conquered [Troy]250-troy . And as a fair reward , [he]857-hercules gave to [Telamon]866-telamon , who fought for [him]857-hercules , [Hesione]1018-hesione , [loved daughter of [that king]6236-that king]3366-loved daughter of that king . For [Peleus]872-peleus had [a goddess]5320-a goddess as [[his]872-peleus bride]2050-his bride and [he]872-peleus was prouder of [[his]872-peleus father - in - law]6448-his father - in - law than of [[his]872-peleus grandsire]5706-his grandsire . Since not [he]872-peleus alone was [grandson of [great Jove]456-jove]3372-grandson of great jove , but [he]872-peleus alone was honored with a goddess for [a wife]6650-a wife . To [Thetis]1019-thetis , [aged Proteus]928-proteus once had said , “ [Oh goddess of [the waves]2151-the waves]7755-oh goddess of the waves , [you]1019-thetis shall conceive , and [you]1019-thetis shall be [the mother of a youth who by heroic actions will surpass the deeds of [[his]872-peleus own father]7758-his own father , and [[your]1019-thetis son]1935-your son shall be superior to [[his]872-peleus father]1530-his father 's power]7757-the mother of a youth who by heroic actions will surpass the deeds of his own father , and your son shall be superior to his father 's power . ”[928-proteus] So [Jupiter]475-jupiter , although the flame of love for [Thetis]1019-thetis burned [his]475-jupiter breast , would not embrace [the lovely daughter of [the sea]1298-the sea]3374-the lovely daughter of the sea , and urged [[his]475-jupiter grandson]5948-his grandson [Peleus]872-peleus , [son of Aeacus]2648-son of aeacus , to [we]3378-we d [the green haired maid]3379-the green haired maid without delay . There is [a curved bay of [Haemonia]152-haemonia]3380-a curved bay of haemonia , where like an arch , two bending arms project out in the waves , as if to form [a harbor]3381-a harbor ; but [the water]6010-the water is not deep — although enough to hide [a shoal of sand]3383-a shoal of sand . [It]3380-a curved bay of haemonia has a firm shore which will not retain a foot 's impression , nor delay the step — no seaweeds grow in [that vicinity]3384-that vicinity . There is a grove of myrtle near [that place]5935-that place thick - hung with berries , blended of twin shades . [A cave within the middle of that grove]3386-a cave within the middle of that grove is found , and whether it was formed by art or nature is not known , although it seems a work of art . There [Thetis]1019-thetis often went , quite naked , seated on [her]1019-thetis dolphin , which was harnessed . [Peleus]872-peleus seized [her]1019-thetis there when [she]1019-thetis was fast asleep : and after [he]872-peleus had tried to win [her]1019-thetis by entreaties , while [she]1019-thetis long continued to resist [him]872-peleus , [he]872-peleus resolved to conquer [her]1019-thetis by violence , and seized [her]1019-thetis neck with both arms . [She]1019-thetis resorted then to all [her]1019-thetis usual art , and often changed : [her]1019-thetis shape as it was known , so that [he]872-peleus failed in [his]872-peleus attempt . At first [she]1019-thetis was a bird , but while [she]1019-thetis seemed [a bird]3387-a bird [he]872-peleus held [her]1019-thetis fast ; and then [she]1019-thetis changed [herself]1019-thetis to a large tree , and [Peleus]872-peleus clung with ardor to the tree ; [her]1019-thetis third disguise was as a spotted tigress , which frightened [him]872-peleus so that [he]872-peleus lost [his]872-peleus hold . Then , as [he]872-peleus poured wine on [the heaving sea]3388-the heaving sea , [he]872-peleus prayed unto the sea green gods and gave [them]3389-them sacrifice of sheep entrails , and smoke of frankincense . [He]872-peleus ceased not , till at last [the prophet of [Carpathia]290-carpathia]3390-the prophet of carpathia , as [he]3390-the prophet of carpathia rose up from a deep wave , said , “ Hark unto [me]3390-the prophet of carpathia , [O son of [Aeacus]865-aeacus]7761-o son of aeacus ! and [you]7761-o son of aeacus shall have [the bride]6113-the bride [your]7761-o son of aeacus heart desires : when [she]6113-the bride at rest lies sleeping in the cool wave , [you]7761-o son of aeacus must bind [her]6113-the bride while [she]6113-the bride is unwary , with strong cords and complicated bonds , And never let [her]6113-the bride arts deceive [you]7761-o son of aeacus when [she]6113-the bride imitates a hundred varied forms , but hold [her]6113-the bride fast , whatever [she]6113-the bride may seem , until [she]6113-the bride shall at length assume the shape [she]6113-the bride had at first . ”[3390-the prophet of carpathia] So [Proteus]928-proteus cautioned [him]3390-the prophet of carpathia , and hid [his]3390-the prophet of carpathia face beneath the waves as [his]3390-the prophet of carpathia last words were said . Now [Titan]818-titan was descending and the pole of [[his]818-titan bright chariot]3391-his bright chariot as it downward bent illuminated [the Hesperian main]291-the hesperian main ; and at that time the lovely Nereid , Thetis , departing from [her]3392-her ocean wave , entered [the cavern]5485-the cavern for desired repose . [Peleus]872-peleus was waiting [there]1500-there . Immediately , just as [he]872-peleus seized upon [the virgin]5026-the virgin 's limbs , [she]5026-the virgin changed [her]5026-the virgin shape and perservered until convinced [she]5026-the virgin could not overcome [his]872-peleus hold — for [her]5026-the virgin two arms were forced apart — [she]5026-the virgin groaned and said , “ [You]872-peleus could not overcome [me]5026-the virgin in this way , but some divinity has given [you]872-peleus the power . ”[5026-the virgin] Then [she]5026-the virgin appeared as [Thetis]1019-thetis : and , when [Peleus]872-peleus saw [her]5026-the virgin now deprived of all deceptions , [he]872-peleus embraced [her]5026-the virgin and was [father of [the great Achilles]3397-the great achilles]6947-father of the great achilles . [Great Peleus]872-peleus ' heart was filled with happiness ; because of [[his]872-peleus great son]3398-his great son and [Thetis]1019-thetis [[his]872-peleus dear wife]2622-his dear wife : [he]872-peleus was blest in everything , except in killing [Phocus]867-phocus . [The Trachinian land]3400-the trachinian land received [him]872-peleus guilty of [[his]872-peleus brother]2004-his brother 's blood ; when [he]872-peleus fled , banished from [[his]872-peleus native home]3402-his native home . There [Ceyx]1020-ceyx , who had the fine countenance of Lucifer [[his]1020-ceyx father]1530-his father , reigned as [king , without the cost of violence or blood]3404-king , without the cost of violence or blood . Before this time [his]872-peleus days had always given [him]872-peleus joy and comfort , but all now was changed , for [he]872-peleus was mourning [a loved brother]3405-a loved brother 's death . [Peleus]872-peleus , outwearied with [his]872-peleus journey 's length . Left [his]872-peleus fine flock of sheep and all the herds [he]872-peleus had brought with [him]872-peleus , not far from the walls of [that city]5869-that city , where [Ceyx]1020-ceyx long had reigned . [He]872-peleus told [the monarch]6443-the monarch who [he]872-peleus was , also [[his]872-peleus father]1530-his father 's name . But [he]872-peleus concealed [his]872-peleus crime , giving untruthful reasons for [his]872-peleus flight : and begged a refuge either in [town]3409-town or [field]3410-field . [The king of [Trachyn]292-trachyn]3411-the king of trachyn answered with kind words : “ Ah , [Peleus]872-peleus , even the lowest ranks enjoy [our]7763-our bounties and [our]7763-our hospitality , and [you]872-peleus bring with [you]872-peleus powers which compell attention and respect . [Your]872-peleus name is so illustrious , and is not Jupiter [[your]872-peleus grandsire]7764-your grandsire ? Do not lose [your]872-peleus time by such entreaties . Everything [you]872-peleus may desire is [yours]872-peleus as soon as known , and all [you]872-peleus see is partly [yours]872-peleus , but in how sad a state ! ”[3411-the king of trachyn] And then [he]872-peleus wept . When [Peleus]872-peleus and [[his]872-peleus friends]5709-his friends asked [him]872-peleus the reason of [his]872-peleus grief [he]872-peleus said , “ Perchance [you]872-peleus deem that bird which lives on prey , which is the terror of all other birds , had always feathered wings ? It was [a man]5610-a man . And now the vigor of its courage is as great as when well known by [[his]872-peleus man]7766-his man 's name , [Daedalion]1021-daedalion , bold in wars and strong and harsh , and not afraid to hazard violence . [[His]872-peleus father]1530-his father was unequalled [Lucifer]513-lucifer , star of the Morning , who at dawn brings forth [Aurora]512-aurora , and withdraws the last of all the shining stars of heaven . — [[My]872-peleus brother]6054-my brother named [daedalion]1021-daedalion , [son of that great star]7769-son of that great star , was fond of cruel warfare , while [I]872-peleus cherished peace and loved the quiet of [my]872-peleus married life . [This brother , powerful in the art of war]7770-this brother , powerful in the art of war , subdued [strong kings]7771-strong kings and nations . — And ' tis [he]6054-my brother transformed from manhood , now a bird of prey , that so relentlessly pursues the doves , known as the pride of [Thisbe 's citizens]7772-thisbe 's citizens . “[872-peleus] [[My]0-i brother]6054-my brother had [a daughter Chione]3414-a daughter chione so beautiful [she]3414-a daughter chione pleased [a thousand men]3415-a thousand men , when [she]3414-a daughter chione had reached the marriageable age of twice seven years . It happened by some chance that [Phoebus]549-phoebus and [the son of [Maia]491-maia , who returned — one from [[his]549-phoebus Delphi]3417-his delphi , the other from [[Cyllene]850-cyllene 's heights]3418-cyllene 's heights]3416-the son of maia , who returned — one from his delphi , the other from cyllene 's heights — beheld [this lovely maid both at the same time , and were both inflamed with passion]3419-this lovely maid both at the same time , and were both inflamed with passion . [Phoebus]549-phoebus waited till the night . [Hermes]651-hermes could not endure delay and with the magic of [his]651-hermes wand , that causes sleep , [he]651-hermes touched [the virgin]5026-the virgin 's face ; and instantly , as if entranced , [she]5026-the virgin lay there fast asleep , and suffered violence from [the ardent god]3421-the ardent god . When night bespangled [the wide heaven]3422-the wide heaven with stars , [Phoebus]549-phoebus became [an aged crone]3423-an aged crone and gained the joy [he]549-phoebus had deferred until that hour . “ When [her]5026-the virgin mature womb had completed time [Autolycus]1022-autolycus was born , [a crafty son]7773-a crafty son , who certainly inherited the skill of [wingfoot Mereury]1023-wingfoot mereury , [[his]1025-philammon artful sire]7774-his artful sire , notorious now ; for every kind of theft . In fact , [Autolycus]1022-autolycus with [Mercury]492-mercury 's craft , loved to make white of black , and black of white . “[549-phoebus] But [[Phoebus]549-phoebus ' child]3424-phoebus ' child , for [Chione]1024-chione bore [twins]6370-twins , was named [Philammon]1025-philammon , like [[his]1025-philammon sire]3426-his sire , well known . To [all men]1428-all men for the beauty of [his]1025-philammon song . And famous for [his]1025-philammon handling of the lyre . “ What benefit in life did [she]5026-the virgin obtain because [she]5026-the virgin pleased ! [two gods]7775-two gods and bore such twins ? Was [she]5026-the virgin blest by good fortune then because [she]5026-the virgin was [the daughter of [a valiant father]7777-a valiant father]7776-the daughter of a valiant father , and even [the grandchild of [the Morning Star]1026-the morning star]7778-the grandchild of the morning star ? Can glory be a curse ? Often it is . “[1025-philammon] And surely it was so for [Chione]1024-chione . It was a prejudice that harmed [her]1024-chione days because [she]1024-chione vaunted that [she]1024-chione did surpass [Diana]484-diana 's beauty and decried [her]1024-chione charms : [the goddess in hot anger]3428-the goddess in hot anger answered [her]1024-chione , sarcastically , ‘ If [my]0-i face can not give satisfaction , let [me]0-i try [my]0-i deeds . ’ “ Without delay [Diana]484-diana bent [her]484-diana bow , and from the string an arrow swiftly flew , and pierced the vaunting tongue of [Chione]1024-chione . [Her]1024-chione tongue was silenced , and [she]1024-chione tried in vain to speak or make a sound , and while [she]1024-chione tried [her]1024-chione life departed with the flowing blood . “[1024-chione] Embracing [her]1024-chione , [I]0-i shared [[her]1024-chione father]5022-her father 's grief . [I]0-i spoke consoling words to [[my]0-i dear brother]3040-my dear brother , [he]3040-my dear brother heard them as [a cliff]3431-a cliff might hear [the sea]1298-the sea . And [he]3040-my dear brother lamented bitterly the loss of [[his]3040-my dear brother dear daughter]6431-his dear daughter , snatched away from [him]3040-my dear brother . “ Ah ! when [he]3040-my dear brother saw [her]6431-his dear daughter burning , [he]3040-my dear brother was filled with such an uncontrolled despair , [he]3040-my dear brother rushed four times to leap upon the blazing pyre ; and after [he]3040-my dear brother had been four times repulsed , [he]3040-my dear brother turned and rushed away in headlong flight through [trackless country]7779-trackless country , as [a bullock flees]7780-a bullock flees , [his]3040-my dear brother swollen neck pierced with sharp hornet - stings , it seemed to [me]3040-my dear brother [he]3040-my dear brother ran beyond the speed of [any human being]7781-any human being . [You]7782-you would think [his]3040-my dear brother feet had taken wings , [he]3040-my dear brother left [us]7783-us far behind and swift in [his]3040-my dear brother desire for death [he]3040-my dear brother stood at last upon [Parnassus]473-parnassus ' height . “[3040-my dear brother] [Apollo]549-phoebus pitied [him]549-phoebus . — And when [Daedalion]1021-daedalion leaped over [the steep cliff]3434-the steep cliff , [Apollo]549-phoebus 's power transformed [him]1021-daedalion to a bird ; supported [him]1021-daedalion while [he]1021-daedalion was hovering in the air upon uncertain wings , of such a sudden growth . [Apollo]549-phoebus , also , gave [him]1021-daedalion a curved beak , and to [his]1021-daedalion slender toes gave crooked claws . [His]1021-daedalion former courage still remains , with strength greater than usual in birds . [He]1021-daedalion changed to a fierce hawk ; cruel to all , [he]1021-daedalion vents [his]1021-daedalion rage on other birds . Grieving [himself]1021-daedalion [he]1021-daedalion is a cause of grief to [all [his]1021-daedalion kind]3435-all his kind . ” While [Ceyx]1020-ceyx , [the royal son of [Lucifer]513-lucifer]7784-the royal son of lucifer , told these great wonders of [[his]1020-ceyx brother]2004-his brother 's life ; [Onetor]7786-onetor , who had watched the while those herds which [Peleus]872-peleus had assigned to [him]1020-ceyx , ran up with panting speed ; and cried out as [he]1020-ceyx ran , “[872-peleus] [Peleus]872-peleus , [Peleus]872-peleus ! [I]0-i bring [you]872-peleus dreadful news ! ” [Peleus]872-peleus asked [him]1020-ceyx to tell what had gone wrong and with [King Ceyx]1020-ceyx [he]0-i listened in suspense . “[0-i] [I]0-i drove [the weary bullocks]3436-the weary bullocks to [the shore]5443-the shore , ” [Onetor]1027-onetor then began , “[0-i] About the time when the high burning Sun in middle course , could look back on as much as might be seen remaining : and [some cattle]3438-some cattle had then bent [their]3438-some cattle knees on yellow sand ; and as [they]3438-some cattle lay might view [the expanse of water stretched beyond]3439-the expanse of water stretched beyond . [Some with slow steps]3440-some with slow steps were wandering here and there , and [others swimming]3441-others swimming , stretched [their]3441-others swimming lofty necks above the waves . [A temple near [that sea]5917-that sea]3442-a temple near that sea was fair to view , although ' twas not adorned with gold nor marble . [It]3442-a temple near that sea was richly made of beams , and shaded with an ancient grove . “ [A sailor]7787-a sailor , while [he]7787-a sailor dried [his]7787-a sailor nets upon [the shore nearby]7788-the shore nearby , declared that [aged Nereus]467-nereus possessed it with [[his]467-nereus Nereids]7789-his nereids , as [the gods who ruled [the neighboring waters]7791-the neighboring waters]7790-the gods who ruled the neighboring waters . [Very near]7792-very near [it]6968-the marsh is [a marsh , made by the encroaching waves , all thickly covered with low willow trees]7793-a marsh , made by the encroaching waves , all thickly covered with low willow trees . “[3445-a monster - wolf] From there a loud uncanny crashing sound alarms [the neighborhood]3444-the neighborhood . [A monster - wolf]3445-a monster - wolf ! All stained with mud [he]3445-a monster - wolf breaks forth from [the marsh]6968-the marsh , [his]3445-a monster - wolf thundering jaws thick - covered with vile foam and clotted blood — [his]3445-a monster - wolf fierce eyes flashing flames of crimson : and though [he]3445-a monster - wolf was raging , both with fury and with hunger , the true cause of [his]3445-a monster - wolf fierce passions was Ferocity . “ [He]3445-a monster - wolf never paused to sate [his]3445-a monster - wolf ravenous hunger with the first cattle that [he]3445-a monster - wolf fell upon , but mangled the whole herd , as if at war . And some of [us]7794-we , while [we]7794-we defended [them]7795-them , were wounded with [his]3445-a monster - wolf fatal bite and killed . — [the shore]5443-the shore and nearest waves were red with blood , and [marshy fens]5067-marshy fens were filled with mournful sounds — the longings of [[our]7794-we cattle]7798-our cattle . — This delay is dangerous . [We]7794-we must not hesitate . [We]7794-we must unite before all is destroyed ! Take up [your]7799-your arms . Arm ! and unite , [I]3445-a monster - wolf say ! And bear [our]7794-we weapons for the cause of Right ! ”[3445-a monster - wolf] So spoke [the countryman]3447-the countryman , and yet the loss had no effect on [Peleus]872-peleus , though severe , for [he]3447-the countryman , remembering [his]3447-the countryman red crime , believed [the Nereid]1028-the nereid had given [him]3447-the countryman that loss — a just misfortune , as an offering to [the departed Phocus]3448-the departed phocus . After this , [King Ceyx]1020-ceyx , while [he]1020-ceyx put [his]1020-ceyx armor on , ordered [[his]1020-ceyx men]5488-his men to arm [themselves]5488-his men with [their]5488-his men best weapons , and to follow [his]1020-ceyx command . But [[his]1020-ceyx fond wife]7217-his fond wife , [Halcyone , aroused by such a tumult]3451-halcyone , aroused by such a tumult , ran to [him]1020-ceyx in haste ; in such haste that [her]7217-his fond wife hair was still unfinished , and such as had been done , [she]7217-his fond wife threw in wild disorder . — Clinging to the neck of [[her]7217-his fond wife loved husband]7219-her loved husband , [she]7217-his fond wife entreated [him]1020-ceyx with words and tears , to send [[his]1020-ceyx men]5488-his men along . But keep [himself]1020-ceyx at [home]2642-home and so to save two lives in one . But [Peleus]872-peleus said “ [O queen]7800-o queen , ' Tis sweet and commendable in [you]7800-o queen to fear but needless . Though [you]7800-o queen promise generous aid , [my]872-peleus hope lies not in fighting with the beast , [I]872-peleus must appease [a goddess of [the sea]1298-the sea]7801-a goddess of the sea . And the divinity of [ocean]2889-ocean must be properly adored . ”[872-peleus] [A lofty tower]2078-a lofty tower is near there , and upon [its]2078-a lofty tower extreme height a signal - fire is burning night and day , known to [the grateful ships]3456-the grateful ships . [They]5488-his men all went [there]1500-there ; and from [its]2078-a lofty tower summit [they]5488-his men beheld with sighs , the mangled cattle scattered on [the shore]5443-the shore , and saw the ravager among the herd , [his]1020-ceyx blood - stained jaws and long hair dripping blood . Then [Peleus]872-peleus stretched [his]872-peleus arms out towards [the sea]1298-the sea , and [he]872-peleus implored the azure [Psamathe]1029-psamathe to lay aside [her]1029-psamathe wrath and give [him]872-peleus aid . But [she]1029-psamathe was deaf to any word of [Peleus]872-peleus entreating [her]1029-psamathe , and would not offer aid , till [Thetis]1019-thetis , interceding on behalf of [[her]1029-psamathe afflicted husband]3460-her afflicted husband , moved [her]1029-psamathe will . [The monster - wolf]3461-the monster - wolf persisted in [his]3461-the monster - wolf rage , even when the sea nymph bade [him]3461-the monster - wolf turn aside . [His]3461-the monster - wolf keen ferocity increased by taste of new sweet blood ; till [Psamathe]1029-psamathe , while [he]872-peleus was seizing the last mangled heifer 's neck , transformed [him]3461-the monster - wolf to hard marble . Every part of [that ferocious monster]3462-that ferocious monster 's shape remained but it was changed to marble colored stone , which showed the monster was no more a wolf , and should no longer be a cause of fear . But still , [the guiding Fates]553-the fates did not permit [the banished Peleus]872-peleus to continue [there]1500-there , in [this land governed by [the friendly king]3465-the friendly king]3464-this land governed by the friendly king . [A wandering exile]3466-a wandering exile , [he]872-peleus proceeded north into [Magnesia]293-magnesia ; and was purified of guilt by [King Acastus of [that land]5048-that land]3467-king acastus of that land . [King Ceyx]1020-ceyx , disturbed by [[his]1020-ceyx loved brother]3469-his loved brother 's fate and prodigies which happened since that time , prepared to venture to the Clarian god , that [he]1020-ceyx might there consult [the oracle , so sanctified to consolation of distress]3470-the oracle , so sanctified to consolation of distress : for then the way to [Delphi]262-delphi was unsafe because of [Phorbas]697-phorbas and [[his]697-phorbas Phlegyans]3471-his phlegyans . Before [he]1020-ceyx went [he]1020-ceyx told [[his]1020-ceyx faithful queen]3472-his faithful queen , [[his]1020-ceyx dear [Halcyone]1030-halcyone]3473-his dear halcyone . [She]3472-his faithful queen felt at once terror creep through the marrow of [her]3472-his faithful queen bones , pallor of boxwood overspread [her]3472-his faithful queen face , and [her]3472-his faithful queen two cheeks were wet with gushing tears . Three times [she]3472-his faithful queen tried to speak while tears and sobs delayed [her]3472-his faithful queen voice , until at last [she]3472-his faithful queen said : — “ What fault of [mine]3472-his faithful queen , [[my]3472-his faithful queen dearest]7804-my dearest , has so changed [your]7804-my dearest usual thoughts ? Where is that care for [me]3472-his faithful queen that always has stood first ? Can [you]7804-my dearest leave [me]3472-his faithful queen for this long journey with no anxious fear — [Halcyone]1030-halcyone , forsaken in [these halls]7805-these halls ? Will this long journey be a pleasant change because far from [you]7804-my dearest [I]3472-his faithful queen should be more dear ? Perhaps [you]7804-my dearest think [you]7804-my dearest will go [there]1500-there by [land]1301-land , and [I]3472-his faithful queen shall only grieve , and shall not fear [the sea]1298-the sea affrights [me]3472-his faithful queen with its tragic face . Just lately [I]3472-his faithful queen observed some broken planks upon [[our]7809-our seashore]7810-our seashore , and [I]3472-his faithful queen 've read and read the names of [seamen]7811-seamen on [[their]7811-seamen empty tombs]7812-their empty tombs ! “[3472-his faithful queen] Oh , let no false assurance fill [your]3474-your mind because [[your]3474-your father - in - law]3475-your father - in - law is [Aeolus]665-aeolus . Who in [a dungeon]3476-a dungeon shuts the stormful winds and smoothes at will [the troubled ocean]3477-the troubled ocean waves soon as the winds get freedom from [his]665-aeolus power , [they]3478-them take entire possession of [the deep]1961-the deep , and nothing is forbidden [their]3478-them attack ; and all the rights of [every land and sea]3480-every land and sea are disregarded by [them]3478-them . [They]3478-them insult even the clouds of heaven and [their]3478-them wild concussions urge the lightnings to strike fires . The more [I]0-i know of them , for [I]0-i knew [them]3478-them in [my]0-i childhood and [I]0-i often saw [them]3478-them from [[[my]0-i father]1438-my father 's home]3482-my father 's home , the more [I]0-i fear . “ But , [O dear husband]7813-o dear husband ! if this new resolve can not be altered by [my]3483-the daughter of aeolus prayers and fears , and if [you]7813-o dear husband are determined , take [me]3483-the daughter of aeolus , too : some comfort may be gained , if in the storms [we]7814-we may be tossed together . [I]3483-the daughter of aeolus shall fear only the ills that really come to [us]7814-we , together [we]7814-we can certainly endure discomforts till [we]7814-we gain [that distant land]5243-that distant land . ”[3483-the daughter of aeolus] Such words and tears of [the daughter of [Aeolus]665-aeolus]3483-the daughter of aeolus gave [Ceyx]1020-ceyx , [famed son of the Morning Star]3484-famed son of the morning star , much thought and sorrow ; for the flame of love burned in [his]1020-ceyx heart as strongly as in [hers]3483-the daughter of aeolus . Reluctant to give up the voyage , even more to make [Halcyone]1030-halcyone [[his]1020-ceyx partner on [the dangerous sea]3486-the dangerous sea]3485-his partner on the dangerous sea , [he]1020-ceyx answered [her]1030-halcyone complaints in many ways to pacify [her]1030-halcyone breast , but could not comfort [her]1030-halcyone until at last [he]1020-ceyx said , “ This separation from [your]1030-halcyone love will be most sorrowful ; and so [I]1020-ceyx swear to [you]1030-halcyone , as witnessed by the sacred fire of [[my]1020-ceyx Star - father]7816-my star - father , if the fates permit [my]1020-ceyx safe return , [I]1020-ceyx will come back to [you]1030-halcyone before the moon has rounded twice [her]1030-halcyone orb . ”[1020-ceyx] These promises gave hope of [his]1020-ceyx return . Without delay [he]1020-ceyx ordered [a ship]5175-a ship should be drawn forth from [the dock]3488-the dock , launched in [the sea]1298-the sea , and properly supplied against the needs of travel . — Seeing this , [Halcyone]1030-halcyone , as if aware of future woe , shuddered , wept , and embraced [him]1020-ceyx , and in extreme woe said with a sad voice , “ Ah — Farewell ! ”[1030-halcyone] and then , [her]1030-halcyone nerveless body sank down to the ground . While [Ceyx]1020-ceyx longed for some pretext to delay , [the youthful oarsmen]3490-the youthful oarsmen , chosen for [their]3490-the youthful oarsmen strength , in double rows began to draw the oars back towards [their]3490-the youthful oarsmen hardy breasts , cutting the waves with equal strokes . [She]1030-halcyone raised [her]1030-halcyone weeping eyes and saw [[her]1030-halcyone husband]1381-her husband on the high - curved stern . [He]1381-her husband by [his]1381-her husband waving hand made signs to [her]1030-halcyone , and [she]1030-halcyone returned [his]1381-her husband signals . Then [the ship]5746-the ship moved farther from [the shore]5443-the shore until [her]1030-halcyone eyes could not distinguish [his]1381-her husband loved countenance . Still , while [she]1030-halcyone could , [she]1030-halcyone followed with [her]1030-halcyone gaze the fading hull ; and , when that too was lost far in the distance , [she]1030-halcyone remained and gazed at the white topsails , waving from the mast . But , when [she]1030-halcyone could no longer see the sails , with anxious heart [she]1030-halcyone sought [[her]1030-halcyone lonely couch]3494-her lonely couch and laid [herself]1030-halcyone upon it . Couch and room renewed [her]1030-halcyone sorrow and reminded [her]1030-halcyone how much of life was absent on [the sea]1298-the sea . [The ship]5746-the ship had left [the harbor]3497-the harbor , and the breeze shook the taut rigging . Now [the captain]3498-the captain bade the idle oars be drawn up to the sides . [They]3499-they ran the pointed sailyards up the mast and with spread canvas caught the coming breeze . Perhaps [the ship]5746-the ship had not sailed half [her]1030-halcyone course , on every side [the land]1295-the land was out of sight in fact at a great distance , when , towards dark [the sea]1298-the sea grew white with its increasing waves , while boisterous east winds blew with violence . — prompt in [his]3498-the captain duty , [the captain]3498-the captain warns [[his]3498-the captain crew]3504-his crew , “ Lower the top sails — quick — furl all the sails tight to [the yards]7817-the yards ! ”[3498-the captain] — [He]3498-the captain ordered , but the storm bore all [his]3498-the captain words away , [his]3498-the captain voice could not be heard above the roaring of [the sea]1298-the sea . But of [their]3499-they own accord [some sailors]3506-some sailors rushed to draw the oars in , others to secure the sides from danger , and [some]4905-some strove to pull the sails down from the wind . One pumps the waves up from the hold , and pours [the rushing sea]3508-the rushing sea again into [the sea]1298-the sea ; another takes [the yards]7817-the yards off . — While such things are being done without command or order , the wild storm increases , and on every side fierce winds wage a destructive warfare , which stirs up the furious waters to their utmost power . Even [the captain]3498-the captain , terrified , confessed [he]3498-the captain did not know the status of [the ship]5746-the ship , and could not order nor forbid [the men]5722-the men — so great the storm , so far beyond [his]3498-the captain skill . Then [he]3498-the captain gave up control , while [frightened men]3514-frightened men shouted above the rattled cordage shocks , and heavy waves were dashed against huge waves , and ail the sky reverberated with terrific thunders . [The deep sea]1436-the deep sea upturned tremendous billows , which appeared to reach so near the heaven [they]3499-they touched the heavy clouds with foam of [their]3499-they tossed waters . — At one time , while the great billows churned up yellow sand from off the bottom , the wild rolling waves were of that color . At another time they were more black than water of [the Styx]278-the styx . Sometimes they levelled , white with lashing foam . [The ship]5746-the ship was tossed about in the wild storm : aloft as from a mountain peak it seemed to look down on [the valley]5540-the valley and the depth of [Acheron]773-acheron ; and , when sunk down in a trough of waves engulfing , it appeared to look up at the zenith from infernal seas . Often the waves fell on the sides with crash as terrible as when a flying stone or iron ram shatters [a citadel]3518-a citadel . As lions , mustering up [their]3519-their strength anew , might hurl [their]3519-their breasts against the spears and outstretched arms of [huntsmen]3520-huntsmen , so the waves , upon the rising of the winds , rushed forth against the battered sides of [the tossed ship]3521-the tossed ship and rose much higher than the slanting masts . [The ship]5746-the ship - bolts lost their grip , the loosened planks , despoiled of covering wax , gave open seams , through which streamed water of the fatal waves . — vast sheets of rain pour from dissolving clouds , so suddenly , it seemed that all the heavens were flung into [the deep]1961-the deep , while swelling seas ascended to [the emptied fields of heaven]3524-the emptied fields of heaven ! The sails are drenched with rain , the salt sea waves are mingled with the waters of the skies . The firmament is black without a star , and night is doubly dark with its own gloom and blackness of the storm . Quick lightning makes the black skies glitter , and the waves are fired with flames of thunder - bolts . Now floods leap up into the very middle of [the ship]5746-the ship . Just as [a soldier]3526-a soldier , more courageous than [the rest of [[his]3526-a soldier brave fellows]3528-his brave fellows , after [he]3526-a soldier has often charged against [the embattled walls of [a defended city]3530-a defended city]3529-the embattled walls of a defended city]3527-the rest of his brave fellows , after he has often charged against the embattled walls of a defended city , gains at length [the place which [he]3526-a soldier has fought for]3531-the place which he has fought for ; all inflamed with [his]3526-a soldier desire of glory , scales the wall and stands alone among [a thousand foes]3532-a thousand foes ; so , when destructive waves have beat against [the ship]5746-the ship 's high sides , the tenth wave with known power , rushes more furious than the nine before , nor ceases to attack [the failing ship]3534-the failing ship , until dashed high above the captured walls it surges in the hold . [Part of [the sea]1298-the sea]3535-part of the sea is still attempting to get in [the ship]5746-the ship , and part is in [it]5746-the ship . [All]5537-all are panic stricken , like men within [a doomed and shaken town]3539-a doomed and shaken town ; who see [some foes]3540-some foes attack the walls without , and [others]4906-others hold possession of [the walls within [the city]5520-the city]3542-the walls within the city . Every art has failed , [their]5537-all courage sinks . With every coming wave another death seems rushing in upon [them]5537-all . [One sailor]3544-one sailor yields in tears ; another falls down , stupefied ; another calls [those blest whom funeral rites]3545-those blest whom funeral rites await ; [another]6394-another prays , addressing [trusted gods]3547-trusted gods , lifting [his]6394-another hands up to that heaven unseen , as vainly [he]6394-another implores [some aid divine]3548-some aid divine , and one in fright recalls [[his]6394-another brothers]5518-his brothers and [[his]6394-another parent]3550-his parent , while another names [[his]6394-another children]3551-his children and [[his]6394-another home]5235-his home : [each frightened sailor]3553-each frightened sailor thinks of all [he]6394-another left . [King Ceyx]1020-ceyx thinks only of [Halcyone]1030-halcyone , no other name is on [his]1020-ceyx lips but [hers]1030-halcyone : and though [he]1020-ceyx longs for [her]1030-halcyone , yet [he]1020-ceyx is glad that [she]1030-halcyone is safe at [home]2642-home . Ah , how [he]1020-ceyx tried to look back to [the shore of [[his]1020-ceyx loved land]3556-his loved land]3555-the shore of his loved land , to turn [his]1020-ceyx last gaze towards [[his]1020-ceyx wife]1380-his wife and [home]2642-home . But [he]1020-ceyx has lost direction . — [The tossed sea]3559-the tossed sea is raging in a hurricane so vast , and all the sky is hidden by the gloom of thickened storm - clouds , doubled in pitch - black . The mast is shattered by the violence of drenching tempests , and the useless helm is broken . [One undaunted giant wave]3560-one undaunted giant wave stands over wreck and spoil , and looks down like [a conqueror upon the other waves]3561-a conqueror upon the other waves : then falls as heavily as if [some god]6773-some god should hurl [Mount Athos]295-mount athos or [Mount Pindus]296-mount pindus , torn from rock foundations , into [that wide sea]3563-that wide sea : so , with down - rushing weight and violence it struck and plunged [the ship]5746-the ship to [the lowest deeps]3565-the lowest deeps . And as [the ship]5746-the ship sank , [many of [the crew]5743-the crew]3567-many of the crew sank overwhelmed in [deep surrounding waves]3569-deep surrounding waves , never to rise from suffocating death : but [some in desperation]3570-some in desperation , clung for life to broken timbers and escaped that fate . [King Ceyx]1020-ceyx clung to a fragment of the wreck with that majestic hand which often before had proudly swayed the sceptre . And in vain , alas , [he]1020-ceyx called upon [[his]1020-ceyx father]1530-his father 's name , alas , [he]1020-ceyx begged [[his]1020-ceyx father - in - law]6448-his father - in - law 's support . But , while [he]1020-ceyx swam , [his]1020-ceyx lips most frequently pronounced that dearest name , “ [Halcyone]1030-halcyone ! ”[1020-ceyx] [He]1020-ceyx longs to have [his]1020-ceyx body carried by waves to [her]3573-her dear gaze and have at last , entombment by the hands of [[his]1020-ceyx loved friends]3574-his loved friends . Swimming , [he]1020-ceyx called [Halcyone]1030-halcyone — far off , as often as the billows would allow [his]1020-ceyx lips to open , and among the waves [[his]1020-ceyx darling]3575-his darling 's name was murmured , till at last a night - black arch of water swept above the highest waves and buried [him]1020-ceyx beneath engulfing billows . [Lucifer]513-lucifer was dim past recognition when the dawn appeared and , since [he]513-lucifer never could depart from [heaven]1454-heaven , soon hid [his]513-lucifer grieving countenance in clouds . Meanwhile , [Halcyone]1030-halcyone , all unaware of [his]1020-ceyx sad wreck , counts off the passing nights and hastens to prepare for [him]1020-ceyx [his]1020-ceyx clothes that [he]1020-ceyx may wear as soon as [he]1020-ceyx returns to [her]1030-halcyone ; and [she]1030-halcyone is choosing what to wear [herself]1030-halcyone , and vainly promises [his]1020-ceyx safe return — all this indeed , while [she]1030-halcyone in hallowed prayer is giving frankincense to please [the gods]1395-the gods : and first of loving adorations , [she]1030-halcyone paid at the shrine of [Juno]488-juno . There [she]1030-halcyone prayed for [Ceyx]1020-ceyx — after [he]1020-ceyx had suffered death , that [he]1020-ceyx might journey safely and return and might love [her]1030-halcyone above [all other women]3578-all other women , this one last prayer alone was granted to [her]1030-halcyone but [Juno]488-juno could not long accept as [hers]488-juno these supplications on behalf of one then dead ; and that [she]488-juno might persuade [Halcyone]1030-halcyone to turn [her]1030-halcyone death - polluted hands away from hallowed altars , [Juno]488-juno said in haste , “ O , [Iris]471-iris , best of all [[my]488-juno messengers]7818-my messengers , go quickly to [the dreadful court of Sleep]7819-the dreadful court of sleep , and in [my]488-juno name command [him]7820-him to despatch a dream in the shape of [Ceyx]1020-ceyx , who is dead , and tell [Halcyone]1030-halcyone the woeful truth . ”[488-juno] So [she]488-juno commanded . — [Iris]471-iris instantly assumed a garment of a thousand tints ; and as [she]471-iris marked the high skies with [her]471-iris arch , went swiftly thence as ordered , to [the place where Sleep was then concealed beneath [a rock]3580-a rock]3579-the place where sleep was then concealed beneath a rock . Near [the Cimmerian Land]297-the cimmerian land there is a cave , with a long entrance , in [a hallowed mountain]3581-a hallowed mountain , [the home of slothful Sleep]3582-the home of slothful sleep . To [that dark cave the Sun , when rising or in middle skies , or setting]3583-that dark cave the sun , when rising or in middle skies , or setting , never can approach with light . There dense fogs , mingled with the dark , exhale darkness from the black soil — and all [that place]5935-that place is shadowed in a deep mysterious gloom . [No wakeful bird with visage crested high]3585-no wakeful bird with visage crested high calls forth the morning 's beauty in clear notes ; nor do the watchful dogs , more watchful geese , nor wild beasts , cattle , nor the waving trees , make sound or whisper ; and the human voice is never heard there — silent Rest is there . But , from the bottom of [a rock beneath]3586-a rock beneath , Lethean waters of [a stream]3587-a stream ooze forth , sounds of a rivulet , which trickle with soft murmuring amid the pebbles and invite soft sleep . Before [the cavern]5485-the cavern doors most fertile poppies and a wealth of herbs bloom in abundance , from the juice of which the humid night - hours gather sleep and spread it over [darkened Earth]3589-darkened earth . No door is in [that cavern - home]3590-that cavern - home and not a hinge 's noise nor guarding [porter]3591-porter 's voice disturbs the calm . But in the middle is a resting - couch , raised high on night - black ebony and soft with feathered cushions , all jet black , concealed by a rich coverlet as dark as night , on which [the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth lies with unmoving limbs . Around [him]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth there in all directions , unsubstantial dreams recline in imitation of all shapes — as many as the uncounted ears of corn at harvest — as the myriad leaves of trees — or tiny sand grains spread upon [the shore]5443-the shore . As soon as [Iris]471-iris entered that dread gloom , [she]471-iris pushed aside the visions in [her]471-iris way with [her]471-iris fair glowing hands ; and instantly , [that sacred cavern of [the god of Sleep]3595-the god of sleep]3594-that sacred cavern of the god of sleep was all illuminated with the glow and splendor of [her]471-iris garment . — Out of [himself]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth [the god]5013-the god with difficulty lifted up [his]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth lanquid eyes . From this small sign of life relapsing many times to languid sloth , while nodding , with [his]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth chin [he]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth struck [his]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth breast again and again . At last [he]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth roused [himself]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth from gloom and slumber ; and , while raised upon [his]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth elbow , [he]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth enquired of [Iris]471-iris why [she]471-iris came to [him]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth . — [He]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth knew [her]471-iris by [her]471-iris name . [She]471-iris answered [him]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth , “ O , Sleep , divine repose of all things ! [Gentlest of [the deities]1400-the deities]7821-gentlest of the deities ! Peace to the troubled mind , from which [you]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth drive the cares of life , restorer of [men]1399-men 's strength when wearied with the toils of day , command a vision that shall seem the actual form of royal Ceyx to visit [Trachin]1031-trachin famed for [Hercules]857-hercules and tell [Halcyone]1030-halcyone [his]3592-the god of sleep , dissolved in sloth death by shipwreck . It is [Juno]488-juno 's wish . ”[471-iris] [Iris]471-iris departed after this was said . For [she]471-iris no longer could endure the effect of slumber - vapor ; and as soon as [she]471-iris knew sleep was creeping over [her]471-iris tired limbs [she]471-iris flew from there — and [she]471-iris departed by the rainbow , over which [she]471-iris came before .
