[I]0-i own the prize [we]3863-we seek is great , but [such a rival]3864-such a rival makes it small . To [Ajax]1126-ajax there s no cause for pride in having any prize , however great , for which [Ulysses]1129-ulysses hoped . But [he]1126-ajax has won reward enough already . [He]1126-ajax can boast , when vanquished , that [he]1126-ajax strove with [me]0-i . “ [I]1126-ajax , even if [my]1126-ajax merit were in doubt should still excell in birth . [I]1126-ajax am [the son of [Telamon]866-telamon , who with [great Hercules]857-hercules brought low the power of [Troy]250-troy and in [the ship of [Jason]833-jason]8010-the ship of jason voyaged even to [the Colchian shores]313-the colchian shores]8009-the son of telamon , who with great hercules brought low the power of troy and in the ship of jason voyaged even to the colchian shores . [[His]1126-ajax father]1530-his father , [Aeacus]865-aeacus , now is a judge among [the silent shades]8012-the silent shades — where [Sisyphus]658-sisyphus toils and is mocked forever with the stone . [I]1126-ajax demand these arms now due [me]1126-ajax as [a cousin]8016-a cousin . [You]8025-you , as [men]1399-men say , hidden in [forest lairs]8027-forest lairs , are moving with [your]8025-you groans the very rocks and asking for [Ulysses]1129-ulysses what [he]1129-ulysses so well deserves — what , if indeed there still are [gods]6543-gods , [you]8025-you shall not ask in vain . And now , [one of [[our]8020-our leaders]8030-our leaders , [he]1129-ulysses that was sworn to the same arms with [ourselves]8020-our ! by whom the arrows of [great Hercules]857-hercules are used , as [[his]3874-he successor]8031-his successor ; broken by disease and famine , clothed with feathers , now must feed on birds and squander for [his]3874-he wretched fare the arrows destined for [the wreck of [Troy]250-troy]8032-the wreck of troy]8029-one of our leaders , he that was sworn to the same arms with ourselves ! by whom the arrows of great hercules are used , as his successor ; broken by disease and famine , clothed with feathers , now must feed on birds and squander for his wretched fare the arrows destined for the wreck of troy . “[3874-he] At least [he]3874-he lives , because [he]3874-he has not stayed too near [Ulysses]1129-ulysses . [That same man who would not help a friend]3880-that same man who would not help a friend now calls for help ; [he]3880-that same man who would not help a friend who forsook [a friend]2008-a friend , should be forsaken , the law [he]3880-that same man who would not help a friend made returns upon [himself]3880-that same man who would not help a friend . [He]3880-that same man who would not help a friend called aloud on [[his]3880-that same man who would not help a friend companions]5589-his companions ; [I]0-i came and saw [him]3880-that same man who would not help a friend trembling , pale with fear , and shuddering , at the thought of coming death . Yet , when [I]0-i faced [the foe]3739-the foe , [he]3880-that same man who would not help a friend , whom [his]3880-that same man who would not help a friend wound had left no power to stand , forgot the wound and took to headlong flight . “ [Hector]1038-hector approached , and brought [the gods]1395-the gods with [him]1038-hector to battle ; and , wherever [he]1038-hector rushed on , not only this [Ulysses]1129-ulysses was alarmed , but even the valiant , for so great the fear [he]1038-hector caused [them]1395-the gods . [Hector]1038-hector , proud in [his]1038-hector success in blood and slaughter , [I]3880-that same man who would not help a friend then dared to meet and with a huge : stone from a distance hurled [I]3880-that same man who would not help a friend laid [him]1038-hector flat . Truly , [I]0-i did protect [a thousand ships]3665-a thousand ships with [my]0-i breast , saving the hopes of [your]3892-you return . — for all [these many ships]3893-these many ships , award [me]0-i arms ! But , let [me]0-i speak the truth , the arms will gain more fame than [I]0-i , for [they]3894-they will share [my]0-i glory . And [they]3894-they need [Ajax]1126-ajax , [Ajax]1126-ajax needs not [them]3894-they . Let [the Ithacan]1137-the ithacan compare with deeds like [mine]0-i [his]1137-the ithacan sleeping Rhesus , [his]1137-the ithacan unwarlike Dolon , [Helenus]1138-helenus taken , and [Pallas]694-pallas gained by theft — all done by night and all with [Diomed]1125-diomed . If [you]3892-you must give these arms for deeds so mean , then give the greater share to [Diomed]1125-diomed . “ Why give arms to [Ulysses]1129-ulysses , who by stealth and quite unarmed , has always done [his]1129-ulysses work , deceiving [[his]1129-ulysses unwary enemy]8042-his unwary enemy by stratagems ? This brilliant helmet , rich with sparkling gold , will certainly betray [his]1129-ulysses plans , and will discover [him]1129-ulysses when hid . [His]1129-ulysses soft Dulichian head beneath the helm of great [Achilles]1048-achilles will not bear the weight ; [Achilles]1048-achilles ' heavy spear from [Pelion]204-pelion must be burdensome for [his]1048-achilles unwarlike hands : nor will the shield , graven with [the vasty world]8043-the vasty world beseem a dastard left hand , smooth for theft . “[1125-diomed] Why caitiff , will [you]3892-you beg [them]3895-them for a gift , which will but weaken [you]3892-you ? If by mistake , [the Grecian people]3896-the grecian people should award [you]3892-you this , it would not fright [the foe]3739-the foe but offer spoils and that swift flight ( in which alone [you]3892-you have excelled all others , [dastard wretch]3898-dastard wretch ! ) would soon grow laggard , dragging such a weight . And that good shield of [yours]3892-you , which has but rarely felt a conflict , is unhurt ; for [mine]3899-mine , agape with wounds a thousand from swift - striking darts , a new one must be found . “ In short , what need is there for words ? Let [us]8044-us be tried in war . Let all the arms of brave [Achilles]1048-achilles now be thrown among [the foe]3739-the foe ; order [them]3739-the foe all to be retrieved ; and decorate for war whoever brings [them]3739-the foe back , a worthy prize . ”[1126-ajax] [Ajax]1126-ajax , [the son of [Telamon]866-telamon]3900-the son of telamon , stopped speech , and murmuring among [the multitude]6124-the multitude followed [his]1126-ajax closing words , until [Ulysses]1129-ulysses , [Laertian hero]3902-laertian hero , stood up there and fixed [his]1129-ulysses eyes a short time on the ground ; then raised them towards [the chiefs]8003-the chiefs ; and with [his]1126-ajax opening words , which [they]8003-the chiefs awaited , the grace of [his]1126-ajax art was not found wanting to [his]1126-ajax eloquence . “ If [my]1126-ajax desire and [yours]8046-you could have prevailed , [O noble Greeks]8047-o noble greeks , [the man who should receive a prize so valued]8048-the man who should receive a prize so valued , would not be in doubt , and [you]8046-you would now enjoy [your]8046-you arms , and [we]8049-we enjoy [you]8046-you , great [Achilles]1048-achilles . Since unjust fate has denied [him]1048-achilles both to [me]1126-ajax and [you]8046-you , ( and here [he]1048-achilles wiped [his]1048-achilles eyes dry with [his]1048-achilles hands , as though then shedding tears , ) who could succeed [the great Achilles]3397-the great achilles better than the one through whom [the great Achilles]3397-the great achilles joined [the Greeks]2456-the greeks ? Let [Ajax]1126-ajax win no votes because [he]1126-ajax seems to be as stupid as the truth declares . Let not [my]1126-ajax talents , which were always used for service of [the Greeks]2456-the greeks , increase [my]1126-ajax harm : and let this eloquence of [mine]1126-ajax ( if such [we]3905-we call it ) which is pleading now for [me]1126-ajax , as it has pleaded many times for [you]8054-you , awake no envy . Let [each man]8055-each man show [his]8055-each man best . “[1126-ajax] Now as for [ancestors]3030-ancestors and noble birth and deeds [we]3905-we have not done [ourselves]3905-we , all these [I]0-i hardly call [them]3906-them [ours]3905-we . But , if [he]3907-he boasts because [he]3907-he is [the great grandson of [Jove]456-jove]3908-the great grandson of jove , [the founder of [[my]0-i family]3840-my family]3839-the founder of my family , [you]3911-you know , is [Jupiter]475-jupiter ; by birth [I]0-i am just the same degree removed from [Jupiter]475-jupiter as [he]475-jupiter . [[My]0-i mother]6323-my mother 's grandsire , [Mercury]492-mercury , would give [me]0-i further claims of birth — on either side [a god]4898-a god . “ But not because [[my]492-mercury mother]6323-my mother 's line is better and not because [[my]492-mercury father]1438-my father certainly , is innocent of [[his]1438-my father own brother]2051-his own brother 's blood , have [I]492-mercury advanced [my]492-mercury claim to own those arms . Where is [Ajax]1126-ajax then ? These arms might go to [Phthia]314-phthia or to [Scyros]315-scyros ! [Teucer]1142-teucer might claim the prize because [he]1142-teucer is [[Achilles]1048-achilles ' cousin]3922-achilles ' cousin . Does [he]1142-teucer seek these arms ? And , if [he]1142-teucer did , would [you]3918-you allow [his]1142-teucer claim ? “ Since then the contest lies in deeds alone , though [I]1048-achilles have done more than may be well told , [I]1048-achilles will recall them as they have occurred . “[1048-achilles] [[Achilles]1048-achilles ' Nereid mother]3923-achilles ' nereid mother , who foresaw [his]1048-achilles death , concealed [[her]3923-achilles ' nereid mother son]5619-her son by change of dress . By that disguise [Ajax]1126-ajax , among the rest , was well deceived . [I]0-i showed with [women]1730-women 's wares arms that might win the spirit of [a man]5610-a man . [The hero]5496-the hero still wore clothing of [a girl]7346-a girl , when , as [he]5496-the hero held a shield and spear , [I]0-i said ‘ [Son of [a goddess]5320-a goddess]3929-son of a goddess ! [Pergama]311-pergama but waits to fall by [you]5496-the hero , why do [you]5496-the hero hesitate to assure the overthrow of mighty [Troy]1143-aeneas ? ’ With these bold words , [I]0-i laid [my]0-i hand on [him]5496-the hero — and to : brave actions [I]0-i sent forth the brave : [his]5496-the hero deeds of Bravery are therefore mine it was [my]0-i power that conquered [Telephus]1050-telephus , as [he]5496-the hero fought with [his]5496-the hero lance ; it was through [me]0-i that , vanquished and suppliant ? [he]5496-the hero at last was healed . [I]0-i caused the fall of [Thebes]103-thebes ; believe [me]0-i , [I]0-i took [Lesbos]285-lesbos , [Tenedos]316-tenedos , [Chryse]317-chryse and [Cilla]318-cilla — [the cities of Apollo]3931-the cities of apollo ; and [I]0-i took [Scyros]315-scyros ; think too , of the Lyrnesian wall as shaken by [my]0-i hand , destroyed , and thrown down level with the ground . Let this suffice : [I]0-i found [the man who caused fierce [Hector]1038-hector 's death]3932-the man who caused fierce hector 's death , through [me]0-i the famous [Hector]1038-hector now , lies low ! And for those arms which made [Achilles]1048-achilles known [I]0-i now demand these arms . To [him]5496-the hero alive [I]0-i gave [them]3933-them — at [his]5496-the hero death they should be [mine]0-i . “ After the grief of one had reached all [Greece]117-greece , and [ships a thousand]8060-ships a thousand , filled [Euboean Aulis]319-euboean aulis ; the breezes long expected would not blow or adverse held [the helpless fleet ashore]8061-the helpless fleet ashore . Then [ruthless oracles]8062-ruthless oracles gave [their]8062-ruthless oracles command , that [Agamemnon]1128-agamemnon should make sacrifice of [[his]1128-agamemnon loved daughter]8063-his loved daughter and so satisfy [Diana]484-diana 's cruel heart . [The father]1574-the father stood up resolute , enraged against [the gods]1395-the gods , [a parent]7531-a parent even though [a king]3680-a king . [I]0-i turned , by tactful ! words , [a father]1601-a father 's tender heart to the great issue of the public weal . [I]0-i will confess it , and when [I]0-i have confessed , may [the son of Atreus]8069-the son of atreus pardon : [I]0-i had to plead a difficult case before [a partial judge]8070-a partial judge . [The people]1439-the people 's good , [[his]8069-the son of atreus brother]2004-his brother 's , and stern duty , that followed [his]8069-the son of atreus great office , won [his]8069-the son of atreus ear , till royal honor outweighed claims of blood . [I]0-i sought [the mother , who could not be won by pleading]8073-the mother , who could not be won by pleading but must be deceived by craft . Had [Ajax]1126-ajax gone to [her]8073-the mother , who could not be won by pleading , [our]8074-our thousand sails would still droop , waiting for the favoring breeze . “[0-i] As [a bold envoy]3934-a bold envoy [I]0-i was even sent off to [the towers of [Ilium]302-ilium]3935-the towers of ilium , and there [I]0-i saw [the senate - house of [lofty Troy]250-troy]3936-the senate - house of lofty troy , and , fearless , entered [it]3936-the senate - house of lofty troy , while [it]3936-the senate - house of lofty troy was full of [heroes]3937-heroes . There , undaunted , [I]0-i spoke for the cause which [all the Greeks]3757-all the greeks had given [me]0-i . [Accusing Paris]845-paris , [I]0-i demanded back the gold and stolen [Helen]1042-helen , and [I]0-i moved both [Priam]1143-aeneas and [Antenor]321-antenor . All the while [Paris]845-paris , [[his]3939-their brothers]5518-his brothers , and [[their]3939-their robber crew]3941-their robber crew could scarce withhold [their]3939-their wicked hands from [me]0-i . And all this , [Menelaus]1127-menelaus , is well known to [you]1127-menelaus : that was the first danger [I]0-i shared with [you]1127-menelaus . “ [I]1127-menelaus need not linger over the many things which by [my]1127-menelaus counsel and [my]1127-menelaus bravery [I]1127-menelaus have accomplished through this long - drawn war . “[1127-menelaus] A long time , after the first battle clash , [the foe]3739-the foe lay quiet within city walls , giving no challenge for an open fight — [he]3739-the foe stood nine years of siege before [we]3943-our fought what were [you]1127-menelaus doing all that tedious time , what use were [you]1127-menelaus , good only in a fight ? If [you]1127-menelaus will make inquiry of [my]0-i deeds : [I]0-i fashioned ambuscades for [enemies]3944-enemies ; and circled [our]3943-our defenses with a trench ; [I]0-i cheered [allies]3945-allies so [they]3945-allies might all endure with patient minds a long , protracted war ; [I]0-i showed how [[our]3943-our own army]3946-our own army might subsist and how it could be armed ; and [I]0-i was sent wherever the necessity required . “ Then , at the wish of [Jove]456-jove , [[our]3943-our king]8075-our king , deceive by A false dream , bids [us]3943-our give up the war — [he]8075-our king could excuse [his]8075-our king order by the cause . Let [Ajax]1126-ajax tell [him]8075-our king [Troy]250-troy must be laid low or let [him]8075-our king fight — at least [he]8075-our king can do that ! Why does [he]8075-our king fail to stop [the fugitives]8076-the fugitives ? Why not take arms and tell [the wavering crowd]8077-the wavering crowd to rally round [him]8075-our king ? Would that be too much for [one who never speaks except to boast]8078-one who never speaks except to boast ? But now words fail [me]0-i : [Ajax]1126-ajax turns and flees ! [I]0-i witnessed it and was ashamed to see [you]8079-you turn disgraced , preparing sails for flight . With exclamations and without delay , [I]0-i said , ‘ What are [you]8079-you doing ? O [[my]0-i friends]6756-my friends , has madness seized [you]8079-you that [you]8079-you will quit [Troy]250-troy , which is as good as taken ? What can [you]8079-you bear [home]2642-home , after ten years , but [your]8079-you disgrace ? ’ “[0-i] With these commanding words , which grief itself gave eloquence , [I]0-i brought [resisting Greeks]3947-resisting greeks back from [their]3947-resisting greeks purposed flight . [Atrides]1144-atrides called together [[his]1144-atrides allies]3948-his allies , all terror struck . Even then , [[Ajax]1126-ajax the son of [Telamon]866-telamon]3949-ajax the son of telamon dared not vouchsafe one word . But impudent [Thersites]1145-thersites hurled vile words against [the kings]3950-the kings , and , thanks to [me]0-i , [he]1126-ajax did not miss reproof . [I]0-i rose and spoke to [[my]0-i disheartened friends]3951-my disheartened friends , reviving [their]3951-my disheartened friends lost courage with [my]0-i words from that time forth , whatever deeds [this man]3867-this man , [[my]0-i rival]1615-my rival , may have done , belong to [me]0-i . ' Twas [I]0-i who stayed [his]1126-ajax flight and brought [him]1126-ajax back . “ Which of [the noble Greeks]8082-the noble greeks has given [you]0-i praise or sought [your]0-i company ? Yet [Diomed]1125-diomed has shared [his]1126-ajax deeds with [me]0-i and praises [me]0-i , and , while [Ulysses]1129-ulysses is with [him]1126-ajax , is brave and confident . ' Tis worthy of regard , when out of [many thousands of [the Greeks]2456-the greeks]8083-many thousands of the greeks , [a man]5610-a man becomes the choice of [Diomed]1125-diomed ! “[0-i] It was not lot that ordered [me]0-i to go ; and yet , despising dangers of the night , despising dangers of [the enemy]6803-the enemy , [I]0-i slew one , [Dolon]1146-dolon , of the Phrygian race , who dared to do the very things [we]3955-we dared , but not before [I]0-i had prevailed on [him]1146-dolon to tell [me]0-i everything , by which [I]0-i learned perfidious actions which [Troy]1143-aeneas had designed . “ Of such things now , [I]1143-aeneas had discovered all that should be found out , and [I]1143-aeneas might have then returned to enjoy the praise [I]1143-aeneas had deserved . But not content with that , [I]1143-aeneas sought [the tent of [Rhesus]322-rhesus]8086-the tent of rhesus , and within [[his]322-rhesus camp]8087-his camp [I]1143-aeneas slew [him]322-rhesus and [[his]322-rhesus proved attendants]8088-his proved attendants . Having thus gained as [a conqueror]6808-a conqueror [my]1143-aeneas own desires , [I]1143-aeneas drove back in [a captured chariot]8090-a captured chariot , — a joyous triumph . Well , deny [me]1143-aeneas , then . The arms of [him]322-rhesus whose steeds [the enemy]6803-the enemy demanded as the price of one night 's aid . [Ajax]1126-ajax [himself]1126-ajax has been more generous . “[1143-aeneas] Why should [I]0-i name [[Sarpedon]1147-sarpedon 's Lycian troops among whom [I]0-i made havoc with [my]0-i sword]3956-sarpedon 's lycian troops among whom i made havoc with my sword ? [I]0-i left [Coeranos]1148-coeranos dead and streaming blood , with the sword [I]0-i killed [Alastor]1149-alastor , [Chromius]1150-chromius , [Alcander]1151-alcander , [Prytanis]1152-prytanis , [Halius]1153-halius , and [Noemon]1154-noemon , [Thoon]1155-thoon and [Charops]1156-charops with [Chersidamas]1157-chersidamas , and [Ennomus]1158-ennomus — all driven by cruel fate , not reckoning [humbler men whom [I]0-i laid low , battling beneath the shadow of the city walls]3957-humbler men whom i laid low , battling beneath the shadow of the city walls . And [fellow citizens]3958-fellow citizens , [I]0-i have [my]0-i wounds honorable in the front . Do not believe [my]0-i word alone . Look for [yourselves]3958-fellow citizens and see ! ” Then with one hand , [he]0-i drew [his]0-i robe aside . “[3958-fellow citizens] Here is a breast , ” [he]0-i cried , “[3958-fellow citizens] that bled for [you]3958-fellow citizens ! But [Ajax]1126-ajax never shed a drop of blood to aid [[his]1126-ajax friends]5709-his friends , in all these many years , and has a body free of any wound . “ What does it prove , if [he]1126-ajax declares that [he]1126-ajax fought for [[our]8092-our ships]8093-our ships against both [Troy]250-troy and [Jove]456-jove ? [I]3962-he grant [he]1126-ajax did , for it is not [my]3962-he wo nt with malice to belittle other 's deeds . But let [him]1126-ajax not claim for [himself]1126-ajax alone an honor in which all may have a share , let [him]1126-ajax concede some credit due to [you]3958-fellow citizens . Disguised within the fear inspiring arms of [great Achilles]1048-achilles , [[Actor]700-elis 's son]8094-actor 's son drove back the host of Trojans from [[our]8095-our threatened fleet or [ships]5718-ships]8096-our threatened fleet or ships and [Ajax]1126-ajax would have burned together . “[3962-he] Unmindful of [the king]6107-the king , [the chiefs]8003-the chiefs , and [me]0-i , [he]3962-he dreams that [he]3962-he alone dared to engage in single fight with [Hector]1038-hector — [he]3962-he the ninth to volunteer and chosen just by lot . But yet , [O brave chief]3963-o brave chief ! What availed the fight ? [Hector]1038-hector returned , not injured by a wound . “ Ah , bitter fate , with how much grief [I]3964-he am compelled to recollect the time , when [brave Achilles]1048-achilles , [bulwark of [the Greeks]2456-the greeks]8098-bulwark of the greeks , was slain . Nor tears , nor grief , nor fear , could hinder [me]3964-he : [I]3964-he carried [his]1048-achilles dead body from the ground , uplifted on these shoulders , [I]3964-he repeat , upon these shoulders from [that ground]8100-that ground [I]3964-he bore off dead [Achilles]1048-achilles , and those arms which now [I]3964-he want to bear away again . [I]3964-he have the strength to walk beneath [their]8101-their weight , [I]3964-he have a mind to understand their worth . Did [[the hero]5496-the hero 's mother]8103-the hero 's mother , [goddess of [the sea]1298-the sea]8104-goddess of the sea , win for [[her]8103-the hero 's mother son]5619-her son these arms , made by [a god]4898-a god , a work of wondrous art , to have them clothe [a rude soldier , who has no mind at all]8108-a rude soldier , who has no mind at all ? [He]3964-he never could be made to understand the rich engravings , pictured on the shield — [the ocean]1288-the ocean , earth , and stars in lofty skies ; [the Pleiades]799-the pleiades , and [Hyades]608-the hyades , the Bear , which touches not [the ocean]1288-the ocean , far beyond [the varied planets]8111-the varied planets , and the fire - bright sword of [high Orion]886-orion . [He]3964-he demands a prize , which , if [he]3964-he had it , would be lost on [him]3964-he . “[3964-he] What of [his]3964-he taunting [me]0-i , because [I]0-i shrank from hardships of this war and [I]0-i was slow to join the expedition ? Does [he]3964-he not see , that [he]3964-he reviles [the great Achilles]3397-the great achilles too ? Was [my]0-i pretense a crime ? then so was [his]3964-he . Was [our]3966-our delay a fault ? [mine]0-i was the less , for [I]0-i came sooner ; [me]0-i [a loving wife detained from war]3967-a loving wife detained from war , [a loving mother]3968-a loving mother [him]3964-he . Some hours [we]3966-our gave to [them]3969-them , the rest to [you]3970-you . Why should [I]0-i be alarmed , if now [I]0-i am unable to defend [myself]0-i against this accusation , which is just the same as [you]3970-you have brought against [so great a man]3971-so great a man ? Yet [he]3964-he was found by the dexterity of [me]0-i , [Ulysses]1129-ulysses , and [Ulysses]1129-ulysses was not found by the dexterity of [Ajax]1126-ajax . “ It is no wonder that [he]3964-he pours on [me]1126-ajax reproaches of [his]3964-he silly tongue , because [he]3964-he charges [you]3970-you with what is worthy shame . Yes , [I]0-i admit [I]0-i urged [him]943-philoctetes to withdraw from toils of war and those of travel and attempt by rest to ease [his]943-philoctetes cruel pain . [He]943-philoctetes took [my]0-i advice and lives ! The advice was not alone well meant ( that would have been enough ) but it was wise . Because [[our]3975-our prophets]3976-our prophets have declared , [he]943-philoctetes must lead [us]3975-our , if [we]3975-our may still maintain [our]3975-our hope for [Troy]250-troy 's destruction — therefore , [you]7988-greeks must not intrust that work to [me]0-i . Much better , send [the son of [Telamon]866-telamon]3900-the son of telamon . [His]3900-the son of telamon eloquence will overcome [the hero]5496-the hero 's rage , most fierce from [his]3900-the son of telamon disease and anger : or else [his]3900-the son of telamon invention of some wile will skilfully deliver [him]3900-the son of telamon to [us]3975-our . — [The Simois]1159-the simois will first flow backward , [Ida]602-ida stand without its foliage , and [Achaia]671-achaia promise aid to [Troy]250-troy itself ; ere , lacking aid from [me]0-i , the craft of stupid [Ajax]1126-ajax will avail . “ Though , [Philoctetes]943-philoctetes , [you]7988-greeks should be enraged against [[your]7988-greeks friends]8114-your friends , against [the king]6107-the king and [me]1126-ajax ; although [you]7988-greeks curse and everlastingly devote [my]1126-ajax head to harm ; although [you]7988-greeks wish , to ease [your]7988-greeks anguish , that [I]1126-ajax may be given into [your]7988-greeks power , that [you]7988-greeks may shed [my]1126-ajax blood ; and though [you]7988-greeks wait [your]7988-greeks turn and chance at [me]1126-ajax ; still [I]1126-ajax will undertake the quest and will try all [my]1126-ajax skill to bring [you]7988-greeks back with [me]1126-ajax . If [my]1126-ajax good fortune then will favor [me]1126-ajax , [I]1126-ajax shall obtain [your]7988-greeks arrows ; as [I]1126-ajax made [the Trojan seer]8116-the trojan seer [[my]1126-ajax captive]8117-my captive , as [I]1126-ajax learned the heavenly oracles and fate of [Troy]250-troy , and as [I]1126-ajax brought back through a host of foes [Minerva]543-minerva 's image from [the citadel]8118-the citadel . “[1126-ajax] And is it possible , [Ajax]1126-ajax may now compare [himself]1126-ajax with [me]0-i ? Truly [the Fates]553-the fates will hold [Troy]250-troy from [our]3979-our capture , if [we]3979-our leave the statue . Where is valiant [Ajax]1126-ajax now , where are the boasts of [that tremendous man]3980-that tremendous man ? Why are [you]3981-you trembling , while [Ulysses]1129-ulysses dares to go beyond [[our]3979-our guards]3982-our guards and brave the night ? If [I]0-i had not done this , [[Telamon]866-telamon 's son]3987-telamon 's son would bear [his]3987-telamon 's son shield of seven bull hides in vain . That night [I]0-i gained the victory over [Troy]250-troy — ' Twas then [I]0-i won [our]3979-our war with [Pergama]311-pergama , because [I]0-i made it possible to win . “ Stop hinting by [your]8119-you look and muttered words that [Diomed]1125-diomed was [my]0-i partner in the deed . The praise [he]1125-diomed won is [his]1125-diomed . [You]8119-you , certainly fought not alone , when [you]8119-you held up [your]8119-you shield to save the allied fleet : a multitude was with [you]8119-you , but [a single man]8120-a single man gave [me]0-i [his]8120-a single man valued help . “[0-i] And if [he]3988-he did not know [a fighting man]3989-a fighting man can not gain victory so surely as [the wise man]3990-the wise man , that the prize is given to something rarer than [a brave right hand]3991-a brave right hand , [he]3988-he would [himself]3988-he be a contender now for these illustrious arms . [Ajax the less]1126-ajax would have come forward too , so would the fierce [Eurypylus]213-eurypylus , so would [[Andraemon]949-andraemon 's son]3992-andraemon 's son . [All these brave men]3994-all these brave men , [[my]0-i equals in the field]3995-my equals in the field , have yielded to [my]0-i wisdom . “ [Your]8121-your right hand is valuable in war , [your]8121-your temper stands in need of [my]3994-all these brave men direction . [You]8121-your have strength without intelligence ; [I]3994-all these brave men look out for the future . [You]8121-your are able in the fight ; [I]3994-all these brave men help [[our]8122-we king]8075-our king to find the proper time . [Your]8121-your body may give service , and [my]3994-all these brave men mind must point the way : and just as much as [he]8124-he who guides [the ship]5746-the ship must be superior to [him]8124-he who rows it ; and [we]8122-we all agree [the general]8126-the general is greater than [the soldier]6126-the soldier ; so , do [I]3994-all these brave men excel [you]8121-your . In the body lives [an intellect much rarer than a hand]8128-an intellect much rarer than a hand , by that [we]8122-we measure human excellence . “[3994-all these brave men] O [chieftains]3996-chieftains , recompense [my]0-i vigilance ! For all these years of anxious care , award this honor to [my]0-i many services . [Our]3997-our victory is in sight ; [I]0-i have removed the opposing fates and , opening wide the way to capture [Pergama]311-pergama , have captured it . Now by [our]3997-our common hopes , by [[Troy]250-troy 's high walls]3998-troy 's high walls already tottering and about to fall , and by the gods that [I]0-i won from [the foe]3739-the foe , by what remains for wisdom to devise or what may call for bold and fearless deeds — if [you]4000-you think any hope is left for [Troy]250-troy , remember [me]0-i ! Or , if [you]4000-you do not give these arms to [me]0-i , then give them all to [her]4001-her ! ” And [he]0-i pointed to [Minerva]543-minerva 's fateful head . [The assembled body of [the chiefs]8003-the chiefs]8129-the assembled body of the chiefs was moved ; and then , appeared the power of eloquence : [the fluent man]8131-the fluent man received , amid applause , the arms of [the brave man]8132-the brave man . [[His]8131-the fluent man rival]1523-his rival , who so often when alone , stood firm against great [Hector]1038-hector and the sword , and flames and [Jove]456-jove , stood not against a single passion , wrath . The unconquerable was conquered by [his]0-i grief . [He]0-i drew [his]0-i sword , and said : — “[1129-ulysses] This is at least [my]0-i own ; or will [Ulysses]1129-ulysses also claim this , for [himself]1129-ulysses . [I]0-i must use this against [myself]0-i — the blade which often has been wet , dripping with blood of Phrygians [I]0-i have slain , . Will drip with [his]0-i own master's : blood , lest [any man]7668-any man but [Ajax]1126-ajax vanquish [Ajax]1126-ajax . ” Saying this , [he]0-i turned toward the vital spot in [his]0-i own breast , which never had felt a wound , the fated sword and plunged it deeply in . though [many]8134-many sought to aid , no hand had strength to draw that steel — deep driven . The blood itself unaided drove it out . The ensanguined earth sprouted from [her]1523-his rival green turf that purple flower which grew of old from Hyacinthine blood . Its petals now are charged with double freight — [the warrior]8135-the warrior 's name , [Apollo]1124-apollo 's cry of woe . [The conqueror]3795-the conqueror , [Ulysses]1129-ulysses , now set sail , for [Lemnos]326-lemnos , [country of Hypsipyle]8137-country of hypsipyle , and for [the land of [Thoas]327-thoas]8138-the land of thoas , famed afar , [those regions infamous in olden days , where [women]1730-women slew [[their]1730-women husbands]8141-their husbands]8139-those regions infamous in olden days , where women slew their husbands . So [he]0-i went that [he]0-i might capture and bring back with [him]0-i the arrows of [brave Hercules]857-hercules . When these were given back to [the Greeks]2456-the greeks , [[their]2456-the greeks lord]1471-their lord with [them]2456-the greeks , a final hand at last prevailed to end that long fought war . Both [Troy]250-troy and [Priam]1143-aeneas fell , and [[Priam]1143-aeneas 's wretched wife]8144-priam 's wretched wife lost all [she]8144-priam 's wretched wife had , until at last [she]8144-priam 's wretched wife lost [her]8144-priam 's wretched wife human form . [Her]8144-priam 's wretched wife savage barkings frightened [foreign lands]8145-foreign lands , where [the long Hellespont]8146-the long hellespont is narrowed down . [Great Troy]328-great troy was burning : while the fire still raged , [Jove]456-jove 's altar drank [old Priam]1143-aeneas 's scanty blood . [The priestess of [Apollo]1124-apollo]8147-the priestess of apollo then , alas ! Was dragged by [her]8147-the priestess of apollo long hair , while up towards [heaven]1454-heaven [she]8147-the priestess of apollo lifted supplicating hands in vain . [The Trojan matrons]8149-the trojan matrons , clinging while [they]8149-the trojan matrons could to burning temples and [ancestral gods]8150-ancestral gods , [victorious Greeks]1045-the greeks drag off as welcome spoil . [Astyanax]1163-astyanax was hurled down from the very tower from which [he]1163-astyanax often had looked forth and seen [[his]1163-astyanax father]1530-his father , by [[his]1163-astyanax mother]1520-his mother pointed out , when [Hector]1038-hector fought for honor and [[his]1163-astyanax country]5467-his country 's weal . Now [Boreas]460-boreas counsels to depart . [The sails]8154-the sails , moved by a prosperous breeze , resound and wave — [the Trojan women]8155-the trojan women cry , — “[1126-ajax] Farewell to [Troy]250-troy ! Ah , [we]4003-we are hurried off ! ” and , falling down , [they]8155-the trojan women kiss [the soil]4995-the soil , and leave the smoking roofs of [[their]8155-the trojan women loved [native land]8158-native land]8157-their loved native land . [The last to go on board]8159-the last to go on board [the fleet]3860-the fleet was [Hecuba]1168-hecuba , a sight most pitiful . [She]1168-hecuba was found among [the tombs of [[her]1168-hecuba lost sons]8162-her lost sons]8161-the tombs of her lost sons . While [she]1168-hecuba embraced each urn and fondly kissed [their]8155-the trojan women bones , [Ulysses]1129-ulysses came with ruthless hands and bore [her]1168-hecuba off , [his]1129-ulysses prize [she]1168-hecuba in [her]1168-hecuba bosom took away the urn of [Hector]1038-hector only , and upon [his]1038-hector grave [she]1168-hecuba left some white hair taken from [her]1168-hecuba head , a meager gift , [her]1168-hecuba white hair and [her]1168-hecuba tears . Across [the strait]8163-the strait from [Troy]250-troy , there is [a land claimed by [Bistonian men]8165-bistonian men]8164-a land claimed by bistonian men , and in [that land]5048-that land was [a rich palace]8167-a rich palace , built [there]1500-there by [a king named [Polymnestor]1164-polymnestor]8169-a king named polymnestor . To [him]1164-polymnestor [the Phrygian king]8170-the phrygian king in secret gave [[his]8170-the phrygian king youngest son]8171-his youngest son to rear , [[his]8170-the phrygian king Polydorus]8172-his polydorus , safe from [Troy]250-troy and war , a prudent course , if [he]8170-the phrygian king had not sent gold arousing greed , incitement to a crime . Soon , when the fortunes of [the Trojans]3716-the trojans fell , [that wicked king of [Thrace]148-thrace]8174-that wicked king of thrace took [his]8170-the phrygian king own sword , and pierced the throat of [[his]8170-the phrygian king poor foster son]8175-his poor foster son and then , as if the deed could be concealed , if [he]8170-the phrygian king removed the body , hurled [the boy]5600-the boy from [a wild cliff]8177-a wild cliff into the waves below . Until [the sea]1298-the sea might be more calm , and gales of wind might be subdued , [Atrides]1144-atrides moored [[his]1144-atrides fleet of [ships]5718-ships]8179-his fleet of ships upon [the Thracian shore]8181-the thracian shore ; there , from wide gaping earth , [Achilles]1048-achilles rose , as large as when [he]1048-achilles lived , with look as fierce , as when [his]1048-achilles sword once threatened [Agamemnon]1128-agamemnon . “[4003-we] Forgetting [me]0-i do [you]4004-you depart , [O Greeks]1045-the greeks ? ” [He]0-i said , “[4004-you] And is [your]4004-you grateful ! memory of all [my]0-i worth interred with [my]0-i bones ? Do not do so . And that [[my]0-i sepulchre]4005-my sepulchre may have due worship , let [Polyxena]1165-polyxena be immolated to appease the ghost : of dead [Achilles]1048-achilles . ” Fiercely so [he]0-i spoke . [The old friends of Achilles]8182-the old friends of achilles all obeyed [his]0-i unforgiving shade ; and instantly [the noble and unhappy virgin]8183-the noble and unhappy virgin — brave , more like [a man]5610-a man than [woman]1432-woman — was torn from [[her]8183-the noble and unhappy virgin mother]4984-her mother 's bosom , cherished more by [her]8183-the noble and unhappy virgin , since widowed and alone . And then [they]8182-the old friends of achilles led [the virgin]5026-the virgin as a sacrifice from there up to the cruel altar . When [the maid]1503-the maid observed the savage rites prepared for [her]1503-the maid , and when [she]1503-the maid noticed [Neoptolemus]1166-neoptolemus stand by [her]1503-the maid with [his]1166-neoptolemus cruel sword in hand , [his]1166-neoptolemus fixed eyes on [her]1503-the maid countenance ; [she]1503-the maid said : — “[1048-achilles] Do not delay [my]0-i generous gift of blood , with no resistance thrust the ready steel into [my]0-i throat or breast ! ” And then [she]1503-the maid laid both throat and bosom bare . “[1165-polyxena] [Polyxena]1165-polyxena would never wish to live in slavery . And such rites win no favor from [a god]4898-a god . Only [I]0-i fondly wish [[my]0-i mother]6323-my mother might not know that [I]0-i have died . [My]0-i love of [her]6323-my mother takes from [my]0-i joy in death and gives [me]0-i fear . Not [my]0-i death truly , but [her]6323-my mother own sad life should be the most lamented in [her]6323-my mother tears . Now let [[your]4008-your men]7942-your men stand back , that [I]0-i may go with dignity down to [the Stygian shades]4010-the stygian shades , and , if [my]0-i plea is just , let [no man]3866-no man 's hand touch [my]0-i pure virgin body . A nobler gift to [him]4012-him , whoever [he]4012-him may be , whom [you]4008-your desire to placate with [my]0-i death today , shall be [a free maid]4013-a free maid 's blood . But , if [my]0-i words — [my]0-i parting wish , has power to touch [your]4008-your hearts , ( [[King Priam]1036-priam 's daughter]4014-king priam 's daughter , not [a captive]4015-a captive , pleads ) freely return [my]0-i body to [[my]0-i mother]6323-my mother , let [her]6323-my mother not pay with gold for the sad right to bury [me]0-i — but only with [her]6323-my mother tears ! Yes , when [she]6323-my mother could , [she]6323-my mother also paid with gold . ” After [she]6323-my mother said these words , [the people]1439-the people could no more restrain [their]1439-the people tears ; but [no one]5311-no one saw [her]6323-my mother shed one tear . Even [the priest]5774-the priest [himself]5774-the priest , reluctantly and weeping , drove the steel into [her]6323-my mother proffered breast . On failing knees [she]6323-my mother sank down to [the earth]1289-the earth ; but still maintained a countenance undaunted to the last : and , even unto death , it was [her]6323-my mother care to cover all that ought to be concealed , and save the value of chaste modesty . [The Trojan matrons]8149-the trojan matrons took [her]6323-my mother and recalled , lamenting , all [the sons of [Priam]1036-priam]8194-the sons of priam dead , the wealth of blood [one house]8195-one house had shed for all . And [they]8149-the trojan matrons bewailed [the chaste Polyxena]8196-the chaste polyxena and [you]8197-you , [[her]6323-my mother mother]4984-her mother , only lately called [a royal mother]8199-a royal mother and [a royal wife]8200-a royal wife , — the soul of [[Asia]330-asia 's fair prosperity]8201-asia 's fair prosperity , ; now lowest fallen in [all the wreck of [Troy]250-troy]8202-all the wreck of troy . [The conquering Ulysses]1129-ulysses only claimed [her]6323-my mother [his]1129-ulysses because [she]6323-my mother had brought [Hector]1038-hector forth : and [Hector]1038-hector hardly found [a master for [[his]1038-hector mother]1520-his mother]8203-a master for his mother . [She]6323-my mother continued to embrace the body of [a soul so brave]8205-a soul so brave , and shed [her]6323-my mother tears , as [she]6323-my mother had shed them often before for [country lost]8206-country lost , for [sons]5526-sons , for [royal mate]8208-royal mate . [She]6323-my mother bathed [[her]6323-my mother daughter]1816-her daughter 's wounds with tears and kissed them with [her]6323-my mother lips and once more beat [her]6323-my mother breast . [Her]6323-my mother white hair streamed down in the clotting blood , [she]6323-my mother tore [her]6323-my mother breast , and this and more [she]6323-my mother said : “[0-i] [[My]0-i daughter]1458-my daughter , what further sorrow can be [mine]0-i ? [[My]0-i daughter]1458-my daughter [you]1458-my daughter lie dead , [I]0-i see [your]1458-my daughter wounds — they are indeed [my]0-i own . Lest [I]0-i should lose [one child of [mine]0-i]4019-one child of mine without a cruel sword , [you]1458-my daughter have [your]1458-my daughter wound . [I]0-i thought , because [you]1458-my daughter were [a woman]5609-a woman , [you]1458-my daughter were safe from swords . But [you]1458-my daughter , [a woman]5609-a woman , felt the deadly steel . [That same Achilles]4022-that same achilles , who has given to death so many of [[your]1458-my daughter brothers]4023-your brothers , caused [your]1458-my daughter death , the bane of [Troy]250-troy and the serpent by [my]0-i nest ! When [Paris]845-paris and when [Phoebus]549-phoebus with [their]4024-their shafts had laid [him]549-phoebus low , ‘ Ah , now at least , ’ [I]0-i said , ‘ [Achilles]1048-achilles will no longer cause [me]0-i dread . ’ Yet even then [he]549-phoebus still was to be feared . For [him]549-phoebus [I]0-i have been fertile ! [Mighty Troy]331-mighty troy now lies in ruin , and the public woe is ended in one vast calamity . For [me]0-i alone the woe of [Troy]250-troy still lives . “ But lately on the pinnacle of fame , surrounded by [[my]4025-an iron witted wretch powerful sons]8210-my powerful sons - in - law , [daughters]5525-daughters , and [daughters - in - law]8212-daughters - in - law , and strong in [[my]4025-an iron witted wretch great husband]8213-my great husband , [I]4025-an iron witted wretch am exiled now , and destitute , and forced from the sad tombs of [those [I]4025-an iron witted wretch love , to wretched slavery , serving [Penelope]912-queen penelope : who showing [me]4025-an iron witted wretch to [curious dames of [Ithaca]332-ithaca]8215-curious dames of ithaca]8214-those i love , to wretched slavery , serving penelope : who showing me to curious dames of ithaca , will point and say , while [I]4025-an iron witted wretch am bending to [my]4025-an iron witted wretch task , ‘ Look at [that woman who was widely known , [the mother of great [Hector]1038-hector]8217-the mother of great hector , once [the wife of [Priam]1036-priam]8218-the wife of priam]8216-that woman who was widely known , the mother of great hector , once the wife of priam ! ’ After so many have been lost , now [you]8219-you , last comfort of [a mother]5325-a mother 's grief , must make atonement on [[the foeman]3741-the foeman 's tomb]8222-the foeman 's tomb . [I]4025-an iron witted wretch bore [a victim]7919-a victim for [[my]4025-an iron witted wretch enemy]5319-my enemy . “[4025-an iron witted wretch] Why do [I]0-i live — [an iron witted wretch]4025-an iron witted wretch ? Why do [I]0-i linger ? Why does cruel age detain [me]0-i ? Why , [pernicious deities]4026-pernicious deities , thus hold [me]0-i to [this earth]3851-this earth , unless [you]4028-your will that [I]0-i may weep at future funerals ? After the fall of [Troy]250-troy , who would suppose [King Priam]1036-priam could be happy ? [Blest]1167-blest in death , [he]1036-priam has not seen [[my]0-i daughter]1458-my daughter 's dreadful fate . [He]1036-priam lost at once [[his]1036-priam kingdom]2369-his kingdom and [his]1036-priam life . “ Can [I]1036-priam imagine [you]4028-your , [a royal maid]8225-a royal maid , will soon be honored with due funeral rites , and will be buried in [[our]8226-our family tomb]8227-our family tomb ? Such fortune comes no more to [[your]4028-your sad house]8228-your sad house . [A drift of foreign sand]8229-a drift of foreign sand will be [[your]4028-your grave]8230-your grave , the parting gift will be [[your]4028-your mother]5112-your mother 's tears . [We]8226-our have lost everything ! But no , there is one reason why [I]1036-priam should endure a while . [[[His]1036-priam mother]1520-his mother 's dearest]8233-his mother 's dearest , now [[her]1520-his mother only child]2296-her only child , once youngest of [that company of [sons]5526-sons]8235-that company of sons , [[my]1036-priam Polydorus]8237-my polydorus lives here on [these shores]8238-these shores protected by [the friendly Thracian king]8239-the friendly thracian king . Then why delay to bathe these cruel wounds , [her]1520-his mother dear face spattered with the dreadful blood ? ”[1036-priam] So [Hecuba]1168-hecuba went wailing towards [the shore]5443-the shore with aged step and tearing [her]1168-hecuba gray hair . At last [the unhappy mother]4032-the unhappy mother said , “ Give [me]4032-the unhappy mother an urn ; O , [Trojan women]8240-trojan women ! ”[4032-the unhappy mother] for , [she]4032-the unhappy mother wished to dip up salt [sea water]4033-sea water . But just then , [she]4032-the unhappy mother saw the corpse of [[her]4032-the unhappy mother last son]4034-her last son , thrown out upon [the shore]5443-the shore ; [[her]4032-the unhappy mother Polydorus]4036-her polydorus , killed , disfigured with deep wounds of Thracian swords . [The Trojan women]8155-the trojan women cried aloud , and [she]4032-the unhappy mother was struck dumb with [her]4032-the unhappy mother agony , which quite consumed both voice and tears within [her]4032-the unhappy mother heart — rigid and still [she]4032-the unhappy mother seemed as a hard rock . And now [she]4032-the unhappy mother gazes at the earth in front now lifts [her]4032-the unhappy mother haggard face up toward the skies , now scans that body lying stark and dead , now scans [his]4036-her polydorus wounds and most of all the wounds . [She]4032-the unhappy mother arms [herself]4032-the unhappy mother and draws up all [her]4032-the unhappy mother wrath . It burned as if [she]4032-the unhappy mother still held regal power [she]4032-the unhappy mother gave up all life to the single thought of quick revenge . Just as [a lioness]4038-a lioness rages when plundered of [her]4038-a lioness suckling cub and follows on [his]4036-her polydorus trail the unseen foe , so , [Hecuba]1168-hecuba with rage mixed in [her]1168-hecuba grief forgetful of [her]1168-hecuba years , not [her]1168-hecuba intent , went hastily to [Polymnestor]1164-polymnestor , who contrived this dreadful murder , and desired an interview , pretending it was [her]4032-the unhappy mother wish to show [him]1164-polymnestor hidden gold , for [[her]4032-the unhappy mother lost son]4039-her lost son . [The Odrysian king]4040-the odrysian king believed it all : accustomed to the love of gain , [he]4040-the odrysian king went with [her]4032-the unhappy mother , in secret , to the spot [she]4032-the unhappy mother chose . Then craftily [he]4040-the odrysian king said in [his]4040-the odrysian king bland way : “ Oh , [Hecuba]1168-hecuba , [you]1168-hecuba need not wait , give now , munificently to [[your]1168-hecuba son]1935-your son — and all [you]1168-hecuba give , and all that [you]1168-hecuba have given , by [the good gods]8242-the good gods , [I]4040-the odrysian king swear , shall be [his]4040-the odrysian king own . ”[4040-the odrysian king] [She]4032-the unhappy mother eyed [him]4040-the odrysian king sternly as [he]4040-the odrysian king spoke and swore so falsely . — Then [her]4032-the unhappy mother rage boiled over , and , seconded by all [her]4032-the unhappy mother captive train , [she]4032-the unhappy mother flew at [him]4040-the odrysian king and drove [her]4032-the unhappy mother fingers deep in [his]4040-the odrysian king perfidious eyes ; and tore them from [his]4040-the odrysian king face — and plunged [her]4032-the unhappy mother hands into the raw and bleeding sockets ( passion made [her]4032-the unhappy mother strong ) , defiled with [his]4040-the odrysian king bad blood . How could [she]4032-the unhappy mother tear [his]4040-the odrysian king eyes , gone from [their]4041-their seats ? [She]4032-the unhappy mother wildly gouged the sightless sockets of [his]4040-the odrysian king bleeding face ! [The Thracians , angered by such violence done upon [[their]4042-the thracians , angered by such violence done upon their king king]6737-their king]4042-the thracians , angered by such violence done upon their king , immediately attacked [the Trojan matron]4044-the trojan matron with [their]4042-the thracians , angered by such violence done upon their king stones and darts but [she]4044-the trojan matron with hoarse growling and snapping jaws sprang at the stones , and , when [she]4044-the trojan matron tried to speak , [she]4044-the trojan matron barked like a fierce dog . [The place]1926-the place still bears a name suggested by [her]4044-the trojan matron hideous change . And [she]4044-the trojan matron , long mindful ! of [her]4044-the trojan matron old time woe , ran howling dismally in [Thracian fields]4046-thracian fields . [Her]4044-the trojan matron sad fate moved [the Trojans]3716-the trojans and [the Greeks]2456-the greeks , [[her]4044-the trojan matron friends]2127-her friends and foes , and [all the heavenly gods]4050-all the heavenly gods . Yes all , for even [the sister - wife of [Jove]456-jove]4051-the sister - wife of jove denied that [Hecuba]1168-hecuba deserved such fate . Although [Aurora]512-aurora had given aid to [Troy]250-troy , [she]512-aurora had no heart nor leisure to be moved by fall of [Troy]250-troy or fate of [Hecuba]1168-hecuba . At [home]2642-home [she]512-aurora bore a greater grief and care ; [her]512-aurora loss of [Memnon]1169-memnon is afflicting [her]512-aurora . [Aurora]512-aurora , [[his]1169-memnon rose - tinted mother]4053-his rose - tinted mother , saw [him]1169-memnon perish by [Achilles]1048-achilles ' deadly spear , upon [the Phrygian plain]4054-the phrygian plain . [She]512-aurora saw [his]1169-memnon death , and the loved rose that lights the dawning hour turned death - pale , and the sky was veiled in clouds . [The parent]4055-the parent could not bear to see [his]1169-memnon limbs laid on the final flames . Just as [she]512-aurora was , with loose hair streaming round [her]512-aurora , [she]512-aurora did not disdain to crouch down at the knees of [Jove]456-jove , and said these sad words added to [her]512-aurora tears : “ Beneath all those whom golden heaven sustains ; ( inferior , for see , through all [the world]1360-the world [[my]512-aurora temples]8244-my temples are so few ) [I]512-aurora have come now [a goddess]5320-a goddess , to [you]456-jove ; not with any hope that [you]456-jove may grant [me]512-aurora temples , festivals , and altars , heated with devoted fires : but if [you]456-jove will consider the good deeds , which [I]512-aurora , [a woman]5609-a woman , may yet do for [you]456-jove , when at the dawn [I]512-aurora mark the edge of night ; then [you]456-jove may think of some reward for [me]512-aurora . But that is not [my]512-aurora care ; nor is it now [Aurora]512-aurora 's purpose here , that [she]512-aurora should plead for honors , though deserved . [I]512-aurora come bereaved , of [[my]512-aurora son]5122-my son Memnon , who in vain bore arms to aid [[his]5122-my son uncle]7984-his uncle and in prime of life ( 0 , thus [you]456-jove willed it ! ) fell stricken by the sword of great [Achilles]1048-achilles . Give [[my]512-aurora son]5122-my son , [I]512-aurora pray , [O highest ruler of the gods]8250-o highest ruler of the gods , some honor , some comfort for [his]5122-my son death , a little ease [[his]5122-my son mother]1520-his mother 's grief . ”[512-aurora] [Jove]456-jove nodded [his]456-jove assent . Immediately the high - wrought funeral - pile of [Memnon]1169-memnon fell down with its lofty fire , and volumes of black smoke obscured the day , as streams exhaling their dense rising fogs , exclude the bright sun from [the land below]4056-the land below . Black ashes fly and , rolling up a shape , retain a form and gather heat and life out of the fire . [Their]4057-their lightness gave [them]4057-their wings , first like a bird and then in fact a bird . The wings move whirring . In the neighboring air [uncounted sisters , of one birth]4058-uncounted sisters , of one birth and growth together make one noise . Three times [they]4057-their flew around [the funeral pile]4059-the funeral pile ; and thrice the sound accordant of [their]4057-their fluttering wings went swift upon the soft breeze . When [they]4057-their turned about , [their]4057-their fourth flight in the skies divided [them]4057-their . As two fierce races from [two hostile camps]4060-two hostile camps , clash in [their]4057-their warfare , [these bird - sisters]4061-these bird - sisters with [their]4057-their beaks and crooked claws clashed , passionate , until [their]4057-their tired wings and opposing breasts could not sustain [them]4057-their . And [those kindred - foes]4062-those kindred - foes fell down a sacrifice , memorial , to [Memnon]1169-memnon 's ashes buried in that place . [Brave Memnon]1169-memnon , author of [their]4057-their birth , has given [his]1169-memnon name to those birds , marvellously formed , — and from [him]1169-memnon [they]4057-their are called [Memnonides]333-memnonides . — now , always when the Sun has passed the twelve signs of the Zodiac , [they]4057-their war again , to perish as a sacrifice for [him]1169-memnon . So [others]4906-others grieved , while [[Dymas]1039-dymas ' royal daughter]4064-dymas ' royal daughter was barking : but [Aurora]512-aurora overcome with lasting sorrows , could not think of [her]4064-dymas ' royal daughter : and even now , [she]512-aurora sheds affectionate tears : and sprinkles them as dew on all [the world]1360-the world . [The Fates]553-the fates did not allow the hope of [Troy]250-troy to be destroyed entirely with [[her]4064-dymas ' royal daughter walls]4066-her walls . [Aeneas]1143-aeneas , [the heroic son of [Venus]996-venus]4067-the heroic son of venus , bore on [his]1143-aeneas shoulders holy images and still another holy weight , [[his]1143-aeneas sire]3426-his sire , a venerable burden . From all [his]1143-aeneas wealth [the pious hero]4069-the pious hero chose this for [his]1143-aeneas care together with [[his]1143-aeneas child]5345-his child , [Ascanius]1170-ascanius . Then with a fleet of [exiles]4071-exiles [he]1143-aeneas sails forth , [he]1143-aeneas leaves [Antandrus]334-antandrus , leaves [the wicked realm and shore of [Thrace]148-thrace now dripping with the blood of [Polydorus]335-polydorus]4072-the wicked realm and shore of thrace now dripping with the blood of polydorus . With fair winds and tide [he]1143-aeneas and [[his]1143-aeneas comrades]4073-his comrades reach [[Apollo]549-phoebus 's isle]4074-apollo 's isle . Good Anius , [king of [Delos]111-delos]4075-king of delos , vigilant for all [[his]4075-king of delos subjects]4076-his subjects ' welfare , and as [priest devoted to [Apollo]549-phoebus]4077-priest devoted to apollo , took [him]549-phoebus [there]1500-there into [[his]4075-king of delos temple]4079-his temple and [[his]4075-king of delos home]5235-his home , and showed [the city]5520-the city , [the famed shrines]4082-the famed shrines , and the two trees which once [Latona]798-latona , while in labor , held . [They]4083-they burned sweet incense , adding to it wine , and laid the flesh of cattle in the flames , an offering marked by custom for [the god]5013-the god . Then in [the palace]2549-the palace and [[its]2549-the palace kingly hall]4086-its kingly hall , reclining on luxurious couches , [they]4083-they drank flowing wine with [Ceres]758-ceres ' gifts of food . But [old Anchises]958-old anchises asked : “ [[O]958-old anchises chosen priest of [Phoebus]549-phoebus]8252-o chosen priest of phoebus , can [I]1171-anius be deceived ? When first [I]1171-anius saw [these walls]8253-these walls , did [you]8252-o chosen priest of phoebus not have [a son]1612-a son , and [twice two daughters]8255-twice two daughters ? Is it possible [I]1171-anius am mistaken ? ”[1171-anius] [Anius]1171-anius replied , — shaking [his]1171-anius temples wreathed with fillets white , — “ It can be no mistake , [great hero]8256-great hero , [you]8252-o chosen priest of phoebus did see [the father of five children]8257-the father of five children then , ( so much the risk of fortune may affect the best of [men]1399-men ) . [You]8252-o chosen priest of phoebus see [me]1171-anius now , almost bereft of all . For what assistance can [[my]1171-anius absent son]8259-my absent son afford , while [he]8259-my absent son is [king]6901-king , [the ruler over [Andros]232-andros]8261-the ruler over andros — [that land named for [his]8259-my absent son name — over which [he]8259-my absent son rules for [me]1171-anius]8262-that land named for his name — over which he rules for me ? “[1171-anius] [The Delian god]3334-the delian god gave to [[my]0-i son]5122-my son the art of augury ; and likewise , [Liber]1172-liber gave [[my]0-i daughters]2339-my daughters precious gifts exceeding all [my]0-i wishes and belief : since , every thing [[my]0-i daughters]2339-my daughters touched assumed the forms of corn , of sparkling wine , or gray - green olive oil . Most surely , wonderful advantages . “ Soon as [Atrides]1144-atrides , [he]1144-atrides who conquered [Troy]250-troy had heard of this ( for [you]8263-you should not suppose that [we]8264-we , too , did not suffer from [your]8263-you storms ) [he]1144-atrides dragged [[my]2339-my daughters daughters]2339-my daughters there with savage force , from [my]2339-my daughters loved bosom to [[his]1144-atrides hostile camp]8266-his hostile camp , and ordered [them]2339-my daughters to feed the Argive fleet , by [their]2339-my daughters divinely given power of touch . “[2339-my daughters] Whichever way [they]2339-my daughters could , [they]2339-my daughters made escape two hastened to [Euboea]336-euboea , and [two]3007-two sought [[their]3007-two brother]4092-their brother 's island , [Andros]232-andros . Quickly then [an Argive squadron]4093-an argive squadron , following , threatened war , unless [they]2339-my daughters were surrendered . [The brother]4094-the brother 's love gave way to fear . And there is reason why [you]4095-you should forgive [a timid brother]4096-a timid brother 's fear : [he]4094-the brother had [no warrior like [Aeneas]1143-aeneas]4097-no warrior like aeneas , none like [Hector]1038-hector , by whose prowess [you]4095-you held [Troy]250-troy from [its]250-troy destruction through ten years of war . “ Strong chains were brought to hold [[my]4095-you daughters]2339-my daughters ' arms . [Both]5611-both lifted suppliant hands , which still were free , to heaven and cried , ‘ 0 , [Father Bacchus]1173-father bacchus ! give [us]5611-both needed aid ! ’ And [he]4094-the brother who had before given [them]2339-my daughters the power of touch , did give [them]2339-my daughters aid — if giving freedom without human shape can be called giving aid . — [I]4095-you never knew by what means [they]2339-my daughters lost shape , and can not tell ; but [their]2339-my daughters calamity is surely known : [[my]4095-you daughters]2339-my daughters were transformed to snow - white doves , white birds of Venus , guardian of [your]8270-your days . ”[4095-you] With this and other talk [they]4098-them shared the feast , then left the table and retired to sleep . [They]4098-them rose up with the day , and went at once to hear [the oracle of [Phoebus]549-phoebus]4099-the oracle of phoebus speak . [He]4099-the oracle of phoebus counselled [them]4098-them to leave [that land]5048-that land and find [[their]4098-them ancient mother]4101-their ancient mother and [[their]4098-them kindred shores]4102-their kindred shores . [The king]6107-the king attended [them]4098-them , and gave [them]4098-them gifts when ready to depart ; a sceptre to [Anchises]958-old anchises , and a robe and quiver to [[his]6107-the king grandson]5948-his grandson , and [he]6107-the king gave a goblet to [Aeneas]1143-aeneas , that which formerly was sent to [him]1143-aeneas by [Therses]1174-therses , once [[his]6107-the king Theban guest]4105-his theban guest . [Therses]1174-therses had sent it from [Aonian shores]4106-aonian shores ; but [Alcon the Hylean]1175-alcon the hylean should be named , for [he]1175-alcon the hylean had made the goblet and inscribed a pictured story on the polished side . There was [a city]6165-a city shown with seven gates , from which the name could be derived by all . Outside the walls was a sad funeral , and tombs and fires and funeral pyres were shown , and [many matrons with dishevelled hair and naked breasts , expressive of [their]4108-many matrons with dishevelled hair and naked breasts , expressive of their grief grief]4108-many matrons with dishevelled hair and naked breasts , expressive of their grief , and many nymphs too , weeping mournfully because [their]4108-many matrons with dishevelled hair and naked breasts , expressive of their grief streams were dry . Without a leaf the bare trees stood straight up and the [she]4109-her goats were nibbling in [dry , stony fields]4110-dry , stony fields . And there [he]1175-alcon the hylean carved [[Orion]886-orion 's daughters]4111-orion 's daughters in [the Theban square]4112-the theban square , one giving [her]4109-her bare throat a cruel cut , one with [her]4109-her shuttle making clumsy wounds ; both dying for [[their]4111-orion 's daughters people]4113-their people . Next [they]4111-orion 's daughters were borne out through [the city]5520-the city with doe funeral pomp , and [mourning crowds]4115-mourning crowds were gathered round [their]4111-orion 's daughters pyre . Then from the virgin ashes , lest the race should die . [twin youths]4116-twin youths arose , whom fame has named [Coroni]1176-coroni and [they]4116-twin youths shared in all the rites becoming for [[their]4116-twin youths mothers]4117-their mothers ' dust . Even so in shining figures all was shown inscribed on ancient bronze . The top rim , made quite rough , was gilded with acanthus leaves . Presents of equal worth [the Trojans]3716-the trojans gave : a maple incense casket for [the priest]5774-the priest , a bowl , a crown adorned with gold and gems . Then , recollecting how [the Trojans]3716-the trojans had derived [their]3716-the trojans origin from [Teucer]1142-teucer 's race , [they]3716-the trojans sailed to [Crete]100-crete but there could not endure ills sent by [Jove]456-jove , and , having left behind [the hundred cities]4121-the hundred cities , [they]3716-the trojans desired to reach [the western harbors of [the Ausonian land]4123-the ausonian land]4122-the western harbors of the ausonian land . Wintry seas then tossed [the heroic band]4124-the heroic band , and in [a treacherous harbor of [those isles]4126-those isles]4125-a treacherous harbor of those isles , called [Strophades]337-strophades , [Aello]1177-aello frightened [them]3716-the trojans . [They]3716-the trojans passed [[Dulichium]338-dulichium 's port]4127-dulichium 's port , and [Ithaca]332-ithaca , [Samos]245-samos , and [all the homes of [Neritos]339-neritos]4128-all the homes of neritos , — [the kingdom of [the shrewd deceitful man]4130-the shrewd deceitful man , [Ulysses]1129-ulysses]4129-the kingdom of the shrewd deceitful man , ulysses ; and [they]3716-the trojans reached [Ambracia]340-ambracia , contended for by those disputing gods ; which is today renowned abroad , because of [Actian Apollo]341-actian apollo , and the stone seen there conspicuous as [a transformed judge]4131-a transformed judge ; [they]3716-the trojans saw [Dodona]238-dodona , vocal with [its]238-dodona oaks ; and also , [the well known Chaonian bays , where [sons of [the Molossian king]4134-the molossian king]4133-sons of the molossian king escaped with wings attached , from unavailing flames]4132-the well known chaonian bays , where sons of the molossian king escaped with wings attached , from unavailing flames . [They]3716-the trojans set [their]3716-the trojans sails then for [the neighboring land of [the Phaeacians]342-the phaeacians]4135-the neighboring land of the phaeacians , rich with luscious fruit : then for [Epirus]247-the green epirus and to [Buthrotos]344-buthrotos , and came then to [a mimic town of]4136-a mimic town of [Troy]250-troy , ruled by [the Phrygian seer]4137-the phrygian seer . With prophecies which [Helenus]1138-helenus , [the son of [Priam]1143-aeneas]4138-the son of priam , gave , [they]3716-the trojans came to [Sicily]158-sicily , whose three high capes jut outward in [the sea]1298-the sea . Of these three points [Pachynos]1178-pachynos faces towards [the showery south]4140-the showery south ; and [Lilybaeum]345-lilybaeum is exposed to soft delicious zephyrs ; but [Peloros]1179-peloros looks out towards the Bears which never touch [the sea]1298-the sea . [The Trojans]1180-the trojans came [there]1500-there . Favored by the tide , and active oars , by nightfall [all the fleet]4143-all the fleet arrived together on [Zanclaean]346-zanclaean sands . [Scylla]878-scylla upon the right infests [the shore]5443-the shore , [Charybdis]879-charybdis , restless on the left , destroys . [Charybdis]879-charybdis swallows and then vomits forth [misfortuned ships]4145-misfortuned ships that [she]879-charybdis has taken down ; [Scylla]878-scylla 's dark waist is girt with savage dogs . [She]878-scylla has [a maiden]5018-a maiden 's face , and , if [we]4147-we may believe what poets tell , [she]878-scylla was in olden time [a maiden]5018-a maiden . [Many suitors]2007-many suitors courted [her]878-scylla , but [she]878-scylla repulsed [them]2007-many suitors ; and , because [she]878-scylla was so much beloved by [all the Nereids]4150-all the nereids , [she]878-scylla sought [these nymphs]4151-these nymphs and used to tell how [she]878-scylla escaped from [the love - stricken youths]4152-the love - stricken youths . But [Galatea]1181-galatea , while [her]878-scylla loosened locks were being combed , said to [[her]878-scylla visitor]4153-her visitor , — “ Truly , [O maiden]8271-o maiden , [a gentle race of [men]1399-men]8272-a gentle race of men courts [you]8271-o maiden , and so [you]8271-o maiden can , and do , refuse all with impunity . But [I]1181-galatea , whose sire is [Nereus]467-nereus , whom [the azure Doris]8274-the azure doris bore , though guarded by [so many sister nymphs]8275-so many sister nymphs , escaped [the Cyclops]470-the cyclops ' love with tragic loss . ”[1181-galatea] And , sobbing , [she]878-scylla was choked with tears . When with [her]878-scylla fingers , marble white and smooth , [Scylla]878-scylla had wiped away the rising tears of sorrow and had comforted [the nymph]5012-the nymph , [she]878-scylla said , “ Tell [me]878-scylla , [dear goddess]8276-dear goddess , and do not conceal from [me]878-scylla ( for [I]878-scylla am true to [you]8276-dear goddess ) the cause of [your]8276-dear goddess great sorrows . ”[878-scylla] And [the nymph]5012-the nymph , [daughter of [Nereus]467-nereus]4156-daughter of nereus , thus replied to [her]878-scylla : — “ [Acis]1182-acis , [the son of [Faunus]1183-faunus]8277-the son of faunus and [the nymph Symaethis]8278-the nymph symaethis , was a great delight to [[his]1182-acis dear father]8279-his dear father and [[his]1182-acis mother]1520-his mother , but even more to [me]5012-the nymph , for [he]1182-acis alone had won [my]5012-the nymph love . Eight birthdays having passed a second time , [his]1182-acis tender cheeks were marked with softest down . “[5012-the nymph] While [I]0-i pursued [him]467-nereus with a constant love , [the Cyclops]470-the cyclops followed [me]0-i as constantly . And , should [you]4157-you ask [me]0-i , [I]0-i could not declare whether [my]0-i hatred of [him]467-nereus , or [my]0-i love of [Acis]1182-acis was the stronger . — [They]4158-me were equal . “ O gentle [Venus]996-venus ! what power equals [yours]4157-you ! [That savage]8281-that savage , dreaded by [the forest trees]7453-the forest trees , feared by [the stranger who beholds [his]1182-acis face contemner of [Olympus]11-olympus and [the gods]1395-the gods]8283-the stranger who beholds his face contemner of olympus and the gods , now [he]1182-acis can feel what love is . [He]1182-acis is filled with passion for [me]4158-me . [He]1182-acis burns hot for [me]4158-me , forgetful of [his]1182-acis cattle and [[his]1182-acis caves]8285-his caves . “[4158-me] Now , [Polyphemus]1184-polyphemus , [wretched Cyclops]470-the cyclops , [you]1184-polyphemus are careful of appearance , and [you]1184-polyphemus try the art of pleasing . [You]1184-polyphemus have even combed [your]1184-polyphemus stiffened hair with rakes : it pleases [you]1184-polyphemus to trim [your]1184-polyphemus shaggy beard with sickles , while [you]1184-polyphemus gaze at [your]1184-polyphemus fierce features in a pool so earnest to compose them . Love of flesh , ferocity and [your]1184-polyphemus keen thirst for blood have ceased . [The ships]2641-the ships may safely come and go ! “ While all this happened , [Telemus]1185-telemus arrived at [the Sicilian Aetna]347-the sicilian aetna — [Telemus]1185-telemus , [the son of [Eurymus]1186-the son of eurymus , who never could mistake an omen , who never could mistake [an omen]8286-an omen]1186-the son of eurymus , who never could mistake an omen , met [the dreadful fierce , huge Cyclops]8287-the dreadful fierce , huge cyclops , [Polyphemus]1184-polyphemus , and [he]1185-telemus said , ‘ That single eye now midmost in [your]1184-polyphemus brow [Ulysses]1129-ulysses will take from [you]1184-polyphemus . ’ In reply , [the Cyclops]470-the cyclops only laughed at [him]1185-telemus and said , ‘ [Most silly of [the prophets]8289-the prophets]8288-most silly of the prophets ! [you]1185-telemus are wrong , [a maiden]5018-a maiden has already taken it ! ’ So [he]1185-telemus made fun of [Telemus]1185-telemus , who warned [him]1185-telemus vainly of the truth — and after that , [he]4162-the giant savage either burdened with [his]4162-the giant savage bulk [the shore]5443-the shore , by stalking back and forth with lengthy strides , or came back weary to [[his]4162-the giant savage shaded cave]8292-his shaded cave . “[4162-the giant savage] [A wedge - formed hill]4160-a wedge - formed hill projects far in [the sea]1298-the sea and either side there flow the salty waves . To this [the giant savage]4162-the giant savage climbed and sat upon the highest point . The wooly flock , no longer guided by [him]4162-the giant savage , followed after . There , after [he]4162-the giant savage had laid [his]4162-the giant savage pine tree down , which served [him]4162-the giant savage for a staff , although so tall it seemed best fitted for [a ship]5175-a ship 's high mast , [he]4162-the giant savage played [his]4162-the giant savage shepherd pipes — in them [I]0-i saw a hundred reeds . [The very mountains]4164-the very mountains felt the pipings of [that shepherd]4165-that shepherd , and the waves beneath [him]4162-the giant savage shook respondent to each note . All this time [I]0-i was hidden by a rock , reclining on the bosom of [[my]0-i own dear [Acis]1182-acis]4166-my own dear acis ; and , although afar , [I]0-i heard such words as these , which [I]0-i can not forget : — ‘ O [Galatea]1181-galatea , fairer than the flower of snow - white privet , and more blooming than [the meadows]4167-the meadows , and more slender than the tall delightful alder , brighter than smooth glass , more wanton than [the tender skipping kid , smoother than shells worn by continual floods]4168-the tender skipping kid , smoother than shells worn by continual floods , more pleasing than the winter sun , or than the summer shade , more beautiful than fruit of apple trees , more pleasing to the sight than lofty plane tree , clearer than pure ice , and sweeter than the ripe grape , softer than soft swan - down and the softest curdled milk ; alas , and if [you]1181-galatea did not fly from [me]0-i , [I]0-i would declare [you]1181-galatea are more beautiful than [any watered garden of [this world]7951-this world]4169-any watered garden of this world . ‘ And yet , [O Galatea]1181-galatea ; [I]0-i must say , that [you]1181-galatea are wilder than all untrained bullocks , harder than seasoned oak , more treacherous than [tumbled waters]4171-tumbled waters , tougher than the twigs of osier and the white vine , harder to move than cliffs which front these waves , more violent than any torrent , [you]1181-galatea are prouder than the flattered peacock , fiercer than hot fire , rougher than thistles , and more cruel than the pregnant she - bear , deafer than the waves of stormy seas , more deadly savage than the trodden water - snake : and , ( what [I]0-i would endeavor surely to deprive [you]1181-galatea of ) [your]1181-galatea speed is fleeter than the deer pursued by frightful barkings , and more swift than rapid storm - winds and the flitting air . ‘ But [Galatea]1181-galatea , if [you]1181-galatea knew [me]0-i well [you]1181-galatea would regret [your]1181-galatea hasty flight from [me]0-i , and [you]1181-galatea would even blame [your]1181-galatea own delay , and strive for [my]0-i affection . [I]0-i now hold the choice part of [this mountain]2849-this mountain for [[my]0-i cave]4173-my cave , roofed over with [the native rock]4174-the native rock . The sun is not felt in the heat of middle day , nor is the winter felt there : apples load the bending boughs and luscious grapes hang on the lengthened vines , resembling gold , and purple grapes as rich — [I]0-i keep for [you]1181-galatea those two delicious fruits . With [your]1181-galatea own hands , [you]1181-galatea shall [yourself]1181-galatea uncover strawberries , growing so soft beneath the woodland shade ; [you]1181-galatea shall pluck corners in the autumn ripe , and plums , not only darkened with black juice but larger kinds as yellow as new wax . If [I]0-i may be [[your]1181-galatea mate]4175-your mate , [you]1181-galatea shall have chestnuts , fruits of [the arbute]4176-the arbute shall be always near , and every tree shall yield at [your]1181-galatea desire . ‘ The ewes here all are [mine]0-i , and many more are wandering in [the valleys]1316-the valleys ; and [the woods]1317-the woods conceal a multitude — and many more are penned within [[my]0-i caves]4179-my caves . If [you]1181-galatea perchance should ask [me]0-i , [I]0-i could never even guess or count the number ; it is for [the poor]4180-the poor to count [their]4180-the poor cattle . Do not trust [my]0-i word , but go [yourself]1181-galatea and see with [your]1181-galatea own eyes , how [they]4180-the poor can hardly stand up on [their]4180-the poor legs because of [their]4180-the poor distended udders ' weight . ‘ [I]0-i have lambs also , as a future flock , kept in warm folds , and [kids of [their]4181-kids of their same age same age]4181-kids of their same age in other folds . [I]0-i always have supplies of snow - white milk for drinking , and much more is hardened with good rennet liquefied . ‘ The common joys of ordinary things will not be all [you]1181-galatea should expect of [me]0-i — tame does and hares and [she]4182-she - goats or a pair of doves , or even a nest from a tall tree — for [I]0-i have found upon [a mountain top]4183-a mountain top , the twin cubs of a shaggy wild [she]4182-she - bear , of such appearance [you]1181-galatea can hardly know the one from other . [They]4184-they will play with [you]1181-galatea . The very day [I]0-i found [them]4184-they [I]0-i declared , these [I]0-i will keep for [[my]0-i dear]3230-my dear loved one 's joy . ‘ Do now but raise [your]1181-galatea shining head above [the azure sea]4186-the azure sea : come [Galatea]1181-galatea come , and do not scorn [my]0-i presents . Certainly , [I]0-i know [myself]0-i , for only recently [I]0-i saw [my]0-i own reflection pictured clear in limpid water , and [my]0-i features pleased and charmed [me]0-i when [I]0-i saw it . See how huge [I]0-i am . Not even [Jove]456-jove in [[his]456-jove high heaven]4187-his high heaven is larger than [my]0-i body : this [I]0-i say because [you]1181-galatea tell [me]0-i how imperial [Jove]456-jove surpasses . — Who is [he]456-jove ? [I]0-i never knew . ‘ [My]0-i long hair plentifully hangs to hide unpleasant features ; as a grove of trees overshadowing [my]0-i shoulders . Never think [my]0-i body is uncomely , although rough , thick set with wiry bristles . Every tree without leaves is unseemly ; every horse , unless a mane hangs on [his]456-jove tawny neck ; feathers must cover birds ; and [their]4188-their soft wool is ornamental on the best formed sheep : therefore a beard , and rough hair spread upon the body is becoming to [all men]1428-all men . [I]0-i have but one eye centered perfectly within [my]0-i forehead , so it seems most like [a mighty buckler]4190-a mighty buckler . Ha ! does not the Sun see everything from heaven ? Yet it has but one eye . — ‘ [Galatea]1181-galatea , [you]1181-galatea must know , [[my]0-i father]1438-my father is [chief ruler in [[your]1181-galatea sea]4193-your sea]4192-chief ruler in your sea , and therefor [I]0-i now offer [him]1438-my father to [you]1181-galatea as [[your]1181-galatea own father - in - law]4194-your own father - in - law — But oh , do take some pity on [a suppliant]5588-a suppliant , — and hear [his]1438-my father prayer , for only unto [you]1181-galatea [my]0-i heart is given . ‘ [I]0-i , who despise the power of [Jove]456-jove , [his]456-jove heavens and piercing lightnings , am afraid of [you]1181-galatea — [your]1181-galatea wrath more fearful than the lightning 's flash — but [I]0-i should be more patient under slights , if [you]1181-galatea avoided [all men]1428-all men : why reject [the Cyclops]4197-the cyclops for the love that [Acis]1182-acis gives ?
