Have pity on [his]1238-vertumnus passion , and believe that [he]1238-vertumnus who woos [you]4534-you is here and [he]1238-vertumnus pleads with [my]4534-you lips . “[4534-you] [You]4534-you should not forget to fear [avenging deities]4543-avenging deities , and the Idalian , who hate all cruel hearts , and also dread the fierce revenge of [her]4544-her of [Rhamnus - Land]389-rhamnus - land . And that [you]4534-you may stand more in awe of [them]4545-them , ( old age has given [me]0-i opportunities of knowing many things ) [I]0-i will relate some happenings known in [Cyprus]284-cyprus , by which [you]4534-you may be persuaded and relent with ease . “ [Iphis]977-iphis , born of [a humble family]8463-a humble family , had seen [the famed Anaxarete , who was of [the race of [ancient Teucer]1142-teucer]8465-the race of ancient teucer]8464-the famed anaxarete , who was of the race of ancient teucer . — [He]1238-vertumnus had seen [her]4544-her and felt fire inflame [his]1238-vertumnus bones . Struggling a long time , [he]1238-vertumnus could not subdue [his]1238-vertumnus passion by [his]1238-vertumnus reason , so [he]1238-vertumnus came a suppliant to [her]4544-her doors . And having now confessed [his]1238-vertumnus ardent passion to [[her]4544-her nurse]7575-her nurse , besought [her]7575-her nurse by the hopes reposed in [her]7575-her nurse by [the loved girl]8467-the loved girl , not to give [him]1238-vertumnus a cold heart and at another time , with fair words given to each of [many servants]8468-many servants [he]1238-vertumnus besought [their]8468-many servants kindest interest with an anxious voice . [He]1238-vertumnus often gave [them]8468-many servants coaxing words engraved on tablets of soft wax ; and sometimes [he]1238-vertumnus would fasten garlands , wet with dew of tears , upon the door - posts ; and [he]1238-vertumnus often laid [his]1238-vertumnus tender side nightlong on the hard threshold , sadly reproaching the obdurate bolt . “[4548-you] Deafer than [the deep sea that rises high]4546-the deep sea that rises high when [the rainy Constellation of the Kids]390-the rainy constellation of the kids is setting ; harder than the iron which the fire of [Noricum]391-noricum refines ; more hard than rock which in [its]4547-its native state is fixed firm rooted ; [she]4548-you despised and laughed at [him]4549-him , and , adding to [her]4548-you cruel deeds and pride , [she]4548-you boasted and deprived [him]4549-him of all hope . “ [Iphis]977-iphis , unable to endure such pain prolonged , spoke these , [his]1238-vertumnus final words , before [her]4548-you door : ‘ Anaxarete , [you]4548-you have conquered [me]4550-you , and [you]4548-you shall have no more annoyances to bear from [me]4550-you . Be joyful and prepare [your]4548-you triumph , and invoke [god Paean]1239-god paean , crown [yourself]4548-you with shining laurel . [You]4548-you are now [[my]4550-you conqueror]8469-my conqueror , and [I]4550-you resigned will die . [Woman of iron]8470-woman of iron , rejoice in victory ! “[4550-you] At least , [you]4550-you will commend [me]0-i for one thing , one point in which [I]0-i must please even [you]4550-you , and cause [you]4550-you to confess [my]0-i right of praise . Remember that [my]0-i star crossed love for [you]4550-you died only with the last breath of [my]0-i life . And now in one short moment [I]0-i shall be deprived a twofold light ; and no report will come to [you]4550-you , [no messenger of death]4551-no messenger of death . But doubt not , [I]0-i will come to [you]4550-you so that [I]0-i can be seen in person , and [you]4550-you may then satiate [your]4550-you cruel eyesight with [my]0-i lifeless body . If , [you]4550-you gods above ! [You]4550-you have some knowledge of [our]4552-our mortal ways remember [me]0-i , for now [my]0-i tongue can pray no longer . Let [me]0-i be renowned in times far distant and give all those hours to Fame which [you]4550-you have taken from [my]0-i life on [earth]1287-earth . ’ “ Then to the doorpost which [he]0-i often had adorned with floral wreaths [he]0-i lifted up [his]0-i swimming eyes and both [his]0-i pallid arms , and , when [he]0-i had fastened over the capital a rope that held a dangling noose , [he]0-i said , — “[4550-you] Are these the garlands that delight [your]4550-you heart ? [[You]4550-you cruel and [unnatural woman]4555-unnatural woman]4554-you cruel and unnatural woman ? ” — Then , thrust in [his]0-i head , turning even then towards [her]1520-his mother , and hung a hapless weight with broken neck . “[0-i] The door , struck by the motion of [his]0-i feet as they were quivering , seemed to utter sounds of groaning , and , when it flew open , showed the sad sight . [All the servants]4556-all the servants cried aloud , and after [they]4556-all the servants had tried in vain to save [him]0-i , carried [him]0-i from [there]1500-there to [[[his]0-i mother]1520-his mother 's house]4559-his mother 's house , ( to [her]1520-his mother because [[his]0-i father]1530-his father was then dead ) . “ [She]1520-his mother held [him]0-i to [her]1520-his mother bosom and embraced the cold limbs of [[her]1520-his mother dead child]8471-her dead child . After [she]1520-his mother had uttered words so natural to the grief of [wretched mothers]8472-wretched mothers — after [she]1520-his mother had done what [wretched mothers]8472-wretched mothers do at such sad times , [she]1520-his mother led a tearful funeral through [the streets]8474-the streets , the pale corpse following high upon the bier , on to a pyre laid in [the central square]8475-the central square . By chance , [[Anaxarete]1240-anaxarete 's house]8476-anaxarete 's house was near the way through which the mournful funeral was going with the corpse , and the sad sound of wailing reached the ears of [that proud girl]8477-that proud girl — hardhearted , and already goaded on by [an avenging god]8478-an avenging god . Moved by the sound , [she]1520-his mother said ; “[4556-all the servants] Let [me]0-i observe [their]4561-their sniveling rites . ” And [she]1520-his mother ascended to [an upper room]8479-an upper room , provided with wide windows . Scarcely had [she]1520-his mother looked at [Iphis]977-iphis , laid out on the bier , when [her]1520-his mother eyes stiffened , and [she]1520-his mother turned all white , as warm blood left [her]1520-his mother body . [She]1520-his mother tried then to turn back from the window , but [she]1520-his mother stood transfixed there . [She]1520-his mother then tried to turn [her]1520-his mother face away from that sad sight , but could not move ; and by degrees the stone , which always had existed , petrified in [her]1520-his mother cold breast , and took possession of [her]1520-his mother heart and limbs . “[4556-all the servants] This is not fiction , and that [you]4562-you may know , [Salamis]1241-salamis keeps that statue safe today , formed of [the virgin]5026-the virgin and has also built a temple called , ‘ Venus [the watchful Goddess . ’]4564-the watchful goddess . ’ Warned by [her]5026-the virgin fate , [O sweet nymph]4565-o sweet nymph , lay aside prolonged disdain , and cheerfully unite [yourself]4562-you to one who loves [you]4562-you . Then may frost of springtime never nip [your]4562-you fruit in bud , nor rude winds strike the blossom . ” When [the god , fitted for every shape]8480-the god , fitted for every shape , had said these words in vain , [he]8480-the god , fitted for every shape laid [the old woman]6260-the old woman 's form aside and was again [a youth]2864-a youth . On [her]6260-the old woman [he]8480-the god , fitted for every shape seemed to blaze , as when the full light of the brilliant Sun , after it has dispelled opposing clouds , has shone forth with not one to intercept . [He]8480-the god , fitted for every shape purposed violence , but there was then no need of force . [The lovely nymph]8483-the lovely nymph was charmed , was captivated by [the god]5013-the god 's bright form and felt a passion answering to [his]8480-the god , fitted for every shape love . At [Proca]1242-proca 's death unjust [Amulius]1243-amulius seized with [[his]1243-amulius troops]8485-his troops the whole Ausonian wealth . And yet [old Numitor]1244-old numitor , obtaining aid from [[his]1244-old numitor two grandsons]8486-his two grandsons , won [the land]1295-the land again which [he]1244-old numitor had lost ; and on the festival of [Pales]392-pales were the city walls begun . [King Tatius with [[his]1243-amulius Sabines]8489-his sabines]8488-king tatius with his sabines went to war ; [Tarpeia]1245-tarpeia , who betrayed [the citadel]8118-the citadel , died justly underneath the weight of arms . Then [troops from [Cures]393-cures]8491-troops from cures crept , like silent wolves , without a word toward [men subdued by sleep]8492-men subdued by sleep and tried the gates that [[Ilia]1246-ilia 's son]8493-ilia 's son had barred . Then [[Saturn]463-saturn 's daughter]1507-saturn 's daughter opened wide a gate , turning the silent hinge . [Venus]996-venus alone perceived the bars of that gate falling down . [She]996-venus surely would have closed it , were it not impossible for [any deity]8495-any deity to countervail the acts of [other gods]5613-other gods . [The Naiads of [Ausonia]394-ausonia]8497-the naiads of ausonia occupied [a spring that welled up close to [Janus]1209-janus ' fane]8498-a spring that welled up close to janus ' fane . To [them]8497-the naiads of ausonia [she]996-venus prayed for aid . [The fountain - nymphs]8499-the fountain - nymphs could not resist the prayer of [Venus]996-venus , when [she]996-venus made [her]996-venus worthy plea and [they]8499-the fountain - nymphs released all waters under ground . Till then the path by [Janus]1209-janus ' fane was open , never yet had floods risen to impede the way . But now [they]8499-the fountain - nymphs laid hot sulphur of a faint blue light beneath the streaming fountain and with care applied fire to the hallowed ways with smoking pitch . By these and many other violent means hot vapors penetrated to the source of the good fountain . — Only think of it ! [Those waters which had rivalled [the cold Alps]395-the cold alps]8500-those waters which had rivalled the cold alps , now rivalled with their heat the flames themselves ! And , while each gate post steamed with boiling spray , the gate , which had been opened ( but in vain ) to [hardy Sabines]1247-hardy sabines just outside , was made impassable by the heated fountain 's flood , till [Roman soldiers]8501-roman soldiers had regained [their]8501-roman soldiers arms . After [brave Romulus]1248-romulus had led [them]8501-roman soldiers forth and covered [Roman ground with Sabines dead and [its own people]8503-its own people]8502-roman ground with sabines dead and its own people ; and the accursed sword shed blood of [father - in - law]8504-father - in - law and [son - in - law]2899-son - in - law , with peace [they]8499-the fountain - nymphs chose at last to end the war , rather than fight on to the bitter end : [Tatius]1249-tatius and [Romulus]1248-romulus divide the throne . [Tatius]1249-tatius had fallen , and [you]4569-you , [O Romulus]1248-romulus , were giving laws to [peoples]8506-peoples now made one , when [Mars]565-mars put off [his]565-mars helmet and addressed [the father of gods]8507-the father of gods and [men]1399-men in words like these : “[5026-the virgin] The time has come , for now [the Roman state]4566-the roman state has been established on a strong foundation and [no more]4567-no more must rely on [one man]6498-one man 's strength the time has come for [you]4569-you to give the prize , promised to [me]0-i and [[your]4569-you deserving grandson]4570-your deserving grandson , to raise [him]4570-your deserving grandson from [the earth]1289-the earth and grant [him]4570-your deserving grandson here a fitting place in [heaven]1454-heaven . One day [you]4569-you said to [me]0-i before [a council of [the gods]1395-the gods]4486-a council of the gods , ( for [I]0-i recall now with a grateful mind how [I]0-i took note of [your]4569-you most gracious speech ) ‘ [Him]4570-your deserving grandson [you]4569-you shall lift up to the blue of [heaven]1454-heaven . ’ Now let all know the meaning of [your]4569-you words ! ” [The god all - powerful]8509-the god all - powerful nodded [his]8509-the god all - powerful assent , and [he]8509-the god all - powerful obscured the air with heavy clouds and on a trembling world [he]8509-the god all - powerful sent below harsh thunder and bright lightning . [Mars]565-mars at once perceived it was a signal plainly given for promised change — so , leaning on a spear , [he]565-mars mounted boldly into [[his]565-mars chariot]8510-his chariot , and over bloodstained yoke and eager steeds [he]565-mars swung and cracked the loud - resounding lash . Descending through steep air , [he]565-mars halted on [the wooded summit of [the Palatine]387-the palatine]8511-the wooded summit of the palatine and there , while [[Ilia]1246-ilia 's son]8493-ilia 's son was giving laws — needing no pomp and circumstance of [kings]5447-kings , [Mars]565-mars caught [him]565-mars up . [His]565-mars mortal flesh dissolved into thin air , as when a ball of lead shot up from a broad sling melts all away and soon is lost in [heaven]1454-heaven . A nobler shape was given [him]565-mars , one more fitted to adorn rich couches in [high heaven]5950-high heaven , the shape divine of [Quirinus]1250-quirinus clad in the trabea . [[His]565-mars queen]5074-his queen , [Hersilia]1251-hersilia , wept continually , regarding [him]565-mars as lost , till regal [Juno]488-juno commanded [Iris]471-iris to glide down along [her]471-iris curving bow and bring to [her]471-iris these words : “[4569-you] O matron , glory of [the Latin race]4576-the latin race and of [the Sabines]1247-hardy sabines , worthy to have been the consort chosen by [so great a man]3971-so great a man and now to be [[his]3971-so great a man partner]4578-his partner as [the god Quirinus]4579-the god quirinus , weep no more . If [you]4580-you desire to see [[your]4580-you husband]2405-your husband , let [me]0-i guide [you]4580-you up to a grove that crowns [the hill of [Quirinus]1250-quirinus]4582-the hill of quirinus , shading [a temple of [the Roman king]4584-the roman king]4583-a temple of the roman king . ” [Iris]471-iris obeyed [her]471-iris will , and , gliding down to earth along [her]471-iris tinted bow , conveyed the message to [Hersilia]1251-hersilia ; who replied , with modest look and hardly lifted eye , “[1607-goddess] [Goddess]1607-goddess ( although it is not in [my]0-i power to say [your]1607-goddess name , [I]0-i am quite certain [you]1607-goddess must be [a goddess]5320-a goddess ) , lead [me]0-i , O lead [me]0-i until [you]1607-goddess show to [me]0-i the hallowed form of [[my]0-i beloved husband]4587-my beloved husband . If [the Fates]553-the fates will but permit [me]0-i once again to see [his]4587-my beloved husband features , [I]0-i will say [I]0-i have won [heaven]1454-heaven . ” At once [Hersilia]1251-hersilia and [the virgin child of [Thaumas]661-thaumas]8517-the virgin child of thaumas , went together up [the hill of [Romulus]1248-romulus]8518-the hill of romulus . Descending through thin air there came a star , and then [Hersilia]1251-hersilia [her]1251-hersilia tresses glowing fiery in the light , rose with that star , as it returned through air . And [her]1251-hersilia [the founder of [the Roman state]4566-the roman state]8519-the founder of the roman state received with dear , familiar hands . [He]8519-the founder of the roman state changed [her]1251-hersilia old time form and with the form [her]1251-hersilia name . While this was happening , [they]8523-they began to seek for [one who could endure the weight of such a task]8524-one who could endure the weight of such a task and could succeed [a king so great]8525-a king so great ; and [Fame]691-fame , [the harbinger of truth]8526-the harbinger of truth , destined illustrious [Numa]1252-numa for the sovereign power .
