[He]5013-the god sailed near [the Cumaean Sibyl 's temple]8761-the cumaean sibyl 's temple . [He]5013-the god passed [the Warm Springs]8762-the warm springs and [Linternum]445-linternum , where the mastick trees grow , and [the river]6228-the river called [Volturnus]446-volturnus , where thick sand whirls in the stream , over to [Sinuessa]1274-sinuessa 's snow - white doves ; and then to [Antium]447-antium and [[its]447-antium rocky coast]8764-its rocky coast . When with all sails full spread [the ship]5746-the ship came in [the harbor]3497-the harbor there ( for now [the seas]6344-the seas grew rough ) , [the god]5013-the god uncoiled [his]5013-the god folds , and , gliding out with sinuous curves and all [his]5013-the god mighty length , entered the temple of [[his]5013-the god parent]3550-his parent , where it skirts [that yellow shore]8770-that yellow shore . But , when [the sea]1298-the sea was calm again , the Epidaurian god departing from [[[his]5013-the god father]1530-his father 's shrine]8773-his father 's shrine , where [he]5013-the god a while had shared [the sacred residence]8774-the sacred residence reared to [a kindred deity]8775-a kindred deity , furrowed [the sandy shore]7171-the sandy shore with weight of crackling scales , again [he]5013-the god climbed into the lofty stern and near the rudder laid [his]5013-the god head at rest . There [he]5013-the god remained until [the vessel]5177-the vessel passed by [Castrum]448-castrum and [[Lavinium]449-lavinium 's sacred homes]8778-lavinium 's sacred homes to where [the Tiber]528-the tiber flows into [the sea]1298-the sea there [all the people of [Rome]433-rome]8780-all the people of rome came rushing out — [mothers]5775-mothers and [fathers]2506-fathers and even [those who tend [your]8784-your sacred fire , [O Trojan goddess [Vesta]1275-vesta]8785-o trojan goddess vesta]8783-those who tend your sacred fire , o trojan goddess vesta — and joyous shouted welcome to [the god]5013-the god . Wherever [the swift ship]8787-the swift ship steered through the tide , [they]8787-the swift ship built up many altars in a line , so that perfuming frankincense with smoke crackled along the banks on either hand , and victims made the keen knives hot with blood . [The serpent - deity]8788-the serpent - deity has entered [Rome]433-rome , [[the world]1360-the world 's new capital]8790-the world 's new capital and , lifting up [his]8788-the serpent - deity head above the summit of the mast , looked far and near for [a congenial home]8791-a congenial home . [The river]6228-the river [there]1500-there , dividing , flows about [a place known as [the Island]6372-the island]8794-a place known as the island , on both sides [an equal stream]8796-an equal stream glides past [dry middle ground]8797-dry middle ground . And here [the serpent child of Phoebus]8798-the serpent child of phoebus left [the Roman ship]8799-the roman ship , took [his]8798-the serpent child of phoebus own heavenly form , and brought [the mourning city]8800-the mourning city health once more [[Apollo]549-phoebus 's son]4778-apollo 's son came to [us]8802-us from abroad , but [Caesar]468-caesar is [a god in [[his]468-caesar own land]4752-his own land]8803-a god in his own land . The first in war and peace , [he]468-caesar rose by wars , which closed in triumphs , and by civic deeds to glory quickly won , and even more [[his]468-caesar offspring]8805-his offspring 's love exalted [him]468-caesar as a new , a heavenly , sign and brightly flaming star . Of all the achievements of [great Julius Caesar]468-caesar not one is more ennobling to [his]468-caesar fame than being [father of [[his]468-caesar glorious son]8807-his glorious son]8806-father of his glorious son . Was it more glorious for [him]468-caesar to subdue the Britons guarded by [[their]8805-his offspring sheltering sea]8808-their sheltering sea or lead [his]468-caesar fleet victorious up [the stream]5090-the stream seven mouthed of [the papyrus hearing Nile]527-o nile ; to bring beneath the Roman people s rule rebel [Numidia]451-numidia , [Libyan Juba]452-libyan juba , and strong [Pontus]1276-pontus , proud of [Mithridates]1277-mithridates ' fame ; to have some triumphs and deserve far more ; than to be father of [so great a man]3971-so great a man , with whom as ruler of [the human race , O gods]8811-the human race , o gods , [you]8812-you bless [us]8813-us past all reckoning ? And , lest [that son]3605-that son should come from mortal seed , [Julius Caesar]468-caesar must change and be [a god]4898-a god . When [the golden mother of Aeneas]8816-the golden mother of aeneas was aware of this and saw a grievous end plotted against [[her]8816-the golden mother of aeneas high priest]8817-her high priest , saw the armed conspiracy preparing for [his]8817-her high priest death , with pallid face [she]8816-the golden mother of aeneas met [each god]8818-each god and said : “[0-i] Look with what might this plot prepares itself against [my]0-i cause ; with how much guile it dooms the head which is the last that [I]0-i have left from old - time Iulus , [prince and heir of [Troy]250-troy]4810-prince and heir of troy . Shall [I]0-i alone be harassed through all time by fear well grounded ? First [the son of [Tydeus]1136-tydeus]8035-the son of tydeus must wound [me]0-i with [his]8035-the son of tydeus Calydonian spear ; and then [I]0-i tremble at the tottering walls of [ill defended [Troy]250-troy]4812-ill defended troy ; [I]0-i watch [[my]0-i son]5122-my son driven in long wanderings , tossed upon [the sea]1298-the sea , descending to [the realm of silent shades]4815-the realm of silent shades , and waging war with [Turnus]1214-turnus — or , if [I]0-i should speak the truth , with [Juno]488-juno ! Why do [I]0-i recall disasters of [my]0-i race from long ago ? The present dread forbids [my]0-i looking back at ills now past . See how the wicked swords are whetted for the crime ! Forbid it now , [I]0-i pray [you]4816-you , and prevent the deed , let not [the priest]5774-the priest 's warm blood quench vestal fires ! ” Such words as these , full of [her]488-juno anxious thoughts , [Venus]996-venus proclaimed through [all the heavens]8819-all the heavens , in vain . [The gods]1395-the gods were moved , and , since [they]1395-the gods could not break [the ancient sisters]8821-the ancient sisters ' iron decree , [they]1395-the gods gave instead clear portents of approaching woe . It is declared , resounding arms heard from the black clouds and unearthly trumpet blasts and clarions heard through all the highest heavens , forewarned [men of the crime]8822-men of the crime . The sad sun 's face gave to the frightened world a livid light ; and in the night - time torches seemed to burn amid the stars , and often drops of blood fell in rain - showers . Then [Lucifer]513-lucifer shone blue with all [his]513-lucifer visage stained by darksome rust . The chariot of the moon was sprinkled with red blood . The Stygian owl gave to [the world]1360-the world ill omens . In a thousand places , tears were shed by the ivory statues . [Dirges]1278-dirges , too , are said to have been heard , and threatening words by [unknown speakers in [the sacred groves]8825-the sacred groves]8824-unknown speakers in the sacred groves . [No victim]8826-no victim gave an omen of good life : the fibers showed great tumults imminent , the liver 's cut - off edge was found among the entrails . In [the Forum]8827-the forum , it is said , and round [[men]1399-men 's homes and temples of [the gods dogs]8830-the gods dogs]8829-men 's homes and temples of the gods dogs howled all through the night , and [silent shades]8831-silent shades wandered abroad , and earthquakes shook [the city]5520-the city . But portents of [the gods]1395-the gods could not avert the plots of [men]1399-men and stay approaching fate . Into [a temple]3295-a temple naked swords were brought — into [the Senate House]8836-the senate house . [No other place in [all [our]8839-our city]8838-all our city]8837-no other place in all our city was considered fit for perpetrating such a dreadful crime ! With both hands [Cytherea]384-cytherea beat [her]384-cytherea breast , and in a cloud [she]384-cytherea strove to hide the last of great Aeneas ' line , as in times past [she]384-cytherea had hid [Paris]845-paris from fierce [Menelaus Aeneas]1127-menelaus from the blade of [Diomed]1125-diomed . But [Jove]456-jove , [[her]384-cytherea father]5022-her father , cautioned [her]384-cytherea and said , “[0-i] Do [you]4818-you [[my]0-i daughter]1458-my daughter , without aid , alone , attempt to change the fixed decrees of Fate ? Unaided [you]4818-you may enter [the abode of [the three sisters]4821-the three sisters]4820-the abode of the three sisters and can witness there a register of deeds the future brings . These , wrought of brass and solid iron with vast labor , are unchangeable through all eternity ; and have no weakening fears of thunder - shocks from heaven , nor from the rage of lightnings they are perfectly secure from all destruction . [You]4818-you will surely find the destinies of [[your]4818-you descendants]4822-your descendants there , engraved in everlasting adamant . ' Tis certain . [I]0-i [myself]0-i , have read them there : and [I]0-i , with care have marked them in [my]0-i mind . [I]0-i will repeat them so that [you]4818-you may have unerring knowledge of those future days . “ [Venus]996-venus , [the man on whose behalf [you]4818-you are so anxious]8841-the man on whose behalf you are so anxious , already has completed [his]8841-the man on whose behalf you are so anxious alloted time . The years are ended which [he]8841-the man on whose behalf you are so anxious owed to life on [earth]1287-earth . [You]4818-you with [[his]8841-the man on whose behalf you are so anxious son]5099-his son , who now as [heir to [his]8841-the man on whose behalf you are so anxious estate]8844-heir to his estate must bear the burden of [that government]8845-that government , will cause [him]8841-the man on whose behalf you are so anxious , as [a deity]1690-a deity , to reach the heavens , and to be worshipped in [the temples here]8847-the temples here . “[1283-antony] [The valiant son]4823-the valiant son will plan revenge on [those who killed [[his]4823-the valiant son father]1530-his father and will have [our]4826-our aid in all [his]4823-the valiant son battles]4824-those who killed his father and will have our aid in all his battles . [The defeated walls of [scarred Mutina]453-scarred mutina]4827-the defeated walls of scarred mutina , which [he]4823-the valiant son will besiege , shall sue for peace . [Pharsalia]1280-pharsalia 's plain will dread [his]4823-the valiant son power and [Macedonian Philippi]1281-macedonian philippi be drenched with blood a second time , the name of [one acclaimed as ‘ Great ’]4828-one acclaimed as ‘ great ’ shall be subdued in [the Sicilian waves]454-the sicilian waves . Then [[Egypt]153-egypt 's queen]4829-egypt 's queen , [wife of [the Roman general]4831-the roman general]4830-wife of the roman general , [Antony]1283-antony , shall fall , while vainly trusting in [his]1283-antony word , while vainly threatening that [[our]4826-our Capitol]4832-our capitol must be submissive to [Canopus]1284-canopus ' power . “ Why should [I]8848-i mention [all the barbarous lands]8849-all the barbarous lands and [nations east and west by ocean 's rim]8850-nations east and west by ocean 's rim ? [Whatever habitable earth]8851-whatever habitable earth contains shall bow to [him]1283-antony , [the sea]1298-the sea shall serve [his]1283-antony will ! “[None-None] With peace established over [all the lands]4833-all the lands , [he]1283-antony then will turn [his]1283-antony mind to civil rule and as [a prudent legislator]4834-a prudent legislator will enact wise laws . And [he]1283-antony will regulate the manners of [[his]1283-antony people]4897-his people by [his]1283-antony own example . Looking forward to the days of future time and of posterity , [he]1283-antony will command [the offspring born of [[his]1283-antony devoted wife]4837-his devoted wife]4836-the offspring born of his devoted wife , to assume the imperial name and the burden of [his]1283-antony cares . Nor till [his]1283-antony age shall equal [Nestor]911-nestor 's years will [he]1283-antony ascend to [heavenly dwellings]4838-heavenly dwellings and [[his]1283-antony kindred stars]4839-his kindred stars . Meanwhile transform the soul , which shall be reft from this doomed body , to a starry light , that always god - like [Julius]468-caesar may look down in future from [[his]468-caesar heavenly residence]4840-his heavenly residence upon [[our]4841-our Forum]4842-our forum and [[our]4841-our Capitol]4832-our capitol . ” [Jupiter]475-jupiter hardly had pronounced these words , when kindly [Venus]996-venus , although seen by none , stood in the middle of [the Senate - house]4844-the senate - house , and caught from the dying limbs and trunk of [her]996-venus own Caesar [his]468-caesar departing soul . [She]4837-his devoted wife did not give it time so that it could dissolve in air , but bore it quickly up , toward all the stars of [heaven]1454-heaven ; and on the way , [she]4837-his devoted wife saw it gleam and blaze and set it free . Above the moon it mounted into heaven , leaving behind a long and fiery trail , and as a star it glittered in the sky . There , wondering at [the younger Caesar]468-caesar 's deeds , [Julius]468-caesar confessed they were superior to all of [his]468-caesar , and [he]468-caesar rejoiced because [[his]468-caesar son]5099-his son was greater even than [himself]468-caesar . Although [the son]4847-the son forbade [men]1399-men to regard [his]4847-the son own deeds as the : mightier ! Fame , that moves free and untrammelled by the laws of [men]1399-men , preferred [him]4847-the son even against [his]4847-the son own desire and in that one point disobeyed [his]4847-the son will . And so great [Atreus]729-atreus yields to greater fame of [Agamemnon]1128-agamemnon , [Aegeus]855-aegeus yields to [Theseus]856-theseus , and [Peleus]872-peleus to [Achilles]1048-achilles , or , to name a parallel befitting [these two gods]4850-these two gods , so [Saturn]463-saturn yields to [Jove]456-jove . Now [Jupiter]475-jupiter rules in [high heavens]4851-high heavens and is the suzerain over [the waters]5216-the waters and [the world of shades]4853-the world of shades , and now [Augustus]469-augustus rules in [all the lands]4833-all the lands — so each is both [a father]1601-a father and [a god]4898-a god . [Gods who once guarded [[our]4858-our Aeneas]4859-our aeneas , when both swords and fire gave way , and [native gods of [Italy]414-italy]4860-native gods of italy , and [Father Quirinus]1250-quirinus — [patron of [Rome]433-rome]4861-patron of rome]4857-gods who once guarded our aeneas , when both swords and fire gave way , and native gods of italy , and father quirinus — patron of rome , and [you]4862-you [Gradivus]1285-gradivus too — [the sire of [Quirinus]1250-quirinus the invincible , and [Vesta]1275-vesta hallowed among [[Caesar]468-caesar 's gods]4864-caesar 's gods , and [Phoebus]549-phoebus ever worshipped at [[his]549-phoebus hearth]4865-his hearth , and [Jupiter]475-jupiter who rules [the citadel high on [Tarpeia]1245-tarpeia 's cliff]4866-the citadel high on tarpeia 's cliff]4863-the sire of quirinus the invincible , and vesta hallowed among caesar 's gods , and phoebus ever worshipped at his hearth , and jupiter who rules the citadel high on tarpeia 's cliff , and other gods — all gods to whom [a poet rightfully and with all piety]4867-a poet rightfully and with all piety may make appeal ; far be that day — postponed beyond [our]4868-our time , when great [Augustus]469-augustus shall foresake [the earth]1289-the earth which [he]469-augustus now governs , and mount up to heaven , from that far height to hear [[his]469-augustus people]4897-his people 's prayers ! And now , [I]0-i have completed a great work , which not [Jove]456-jove 's anger , and not fire nor steel , nor fast - consuming time can sweep away . Whenever it will , let the day come , which has dominion only over this mortal frame , and end for [me]0-i the uncertain course of life . Yet in [my]0-i better part [I]0-i shall be borne immortal , far above the stars on high , and mine shall be a name indelible . Wherever Roman power extends [her]4871-her sway over [the conquered lands]4872-the conquered lands , [I]0-i shall be read by lips of [men]1399-men . If [Poets]4681-poets ' prophecies have any truth , through all the coming years of future ages , [I]0-i shall live in fame .
